Summary: I had the privilege of attending a Government Finance Officers Association training as well as lodged at this facility on last week. It appears to be a very busy resort and they operate with a "Spirit of Excellence." I would highly recommend this resort for a leisurely stay and it is in close proximity to the beach. I will definitely visit again with family at my leisure when I have more time to enjoy the facility and tour the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words.  We love hearing from our conference attendees.  We do hope you will visit us again with your family and some quality leisure time!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Busy hotel and excellent service when a particular housekeeping issue arose.  The staff, across the board, were accommodating, professional, gracious, and seemed to be genuinely concerned that guests were satisfied with any aspect of their stay.  Just another of many favorable Hyatt visits, and reasons why my entire family views Hyatt as the most reliable and dependable hotel properties of all major brands.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay, services and amenities and are especially gratified with all of your kind words about our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Boutique hotel in Newport Beach. I love this property it's not overwhelming with large buildings spread out nicely. The entertainment they have on Friday nights during the season Is always a good time. New patio furniture makes it more welcoming and with the addition of a barista bar complimentary depending on your level of Hyatt membership.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: A great play to stay during your vacation Great staff, great location, great hotel! I definitely will return to stay at this hotel! I was treated exceptionally well from the minute I arrived to the minute I checked out. If you are staying in Southern California, my recommendation would be to stay at a Hyatt property
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words.  We especially appreciate your shout out to our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great place to stay with amazing service and accommodations  and close to beach (approximately 2 miles). Coffee bar in the morning (6:30am) and they also offer great selection of breakfast items. One of the most helpful technology--ordering your coffee the night before and having it ready for pick up! Check-in done via email/mobile app and check-out same manner. Truly, a great place for business, travel for two or with family. Very family friendly. They even had a room (large with games for the litlte ones and place) to sit and enjoy beverages.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words, recommendation and great rating!  We are delighted to hear that you had an excellent stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The room was okay. Not sure it was worth the amount of money I had paid. My room was freezing and the heat would not stay on. The staff was very polite and the valet workers were very quick and polite!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it.  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The Hyatt Newport Beach never disappoints! Roomy lobby and sitting areas inside and outside, beautiful grounds, centrally located to so many places.  Highly recommend! Staff is always helpful, professional, friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Having stayed at this hotel before we knew what to expect and we're not disappointed. The hotel and grounds are spotless as always, and the staff are all incredibly friendly and helpful. I can't really fault any part of our 7 night stay, thanks again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your sincere review and many kind words.  We do hope you will visit us again soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Okay the views are alright.  Here’s  the skinny on the rooms.  The walls are paper thin.  Men were snoring on both side of my room.  I can hear everyone taking each step above me, like they are going to fall through the ceiling any second. I can hear everything.  Zipping the suitcase, opening the balcony, taking a pee,   I called to request a room on the top floor at the end of the hall.  Ashley accommodated. Apologized and said we’re going to remodel.  Yeah right.  Where’s the bill dozer?   Do not stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  It does sound as if you are employing quite a bit of hyperbole to describe an older property.  I assure you that no guest has ever fallen through our ceiling but duly noted that the noise levels vary from building to building.  We were happy to accommodate your room change request and rest assured all of your comments have been shared with our leadership.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great location, clean, fun, lots of activities. Will be coming back soon! The views and the overall atmosphere is top tier, I enjoyed my bike rides and the sunsets at night, the staff was very friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for mentioning all of our fun outdoor activities!  Our large campus-style hotel is perfect for active people who enjoy being outdoors.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The staff was very professional and friendly, and the food was excellent.  My only comment is that the rooms are dated (carpeting, art, ease of plugging in electronics).  Room amenities (bathroom supplies and water) were excellent.  I really appreciated the water bottles that were included in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel is beautiful. My room had a balcony overlooking the golf course which was beautifully maintained.  The food and drinks were amazing. The staff were helpful, friendly, and professional. I would recommend spending time here.l
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay with us.  We especially appreciate the shout out to our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy

Summary: I booked a 2 queen bed room. I arrived to be told they were all sold out and could only give me a 1 king bed room with a roll-away. We all know till aways aren’t as comfy as a real bed. They bring the bed in, I move the sheets and see a spider, needless to say, I didn’t sleep very good. Room key didn’t work to open the parking gate. I left in early in the morning and forgot an item inside the room, and of course my 2 keys don’t work to get back inside. I run to the hotel lobby, since I’m in a rush, and it’s not staffed. I didn’t have time to wait around so I lost the item. Hotel seems pretty dated and it has seen better days. Overall, a pretty bad experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback is invaluable to our team.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and we are confident we can make your next stay with us one you will enjoy more.  Many of our frequent guests have come to love and appreciate our complimentary tennis, bikes and golf and three pools from which to choose.  We do hope you will give us another try as many of the issues you encountered can surely be remedied with ease.  Again, thank you for your time.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The room and building felt very old and outdated. We were constantly woken up by noise (mostly hotel doors slamming shut - the only way to properly close the doors) very early in the morning (6 am) and we could hear everything going on around; the room had no sound proofing. The doors to our bathrooms were shutters that bathroom smells could go through and someone could peak through. There was no fan in the bathroom. The toilet was very close to the shower doors. The thermostat made 3 loud beeping noises every time the temperature was changed (so you can't adjust it in the middle of the night without waking everyone up). The mattress was not great and the pillows were so soft they provided no support whatsoever. The TV and cable felt very outdated; there were no options to sign
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback is invaluable to our team!  We actually do have Chromecast available for streaming Netflix and the other services.  I wish you had reached out for assistance while you were on property.  Again, we appreciate your feedback and hope you will give us another try in the near future, as so many of our frequent guests have come to appreciate all of our amenities, such as complimentary beach cruiser bike rentals, as well as complimentary tennis and golf.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Bullets and garbage in my "clean" room!!
Summary: Checked in to this hotel expecting the Hyatt experience.   It felt like a glorified Motel 6 with exterior doors to the rooms, no elevators to second floors, dirty carpeting on exterior floors.   A very weird experience.   Inside the bed was fantastic and perhaps the only clean thing in the room...room was dirty with random items being found throughout the stay... a receipt from someone's shopping excursion, a pill on the floor (God knows what it was!) a dry erase marker on the floor near the bed and the icing on the cake....a BULLET in the safe.    Way to go, Hyatt....    I give credit to the nice lady at check-in and a killer avocado toast.   That is all.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  Our hotel team has been made aware of your comments and we have alerted our housekeeping department to initiate a new and more extensive inspection protocols.  We hope you will give us another try as so many of our frequent guests have come to enjoy our property and all of its amenities.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Our stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach was superb, and I wish that we could have stayed longer. All staff were very helpful, friendly and knowledgeable. The evening food was good and the breakfast menu outstanding. The room was fine and everywhere was really clean. We would have liked to stay longer.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words.  We can't wait to welcome you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Spent our family vacation at this so-called 4-star hotel resort during X'mas. The room is average, with only one tiny rubbish bin in the whole room for 4 pax, but a bunch of dust hanging on the air vent over our toilet.   The worst part was their customer services. Be aware that they will overcharge your credit card without any alerts during your checkout. Never happened in all my hotel stays before, where I'll usually be notified for any final charges and asked if I'd like to pay by credit card on file or any other means.   Make sure you check all your invoice and receipt on the spot during checkout, cause their staff will simply ignore you, and don't bother to response to all your emails afterward.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our hotel team and leadership.  We do hope you will give us another try, as so many of our frequent guests have come to feel at home with such amenities as complimentary golf, tennis and bike rentals.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The room was very clean and updated, I enjoyed my private patio facing the pool however the bar area left something to be desired --feels like it lacked character and condiments were not readily accessible -like honey or sugar for tea or coffee (for non alcohol drinkers). Breakfast options were limited and quality was poor -avocado toast was more like old guac served on a cold thick slice of bread. Overall, I enjoyed my stay but would not choose to dine in next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your comments have been shared with our hotel team and we appreciate your feedback.  We do hope you will visit us again soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Excellent hotel experience! Beautiful hotel and common areas, extremely clean, rooms spacious and very comfortable, staff extraordinarily friendly and helpful. Highly recommended and we hope to visit again soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for all your kind words. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and the wedding.  We especially appreciate the shout out to our colleagues!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Highly recommended. Clean rooms, friendly service, luxurious stay, good options to eat and drink, shuttle service to Disney Parks. They made it easier with little kids. Our requests were answered kindly and on time.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to your next visit!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Hotel staff was okay. Rooms needed upgrade, especially bathrooms. Wallpaper peeling off. Chairs were torn and couch bed needed new mattress. Grounds well kept but overall facility was old and needed more TLC.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it.  We appreciate all of your feedback and rest assured, we have shared it with our leadership.  We hope you were able to take advantage of some of the truly unique amenities our hotel offers, like complimentary golf, tennis and rental bikes.  We hope you will visit us again and enjoy the grounds, three pools and hiking trails as well.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Too expensive for an old hotel
Summary: Old, no room service after 10, No lobby coffee service in the morning and the add on fees are just stupid.  My room rate was $297 for one night but after taxes and resort fees, it came out to $421 with out any food or drinks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  We wish you were able to take advantage of our many amenities that are part of our resort fee, like bike rentals, tennis and golf.  Many of our frequent guests enjoy these bonuses.   We do hope you will give us another try in the future as we have become a favorite among our frequent guests.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Better than expected! Grounds were clean and tranquil.  Room service was fast and friendly. Food was surprisingly very good.  (Only one negative thing to say is: Parking was expensive especially since there are no other options for parking. Self-parking should be free if you're a guest. Period.)
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know we've exceeded your expectations!  Will pass on your feedback regarding parking.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Always the Best service and beautiful property
Summary: Love staying at the Newport Beach, CA property! Staff is accommodating and the property is well kept and inviting. The property views are absolutely amazing. Stay in the Lido properties and witness a breathtaking view of the bay!
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.    Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Room smelled of mildew. Food and drinks were poor. Feels like they haven’t updated the hotel for 50 years. Cottage cheese ceiling. Staff pleasant. Maid service entered room without knocking. Front desk recommended a restaurant and did not call and make reservation… it was fully booked when we arrived.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While we wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our hotel team and leadership.  We do hope you will give us another try as we have become a favorite among locals and frequent guests who enjoy our expansive property, and complimentary tennis, golf and rental bikes.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Expensive, service wasn't friendly, parking is ridiculous, and room felt dated.  I've stayed throughout Newport Beach and Laguna Beach and I would never go back to this hotel, especially for the money.  So many better options.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are sincerely sorry that you did not enjoy your stay with us, as so many locals and frequent guests have come to love our iconic property.  We do hope you will give us another try and take advantage of our complimentary amenities like golf, tennis and rental beach cruiser bikes.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: This is a 1950's hotel that has modern updates. Somewhat charming and great location but substantially overpriced ("resort fees" , parking). I did not use the hotel dining as the restaurants of Newport Beach are one of the main attractions in the area. The hotel location provides great driving access to all the local attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write and share a review with us.  We appreciate your feedback and your comments have been shared with our leadership.  We do hope you will give another try and enjoy some of our complimentary amenities, like golf, tennis and bike rentals.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: In addition to just being a great hotel/resort, the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach has a fantastic location!  You are close to everything no matter where in the area  you are going!  And the service is top notch.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and we appreciate your mention of our top-notch service!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We stayed here in October 2022. We met up with relatives from Australia, and there were so many places to visit while enjoying the grounds. We especially enjoyed sharing the 'smores kit around one of the fire pits because this camping tradition is not a thing in Australia.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.    Happy Holidays!  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Nice property convenient to PCH and OC airport
Summary: Nice hotel, grounds, and amenities. Convenient to Newport Beach, Balboa Peninsula, and PCH. Also easy to get to Orange County Airport.  Room very functional with pool, jacuzzi, tennis courts, o hole golf, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This hotel is very quite  but also has a lot of activities for family and friends. Games, reading room, pools. Walking paths and views of the Back Bay. Close to Fashion Island for shopping. Easy drive to Balboa Island or Corona Del Mar or Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and great rating!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I’m really amazed at the good reviews here. The common areas are decent, but the rooms are terrible. The Bayview king suite we are staying in looks nothing like the website pictures depicted. It looks more like a Travel Lodge in terms of the quality and lack of luxury. The bathroom is actually worse, very small and poorly appointed. The in room coffee is horrible and we actually threw out what we made. The walls are so thin and poorly insulated that we could hear the family in the room next-door at 11:30 watching an animated movie and we had to sleep with earplugs on. The airplane noise, particularly in the evenings, is a major distraction. If the property were rebuilt they could put a noise resistant glass that you wouldn’t notice. The balcony is small, dark and uninviting. The
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Our resort fee covers golf, tennis and bike rentals. We appreciate your feedback and comments and have shared them with our leadership.  The images on our website depict each of the room types available and were updated recently.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Sub-Par for a Hyatt Regency Resort
Summary: The resort was beautiful but the rooms were below standard for this type of resort. The heater didn’t really heat the room so we were subjected to very cold nights. Also, the linens did not smell great. They smelled musty, not clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While we wish you had a better experience, your feedback is invaluable to our resort team.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and housekeeping team.  We do hope you will give us another try, as our large outdoor spaces, complimentary bike rentals, tennis and golf are all amenities that are not available at other Newport Beach hotels.  Sincerely  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Multiple stays and would stay again.
Summary: I’ve stayed at the  Hyatt Regency Newport Beach and it’s always reliable. I prefer the main building, Catalina, which is closer  to the restaurant and parking.  The restaurant food is good and reasonably priced for a Newport Beach hotel. I also like the pool and jacuzzi near the Catalina building which is usually peaceful and quiet.  One of the front desk persons, Zach, was very acomodating and helped us get the room that we requested. Balboa Island is an easy walk from the hotel. My only complaint is that we could hear people moving around above us but other than that, I will still return.
Manager Response: Thank for your your kind words.  We love hearing from our frequent guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon to enjoy the room/building that you prefer.    Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: reservation and was somehow messed up online. which happens. no big deal. but was not expected was the complete apathy we received from the staff. we are Hyatt members and were staying for 5 days for our corporate event also located on the property. we were so dissatisfied with the service we stayed one night, checked into another hotel and commuted each day for the conference. the other hotel was wonderful, and we were able to salvage out trip and have a great time. my advice? there are other really good hotels in Newport that do value business. choose wisely.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.   While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback in invaluable to our hotel team.  Again, we appreciated you comments and do hope you will give us another try, as our hotel has so many features, like complimentary golf, tennis and bikes.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Service areas I experienced were excellent.  The staff at check-in were very kind and made me feel as if I was special.  My room was excellent.  It is a lovely location and the feel while I was there was very relaxing.  I enjoyed the face that is was a small hotel (3 floors).  The style and location was perfect for the surrounding area.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,   Cathy S.

Summary: The grounds here are really nice. Meandering pathways, lush vegetation, multiple pools and activities. The 9 hole golf course is very manageable for the novice player. It would be perfect to take kids out on, but fun for adults too. Staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, especially those about our colleagues.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Old budget hotel in need of a renovation
Summary: Despite the pricing, know that this is a BUDGET hotel....in fact, i stayed at a budget hotel earlier on my trip and it was way more comfortable and accommodating. Beware - you can hear every noise in the room above you....You have to wonder why they would put someone on top when there are plenty of other rooms available. Their towels are not at all comfortable - fraying and coarse like sandpaper. When i turned on the shower i was welcome with a spray of water everywhere - the shower heads need to be updated as well. The one night i decided to try out the bar - they decided to do drilling in the bar area (fixing their TVs)...was probably around 10pm at night....impossible to hold a conversation. Lousy experience. Next time i am in town I will be staying at the VEA or somewhere
Manager Response: Thank you for the detailed account of your stay.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our teams.  All of your comments have been shared with our leadership for further inspection.  Again, thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.

Summary Heading: BAD SERVICE AND HORRIBLE SUPPORT WITH ADA REQUIREMENTS
Summary: long wait for my room and no ADA support when i told them i didn't have my plaque with my....they told me i would get towed and needed to park it someplace else...i parked in the parking lot and walked all the way back to my room in pain....manager didn't help or come out to assist and room wasn't an upgrade as promised and i waiting over 5 hours when i showed up before all my other colleagues. I will never refer this place because the management here is very unprofessional.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our teams.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership team and we sincerely apologize for the long wait and discomfort you experienced at our hotel.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Great Time at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach
Summary: Had a wonderful time at this beautiful resort. Was there for business and would definitely come back for leisure. The amenities at the hotel were wonderful! and the staff was very accommodating. Everyone treated our group very well!
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We love hearing from our conference attendees.  So glad your group meeting was a success and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Wonderful, relaxing stay in Newport Beach
Summary: Enjoyable stay for a long weekend. We stayed in the Presidential Suite, and it was well appointed and comfortable. Four large slider doors led out to a long balcony that overlooked the golf course. Perfect for enjoying the Newport Beach weather. Beautifu heated pool and Jacuzzis were great for soaking up the sun and realxing in the evening. Great breakfast at Shor. Great location to go out to eat at the many great restaurants at night.
Manager Response: Thank you so much much for your excellent rating and review!  We are delighted you enjoyed all of our amenities and Shor.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Nice, relaxing location for a getaway from the rest of the world.  Nicely appointed, clean rooms.  Very helpful staff.  First time stay, but will definitely plan to return.  Newport Beach has many wonderful attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great rating and review!  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Noisy hotel and poorly designed bathrooms
Summary: This property needs a facelift and some paint.  It would be a good idea to advertise that the property is right under the flight path to a busy airport.  Very noisy as was the AC and the room in general to the rooms next door and pedestrian traffic outside.  Very disappointing.  Also, it is hard to believe the chain of incompetence that allowed for the design of the bathroom to actually get planed and then get built with the toilet right next to the shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  All of your comments have been shared with our leadership and we appreciate your feedback.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The room and the room landscape are completely inconsistent with the description of the website and the requirements when booking, the room equipment is insufficient, the room location is poor, there is no clear sign on how to go to the lobby after parking, there is no handicap facility between the lobby and the parking lot, from the back of the hotel to  Too many steps in the lobby
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  I apologize for the difficulty you encountered between our parking area and lobby.  We do have golf carts and attendants available to assist guests, and that should have been communicated to you upon check in.  Our hotel is ADA compliant and I am sincerely sorry that an ADA route was not shared with you.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback is invaluable to our team.  We appreciate you comments and will strive to better communicate these issues to our guests.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The check in experience was a nightmare- instead of charging $75 a night for a hold for incidents, they charged $995 for a 3 night stay hold!!! They said they tried to call me to let me know, however that was a lie. The room had ants on the bed and rooms by the kid pool were very outdated.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our hotel team.  We hope you will give us another try as our hotel has become a favorite among locals for its complimentary golf, tennis and rental bikes.  Our Back Bay location and large campus-style grounds are also loved by families traveling with children and dogs.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Hotel and rooms have a strong odor of mold. Carpets we so gross my feet stuck to the carpet. Bed was harder than a rock, room prices are not worth it. I checked out after 1 night and tried to locate another hotel 1 hour after being in the room. Had I not been so tired from a day of travel I would have left and went somewhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback is invaluable to our team.  We appreciate your comments and have shared them with our housekeeping department.  We do hope you will give us another try as so many of our frequent guests have come to appreciate our grounds, complimentary tennis, golf and bike rentals.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: I love this hotel more every time I stay there! I sleep so good, I even checked what kind of pillows they use so I could purchase the same for at home. I love the grounds and all the beautiful succulents and tropical feel of the resort. Even though I was there on business, my stay was relaxing and enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thanks for your kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Mr. Chen made our experience at the hotel a very memorable beautiful event thank you. We will be back again thanks to the excellent service that he took the time to arrange for us thank you very much we appreciate the dedicated service.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and great rating!  We appreciate  your feedback and comments about Mr. Chen and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Beautiful hotel and surrounding area.  Very clean.  Worth every penny spent.  Atmosphere is great.  Employees are nice and accommodating.  Bar staff excellent.  Waiting staff excellent during breakfast, lunch dinner.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent rating and review.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and especially appreciate your kind words about our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: My company has hosted their Conference here for several years, prior to COVID, and this was our first year back. My view was amazing. And I had 2 exceptional employees assist me. Only concern was the community lavatories had spider webs and spiders on 2 of the 3 stalls. I a petrified of spiders. If not for that I would have 5 starred the experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We love hearing from our conference attendees. Thank you for your feedback and please note that our housekeeping services team is on it.  We appreciate your comments and do hope you will visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I had a delightful time at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. Checkin was charming, with the cozy lobby area and outstanding staff. The hotel grounds are massive! They have ample bellman available to golf cart you and your luggage to the room. I stayed on the first floor of the Balboa building and had a nice view of the grounds and pool area - nice music was played there and they even had a hammock (my fave amenity). I didn’t try the bar or restaurant, and they had a highly rated golf course next door (like 50 yards from the front door).   It is located in a good area, but not really walkable (although I did from the Balboa Island ferry - about 2 miles and not too bad). Room was great, with patio, large toilet, but a firm mattress that wasn’t to my liking. Overall, an excellent
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and we are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Always a pleasure and relaxing time with the Hyatt Family!  The service was as expected, warm greetings and the extra stuff that makes if like being home and east knowing that excellent people are there to help and make the stay special.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a part of our Hyatt Family!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and look forwad to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: 3* hotel w/ lots of recreational resources
Summary: Hotel is old but has lots of recreational facilities.  It is close to lots of local restaurants, quite accessible. $35 overnight parking is a bit expensive for this hotel.  Staff was friendly & pleasant.  Choices of food in hotel restaurant were quite limited!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Excellent location - not on the beach but close.  Very private grounds, several pools and spas.  My room was clean and comfortable.  Very quiet until the housekeepers started slamming doors as they went in and out cleaning rooms.  Overall, a very enjoyable stay.  No major complaints.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Nice property but rooms need renovation
Summary: Property is well kept and the exterior amenities are nice. The rooms really need a renovation and felt old and dirty. Staff was very helpful about changing us to a better room. The new room was much nicer but overall we wouldn’t stay again until the hotel does some renovations.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, especially those regarding our colleagues.  We appreciate your feedback and it has been shared with our leadership.  We do hope to welcome you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This hotel is in a good location central to a lot of attractions but the property is poorly maintained. This could be an awesome property with golfing, tennis, bicycles and proximity to shopping and the Newport back bay. Unfortunately the property is not in good condition and you will wish you chose another place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  You mention all of the amenities that our property offers -- golf, tennis, bikes, as well as three pools, cabanas, fire pits and hot tubs.  We are sorry you wish you chose another place to stay.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Disappointing Stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach
Summary: My room was small and dated. Housekeeping service was awful. If I had not begged the front desk, my room would never have been cleaned at all. The cleaning I did receive was from a man without a cart, cleaning supplies, or fresh linen. My most disappointing Hyatt experience ever. I usually rave about my Hyatt stays. This was a stinker.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better stay, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  We have had some setbacks with our housekeeping protocols and inspection process.  We are re-examining our current operations and policies to remedy the situation.  We hope you will give us another try, as our grounds, amenities (complimentary bikes, tennis and golf) and large campus have become a favorite among our frequent guests.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Old hotel, mediocre conditions and don’t even ask to have your room serviced. It’s an act of congress to have your room cleaned and the staff is argumentative at best. Not a Newport Beach experience and there are way better hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Thank  you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While we wish you had a better experience, you feedback is invaluable to our team.  It sounds as though we dropped the ball with housekeeping and I do appreciate your comments as they have been shared with our hotel team.  We sincerely apologize that your stay was less than satisfactory.  Please contact me directly before your next stay, so we as a team can demonstrate our commitment to authentic hospitality.    Sincerely,  Cathy Scott cathy.scott@hyatt.com

Summary: A great hotel in the Newport Beach area. The staff was extremely helpful and willing to always meet our needs. The restaurant was slow and the food was just so so. One issue is the price for self-parking. It was $36.00 per day and on weekends when they have concerts, it was hard to find a spot.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words, especially those about our colleagues.  Your feedback has been shared with our leadership and we do hope to welcome you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: $43 for valet parking after paying $600 a night seems quite high. Also charged 2 different “tip” charges on room service order. Shor restaurant only had set menu for Newport concert series nights, very limited
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We hope you will give us another try when we are not having a concert on property.!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Overall good.  People /staff very helpful and it was across the street from the event we were attending that weekend. We attended the Pacific Food and Wine Festival at Newport Beach. Very nice too. Overall great time all weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  So glad you enjoyed your stay as well as the Pacific Food and Wine Fest!  We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The room is about motel level while I am being charged for Hyatt room price. I would not come back to this hotel. Because of this experience, Marriott is my preferred hotel. I would be extremely careful in visiting Hyatt next time
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are sorry that our hotel was no satisfactory and not a high-rise.  Our mid-century low-rise property has a large campus like setting that so many of guests have come to appreciate.  We also offer amenities such as golf, tennis and bikes as part of our destination fee.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The staff was so pleasant and helpful. I totally enjoyed my stay and the food was great too! Due to an airline mishap my luggage was lost for 2 days and they were more than happy to supply me with extra personal care items and make sure that I was comfortable. Also, the beds were amazing to sleep on!
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words about our colleagues!  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We stayed here for a wedding and brought our kids along with a sitter. The rooms are dated but if you're not going to spend much time in them, they'll do the job. Keep in mind if traveling with kids, they put us in a building with no elevator. Strollers, baby seat, luggage..etc was a struggle Nice amenities, such as multiple pools, gyms, and a 9 hole golf course on site. The food at the restaurant was okay but overpriced. Keep in mind you're not walking distance to any other restaurants. Fashion island is "across the street" but quite a treck uphill. We had an overall good experience but we've stayed at other hotels in the area with better customer service and closer to shops and food. More bang for your buck. After all, when you're on vacation, that's all you really want.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are glad you enjoyed our grounds, pools and golf course.  We wish you would have let us know you needed help getting to your guest room.  We have golf carts available and would have shuttled you to your room.  We hope in the future you will stay with us again as so many of our guests have come to appreciate and enjoy our Back Bay location and our large campus, especially families.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The Valet was outstanding I couldn't Believe how fast my car arrived. All of the staff made us feel as if we Owned the hotel. Can't wait to come back again KR. You ove it to yourself to experience this Hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The property was in great shape and beautiful.  All associates and service prersonal were wonderful and above average. We were in room 319 and would highly recommend it.  It is a very large property. My dislikes are the high charges for parking and I hate that. the daily fee is not include in the price and should be because you can not avoid it and hopefully someday they will force the hotels etc to include them in the daily cost instead of an extra.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and especially appreciate the shout out to our colleagues.  Your feedback regarding our parking and destination fees has been shared with our leadership.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Older hotel with some signs of aging but the staff, rooms, location and ambiance are excellent! TV in room could be upgraded to smart tv but otherwise was happy with my room. The grounds are well kept, and the staff is very helpful and professional.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, especially the shout out to our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S,

Summary: Wonderful staff, facilities and food. I would definitely come again! Love it and I will recommend this place to anyone staying in Newport Beach. It not exactly on the beach but the back bay area was awesome!
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and look forward t o welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Overall a very good experience!!! wonderful location and lots of activities for kids. We had an 8 year old boy with us for his birthday. They tried to fix the technical problems we had. The staff was very receptive and nice!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We are delighted you chose our hotel to celebrate a birthday.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: This Hyatt is very old and shows its age. Needs a complete renovation to be in Newport Beach. Rooms have AC units on balconies. Amenities are sparse and hotel corridors are dreary.  Staff need to be trained better on customer service. Housekeeping staff though are very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your feedback.  It has been brought to the attention of our leadership and hotel team.  We appreciate your kind words about our housekeeping services.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Amazing location and very beautiful setting - this is truly a great place to stay. Staff is responsive and friendly and Charisma the manager is the best. The hotel needs a bit of renovation as needs cubicle in the bathrooms for bathing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and excellent rating!  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The massive property is really beautiful and I can see it being an excellent vacation or staycation for families. I stayed with my boyfriend and we loved that there are multiple pools to sneak away from the young families playing.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We are delighted you had a great stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Swimming pools one has a water slide , a kids splash pad area ,hot tubs ,ping pong ,horse shoes, shuffle board, volleyball sand area. The par3 9 hole golf course also has a putting green area that hotel guest can play as much as they want. This was a big hit with our 15 year old grandson.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed all that our property has to offer!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: I have stated a number of hotels recently that took advantage of the store times during Covid to freshen up the rooms and do updates. This was not one of those hotels. Lobby and guest rooms are tired. Food was subpar. They are charging for too much for the rooms given the state of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your feedback has been shared with our leadership.  We hope you were able to enjoy our three pools, complimentary golf, tennis and bike rentals while you were staying with us.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The Hyatt Regency Newport Beach is a beautiful hotel. The staff is friendly and helpful. The swimming pools and hot tubs are amazing. It was peaceful. I like the trees and the flowers. It was quiet. The staff promptly fixed the ceiling in the bathroom that was leaking. An amazing experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words -- we are delighted you enjoyed your stay!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Warning  This Hyatt is a disgrace to the Hyatt brand. If you travel for business do not stay here. You will be very disappointed.  As a Hyatt loyal meme er for 35 years I have never seen a “resort” property in such disrepair. This place is old, musty, worn and aches for reinvestment dollars. Dont be fooled by the great reviews. These are families packed into rooms enjoying the water slides and aged amenities.   You have been warned.

My family and I come her quite often.  This place is excellently located with quick access to the beach and a nearby 10 mile trek around the Back Bay.  The grounds are peaceful and beautiful. The resort fee includes use of the golf and tennis courts.  We also enjoyed the restaurant and the friendly wait staff there.  Kudos to to Sichi L. and Beverly E.  for accomodating us and making our stay that much more enjoyable.  They provide excellent service and support to make our stay comfortable.  Noise can be a factor, however if you bring your own white noise machine, we never heard a thing!!! :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words, especially those directed at our resort team, like Sichi and Beverly!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: staff was friendly and attentive.  Grounds were clean and stocked.  Overall stay was awesome. Looking forward to returning next year. Location was perfect.   The restaurant was clean and the for was delicious.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review our resort.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The resort is old and in dire need of updates. The room was very old and smelled like mold. I was extremely disappointed with the resort. For the price, I was expecting way more. It was more like a 3 star hotel at best.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate all of your comments and have shared them with our leadership.  Your feedback is invaluable to us.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The staff did nothing to accomodate me when I realize a mistake was made through booking with one of their travel partners.  The beds in the room were less than satisfactory.  I won't be booking rooms with the hyatt anymore
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback is invaluable to our team.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and we do hope you will reconsider and give us another try as our hotel has become a Newport Beach favorite, because of our tennis, golf and bike rental amenities that are complimentary to our guests.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Parking lot and rooms could be a lot better
Summary: The parking lot for the location was a 5~10min walk away from the front lobby. And the rooms felt more like a motel then what I'd normally expect from a Hyatt Regency resort. The other amenities were quite nice
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate all of your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The staff were all very friendly and accommodating.  The room was not ready by 4pm, so we received a comp for a pastry and coffee.  The grounds were well kept. We had a lovely view in room #329.  However, the shower was very loud, and the bathroom could use a vanity mirror. Room service and bell staff were prompt and friendly.   Be warned, it's in the John Wayne Airport flight path, and the plane noise was annoying at times.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We appreciate all of your comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Wonderful Reunion-68th.  Wonderful to re-connect with classmates from the class of 1954.  The Hotel Site was clean with lots of beautiful plants, wide paths with attention to ramps to avoid alot of stairs.  We did room service on our last night.  Quick service.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Thanks for taking care of us!
Summary: Stayed here for one night because our AC went out at home during the Southern California heat wave. The staff was very welcoming and upgraded our room and we had a pretty view of the garden and the pool, which my kids loved! I haven't stayed here since before my kids were born so it was nice to be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We appreciate your great rating and review, especially your comments about our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I recognize that the hotel's location is optimal for access to the nearby bay and other amenities on Balboa Island etc.  But for $379 per night plus the always mandatory resort fee, one would expect a much nicer room.  The furnishings in the room and all of the hotel decor were extremely dated, there were no drinking glasses in the room and the natural lighting in the room was limited.  Overall, very disappointing, and I would rather spend a lot less and drive a few extra minutes.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are sorry you stay was less than satisfactory and we appreciate your feedback about the lighting in our guest rooms.  All of your comments have been shared with our leadership and we hope you will give us another try.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The external hotel is very old looks like any apartment cut up to have small hotel rooms . The internal was ok . I wouldn't recommend it for a romantic area. But good for kids there is a waterslide in one of the pools
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Tired rooms in need of good clean
Summary: Stayed here numerous times over the years first time since COVID this time  The hotel is almost how I remember it but noting seems to have been done to improve the hotel over the years in terms of rooms,  Rooms do need updating,  Bathrooms need a good clean Towels are so hard General wear and tear  Dirty  bathroom doors and paintwork that look like they have never had a clean  Pool area needs sweeping and mattresses a good clean   Hotel rooms are showing signs of age  Self parking costs are rediculous,  On check in I was asked if I would like a room with a patio or balcony If you say balcony that’s considered as a upgrade for $9 per night That should be an option when you reserve the room, not when you check in  I  Not sure I would be staying next time ☹️
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  All of your feedback has been shared with our leadership and we do hope you will give us another try as our resort is a favorite for all of our complimentary activities, like bike rentals, tennis and golf.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We went on a family trip with a 4yo and a 7yo. The kids loved the facility and kids friendly activities, and the service was great! The hotel is a short drive from beautiful beaches and there's a lot to do onsite.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  So glad you and your family enjoyed our Labor Day weekend activities.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: So many great things to do with your kids and family. We loved reserving a campfire and roasting smore's and hot dogs. We loved roaming the grounds and playing with the sand volleyball net, yard games, shuffle board, and all the grass/trees and fun for the kids to roam. Kid pull was insane, in a good way. Loved the free movie nights at the swimming pool over labor day weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  So glad you were able to take advantage of all of our Labor Day activities!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: I felt like i am in a motel
Summary: Did not expect the room and the beds to be so small. 4 people in a room with 2 full size bed ? too bad! Dark room and very bad lighting. The pool was dirty and trash all over the place . pool service horrible - ordered food and did not get it till an hour later and the order was wrong!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback ike yours that is invaluable to our team.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and we clearly will do our best to better serve our poolside guests.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: This is hotel has a "vintage" feel especially the Lido buildings with its outdoor entrances. Think old Palm springs meets beach vibe. It could use some updating but overall it is comfortable and well suited for families, couples or business travelers. It is very close to Balboa island and Corona del Mar which is really great but also only about 8 minutes from the John Wayne airport. I would say in recent months it has been slightly overpriced compared to other 4 star hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort hotel close to ocean
Summary: This hotel is close to ocean but not by the beach. Hotel is well maintained with beautiful gardens and 3 gorgeous pools, one has slide (not very tall, even baby can slide in the arm of parent;-). Rooms are equipped with refrigerators and in-room coffee. Some have balconies to enjoy.  The only pitfall is the check-in area too small. The narrow driveway makes unloading at check-in and uploading at checkout a long wait. The line for checking in is also long inside the small hallway. No digital key available as such picking up the keys when room is ready becomes another long waiting in line. App is not too useful for check-in. However, communication with staffs via App is quick and convenient.
Manager Response: Thank  you for all of your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Nice resort, but paper thin walls in the main building.
Summary: Bring earplugs if you are a light sleeper.  I could literally hear the conversation next door not to mention the "stomping" from above.  Put away any personal soaps as the room service staff apparently feels the only soap you should be using is the hotel bar of soap.  They threw away a $12 bar of soap that I brought and prefer to use.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  I apologize for your soap getting thrown away.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: I have been coming here often for years and it has an incredible staff that work so hard to make sure your stay is wonderful.  The hotel is not new and updated, don’t expect that, but the location is amazing, the restaurant serves a great breakfast and dinner and the staff works so hard and is comprised of some amazing people!  This Labor Day weekend they served Bloody Mary’s in the morning for guests, did movie nights by the pool and gave out cookies and popcorn and had Bingo and Water Balloons for the kiddos.  My son and nephew had the very best time all weekend!  For a sold out weekend, the staff worked SO hard to make sure each guest was cared for.  Special shout out to Ana who is one of the biggest assets to this property.  She is incredible and will do anything to take

As a globalist we stay at many hyatts across the world this was by far one of the worst. In fact I would compare it to a double tree or embassy suites… it was tired the staff were lazy. The rooms were gross and not clean.
Manager Response: We apologize that your stay was less than satisfactory.  Your feedback is invaluable to our teams and we appreciate it.  We do hope you will give us another try as our hotel has become a local favorite with golf, tennis and bike rentals that are all part of your resort fee.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Great staff. Poor quality and dated rooms
Summary: Staff were great and facilities but rooms were equivalent to 2* hotel or maybe worse. Ants crawling on beds and could hear every step from room above. For the price I probably would stay at other hotels in the area
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about our colleagues!  We hope you will give us another try as our resort offers complimentary tennis, golf and bike rentals, as well as movie nights by the pool for families and s'more roasts at our firepits.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We truly enjoyed our experience here! * Large, well-decorated room * K-cup coffeemaker in the room. Good dark roast provided! * We were upgraded to a golf course room with a porch on the fairway! Lovely! * There's a coffee shop in the lobby that opens at 6:30am (a half hour before the restaurant) serving Starbucks coffee (but only Pike Place or espresso drinks) but also Chai Tea Lattes, an assortment of breakfast sandwiches and pastries, even oatmeal. Really friendly baristas. * The staff here is amazing, always willing to help. From the young valets who RUN to get your car quickly (I tipped $5 each time) to the desk staff, restaurant staff, even the gardeners - I always felt they were happy to assist. * Beautiful well maintained grounds * Free 9 hole golf course, complimentary
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review.  It is so gratifying to hear that you took advantage of all our property has to offer!  We greatly appreciate all you compliments to our colleagues and we can't wait to welcome you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: It was wonderful experience staying at Hyatt as it was convenient location for airport pickup/drop off as well as for business event. The reception counter was welcoming and really good at directing in right ways.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent rating and review!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon for a business or leisure stay.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Very nice property.  Resort fee covers many fun activities including golf, biking, and chairs/umbrellas for beach excursions.  Food service was delicious.   Teenage son who accompanied had a great time.  Very convenient and enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review and rating.  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: African American clerk gave a hard time checking in because it was done through Expidia
Summary: African American clerk gave me a hard time checking in. I was over charged by about $350. Clerk in the morning said she didn’t understand why I was charged extra and to dispute with my bank. My bank disputed and now send me a new debit card
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I do not understand the mishap you describe, it does sound as if it has been resolved.    Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: For the location and price, everything was a disappointment. The check in process was poor. We were automatically charged valet parking when we hadn't yet given our keys to the valet because no one explained how parking worked. Upon check out I found out they charged me parking for two cars when we only had one. The employee didn't automatically review the charges with me, I had to ask for details. Luckily I did otherwise I wouldn't have known I was over charged. The service for breakfast in the restaurant was terrible, parts of our order missing, not getting drink refills when needed. A piece of old food was found under one of the beds. Toilet paper was the cheapest I've ever used, very thin. The towels were rough and cheap. The pools were nice and the bed ok. I would not
Manager Response: While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  I apologize that your stay was less than satisfactory.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: If you want the luxury of a mediocre motel room under the flight path of John Wayne airport, definitely book here. If you like thin walls and a barking dog for a next door neighbor, then you will enjoy this hotel. The summer concert series is next door where all we could hear was muffled booms and our walls vibrated until 9:30. Self parking is a humiliating walk of shame down an unsafe hill that cars whip around. A can of Sprite from the bar at the hotel was $4.31.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback is invaluable to our  team.  Many of our guests have come to appreciate our 26 acre campus-style resort, with complimentary tennis, golf and bike rentals.  We are sorry you did not take advantage of any of these activities.  Our summer concert series is very popular but clearly we need to communicate that better to our guests.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Part of the hotel is nice, part of it is not nice. There are rooms right next to the road, where you cannot sleep all night.  Please make sure to get the right room and take a one that is on second floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is  feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  We hope you will give us another try, as so few properties are as expansive and offer complimentary activities like bike rentals, golf and tennis as part of your destination fee.  Sincerly,  Cathy S.

Summary: Staff were very friendly even though they were fully booked when we stayed. They have free 2 hour bike rentals and free golf club rentals. There were games and fun activities for kids by their pool. Good place to relax on a weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  We are delighted you and your family enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Personal items taken and not returned
Summary: My personal pillow case which was a completely different color from the hotels pillowcases was taken and not returned my personal washcloth was also taken and not returned. My fresh towels also had blonde hair on them I am brunette.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our resort team. We sincerely apologize that your personal linens were removed from your guest room as our guests do not usually bring their own pillowcases and washcloths.  We will definitely use your feedback as a training opportunity and appreciate your comments. Again, thank you for your review.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We had a great one night stay while visiting our daughter. Overall vibe of the hotel is very lively with families and couples. We enjoyed the breakfast in the morning. Great selection and great service!
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate all the compliments about our food and beverage and service!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,   Cathy S.

Summary: Room smelled like bleach, no central AC, bathroom was hot, food is very expensive with ok quality. Bathroom products are cheap quality and no bathroom robe or slippers provided. No elevators at my building that I stayed at.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate all of your feedback and have shared your comments with our hotel team.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Dated. Rooms need updating as do some of common areas. Pools were nice and service was friendly and good. Location was walkable to Balboa Island, but a long walk. Complimentary bikes made getting around fairly easy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Hotel staff seemed genuinely concerned about the visitors well-being. Everyone was very positive and helpful. The rooms were very comfortable and clean. Overall was very relaxing and wonderful experience staying at your hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We especially appreciate the shout out to our colleagues.  We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Great staff and a very nice hotel.
Summary: This hotel was clean, updated and located in a great area.  Only wish was for breakfast to have been included as the food was very expensive.  The room had a refrigerator but no microwave.  The grounds were well kept and staff very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Property is very dated. Chose this property because of the family pool and slide for our grand loves. Only way to pool is 39 stairs down. We rented a cabana which was very shabby. Cabana furniture pillows smelled very musty. Volume on TV didn’t work.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize that your stay was less than satisfactory.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership as your feedback is invaluable to our resort team.  We hope you will give us another try as we do have plans to update many of our public spaces -- like the pools and cabanas.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I have stayed in many Hotels over the years but never experienced the friendliness and efficiency of the staff at this Hyatt.  Rooms were comfortable and clean and the Hotel a beautiful space in which to spend time.  Breakfasts delicious too.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words, especially regarding our colleagues.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Upgrade the rooms! Awful for the price!
Summary: An upgrade for a global elite is a handicap room. Sad and never again. For a Hyatt Regency I presume they believe due to location who cares for quality. Everyone is looking for other rewards programs, believe me.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and sharing it.  We apologize that your room was less than satisfactory and hope you will give us another try in the near future, as our resort has so many amenities, like golf, tennis and bike rentals, all complimentary.  We also have hiking trails around the Back Bay with lovely views.    Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Big shout out to Sichi and Ashley!!
Summary: Went to this hotel for a 6-day getaway trip, and it was worth every penny!!  Everybody here was on their game.  Upon arrival, I met Sichi, the Operations Manager….she was so warm, friendly, and welcoming….checking up on me to ensure my stay was going well.  And a big shout out to Ashley from the Front Desk.  Being the hiking enthusiast that I am, she recommended a walking trail that ran along the Back Bay Road, and it was awesome for doing morning walks!!   A return trip is definitely in order….thank you so much!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words about our colleagues and our resort!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Very dated, overpowering smells and poor condition. Should be renovated or rebranded to a budget hotel.
Summary: Room has a very strong musky smell which is masked by an overpowering chemical spray. This is not a cleaning issue, just the result of a very poorly maintained hotel. Room is very dark and feels like you are in a basement, even on a sunny day.   When you try to escape the smell, you are presented on a patio with an air conditioner that feels like a jet engine on a takeoff roll. Far from relaxing.  Desk is in rough shape held together with multiple rough repairs - looks like something purchased at a flee market for $15. Chair has holes in it as if someone was attacked in it.  Honestly is more in line with a Days Inn than a Hyatt.   Hotel desperately needs to be renovated OR reflagged to a budget brand. Yet the price makes no sense. Too many better options nearby. Would not stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate all of your feedback and have shared your comments with our leadership.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We stayed here 3 years ago and liked it so much that we booked for this year. We were slightly worried about the negative reviews but the hotel is excellent. Pool facing room is spacious, clean and modern. Hotel staff are very welcoming and helpful. Food and drink is expensive but that’s to be expected. Would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and we are delighted you enjoyed your stay!  We appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: I love this place .   Clean rooms with comfortable beds is number #1.   Beautiful grounds and landscaping . Love all the amenities:  Three pools, golf, bikes, fitness center , on site restaurant -  etc .  The location is great and close to the bay .  The whole place feels friendly .
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We love hearing from our frequent guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Pro's: - about 15 minutes from SNA airport - I was able to check in at 11am, it wasn't the same room category but had been traveling for hours and was happy to make the change - rooms are spacious  - comfy bed - good seating in lobby bar  Con's - there were no food options when I checked in - my shower didn't drain, and the water was up to my ankles, not good!!  - the business center is NOT a business center. It's a Mac with very minimal access, and a cheap printer that was out of toner. I even called to confirm there was an actual business center. At best it's good for printing out a boarding pass  - hotel rooms are outdated  - my balcony was over the lower building so not a good view  - food was okay but definitely not worth the price
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate all of your feedback, as it is invaluable to our resort team.  We do hope you will give us another try.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: I had a very bad experience here the cleanliness was a 0/10, to not have sheet on the beds and to not have a mattress cover on one of the beds during this time with Covid and other virus is ridiculous
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are not currently offering daily housekeeping service, unless it is requested.  I hope that was communicated to you during your stay.    Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: AC was horrible and wasnt capable of keeping up with the temp and humidity. They said they fixed it but ther was no improvement. Floor was filthy. Had to wash our feet before going to bed. The tub was full of hair and lint.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your feedback.  Your comments are invaluable to our team and we assure you that our engineering and housekeeping leadership are working on the issues you have brought up.  We do hope you will give us another try, as we have been a local favorite in Newport Beach and our large campus location, golf and tennis courts and bike rentals are great amenities that are included in your resort fee.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Average experience at a colossal price.
Summary: Very polite staff but overall quality of service not quite up to rest of world standards. Enjoyed the s’mores night but the outdoor firepit area was not well maintained.  Limited bar menu choice and very expensive overnight parking charges on top of huge hotel rate. $515 plus taxes per night plus $35 per night parking. For the money the standard was very average and not competitive with Europe or Asia.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, we appreciate all of your feedback and have shared it with our resort team, to ensure a better experience next time.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We had a wonderful family reunion in July at the Hyatt in Newport Beach.  They accommodated our family with a suite and connecting rooms so we could all be together.  They were very responsive with every request from booking our rooms to our actual stay.  Shout out to Bryan at the front desk, who made it all happen.  He was so warm and friendly and even personally met with us to make sure everything was going well!  The amenities were great, we enjoyed the pools, the volleyball courts, the golf course onsite, and the proximity to the beach.  It was truly a memorable experience.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your great feedback and a shout out to Bryan!  We are delighted you family reunion was so successful and thank you for choosing our resort to celebrate your family!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I ended up booking a few more nights because I enjoyed my stay so much. Great location, resort amenities, some of the best food you can get at any resort/hotel. Yes it’s pricey but good quality food. If one of the pools was designated 21 and up only it would have made it a much more relaxing vacation for those of us without our kids…
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We are delighted you had a great stay and we appreciate all of your comments and feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: If you like water activities, this is the hotel you are looking for. Even though, queen beds are smaller cmpared to other hyatt, the room is clean. Great shower pressure! 5 min walking distance to beach to swim, kayak
Manager Response: Thank you for your great rating and review.  We are delighted you discovered all of the great water activities nearby at Newport Harbor!  Next time, try the Duffy Boats!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This resort was nice and is centrally located in Newport Beach. we had a great time, the staff was wonderful, the rooms were clean, everything was good. My only feedback is get ready to pay for parking at this hotel. $40 per day on top of your nightly rate and resort rate.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great rating and review!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We we here for nephews wedding.  Beautiful wedding venue.  Staff had it down to a science. Everything flowed so beautifully.  Also fabulous resort.  Spent a lot of time enjoying the saltwater indulgence pool.  Very clean and comfortable room. What hit this stay out of the park was the customer service.  Best hotel staff I’ve experienced.
Manager Response: Thanks so much!  Weddings are our super power -- so glad you enjoyed yourself.  We especially appreciate all of your kind words about our colleagues.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The front of the property was nice, but as we made it to the back of the property where our room was, it got worse. Our rooms were so rundown & filthy that we felt like we were staying at a Motel 6. Not acceptable for $700 a night.
