Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our resort team.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and clearly, we dropped the ball with our housekeeping team.  We will use your feedback as a training opportunity and revise our inspection procedure so that we do not have any further issues with our guest room cleanliness.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Spent 3 nights here. Place is like a 60s motel needing upgrade. Not up to Hyatt Regency standards. Way over priced. The staff are nice and helpful. The beautiful par 3 golf course is a nice feature - sadly the greens are shockingly poorly maintained for such a resource.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write and share a review. We appreciate the kind words about our colleagues and the rest of your comments have been shared with our resort team.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Beautiful golf course overlooking the harbor. Lots of amenities on site to please adults, teens, and young children. We took advantage of the sand volleyball court, tennis court, conference room, bonfire pit, hiking, and golf course. But the outdoor swimming pool looked pretty nice also. We enjoyed the complimentary wholesome popsicle snacks offered at the lobby on Friday.
Manager Response: Thank  you for all of your kind words.  It sounds as if you enjoyed all that our property has to offer!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and we hope you can enjoy the pools at that time.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great vibe for out-of-town guests to enjoy the luxury & comfort of a tropical paradise with lots of amenities for guests of all ages!  Many activities, pools, spa, fitness center & awesome dining areas to sip & enjoy beverages while watching the sunset.
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent rating and review.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Stayed for business function; would not return
Summary: Lukewarm shower temps, spotty housekeeping (e.g., neglected to clean one day, then didn't replenish shampoos, soaps and towels the other days).  Dining (baked salmon) was a hot disaster of reheated fish, half-cooked vegetables drowned in vinegar and a wait staff more interested in chatting with each other than looking after patrons.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Our housekeeping service is available upon request.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our resort team.  All of your comments have been shared with our leadership and while we will immediately address them, we do hope you will give us another try.

Summary: Went for wife’s birthday and had dinner reservations. Hotel room wasn’t ready on time so we had to cancel dinner. Hotel is in a great spot though and staff was friendly. Probably save some money next time and stay somewhere else
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We apologize for your guest room not being ready and appreciate your kind words regarding our colleagues.  We do hope you will give us another try.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I had very bad experience of this Hyatt property. One night when we were sitting outside at the court to have our snack, we were warned by staff there that we can’t eat outside food. First of all, it’s outside Hyatt restaurant or cafe. And second, there is no warning sign of prohibition of outside food like at swimming pool. The staff was very rude. And we saw many other people eat the food brought from outside restaurant without disturbing there before and after this incidents.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for your experience with our colleagues regarding outside food.  We do have a policy which is posted at all of our pools that prohibits guests from bringing in outside food and beverage inside the pool area.  You can absolutely bring snacks and beverages to enjoy in your guest room or on your balcony.  Our public spaces, restaurants and pool decks are serviced with food and  beverage from our dining outlets.  I hope that clarifies our policy and we do hope you will give us another try.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We paid big bucks to stay at a Villa assuming that a Hyatt would justify the price. What a disappointment! The place was badly in need of refurbishing . I doubt Goodwill would even accept the furniture. Torn chair upholstery, warped kitchen table. Paint was literally peeling off the walls. Dirty dishes piled up outside the scuffed up front doors of all 3 villas for days. Worst was the musty smell. We kept the windows open even tho it was hot out. We felt very ripped off. The restaurant and pool were nice. It was just out Villa that was bad.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better stay, it's comments like yours that our invaluable to our team.  Your comments and feedback have been escalated to our leadership as we take your review very seriously.  Again, thank you for sharing your experience with us and we look forward to making the appropriate adjustment immediately.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Let me first say that this is the 1st review I have ever taken the time to write in over 25+ years of travel, so this should tell you how I felt about this trip!  Hyatt Newport Beach is an extremely tired property and frankly I am floored that whoever either owns or franchises it has not just closed and spent the money to do a facelift.  I am pretty well traveled and I can tell you that I have stayed in Hampton Inn's and Fairfield Inn's at 1/5 the price that blow this property off the map.  When I stay at "Budget Hotels" mentioned above I do so because others I am traveling with need to stay there and many times it is just fine and clean.  Cleanliness at the Hyatt Newport Beach is so bad from the stained couch cushions all over the hotel property, to the squeaky floors as your

Hotel is very old design but staff is well trained and very nice. I won't recommend to people with baby or  heavy luggage or even handicapped. It has no elevator to my room and I had to carry my luggage and stroller up and down stairs. I did asked the staff and answer is hotel is too old and no elevator. I really want to take my dogs out to the beach but thinking of carry stroller up and down is sooooo inconvenient.   I think that's why I don't see guest with children in this hotel. It's mostly for retired guests.  The hair dryer is very disgusting and dirty, lots of hair tangled from previous guests, and the handle is very sticky...  Staff is very friendly and helpful. One of the staff voluntarily helped me carry the stroller which I really appreciate his help.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  We are sincerely sorry for the less than satisfactory responses you encountered and we hope to turn this into a training experience for our new team members.  Again, we appreciate your time and do hope you will give us another try in the near future.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Hyatt Newport Beach had an excellent location.  In addition the grounds give it a boutique feeling with beautiful landscape.  The outside of the buildings gives the feel of a motel, opening your door to the outside and not enclosed in a high rise or or hallway.  There are 2 floors and no elevator. Some of the rooms have balcony's and patios.  The landscaping is pretty and the lobby is an "open air" entrance with valet parking.  Self parking is $36 per night.  The staff is very friendly, efficient, and accommodating.  They have 3 pools and it's very family friendly.  A nice getaway overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Not as expected for a Hyatt.
Summary: This hotel feels like a slightly upgraded 1960's motel.  Housekeeping service was lacking, there was no gift shop and the vending machines were inoperable or empty.  Self-parking was very expensive and very far from the rooms with lots of steps and no elevators.  I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better stay, I do want to let you know that we do have golf carts available to assist guests with luggage and to get to our parking area.  I do hope you will give us another try as we have so many amenities that our guest have come to enjoy, for example, complimentary golf, tennis and bike rentals.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great location and friendly staff. We stayed here as part of our visit to the USA travelling from the UK. The rooms where clean and spacious, with lovely swimming pool and gym and other amenities. We had only two issues staying and that was the expensive food in the hotel, and the ridiculous high parking costs.
Manager Response: Thank you and welcome back to the U.S.!  We love hearing from our guests from the U.K. and we missed having you over the last couple of years.  We appreciate your feedback and have shared your comments with our leadership.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This Hyatt needs to do some significant updating to their common and room spaces.  It was clean and the staff was friendly, however the overall experience is not what I would expect of a property in this location with that much space. Also, they have summer concerts and that was very noisy late into the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know your thoughts about our resort.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and team we appreciate your time.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I was very pleased with my stay here for a business trip. The room was spacious and quiet, the bed was comfortable, everything was clean, the grounds are very well kept. I also enjoyed the hot tub and ping pong facilities. I was really impressed when I balked at paying for a microwave to heat up water for tea and oatmeal that I was offered and delivered an electric tea kettle, which I loved. I also requested a robe, which added to the luxury. The one spot for improvement would be that the bath towels were kind of rough. Oddly, the pool towels were softer.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We were hesitant based on some of the reviews here, but we had a great stay! The room and property were good--much better than many of the reviews here--but the service was far above normal. We had some special requests that were immediately agreed and overall we found everyone to be very helpful. We are Globalists so maybe that helped, but we were very impressed. Will definitely return!
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent rating and review.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at our resort.  We appreciate your shout out to our colleagues and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: In an area with many hotels to choose from, many of which are much closer to (or on) the beach, I really expected nicer rooms, pool areas, amenities, facilities, food options, bar areas, and, well, everything. Especially given that this hotel is priced closely to those better-located competitors.  This hotel needs a serious infusion of cash from its parent company to upgrade basically everything. Until that's done, it's just ripping people off. As it stands now, this hotel is simply not worth the price.  I do want to point out that the staff were friendly, helpful and accessible. They made the best of what they had on hand which, again, wasn't much.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your kind words about our colleagues.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Worn out, not worth price, Needs improvement
Summary: At $500/night the rooms are minimal, fridge didn't work and ruined all our food. Bathrooms very dated like motels. AC didn't work well and walls are thin with hallways and driveway noise all night making it impossible to sleep. Front desk at check-in was cold and unwelcoming, long waits at the restaurant. Had to go looking for my check. It was meant to be a special weekend getaway but turned out to be a mediocre experience.
Manager Response: While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  it does sound as if we dropped the ball, especially concerning your check in experience.  We are sincerely sorry that your stay was less than satisfactory, and we do take your remarks very seriously and will offer our team further encouragement to make your future visits on par with your expectations.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel is beautiful on the outside but the rooms are dated. Service in the hotel restaurant was poor. Probably due to not enough staff. There is no secure internet available for guests, which made it very difficult to take care of business while away from my office.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and we appreciate your feedback.    Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This is a must stay location! That this Hyatt location you will be wowed with the staff and it amenities. The Hyatt features an excellent restaurant with delicious choices of American delights. It's close to high end shopping and other fine dining. This Hyatt location also offers some of the finest concerts on the west coast!
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and compliments.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay, dining and shopping at our property and in Newport Beach.  We love that you were able to take in a show from our Summer Concert Series!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Hotel is nice and clean, but don't count on their hospitality.
Summary: the staff was quick to dismiss ideas on how to enjoy the area.  They seem to not know, or care nor did they offer options on how to get places, if you have no rental car.  In fact, I had staff not even know where the nearest mall was and how far the beach was.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  While I wish we could have been more helpful, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  We are on-boarding a lot of new colleagues and it sounds as though we can improve upon their training with more information about our destination's high points and transportation.  We appreciate your help.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Rooms are average.  Service was good until all my bags from shopping at Fashion Island were stolen from my room. Hotel staff is still investigating and I have not heard anything more from them. If you are planning on staying there lock your belongings.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property.  We are working to resolve your issue with missing packages.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: My checking experience at this hotel was brutal. Took an hour. I'm not one to complain much about hotel conditions but this place is run down.  The rooms are tattered, the gym equipment has missing parts... The place badly needs some TLC.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your feedback has been shared with our hotel team and leadership.  We hope you will give us another try.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Resort looks like a few apartment building close by. None have any great view. so don't pay extra for bay view, golf view etc. Stay away from the Lido building. It is the worse of them all. Only bar restaurant food was good, the other so called fancy restaurant, food was not great at all. Ground covering looks nice though. Free 9 hole par 3 golf, good to get morning walk. Pool sides, not so fancy, but does the job.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our resort.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  We hope you will give us another try, as our complimentary golf, tennis and bike rentals are unparalleled in the SoCal market.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We tried to check in and our helper said there are no rooms available. Ok, fair enough, so we waited and finally got a room.  It was a lengthy walk and my wife is on crutches, so that was not ideal but we made the best of it.  We get to the room and it is sub par to say the least— maybe the same as a motel 6.  On top of that; all we hear are kids screaming at the pool.  For $500/night, I expect a lot more.  Long story short, don’t stay here.  Spend the extra money and go to Lido House or Pelican.
Manager Response: We apologize that your stay was less than satisfactory.  We appreciate your feedback and wish you had a better experience.  It sounds as though a front desk did drop the ball on your stay, we have golf carts available to transport guests and luggage to their guest rooms upon request.  Your comments are invaluable to us and we truly thank  you for taking the time to share the details of your experience.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Do yourself a favor and look for a different hotel.   I have Hyatt Globalist status, and had a free award night, so I chose to use that and some points to stay here for two nights. I checked reviews and hotel photos, so I thought it would be clean and decent. I also thought that my globalist status might get me a nicer room, but if they did give me best available, I don’t even want to know what the lower tier rooms looks like.  I thought this place was considered a 4-star hotel, but I’ve stayed in 2.5-star motels that were in way better shape than this place.  The room we stayed in was in the Bay building overlooking the big pool with a water slide. First impression walking in was that it is in desperate need of some repairs.  The popcorn ceiling has 3 large lines all across
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our leadership and resort teams.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Beautiful property with AMAZING staff throughout - parking, front desk, restaurants, pool, etc. but rooms need to be updated. Bathrooms outdated...rooms are generous in size. 3 pools so something for everyone...closer to walking trail.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and we appreciate all of your feedback.  We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Great location, outdated property that doesn’t match price
Summary: As an Orange County native I have fond memories of this property over the last 30 years. Recently, we decided to have a staycation and chose this hotel because of its super central location. But after checking in, we quickly realized that so much TLC is needed.   Many parts of the property are sorely outdated or just plainly haven’t been maintained. For a hotel that costs $400-600 a night you’d expect the property to be cleaner and better taken care of. For example, the pool area is covered in rust, ripped furniture and trash.  The rooms have outdated furniture that is also rusted, broken or plain dirty.  The only bright spot was the staff. They were all very helpful, had great attitudes and super nice. Please give Scotty the bellman a raise. He went out of the way to make our
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your feedback and we especially appreciate the shout out to our colleagues and Scotty!  We do hope to welcome you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Pretty nice stay. Expensive for where we were located at the end of the property and a long walk to vehicle self parking. Decided to self park after watching people wait very long for their valet parking to bring up their car.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 5 Star Experience. Check In, Housekeeping, Poolside Service, Restaurant did an excellent job. My family & friends had a great 4th of July!  The hotel offers several fun amenities such as bicycles, volleyball, golf, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent rating and review!  We look forward to welcoming you all back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The service and cleanliness of the property were wonderful.  The location of the property was fantastic, close to the beaches.  Loved the pools and being able to order drinks and food without having to leave the pool all day.  While I enjoyed the Bay building being close to the pool wih the waterslide it is really noisy and those rooms can use an upgrade.  The pool and staff including the managers are really what made our vacation such a pleasant experience.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay!  We appreciate all of your feedback and have shared your comments with our leadership.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Work trip on Holiday weekend. Brought the family along and the enjoyed it very much. The staff was so nice and efficient. This Hyatt like so many others, offered tons of amenities for everyone in the family all ages. This hotel was so clean. The pools never were cloudy and clear and bright blue. The spas walls were clean and didn’t have any build up like most places. This Hyatt made this stay an experience for us, not just a hotel stay. Thank you keep up the great work. I would recommend providing some disinfect wipes in pool areas to wipe down chairs in between guest usages.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for all your kind words.  We are delighted you had a great stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great family -friendly hotel. We loved the pool and water slide, games, fire pits etc. The grounds are beautiful, and most importantly, the kids had fun!  The water slide kept them entertained for hours, and there is also a great little splash pad for younger kids. Enjoyable for all!
Manager Response: Thank you for all your kind words and great rating!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Bad reception  Room with Balcony!! Full price!! Overlooking linen exchange dock. No coffee til 6:30.  And not complementary  at high price lodging. Resort fee for ????  The pool? Room not cleaned daily... Beware
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  The resort fee covers complimentary rental bikes, tennis and golf greens fees.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback in invaluable to our team.  Again, thank you.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Major water leak—staff did not care
Summary: We stayed in a Villa over the weekend for my daughter's wedding. During the time we were getting ready, one of the bridesmaids slipped in a large amount of water on the tile floors in the dining area. We grabbed towels and called the front desk. We also noticed that the tile floor was hot. A maintenance man came and tried to blame it on us (he said maybe when we washed the dishes)…ugh, on closer inspection, we could clearly see that the wall had a bulge and previous water damage. The maintenance man said he had to get a heat sensor for the floor and would be back. After a long while, he came in with another worker and a sensor and said the floor was indeed hot, they hung out for a while and then told us the room was safe and no work would be done, I said I was worried about the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Our team is aware of these issues and all is being addressed off-line.  I assure you our colleagues do not take any of these issues lightly as we are known for our care of guests, especially where a wedding is concerned.  Again, thank you for your feedback and comments.  All of which are being shared with our leadership.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel is charging 500usd a night for average rooms and it does not offer daily housekeeping. They offer what they call “light housekeeping” which involves them putting in fresh towels and supposedly replacing bathroom amenities. After the third night they supposedly offer full housekeeping but I didnt experience it because apparently I was supposed to be part of their loyalty program for that! In general communication was a mess. Called 2 weeks in advance to ensure there was a crib set up in the room when I arrived (we arrived near midnight with an 18month old) and they assured me that it would be there. Of course it wasnt there. Took them 20 minutes to bring it. A mess. Also does not offer breakfast buffet so be ready to spend around 30 a person  in menu breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  It does sound as though we dropped the ball on many issues and we do apologize for that.  Housekeeping is available upon request and I apologize if that was not communicated.  We do hope you will give us another try, as so many of our guests have come to appreciate all of our amenities -- complimentary rental bikes, three pools, a nine-hole complimentary golf course with clubs/putters and an array of firepits scattered around the property.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Not that there's anything wrong with motels. In fact, we've stayed at a few that were in better shape than this property.  We live in LA, about an hour away from Newport, and some friends from Oregon were visiting for the week. We decided to meet up with them and stay a few nights. Reviews for this hotel were mostly positive, especially for families with young kids (water slide!). There was a great points option for a king room, which we then upgraded to a suite at check-in for $80/nt. Self-parking and resort fees added about another $70/nt, so all in we were at about $300 for the stay. Seemed like a good deal, right?  Positives are few: - good location in Newport. Close to lots of shopping and food. - if you have kids, the water slide is the main selling point. Our 5yo went on
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and feedback.  We appreciate all of your comments and have shared them with our leadership.  We do hope to welcome you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I am a loyal Hyatt frequent stayer and the Newport beach property contributes to that decision.  The staff is wonderful, whatever you need/want they find a way to accommodate you.  The property accepts dogs so there is always a furry friend around to pet.  The property itself is lovely.  The beds are comfortable, and the linens are fresh and crisp.
Manager Response: Thank  you for such a great rating and review, we are so delighted you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel is so lush and has plenty of activities for both families and couples like my husband and me. When we arrived, the stress of the week melted off with the calming vacation vibes. Kids were enjoying time with their families at the pool while we read and enjoyed Mai Tais delivered to our lounge chairs. We ate at the bar 4 times in 2 days. The veggie flatbread was one of the best I have tasted. Now the question is, "How do we make time to get back to this lovely resort with our kids and grandbabies."
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and compliments to our team.  We are delighted you and your family enjoyed our resort so much.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The staff at this hotel is just fantastic- housekeeping, front desk, restaurant and bar staff, all of them are great and very responsive. The facilities are in need of a major overhaul.  The carpet is gross, the fixtures are old, the appliances are not working properly. Shower pressure was awesome though :).
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words about our colleagues, it is greatly appreciated!  Glad you enjoyed the water pressure!  We have shared your feedback with our leadership as it is invaluable to our resort team.  We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: To start, I reserved 2 rooms directly with the hotel at over $500 per night per room , and specifically requested connecting rooms due to having young children under 9 year old , and paid extra for the rooms to have them guaranteed connecting per the reservation agent . Upon checking to my dismay, the rooms were not connecting and the hotel was sold out with no ability to rectify the problem, other than to offer free parking for my dissatisfaction.  So I had to separate from my wife in different rooms  for the entirety of the family weekend getaway.  The room quality was fair and the building was worn out compared to other Hyatts I have stayed at. The USB port on the lamp was broken. Poor attention to basic amenities , as there were no coffee stirrers in the room with the coffee
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  We are sincerely sorry that your stay was less than satisfactory.  Your comments have been shared with all of our leadership.  We hope you will give us another try as our property does have many amenities to offer like complimentary tennis, golf and bike rentals.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: I rented the 3 bedroom villa, as I have 4 children.  The space was perfect as far as how much space it had, however, those rooms haven't been updated in years, and don't really seem all that swanky for the high price of over $2100 that you charged me per night.  The pool hadn't been cleaned and was pretty nasty upon arrival.  It was cleaned on day 2 and was much nicer after cleaning.  There was trash on the back patio near the bushes that hadn't been cleaned.  The outdoor chairs were covered in bird poop and just kind of beat up to be honest & not that nice.  The inside of the rooms were fine, just dated and older, for the price I paid per night I assumed it would be taking my family to really stay in something "extra" and it didn't feel all that extra.  The maid service took
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our teams.  It sounds as if our housekeeping team dropped the ball and we sincerely apologize for that.  Your comments are being shared with our leadership and we clearly need to activate some immediate protocols in our villas.  Thank you for your candid remarks and we do hope you will give us another try as we encourage our team to make the appropriate changes to assure a better stay.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: AC didn't work. Water from bathroom faucet smelled like sulfur. Room was loud with noise from outside. Bathroom was dingy and somewhat old. Overall it felt VERY overpriced for  a glorified motel. Would not stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  We appreciate all of your feedback and it has been shared with our leadership and engineering and housekeeping teams.  We do hope you will reconsider another stay with us, as we are one of the only Southern California hotels to offer complimentary tennis, golf and bike rentals.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Resort is nice. Very crowded with families. This was a business trip so we had little to say about room choices but ours was not great. In the “Bay “ building overlooking the pool. Constant noise from the pool. Room opens onto a breezeway so also constant foot traffic by the window. Room very small. Would hopefully not ever have to stay here again but if so would try for another room location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate all of your feedback and comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon in another room type.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Just stop for a very comfortable night on our way back San Diego. Located in a wonderful SoCal neighborhood and an elegant old inn. Hyatt is one of our reliable standards while travelling. Wonderful weather and long days. Not remarkable for there and then. We truly enjoyed and appropriated a needed stop toward home.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great rating and review! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Upon check-in there was no availability for a suite upgrade do to a wedding however, a few days prior there were suites available (I had called and spoke with management) and I'm pretty sure the wedding was booked several months out so to hear that the wedding was the reason for no suites was a little odd. So being that was had a regular room made the stay ok but nothing exceptional. The breakfast each morning was nice for globalists so we enjoyed that. We were at the pool everyday with our kids and noticed that there were multiple cabanas empty (not being used) each day. As a globalist since we could not get the room upgrade it would of been nice to be offered a cabana instead of seeing them empty.  Also had billing issues I had to call in for and have removed. I was getting
Manager Response: We are sincerely sorry for the billing error you described, as we have so many World of Hyatt globalists staying with us and enjoying breakfast as  a part of their membership.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership regarding pool cabanas.  I apologize that there was not a suite available when you were checking in.  We do sell a lot of room upgrades at the front desk and it sounds like guests at the wedding may have upgraded to suites that were available earlier in the week.  We do hope you will give us another try to experience all of the amenities our resort and destination have to offer.  We have complimentary bike rentals, tennis and golf available to our guests, something that is unique to SoCal hotels and resorts.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Our two daughters had a great time. Pool times provided us an opportunity to not rush. Smores and fire pits were a great amenity. Check in and check out were extremely fast. All employees were very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  We are delighted you had such a great stay.  We especially appreciate your shout out to our colleague!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The Hyatt Resort at Newport Beach is everything you would expect from a resort & spa! The service is impeccable throughout the facility. They get it and are sure that you are enjoying your stay. The poolside servers are the friendliest you will ever see. The Ahi salad, Ahi Sandwich, Burgers, fries, chicken strips, margaritas, pina coladas and assortment of beers offered was phenomenal. From the front desk, to maids, to maintenance people, they were all so friendly and truly seemed to care about the customer.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and excellent rating.  We are delighted you had such a lovely stay and we especially appreciate the shout out to our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: my wife and i were charged multiple incorrect charges on our credit cards and it took a couple weeks of constant emails and calling customer service to get the issue resolved had it not been for that overall our trip would have been great
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for the inaccuracies on your folio and very glad to hear that all has been amended.  We are sorry it took longer than it should and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to show you how seriously Hyatt takes your feedback and comments.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention and please feel free to contact me directly before your next stay with us.  Sincerely,  Cathy Scott cathy.scott@hyatt.com

Summary Heading: We loved Our Stay at this Beautiful hotel.
Summary: Beautiful landscaped and just so much attention to detail. I love all the cozy seating areas scattering around this spauling resort. We absolutely love this hotel. I do have to say it the only reasons I did not give this place a 5 rating was because of the very limited restaurant hours, the gift shop is permanently closed, and the check-in staff could have done better.  Shor Restaurant was very nice but the service was severely lacking. Our waters were never refilled, service was very slow, and frankly We felt forgotten about most of the time.   The three pool areas were very well done and many times I had one of the pools to myself.    To be honest this hotel was much more beautiful than I thought it was going to be and over all I would recommend this hotel. We had breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  We appreciate your feedback and comments regarding Shor.  Your opinion is important to us and our leadership. We do hope to welcome you back again.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Great location but the hotel is in bad shape.
Summary: This hotel is in need of a major renovation, it’s in extremely poor shape. The housekeeping staff does a great job, but there’s only so much they can do.   The valet staff was great - super friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words regarding our housekeeping and valet colleagues!  We appreciate your feedback and have shared it with our leadership.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: My daughter and I were celebrating our first Father's Day in 10+ years and really looking forward to a great time in Newport Beach.  We booked months ahead.  We checked in via the app 8 hours before arrival.  Our room wasn't ready upon arrival and the configuration we booked wasn't available.  An upgrade was offered, but the roll away bed was very uncomfortable.  My daughter's sleep experience was awful.
Manager Response: We are sorry you stay was less than satisfactory and we know how important a good night's rest is, especially when travelling.  I wish we could have anticipated your early arrival and gotten you into the room you originally booked.  I do hope you will give us another try to make your next visit with your daughter a success.  Please contact me directly, as I will do my best to assure your guest room needs are met.  Best regard,  Cathy Scott Area Marketing Manager cathy.scott@hyatt.com

Summary: This Hyatt is terrific when the family visits. It makes gathering so easy for all ages and takes away all the stress of hosting.  We’ve enjoyed the Hyatt in this fashion for many years and look forward to holding more events here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all your kind words!  Families are our super power and it sounds like you were able to enjoy all that our resort and destination has to offer.  We also look forward to welcoming you and family back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Low end hotel at a high end price
Summary: We came here for my cousin's wedding and were sorely disappointed in this property. It was run down with the rooms reminding me of a Motel 8 - dirty, run down and smelled of urine. The only upside was the bellhop who helped us from the very beginning.
Manager Response: I am very sorry that your stay was less than satisfactory.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  Your comments have been shared with our housekeeping team, and we are initiating a more comprehensive inspection process to assure our guest rooms are properly prepared for our guests.  We hope we can win back your business and you decide to give us another try.  So many of our frequent guests have come to appreciate our iconic property for all of its amenities and large campus-style grounds, various pools and complimentary golf, bikes and tennis.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great hotel in common areas, but rooms need more cleanliness and front desk staff need a bit more cheerfulness. The coffee/ bar morning ladies and afternoon bar man were awesome! As for the room, had a blood stain on my duvet so I just moved it as I was there for a wedding and didn’t have time to deal with it being changed out. The tub also was clogged the first night of our 3 night stay. This was not worth the extra $10 a night for golf course view.
Manager Response: Thank you for feedback and comments about your stay.  Our leadership has been made aware of the issues you encountered and I assure you we are taking steps to mitigate these missteps going forward.  Again, we appreciate your feedback and hope you will give us another try as so many of our frequent guests have come to appreciate our property, colleagues and amenities.  Sincerley,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Not up to the Hyatt standard.
Summary: Booked a room here 6 months in advance for a wedding. Check in is at 4 pm…room was not available until almost 7 pm. Had to use the public restroom to get ready. The room service and cafe food was cold, in cardboard boxes and horrible. Don’t eat here! $130 for 2 burgers and 2 salads. Micky D’s has better food. Rooms are nice but old facilities. Dated property and pool. I won’t ever stay here again even for an event. I’ll drive the 1 hour home and hit up a drive thru.
Manager Response: We apologize for the missteps we took during your stay.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback is invaluable to our team.  We clearly missed the mark and we sincerely apologize.  Please contact me directly if you want to give us another try, our resort has so many amenities that you were unable to take advantage of.  My direct email is cathy.scott@hyatt.com  Sincerely,  Cathy Scott

Summary: We checked in on a Friday when a Jazz Festival was being hosted at the resort.  We didn't know this was happening and the front desk (Ashley) apologized for the crowd and stated that the hotel was sold out, but would be able to put us in a better room on Monday (a complimentary upgrade).   Even though we were several hours early, we were able to check in.  The room was by a large pool and was O.K., but when Monday rolled around, Ashley, moved us into a beautiful balcony room overlooking the beautiful Indulge pool (much nicer than the room we booked).  The rest of the week was fantastic, all the staff were friendly and helpful.  Shor restaurant (on site) was also fantastic with exceptional service thanks to Jay, Angel, and the rest of the gentlemen servers!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with you.  I am so glad we were able to accommodate you with a great view for your anniversary trip.  We appreciate all of your kind words about our colleagues and the shout outs to Ashley, Jay and Angel.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great place to stay!  Friendly and helpful staff, nice rooms and great atmosphere! Looking forward to staying at this Hyatt Regency for all future Concert series events! Thank you for making our anniversary weekend so memorable!
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words, especially those directed at our colleagues.  We are delighted you had a great stay and do stay tuned we will have more summer concert announcements next week!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The staff is very accommodating and friendly. Our request were accommodated The bellman and cleaning staff are also friendly in spite of the climate we are in today. The Hyatt year after year has been welcoming, courteous and professional for the Newport Jazz Festival crowd. We’ll be back next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back next year!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Overall, a great time. Rooms are great, service attendants very attentive.  The property is well kept at all times.  The Lobby & it’s surroundings are great for socializing.  Suggested to extend stay longer or limit luggage due to large volumes of guests checking out the morning after the festival.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your feedback and kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and the music.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I travel alone so I try to stay at the safest hotel. My room was clean and comfortable and the grounds were well lit in the evening and I felt safe. I had visited before for concerts, but this is my first year staying in the hotel. I was pleased!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review and promise to return!  We are delighted you enjoyed staying at our property and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: All performs were outstanding and my family and friends are looking forward to next years festival. From Friday night with Alex Bugnon and Marion Meadows to closing Sunday with Brian Culbertson, everything was OUTSTANDING
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed your stay and the great music over Jazz Fest!  We are delighted you and your family and friends had such a great time.  We look forward to welcoming you back next year!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This resort is so pretty - the fire pits and outdoor walking paths are beautiful.  Shore restaurant has great food and the best staff.  They really treated us well.  We were there for the jazz fest and they knew many people that come there every year.  Very well run.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at our property.  So glad you got to enjoy our annual Jazz Festival.  We hope to see you next year!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The Hyatt staff delivered above and beyond service the entire crowded weekend.   Food quality was excellent, room was very clean, and the bar and coffee service were fantastic.   We love the various areas to sit and visit, enjoy a cocktail and listen to music.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words.  We love Jazz Fest weekend too!  See you next year!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: It's an excellent hotel with an excellent staff. They have very strict COVID-19 rules that are being enforced. They are doing their very best to keep their clients safe. I strongly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your vote of confidence in making you feel confident during the pandemic.  We are delighted your enjoy your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Being a Discoverist member I should have received early check-in but the room was not available even by 4.00pm. It was available only by 4.15pm and I was checked in by 4.25pm. Air conditioning was not enough.
Manager Response: Thank  you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We apologize that your guest room was not available for early check in.  We hope the rest of your stay was a great experience.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: It was the STAFF who made this stay so wonderful.
Summary: SO MANY EXAMPLES OF OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE 1. GARRETT, Mgr. addressed an uncontrollable mix-up with restaurant to-go food and did so with finesse. 2. PAGE Valet. several times during my week stay, she was more than attentive to things I needed attended to as I was dropping off...and retrieving my car. 3. JENNIFER AT SHOR: Helped me resolve a complexity in my ordering and getting service in a most timely an effective manner. 4. JOHNNY Chief Engineer. handled an issue with my door lock continually (4 times) not working. Exceptional at explaining why the issue occurred. No problems after his efforts. 5. BERTA Housekeeping for Rm 119: Attentive to what specifics I might need as I declined the regular process for changing sheets and servicing the room. (I didn't want to clear
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words regarding our customer service.  We are delighted we were able to assist at making your stay a success.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Love the property for a quick getaway to the beach.  Very family friendly.  Very pet friendly.  Golf course is well groomed. Pool is a lot of fun and clean.  Three different pools to choose from.  Would recommend this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We are delighted you enjoyed all that our property has to offer.  We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great location with nice views of the back bay. Great place for children and active people. Back Bay road is a great place for a walk, bike or run. It is also a great place to see wild life. At Newport dunes there is swimming (although the water is not very nice), but there are a lot of water activities.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great rating and review!  We definitely agree that our resort is perfect for active families and people who want to bike ride, swim, golf and enjoy surfing, kayaking and duffy boats!  Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Newport!
Summary: We always stay here when in town because it is a very comfortable venue and the staff is always friendly and helpful and the food is usually very good. The rooms are usually very clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We love hearing from our frequent guests and are delighted you enjoyed your most recent stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  We especially appreciate your kind words about our colleagues!  Sincerley,  Cathy S.

Summary: Loving our stay this far! The grounds are beautiful, the staff attentive and friendly, the room clean with a lovely view. The swimming area has a cool water slide for the kids in one of its 3 pools. There is a golf course, restaurant, bar and wine bar. It’s a short hop to the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review.  It sounds as though you are enjoying all that our property has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I was very happy to of found the Hyatt Regency in Newport reasonable pricing ;beautiful room, grounds ,pools and friendly staff.  Near the beach and freeways for day trips to other locations.  I felt safe and comfortable .
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and we especially appreciate the shout out to our colleagues!  We look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Wish I had something better to report. Complaints have been made to corporate and also the late night management I have also taken video . The carpets are wet and damp smells of musk because of leaking fridge . I take a shower and now I am taking a bath. I cannot tell you how disappointed I am I the Hyatt and especially this one
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write and share a review with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  All of your comments have been shared with our leadership and we do intend to address each and every one of them. Again, we appreciate your candor and hope you will give us another try as so many of our guests have come to appreciate our hotel as a local landmark.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Just returned from a two night stay. Its just not very nice and is in serious need of attention. I was in one of the outer buildings, which really look like not very nice motels. Two floors, no elevators so you have to drag your luggage up the stairs. And it’s just very dumpy, smelly, moldy. The doors to the rooms are outside surrounding a courtyard with a pool and just looks like a drive in motel. Room was ok but again needs an update.  Room had an iHome alarm clock made for the original iPods with the 30 pin connector that hasn’t been used since 2011. Hyatt, but some new clocks!  I stayed for 2 nights and when I checked in I was told because of the length of my stay I didn’t qualify for housekeeping services, so they didn’t come and clean my room. Still charged me full price
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  Housekeeping services are available upon request and I wish that was better communicated to you while you were staying with us.  We appreciate all of your comments and have shared them with our leadership.  We hope you will give us another try, as our spacious campus-like courtyards, three pools, complimentary bike rentals and golf course are a amenities you can really come to enjoy.    Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: If you want something basic, this is it. Rooms were outdated and had a very particular smell. Property is nice but needs a big upgrade. Our room had weird splatters all over the wall. Looked like a crime scene, Do not eat at restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate and review our hotel.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback is invaluable to our team.  Your comments have been shared with our housekeeping leadership and we appreciate your candor.  We do hope you will give us another try, as so many of our guests have come to appreciate all the amenities that our large, campus-style property offers, like complimentary bike rentals and golf club rentals and greens fees.    Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Good location for our corporate event
Summary: My company held our five day event at this property.  The food and beverage for the meetings was superb.  The staff was courteous and helpful.  The grounds were well groomed.  The rooms were spacious, clean, but somewhat outdated.  Overall a great location for our business event.  The location is convenient to the SNA airport and to shopping, dining, entertaining, etc.
Manager Response: We love hearing from our conference attendees! Thank you so much for all of your kind words.  We hope you will visit us again soon, perhaps on a leisure trip!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This is our second time staying here in Newport Hyatt. We find the grounds to be very pleasant and enjoyable!  The pool was beautiful and entertaining with games like ping-pong and sunning.  The lounging areas were very nice cozy and romantic
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: For the price the room was horrible
Summary: Arrived late from the airport only to be told that the room was the last room available. There was a coffee machine, however, no coffee pods, no water, two towels, room smelled musty and restroom didn't look like it was cleaned. No food or cocktails available after 10:00 PM, even though when I checked in the receptionist said the bar usually closes late or until a few people left. No room service. There was a minimum of 20 people still there when they shut down. Overall for the price that was paid for a "Resort" it was a poor experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team. All of your comments are being shared with our leadership and we intend to address them immediately.  We do have a service called Zingle that allows guest to text their requests 24/7, that would have alleviated your issues with towels, coffee pods and water bottles.  I apologize that your were not made aware of the service.  I hope you will give us another try and let us make up for your recent experience.  There are so many amenities that our property and destination have to offer that has made our hotel a local favorite for decades.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: I had such a great experience during my stay at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. Great area, service, room, valet service, the staff are welcome and polite. I hope have the chance to get back and enjoy the pool and external area. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We are delighted your stay was amazing and especially appreciate the comments regarding our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This isn't the typical Hyatt Regency quality I expected. The place is old and very dirty. The room reeked of cigarettes with sticky stains on the floor and jam all over the remote when I got there. I was there for a complimentary, one night stay for a business trip, however I would not come back for any other reason. My stay was unpleasant to say the least.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  Again, your comments have been shared with our housekeeping team and we do appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Good location, horrible horrible service for a Hyatt royal customer
Summary: I'm Hyatt globalist. booked double beds, I requested to upgrade and was rejected. I requested to change to 1 king bed since I traveled myself and was rejected, told me that there is no room but I can find the room is available through the app if I want to make a reservation... Put me into the farthest 2 bed room. that's not the way they should treat globalists..  I went for breakfast the second day around 9:30am. I was told there is no table for 1 person althrough I saw many tables in that area. The waiter refused to tell me how long it will take to have a table, just told me it will be long.  He wrote down my phone number as reservation but never called me after it. I had to go to the coffee area for a quick breakfast.   When I was checking-in, I was told that with my
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  As a Globist you know that upgrades are based on availability.  We apologize for your wait time at Shor and any other mishaps you encountered along the way.  At Hyatt, our purpose is to take care of guests so that they can be at their best.  It sounds as though we missed the mark and we appreciate you making us aware of it.  We will use your experience as a training opportunity and look forward to your next stay.  Thanks for the kind words about our housekeeping and food and beverage quality.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel is very nice.  I am a older female traveling alone and it was very comfortable.  I did not have any reservations about staying alone.  I did not eat in the restaurant, but I did have a snack in the bar/restaurant.  The food and service was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate and review our resort.  We are happy your enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: this place looks a LOT nicer in photos than it actually is, I expected alot from Hyatt but my room was one step above a Motel 6...the room had a lingering oder of fast food and cigarettes, it was unclean, housekeeping no longer comes to clean rooms but just to give you new towels. Also this place is so understaffed, they are all rude and abrubt, good luck getting ANY kind of room service, poolside service, and everything shuts down at 11 pm so dont plan to eat or drink after that, I couldnt wait to get out of there
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate and review our resort.  Although I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team!  We apologize for our limited room service hours and housekeeping is available daily upon request.  We hope you will give us another try as our resort has been a local favorite for decades and has some great amenities like golf, tennis and bike rentals -- all complimentary.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a beautiful location!!
Summary: We arrived very late to the hotel and staff did their best to accommodate us with our needed room request. The rooms were clean, very comfortable, and the staff was amazing, and extremely accommodating. Overall, we truly had a wonderful experience. I fully recommend this hotel to everyone looking for a relaxing getaway!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent rating and review.  We are delighted you had a great stay and we especially appreciate all of your comments regarding our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This place sucks. Old AF and janky looking, rooms are real cramped. Strange lack of doors for showers of ADA compliant rooms so that gets messy. They let us check in early though and the customer service was generally very good.
Manager Response: Thank your for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your feedback and wish you had a better experience.  We are sorry that you did not get a chance to experience all that our property has to offer, like our complimentary beach cruiser bike rentals, golf or tennis.  While we are not newest hotel property in the area, we are a legendary iconic hotel that many in the community hold near and dear to their hearts.  We hope you will give us another try so you many experience some of the rich history of Newport Beach.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Came here for Mother’s Day celebration. My main issue with them is they had two large events on Saturday that took up all parking- hotel guests  had to scramble to find parking or park in extremely far spots. I understand music blasting but I came with two young kids- it would have been helpful for front desk to warn me of the loud music so I could request to be moved to a quieter spot, but instead they put our room right next to the party. Talk about a horrible sleep. I tried putting on white noise loudly to drown out music but impossible. Rooms and beds are definitely on the smaller side. I wouldn’t come back here. The only thing that makes it even worth anything is the pool but otherwise nothing stands out and poor costumer service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your feedback and wish you had a better experience.  We are sorry that you did not get a chance to experience all that our property has to offer, like our complimentary beach cruiser bike rentals, golf or tennis.    Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We spent one night in a king bay view room with balcony.  We picked up food and wine from the Whole Foods at Fashion Island nearby to enjoy from the balcony Saturday evening.  This resort feels very private and serene.  The room was nicely appointed and bed very comfortable.  Staff brought a twin bed for our son up the stairs as no elevator in our building.  Although hotel was booked, staff was completely courteous and gave wonderful service.  We loved having our own pool and spa and hot tub for our building, although our kids loved going to the big pool with water slides.  We will definitely return! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you or all of your kind words, especially those about our colleagues.  We are delighted you had a great stay and we look forward to your next visit!    Sincerley,  Cathy S.

Summary: We love this hotel. Nice location with great pools especially water slide!  If you have kids you should stay there!  Price is great. People are nice! It's also good for a weekend outing!   I wish we could have bigger room. But that weekend was super busy.
Manager Response: Thank  you so much for all of your kind words!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S,

Summary: We went to Newport for a dinner cruise in the harbor and our Association booked the Hyatt  and arranged for a tour bus to take us all down to the harbor and bring us home safely. We arrived to as expected service from Hyatt and got ourselves all checked in. The hotel is a bit on the older side but is impeccably maintained both inside and out providing with such nice visual aesthetics all around the property.  Our room was very nice, quiet and clean. The bed and pillows were comfortable and the bathroom was nice and functional. We all met up in the bar, kind of pre party, and the bar and food staff were prompt and very courteous. We enjoyed some drinks and appetizers before heading out. The Valet staff we quick to approach your vehicle, offer luggage or other assistance service
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent rating and review!  It sounds as though you enjoyed every aspect of our resort and destination.  We do hope you will return to our property next year with your Association.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: It's a Motel 6 from the 1970s...needs to be demolished and rebuilt! Very thin blankets, shoddy quality all around. Quite strange it's a Hyatt. There is a lack of quality hotels in the area, otherwise never would have stayed here.
Manager Response: Thank your for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your feedback and wish you had a better experience.  We are sorry that you did not get a chance to experience all that our property has to offer, like our complimentary beach cruiser bike rentals, golf or tennis.  While we are not newest hotel property in the area, we are a legendary iconic hotel that many in the community hold near and dear to their hearts.  We hope you will give us another try so you many experience some of the rich history of Newport Beach.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: For the price this hotel charges, it is not worth it. Old hotel, rooms are outdated, pool old. Basically if this was a $200 a night property, fine. Service was excellent and food at Shore was yummy, but they need to renovate this place ASAP.
Manager Response: Thank your for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your kind words regarding our service and colleagues.  We are sorry that you did not get a chance to experience all that our property has to offer, like our complimentary beach cruiser bike rentals, golf or tennis.  While we are not newest hotel property in the area, we are a legendary iconic hotel that many in the community hold near and dear to their hearts.  We hope you will give us another try so you many experience some of the rich history of Newport Beach.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: A nice place for a business trip or vacation
Summary: Very nice hotel in an excellent location. Close to restaurants & beaches and to the beautiful back bay road for daily runs. Staff was excellent. Room was comfortable and clean. A very comfortable place to stay for work.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  We love hearing from our business clientele.  We look forward to your next visit and hope you can enjoy some leisure time with us.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: It was ok. The room was very clean but the carpeting outside our room seemed old and the building outdated. I wish our room would've been in the main building. I expected more from Hyatt. There were a few planes flying by but at least it wasn't constant.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish we could control air traffic, we cannot, but the upside is we are just minutes from John Wayne Airport.  Your feedback has been shared with our resort team and we do appreciate all of your comments.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Please contact us directly to book in the Catalina building.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The team at the Hyatt Newport on Jamboree is incredibly warm and professional. This was the second meeting we have had at this location, and I could not have been more pleased and impressed. We felt completely cared for and taken care of the entire time. The team is ready to pivot when the plan changes and they are understanding of miscommunications on our part. I would highly recommend this property for a work meeting! It is also a gorgeous property, so I would stay there for pleasure happily as well
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about our resort team!  We love that you have had multiple successful meetings at our resort.  Your feedback and recommendation is invaluable to our team.  We look forward to working with you again soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This hotel is in an excellent location. It is close with easy access to the beach, dining and shopping areas. The grounds are very nice and well maintained. The rooms are a little dated but clean, comfortable, and well maintained. I would stay here again and recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: It is old and service is poor, and the toilets were disgusting.
Summary: A two day journey turned into a hotel nightmare with bad service on check in, check out and during the stay. Bathroom in the lobby was the worst, with excrement all over the toilet. And they wanted to fix it by "talking to me". Damage is already done. I will never stay at a hyatt again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We apologize that your stay was less than satisfactory.  All of your feedback is being shared with our leadership and all of these issues will be addressed immediately.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Old hotel, I could hear every person I shared a wall with
Summary: Front desk phone staff (Ashley) was inconvenienced by questions/requests and made it known with sighs and tone of voice. The first night I called to say that the people above us were so loud that it was impacting my children’s sleep. I was told a manager would be in touch. No one ever called/contacted me or addressed the noise. I responded to a Hyatt text asking how my stay was and I responded with these concerns. Again nothing was done about any of it other than “let us know if you need anything.”  The hotel is old and the walls are so thin that I could hear my neighbor’s entire phone conversation. I asked housekeeping for extra conditioner and was told the manager only gives her so much and I should ask the manager myself if I wanted more.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better stay, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  It looks as though we have missed several opportunities to show you what Hyatt hospitality is all about.  Although we cannot change the fact that our resort is an older property, we certainly will address all of the other issues you mention.  Again, thank you for all of your help in correcting these missteps.  Sincerly,  Cathy S.

Summary: I have stayed at its location multiple times now. The staff is very friendly and welcoming. It’s on a resort style layout with multiple pools. The main pool has food and drinks along with a water slide. The hotel offers paddleboard’s and bicycles and a few other things for rent that I did not take advantage of but the location is right on a main bike path that travels around back bay.   The rooms are a little out of date but very clean. Every time I come I have the steak and eggs for breakfast. As a Hyatt globalist this is complementary and is really quite a value especially if you’re there with more people.   The location is walking distance from Newport dunes. A short drive from SNA airport, roughly a mile to fashion Island Mall and a short drive to Corona Del Mar and  Newport
Manager Response: Thank you for all of kind words and compliments, we love hearing from our frequent guests and it sounds as if you are definitely in that category.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This resort is a bit dated but has a lot to offer.  The grounds are lush and beautiful .  It’s location is ideal. It’s a short walk or bike ride over to Balboa Island and the pedestrian/car ferry to Balboa Peninsula where an absolutely beautiful beach awaits you.  A two hour bike rental is included for each day of your stay so take advantage of that.  The restaurant Shor has a great selection for breakfast and lunch and the staff there was super friendly. There is a little pitch and putt golf course and several tennis courts on the property. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for pointing out all of our amenities -- it's true our hotel is older but we consider a Newport Beach classic and most of our local, regular guests agree.  Thank you for the shout out to Shor and our colleagues, we especially appreciate it and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The rooms of the hotel circle the perimeter of a large, family friendly pool. During the first night of my stay, adult patrons were extremely loud on the pool deck passed 10 pm. I checked the reviews of this place to see if this is a reoccurring issue and it looks like my experience was an isolated event, though a friend in a separate room and I called the front desk to ask if they could quiet the folks by the pool. They did quiet down after 10:30. Know that there is know housekeeping if you are staying for 3 or less nights. When I called for new k-cups for the in-room coffee maker on my second morning of my stay, I waited for an hour to get them. After waiting a half hour I went to the front desk to get my k-cups. It wasn't until I returned to my room that I realized the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback is invaluable to our hotel teams.  We appreciate you comments and will share them to be sure we can improve upon your experience for your next visit.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Resort Feel Stay Like Melrose's Place
Summary: This hotel has a very relaxing feel.  My first impression is it feels more like a resort than another hotel.  Also, the place reminds me of the show Melrose's Place.  I didn't get to swim in the pools but they look nice.  I do enjoy the lobby dining experience.  The bed is very comfortable.  The only thing that I do notice is how noisy it is.  You'll hear planes fly by and machineries working almost all day and night.  With the window closed, it's fine but if you're thinking that you'll have peace and quiet with the window open then you might be in for a surprise.  At least for my experience.
Manager Response: Now that you mention it, our low-slung, mid-Century SoCal architecture does kind of look like the set of Melrose Place!  Thank you for your kind words and feedback, we appreciate it and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Horrible check in and check out
Summary: The reservation had wrong Hyatt membership number so I needed to update. I requested at the time of check in, and it was still not updated. I requested at the time of check out again yet it still wasn't updated. Especially the representative who checked me out was horrible and rude that she was pretending to listen my request about membership number update but her hands were not moving at all. I have stayed many Hyatt hotels but this was the worst experience of all.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience with your membership number update, I hope the rest of your stay was more satisfactory.  Your feedback is being shared with our guest experience team and we can assure you we take your comments very seriously and will use them as an immediate training opportunity.  We appreciate our World of Hyatt members' brand loyalty and strive to make every Hyatt stay a great experience.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Nice relaxed hotel with good facilities including choice of pools, gym, cycle hire with a nice route around the bay. We’ve stayed here a few times and it’s probably the optimum location for a So Cal vacation. Fashion Island mall is a moment away for shopping and dining, Balboa Island is a minute away and is a delightful spot - so laid back with small shops and a few eateries and you can take the ferry across to Balboa Peninsula and the beach, you can cross to Catalina Island from here which is a ‘must do’ - we saw a whale on our crossing), Corona del Mar beach is a 5 minute drive, Laguna is not far, and you’re in a good position between San Diego and LA for theme parks, zoos etc. People are very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We love hearing from our frequent guests.  We are especially delighted to have international guests back in SoCal!  It sounds as though you managed to take advantage of all of the wonderful experiences our destination features.  We are glad your trip was a such a success and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Vacation stay at Hyatt Newport Beach
Summary: We loved our stay at Hyatt in Newport beach.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  Most of all I loved, loved, loved the daily cleaning, towel refresh and daily linen changes.  Sadly, this is almost unheard of anymore. Our stay was fun and relaxing just what we needed on the kids spring break.  Also, I'm a terrible sleeper - the room was perfectly quiet and our view of the golf course serene.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Had a room over looking the bay and the view was perfect. Food was good and location to the beach is about an 8 minute drive, lots of great restaurants close by as well, the grounds a clean and well kept.  Only complaint I would have is the $35 daily parking fee for guests, that is extremely high for having to park your own vehicle then walk all the way from the parking lot to your room (Its a far walk) other than that is was a great stay and vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review!  We appreciate your kind words and feedback regarding parking.  We have golf carts available if you ever need a lift to our parking areas in the future.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.
