Summary: This hotel was so beautiful. The location was perfect! Very close to all of our beach destinations and restaurants. The staff was very helpful and attentive to all our needs/questions. The pool and slide were perfect for my child. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We appreciate your feedback and shout out to our colleagues as well.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel had great amenities for the whole family. We enjoyed the nice short walk to the beach. A wonderful staff that treated us very well especially for my children. This is a nice welcome to cali.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words.  We are delighted you and family enjoyed your stay!  We especially appreciate the shout out to our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We would go back there again and room service was good. I would recommend to anyone! Room was clean and quiet and was able to get a good night’s rest. Room was also accessible to all amenities. Overall great experience
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and all of our amenities.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: My daughter and I enjoyed our stay very much. It's a lovely property. We had a balcony room in the Balboa building - a nice spot because it's not too far from the front of the property, the doors open to an inside hallway, and it was also pretty quiet. Ashley at the front desk checked us in and was there at the desk every day, she was very helpful and knowledgeable. Juan in the restaurant at breakfast was awesome, as were the ladies at the coffee counter, the valet team and the team who helps with luggage, the poolside server at the Bay building pool, and many thanks to Catalina in housekeeping for helping me out when I left an item behind in the room. Lovely area close to all kinds of interesting things to do including beach and shopping.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and shout outs to our team members!  We appreciate all of your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: There may be nice rooms but I wasn’t in them - they have several buildings and the one I was in was cheaper than a Days Inn. Motel like, you couldn’t keep your shades open, the heating/cooling was awful. For a business traveler good luck in finding a plug. The lamps didn’t work either. The 9 hole course is one step up from a pitch and putt. The coffee shop only opens at 630am which isn’t great when you’re on East Coast time. The front desk can often be overwhelmed with calls and make you wait. Do yourself a favor and avoid this hotel and stay elsewhere!!  Bar staff was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better stay, your feedback is invaluable to our resort team.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and various departments.  We sincerely apologize that your stay was less than satisfactory can assure you that our team takes this type of review very seriously.  We hope you will give us another try to allow you to see what so many locals and domestic and international visitors have come to appreciate about our iconic landmark hotel.    Sincerley,  Cathy S.

Summary: I stay at Hyatts all over and have stayed at this property a few times in the past. Unfortunately, it’s not what it used to be. The rooms are old and dated and the overall experience is lacking for the money. Our room unfortunately was infested with bugs. Needless to say we won’t be going back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had  a better experience, we are grateful for your feedback.  We are taking measures to assure the issues  you encountered are resolved.  We hope you will give us another try in the future.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Our family recently stayed at this hotel for a quick getaway over Spring break. Our kids are 1, 6, and 8. From the moment we arrived we were warmly welcomed and then greeted at the front desk. I always appreciate agents who are kind to our kids, and they went above and beyond to include them and get our vacation off to a great start. We stayed at a Bay room right next to the pool. It feels a bit small, but we made it work as the room wasn’t the destination, just a place for bags and sleeping. Our luggage was delivered to our room and we got changed and went to the pool. Our toddler enjoyed the splash pad and the big girls spent hours in the pool and water slide. The water was the perfect temperature for all, and there were just enough chairs to go around. It’s sort of the off
Manager Response: Thank you for acknowledging that we are indeed a "classic" SoCal hotel!  We are delighted you enjoyed our pools, grounds and s'mores.  Your comments regarding Shor have been shared with our F&B and culinary teams for future encouragement.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Stayed here recently, and quite frankly they are more concerned with draining money from guests than giving quality service. At check in they did not inform us that they now only service the room every three days ,we had to call to get tea coffee and shower items sent to the room, as they ran out quickly. In the room there is a card from the maid giving details about what time they are due to service your room, Monday to Friday and Saturday and Sunday, what a joke. At check in it’s all about the resort fee and the car parking fee, also the $75 they hold as a daily charge for “ incidentals”. We stayed in this hotel about three years ago, and the difference was incredible, I complained at the hotel desk twice including check out, and was met with total indifference. I understand
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your feedback has been shared with our leadership.  We do appreciate your kind words regarding our colleagues.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to exceed your expectations and get you to enjoy the many amenities that are available to our guests through the resort fee, like our Back Bay golf course with complimentary greens fees and club rental and complimentary beach cruiser bike rentals.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Let's put it this way:  You can spend days on and off the property without a car. There are plenty of outdoor activities to enjoy right here: Golf, Tennis, 3 Pools, etc. plus easy walking access to hiking trails, Balboa Island, beaches, shopping at Fashion Island, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful review.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort ... Lovely place to relax and unwind.
Summary: In addition to a clean and lovely resort style hotel, there are a lot of "relaxation and bonding" spots all over the place. Just hang out and enjoy the place.  IF you want go to the beach, it is a short uber ride.  It would have been nice if the hotel had a shuttle service to Newport Beach Center and the beaches nearby, but uber/lyft is always there.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and your suggestions have been shared with our leadership for consideration.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Very good  hotel for a pool vacation
Summary: Pools are amazing. There are 3 pools in the resort : Oasis (kid friendly pool), Indulge,Serenity. All pools are open to kids but Oasis is mostly preferred by families with kids.  We stayed in Lido Building that has Serenity Pool.  Our room had balcony having view of golf area. Room was not small but not big, also not fancy but not dated. There is no elevator in the resort which consists of two-story buildings. You have to use stairs if your room is at upper level.  Self parking area is located a bit far from rooms. There is also a valet parking option.($43)  We did not go to Shor restaurant for neither breakfast nor dinner. We ordered some food from Shor’s kid menu to pool and also to our room.  It was good.   Lobby bar sells breakfast bakery and starbucks coffee in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We have stayed here many times, a beautiful property near the beach. However this stay was in a villa at $1000+ per night and we were very disappointed. This villa is tired and worn and smells moldy throughout. There were cock roaches in the kitchen area and no housekeeping services available. The yard in this villa with its fire pit and private pool was outstanding but the interior spaces were dirty and uncomfortable. These villas at this price point are unacceptable and need renovations throughout.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We love hearing from our frequent guests and am very sorry to hear that your stay was less than satisfactory.  Your feedback and comments have been shared with our leadership and we appreciate your candor.  We do hope you will give us another try in the future.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Pretty dumpy for a Hyatt, but the rooms are dirty
Summary: Stayed in April 2022 for 1 night business trip. Got a Motel 6 for Hyatt prices. The ants and open soap when I checked in were an unexpected bonus. Newport Beach is beautiful, but there has to be a nicer hotel fo rthe money than this place.
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  Rest assured your comments have been shared with our housekeeping team and leadership to avoid any similar mishaps in the future.  We do hope you will give us another try as so many of our frequent guests have come to love our amenities and destination.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Very spacious public areas, well manicured grounds, super location in quiet subdivision, 5 minutes drive to the beach, terrific staff was very friendly and helpful regarding reservation, room and facility was clean. Parking was far.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and we very much appreciate the shout out to our colleagues!  Next time you stay with us, just ask for a golf cart lift to our parking area.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Dog friendly, kid friendly Newport Hotel
Summary: Very nice hotel that is extremely dog friendly, the kids loved the pool and kid menu, and is centrally located.  Staff was very friendly and throughly enjoyed the overall experience. Easy to get around Newport, get to Disney etc too.
Manager Response: Kids and dogs are our super-power! So glad you had a great experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Everything always fell short here, just a few examples:  - At breakfast we were served glasses that clearly hadn't been cleaned and had been previously used for smoothies, disgusting  - When the bell hop came to assist me in taking my things to my car to leave, they packed it and I gratefully tipped them. I went back to the room and found that had left my dogs crate and the car would need to be entirely repacked - They double charged me on the pet fee - The rooms aren't very nice, the shower is bad, and our suite didn't even have a wine key.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and various teams.  It sounds as though we fell short in so many areas, and I sincerely apologize for that.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback is very important to our team.  I hope you will give us another try as so many of our guests have come to truly enjoy the many amenities our hotel and destination have to offer.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Overpriced breakfast bar with poor service.  $6 for a bagel was ridiculous.  The bagel was thrown in a bag with no wrapping.  No napkins were placed in the bag.  Value was about $2.  No coffee available in the lobby.  Pods in the room are fine but no water or coffee available in the lobby is chintzy.  As part of a wedding party, I was told parking would be $15/day.   At checkout, my bill showed the full price of $36/day.  I called and the front desk made an adjustment but, 4 days later, the adjustment has still not shown on my credit card statement.  The bill stated "wedding party".  Why wasn't the $15 parking charge automatically applied?  Overall, a nice hotel but overpriced in several areas.  I will not be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  I apologize for the parking fees being overcharged and am sure it will be reversed.  The credit card companies some times take longer than the 36 hours they quote us.  I hope you will give us another try, as we do have some great amenities -- like complimentary bike rentals, a par 3 golf course with complimentary green fees and club rentals.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: My daughter and I were visiting family in Newport and the hotel’s location was perfect for us - walking distance to many interesting areas/activities. My morning “Back Bay” runs were great followed by swims in the pool - soft towels and relaxing music waiting for me. Using bikes to get around was also convenient and fun! Felt very safe at this resort.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words!  We are delighted you enjoyed our resort and warm weather!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon,  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Hotel is old in all manners.  Everything about the hotel is cheap and it shows. Definitely not worth the $320 per night plus the expensive mandatory resort fee (for what?).  Maybe they can get away with these prices in this area but at least be warned - this is not a 4* hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our leadership and resort team.  Our resort fee includes complimentary bike rentals, and golf club rentals and green fees for up to 4 ppl at our Back Bay (Par 3) golf course.  We hope you can enjoy these amenities during a future stay.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: They charge for parking and parking is a quarter mile away the building and they also charge for microwave per night and for the money spent the room did  not justified the price. There are ocean view hotels for the same price .
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your feedback has been shared with our leadership and we do hope you will give us another try.  In the future, our team can assist with a ride to our self-parking area.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: From the moment we arrived, we received a level of hospitality that went above and beyond! Beautiful property, nice-sized, immaculate rooms, far better food than most hotels we've been in, and lots for couples and families to do! This was our 2nd time staying here, and just booked our 3rd!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words and great review!  We are delighted you are coming back again and look forward to welcoming you back!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I've stayed in this hotel for 30 years and the current condition of the hotel is dreadful. Grounds need picking up with trash everywhere. Rooms badly maintained and housekeeping absent. We had a room adjoining the pool pump and the noise from it kept both of us awake for the night. Bellman took 50 minutes to appear when we checked out. .Pool pump noise and vibration was remarkable....lack of maintenance? Engineering was called to no avail. Carpet in the room was Filthy.  Overall an experience of a property now coasting and maximizing profit with no concern for the guest. We are beyond disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your candor, and while we wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and teams for further encouragement going forward.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: My little room was all the way in the back. View of nothing but nature. private little patio. The room was perfect and relaxing. It was the stress free portion of my trip. Also, I had forgotten a couple things and the front staff was very helpful with accommodating me.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are so delighted you had a great getaway and were able to relax and de-stress.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel is absolutely beautiful and clean. The grounds were kept very nicely and the location was very convenient. It’s a 3 minute drive to Fashion Island which is a outdoor shopping mall with all the top brands stores. In many hotel the air condition makes noises throughout the night waking me up. This hotel the air condition is completely silent making the sleep perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and great rating and recommendation!  We are delighted you had a great stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This was a great location with great amenities, very clean, beautiful well kept grounds. The food onsite was very good. Every employee was helpful and pleasant. My favorite was all the healthy palm trees on the premises. Great trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us!  We love hearing from our business travelers.  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Not Worthy of the Hyatt brand
Summary: We travel frequently and rarely leave reviews; however this hotel is so poor I feel I must let other visitors know. The first room we occupied had a very low ceiling it makes you feel claustrophobic. The bathroom is such a poor design it deserves a Darwin award, you can actually exit the shower and stand on the WC, there is around 15 cm between them, and the shower door will open so you can exit via the WC location. The shower leaks, not from the screen or door from the plumbing itself. There is no privacy so the room curtains need to be closed all day and the walls and ceilings are so thin you can hear next door residents. The plane noise from the airport is terrible, do not expect to sleep here, there is no sound insulation, and in the early morning the children will be in the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish your had a better stay, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  We appreciate all of your comments and have shared them with our leadership.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Beautiful area but accommodations were lacking
Summary: The area is nice but our hotel room was lacking. There was a strange odor in the room. We tried masking it with air fresheners but it did not work. It seemed to be embedded in the furniture. The grounds were nice and it was located in a beautiful area.  The hotel just didn’t live up to our expectations for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are sorry your stay was less than satisfactory and we appreciate your feedback to help our team improve the quality of your next stay.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The lack of daily housekeeping, particularly when the room rates are pretty darn high, is disappointing. What is initially a clean room becomes a den of trash and dirty towels. Shame on Hyatt for providing such a poor level of service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Housekeeping is available upon request.  I am sorry you were not aware of the housekeeping option.  We do hope you will give us another try.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, nice pool, good location, clean
Summary: This hotel was clean, comfortable, great location, nice pool, decent gym, friendly staff. We slept well and had a great time here. We loved the running and walking trails along the shoreline right outside of the hotel too. Great restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  CathyS.

Summary Heading: Resort-like gem in walking distance to Balboa Island
Summary: We were there with our club volleyball team which consisted of 11, 18-year-old girls, their families and 2 coaches. When we drove up to the hotel, we immediately "ooh'd and ahhh'd" over the landscape and general resort-like vibe. The staff were friendly and courteous, the grounds are beautiful and the rooms are clean and spacious. The location was perfect as our girls could rent a bike, walk or Uber to Balboa Island to shop, eat and enjoy the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your sincere review!  We love having your teams, coaches and families stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The wife and i needed this get away rode our bikes around town and was very relaxed by the time we left. we loved our view in the lido building and used the jacuzzi multiple times. we recommend this hotel to anyone!! we loved the 60's-70's vibe it have off to us... we will definitely be back
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review and rating!  So glad you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We are local, but we still stop by this hotel for short weekend getaway.  Good & Warm swimming pool, good services overall.  I recommend this hotel if you are traveling with young kids in your family, since kids will love it
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words.  We are delighted to see your excellent review and rating!  We look forward to  your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many times over the last few years and it never disappoints.  We started coming here during Covid because they have the golf course but soon found that they have so many other things to do there. The staff is so nice, friendly and very helpful with whatever we need. The rooms are clean, the suites and villas are so big but the very best part is the pool. My grandkids ask to have their birthdays at this hotel every year. There are cabanas at the pools for rent which are so worth the price, the kids can spend the day at the pool and slide while we can stay comfortably in the covered cabana. The World of Hyatt program is the best I have seen and the benefits are great, my last stay was for 2 rooms which were both paid for with my points.  THE BEST HOTEL
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and the new title of Best Hotel in Orange County!  We'll take it!  We are delighted you had such a great stay and appreciate your loyalty to our resort and World Of Hyatt.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy Scott

Summary: Parking is far from the entrance. My room was not ready on time, missed a scheduled appointment due to this. The check in was not smooth. The receptionist was rude and inpatient. There were items missing in the room, called to ask for a bathrobe and was told it’s in the room already. It was not.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better stay, your feedback is invaluable to our team.  Your comments have been shared with our front office team for further encouragement.  We hope you will give us another try.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The Hyatt on Jamboree  Drive in Newport Beach is a wonderful hotel with many amenities.  It is a great location with many options for activities in the area  but also nice enough that you never have to leave the complex. You won’t be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are delighted you had a great stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Great resort, close to beaches, and central to many favourite locations to visit
Summary: Love California. Have stayed in Anaheim and Orange County area many times. Hyatt Regency Newport Beach is one of my favourite places. Central to get to Laguna Beach, Newport Beach, and Huntington Beach. Close to Fashion Island shopping area, and many great restaurants. Still within easy travel time to Disneyland area too.   Resort’s three pools are may be a little older, but clean and water is amazing. Very relaxing to spend a few hours by pool.   If anything, I would say cost of room and parking is a little high for the room quality. But location makes it a great option.
Manager Response: Thank you for an excellent review and rating.  It sounds as if you have taken advantage of everything our resort and destination has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This was one of the worst hotels for the price I’ve ever stayed. The room was simply awful - the windows were rotten and filthy. The window sills we’re covered in accumulated dirt. The door didn’t seal and it was insanely loud. Like you camped next to the shipping garage. The filter in the bathroom was gross and hadn’t been cleaned in years.   I’ve stayed in $10 backpack hostels that were nicer than this $400 USD Hyatt. We were moved to a different building and room (from 621 to 153) and it was like an entirely different hotel and the front office manager comp’d our first night. But honestly it did not make up for how outrageously awful that room was.  The photos I have show how bad it was.   Do not stay. Trust me. Do not.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better stay, it is feedback like yours that is so invaluable to our hotel team.  We are happy to here that you were accommodated and moved to another guest room.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Hyatt always provides the best service, rooms, and amenities.  This location near the beach and activities is great with lots to do or just stay on the beautiful property.  Great lounge and outdoor bar seating.

Summary Heading: Nice, Quiet Stay in Newport Beach
Summary: My wife and I flew to Newport Beach to spend a few days touring the area.  I used to be a Marine in El Toro and it has been nearly 27 years since I'd been back to this area.  We enjoyed our stay at the property and wound up staying an extra night.  The hotel was nicely kept, and very quiet at night.  The valet service was prompt with no issues.  We did not eat at the hotel, so I can't rate the food service.  The staff we interacted with were super nice and accommodating during our stay.  The hotel is in a great location, within several minutes of the beach and the Back Bay.  The Back Bay walking trails are a few minutes from the hotel and you can walk or run the scenic trails.  The weather was beautiful during our stay.  We stayed in the Lido building, which is away from the
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the excellent rating and review!  We are especially excited to hear you enjoyed the scenic trails along the Back Bay, another hidden gem!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Rooms are below par, honestly you can find a better room at a extended stay. Property is beautiful, but don’t let that fool you, the room you will get looks straight out of the 80’s. Popcorn ceiling an all
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your feedback and comments and have shared them with our leadership.  We hope you will give us another try and experience some of our awesome amenities, like our Back Bay Golf Course and complimentary bike rentals.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Such lovely grounds! Our room was very comfortable, clean, and spacious and had a great little balcony. The staff was friendly & helpful. As a Globalist, we got complimentary breakfast from the on-site Shor restaurant & it was FANTASTIC! The gym was also really nice - lots of cardio equipment, plenty of space, lots of free weights & weight machines. I would recommend asking for a room on the further edge of the property if you're sensitive to noise. The walls are kind of thin, so I just imagine it'd be maybe a bit too noisy if you were staying near the pools toward the center of the property. Otherwise, absolutely loved our stay & definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Fair and reasonably nice hotel. Breakfast was less than expected and quite expensive. toiletries were not always sufficiently provided, but were provided upon request quite quickly.  a big drawback was the separate and quite distanced car parking space; you had to park the car in a ramped parking and then walk all the way to your room, which I can imagine for some people is a nuisance.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write and share a review with us.  We greatly appreciate your comments and feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Breakfast and lunch was great at the SHOR restaurant.  The staffs were very kind.  I loved my stay.  I would love to visit again.  Swimming, golf, bicycle...just so much activities to do with kids.  Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate and review our hotel.  So glad you enjoyed your stay and we appreciate your kind words about our colleagues!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This Hyatt Property has it all. The location is central to Newport Beach yet convenient to John Wayne airport. The staff is friendly, breakfast is amazing, the rooms are very clean and comfortable, WiFi is reliable and high speed and every room has access to fresh air. There are a number of open spaces to relax and paths to walk around while taking in the Southern California sunshine. We will return!
Manager Response: Thanks for all of your kind words.  We are delighted you had such a great stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Our stay at the Hyatt Regency in Newport Beach was a lovely mini-getaway.  The staff is extremely kind and professional, helpful and eager to be of assistance when needed.  The room accommodations were comfortable, clean and exactly as shown on their website.  We would definitely return and enjoy their beautiful pools and amazing surroundings again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate and review our hotel.  We appreciate you comments and kind words and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: I rate the stay as average for a couple of reasons. The grounds are beautiful and there are plenty of pools, a nice fitness room and in a very nice and convenient area.  The food was delicious and the dining atmosphere was very nice.  The downside: It is an older property and parts of it were remodeled better than others.  Our room was very attractive and comfortable, but the bathroom had no heat or air and only had louver style doors to separate it from the bedroom.   The windows/doors to the outside are thin and original to the building.  The area we were in was also a bit rundown looking on the outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate and review our resort.  We are delighted for your kind words describing our grounds, pools and food and beverage offerings.  We appreciate your feedback on our guest rooms and have shared your comments with our leadership.  We hope to welcome you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The Hyatt Regency Newport Beach is a great property.  The location is convenient to so many things, the grounds are ver attractive and relaxing.  The 3 pools provide plenty of space to relax and enjoy the weather.  The lobby bar is a relaxing place to to have a cocktail at the end of the day.  This has become our go to place when visiting Southern California.  Excellent value.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and we hope you will stay with us again soon!  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and rate our property!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Newport Beach Hyatt not a Treat
Summary: I don't know if Hyatt has a lazy eye to updating this property or just does not care.  Do not get me wrong the grounds are great, the building including the lobby, rooms and restraunt have a worn look  I notice on most of the doors the weather stripping missing on the bottom leaving a 3/8" opening for any little creature to come right in your room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your feedback is invaluable to our team and we have shared your comments with leadership for further consideration and action.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The property is old and tired and could benefit from some renovations.  Staff is great, but room was not cleaned well which gives very little confidence as to the cleanliness over all.  When I stay in a hotel, I want the carpets vacuumed well and the bathroom to be clean.  Neither was the case during this stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, we are grateful for your candor and it allows us to examine our housekeeping inspection protocols and other services.  We so appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: I definitely feel at home when staying at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. Very comfortable, friendly efficient staff. Always accommodating. And the food was very good. Thank you! I always look forward to visiting.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and great rating!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great location with nice amenities. The staff is friendly, especially the bell gentleman.  Very dated hotel, rooms had a bad odor probably due to a pet-friendly hotel. I would not recommend this resort.
Manager Response: Thank you  for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback is invaluable to us and all of your comments have been shared with our resort team for further encouragement and new protocols with regard to our guestrooms.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Disappointing stay at Hyatt Newport Beach
Summary: We booked a pool view room.  All we could see was bushes and chairs.  Room also smelled dirty and moldy.  Mgr said no other king room to give us.  Wedding group we were there with had gifts for guests.  Front desk never gave us ours at ck in.  We had to go back and ask for it before we left.  They had it, just never gave to us.  We were gone most of the day Saturday.  We returned around 2pm to find room never cleaned.  Frt desk said coming right now.  We left about 3:30 for the wedding and still never cleaned.  We returned at about 10pm that night and at some point it was finally cleaned.  Overall very frustrating and disappointing experience with Hyatt.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  We apologize for our challenges in the housekeeping area and your comments have been shared with our rooms teams.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you and your family better.  Our hotel and destination have so much to offer that we believe we can deliver a great stay for your next visit.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We had an amazing experience. The stager was well above average in every way. From check in to check out and everything in between. The food and beverages were great as well. Not a single complaint from us! Looking forward to our next trip the Newport!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  We especially appreciate your shout outs to our food and beverage teams as well!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Very dirty and not as classy as this hotel seems to be. Very sadly dissapointed with the over all experience and will not book any rooms here again. The view also was really bad and didn't not make our stay any better
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are sincerely sorry your stay was less than satisfactory.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to win back your business.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Not recommended at all. Beyond needing a renovation, I awoke to a flood from above in my room at 3:30am, simply got a "sorry". Also, you need to add $60-68 add to each room night for "facility and parking".
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is so invaluable to our team.  We sincerely apologize and hope you will give us another opportunity to curate an amazing stay.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We love staying here every Valentine’s Day weekend. Rooms are always clean and the staff are friendly and professional. You get what you pay for. It’s a little pricy but worth it knowing the cleanliness.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for all of your kind words and we are delighted you chose our hotel to spend Valentine's Day weekend.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Very quiet and discreet property, stayed for business so used conference rooms and onsite restaurant, food and beverage.
Summary: Very clean and staff are extremely friendly. Room had a bathroom issue, was quickly moved to another room. Very quiet due to off-season. Many pools but because of weather did not see a lot of people outdoors.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent rating and review.  We love hearing from our business travelers and we look forward to your next stay.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Whenever I am in Orange County I stay at the Hyatt in Newport Beach.  The staff are incredibly helpful and accommodating.  It's a lovely property with plenty of green space.  Close to all the Newport area has to offer.
Manager Response: Thank you for the shout out about our colleagues!  We are delighted you choose our resort when you are visiting Newport Beach. Thank you for your loyalty and we look forward to your next stay.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We came on a sold out weekend and the staff was great. No long lines, and friendly desk and front line employees. Love that housekeeping is back. It's a sprawling property that is so convenient to everything in Newport and CDM.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for an excellent rating and review.  We are delighted you enjoyed our resort and everything that the destination has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: My experience at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach was fantastic.  Automated check-in and check-out simplified my arrival and departure. The facility and staff were great and I will definitely consider a return visit!
Manager Response: We love hearing from our conference attendees!  So glad you had a productive meeting while enjoying our hotel accommodations.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: What a slice of paradise tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the metropolitan coast line.  All amenities and staff were top notch.  Any time we interacted with the staff we were left with the felling that our needs were taken care of.  All staff and employees were great and responsive to all of our needs.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words, especially those about our colleagues.  We are delighted you enjoyed you stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Hyatt Regency and it was by far the best hotel we've ever stayed at. Quality service and products all the way around. We could tell that they go the extra mile to make your stay as comfortable as possible!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for all of your kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay!  Again, we appreciate your comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We stayed at a two room suite, actually it was a combination of a room with king bed, a room with two queens and a room in the middle with a couch, at balboa building. Room sizes were fine and we had two balconies that was awesome. Rooms need renovation, specially stained couches and flooring need to be changed, even though the rooms were clean it gives the impression that they were not. Self parking is a good 4-5 minutes walk but the valet parking was 35$ (or something close to that) per night and honestly not worth it. Check in was great even though when we arrived there were a lot of families checking in. Room cleaning service was great. Big resort like hotel made it easier for the kids to have fun, such as pool, bike rentals, table tennis etc... a lot of outside room for
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your detailed review.  We are delighted that our hotel and room types worked so well for your stay.  We hope you will visit us again soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Wonderful stay, perfect location close to fashion island and balboa island (2 miles). The only drawback was the for the price the room service food wasn’t what I expected, but definitely tasty, just not $20 worth tasty.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate and review our hotel.  We appreciate your feedback and have shared your comments with our food and beverage team.  We hope you will visit us again soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Tired and Run Down with No Service
Summary: Despite a very appealing lobby, the rooms of his hotel are very tired and run down and as mentioned elsewhere on these reviews the entire place smells bad.  Although I agreed not to have the room cleaned my first night as I checked in late my room was not cleaned or services at all for the four nights I stayed-no towels replaced, etc.  As I noticed a few mornings that wine glasses were left on the tables from the night before, this lack of service is clearly not specific to the rooms.  The overall tone is very dingy, run down and clearly just trading on the Hyatt brand.  No one ever at the front desk-from the time of my check in to check out four days later I literally had no contact with anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is invaluable feedback like yours that keeps our team striving to improve our service and protocols.  We apologize that the times you needed front desk assistance there was not a colleague available.  All of your comments have been shared with our leadership and we do hope you will give us another try to create an amazing stay for you.  Our resort and destination have so much to offer, we hope to win back your business on your next visit to Orange County.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Solid location with a great view
Summary: I've stayed at the Newport Beach location a number of times, as it has become my go-to space when traveling to town for business. The main hotel (connected to the lobby) is great with modern look and feel (though one has to pay for the "beach view" upgrade to be lodged in the nicer area). Food and beverage are accessible all day which is nice when traveling alone.
Manager Response: Thank you so much, we love hearing from our frequent guests!  We appreciate all of your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The place was mostly clean and nice.   The rooms smelled old and gross.  Would return if they cured the smell issues.  The bathroom had a reddish - brownish substance on the bathroom door.   They put me in a room that was not what I reserved, which they quickly corrected.   The staff was awesome.   I felt like parking was waaaaaaaay to far away from my room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your feedback is invaluable to our team.  It seems we have some challenges to overcome in housekeeping.  As you noted, our hotel team is awesome and will correct the issues you have shared with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: I recently stayed here with my 2 sons, ages 6 and 5. I wasn't sure what to expect, but I was definitely pleasantly surprised. Every member of the staff that we encountered was very friendly and helpful. No one seemed put-off with my boys, and I'd be lying if I said there weren't times when they made me want to crawl under a rock and hide. They're well behaved, but we had just driven straight through from the Bullhead City, AZ area and they were a little excited. Despite my continued apologies, Julian was extremely patient during the check-in process. We ate in the lounge area and were not treated any differently than the groups of adults that were also there, service was exceptional! The next morning, we were the only guests enjoying the pool, but they still came out and turned
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent rating and review!  We are delighted you and your sons had such an amazing stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Nice location , is not really ocean view as advertised is inter coast and is blocked by the trees , would be more appropriated to call pool view and inter coast . No worth to pay extra for the view We also asked for quite room . It was very noise since it was on top of the patio
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time write and share a review with us.  We appreciate all of your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Yes the property was a little older, but everything was kept up and clean, from the exercise room to the grounds, and the golf course. The golf course could have better directions on where one hole ended , and where to tee off for the next hole. Breakfast was delicious and quick. I wish I gotten to take advantage of the fire pits they had but ran out of time. Valet was very friendly and quick, you could text the staff 5 mins before you left your room and the car would be ready in time. We did not get to take advantage of the pools and the hot tubs but they were nice. The exercise room were great, clean new equipment, and the pelotons were great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  It sounds as though you were able to take advantage of all the amenities our resort has to offer.  We hope to welcome you back very soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Great hotel - bring your own pillows!
Summary: Beautiful property with a great staff and comfortable bed, however the pillows on the bed are not the most comfortable. If you have the opportunity to bring your own, do it. Other than that, the rest of my stay was as expected.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your kind words and yes, we get it, pillows are a definitely a personal preference.  We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Old and dying property kept alive by the Hyatt name and the location
Summary: We were expecting a resort experience, but instead found an overpriced motel. Please stay away from this unless you want - old, smelly motel with a feel of 90s corporate travel. Rooms are small, bathrooms  are even smaller, many things are broken and neglected in the room. The only restaurant has airport like food and ambiance. Parking is over-priced too. They lost our luggage upon arriving, It took them an hour to find it and deliver it to the room. You can hear the people from all sides and top, bottom. Just Yuck.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our hotel team.  We are very sorry that you did not take advantage of our many amenities, including golf, tennis and complimentary bike rentals.  Our hotel was once the iconic Newporter and we have been making memories for locals and visitors for over five decades, who have come to appreciate all that NB and our hotel have to offer.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Pools, jacuzzi, water slide, splash pad, fire pits with s'mores, bikes and extensive ground to explore.  Very friendly staff and accommodating family dining.  Many fun place for the kids to explore, and even a 9 hole golf course.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words about our amenities.  We are delighted you and your family enjoyed our property.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I love this hotel.  It's conveniently located, and has all the food and beverage amenities you could want.  It is very convenient that the Hyatt has a couple Tesla charging kiosks.  As any Tesla owner would tell you, finding Superharging stations can be hassle.  Other than that, the staff is friendly and efficient, and the rooms are great.   All good!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review and rating.  Happy to keep your Tesla super-charged and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Third floor lido rooms looking over trellis are only ones with a Back Bay harbor view. Nice bike path to Balboa Island. Free golf and bikes were why we went. Made it worth it except I’d Uber rather than pay 30 bucks for parking way on other side of property. Should be free since lot was empty.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  We appreciate all of your feedback regarding parking.

Summary: My wife and I enjoyed our stay at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach.  The room was spacious, clean, and the staffs were professional & friendly.  We enjoyed the breakfast at the hotel.  We love the landscaping and gardens around the hotel as the grounds were well kept. We enjoyed our stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  We appreciate all of your compliments and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Happy Holidays!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We had good service and nice staff, but the hotel itself is looking very dated. The location of the hotel is great.  The wing we stayed in was right out of a 1950's motel - while the rooms were mostly updated, the building was OLD and looked old. Example to get to the second floor rooms, you climb up an astroturf covered rickety staircase. The grounds are nice and the location is very convenient.  With parking and the resort charge and various fees, the rate we paid was about $100 per night above the quoted rate.  Net is we had a good stay, but the quality is not up to Hyatt Regency standards, and with the added daily fees it's not a super value either.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are delighted you had a great stay and we have shared your feedback with our hotel team.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Pictures of the rooms seemed a little different, kind of deceiving. The hotel appearance when arriving was beautiful, but the rooms were a little outdated and plain.  Cleanliness and Costumer Service were good, though.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Thank you for your feedback and kind words.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We choose this property for its proximity to our daughters' wedding venue.  We received so much support from reservations, to catering, bar, valet, and especially bellman.  The campus is sprawled out and provides many options.  The bellman proactively offered support for wedding party movement throughout the campus especially on wedding day!  They were awesome!
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We are delighted you were able to enjoy our hotel during your family wedding.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: With the Newport Beach location the hotel tries to sell itself as more upscale than it really is.  For example we stayed in a 2 room suite. The Hampton Inn and Suites have better suites with mare amenities than this Hyatt. The employees were very friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We especially appreciate the shout out to our colleagues.  We hope you will give us another try as our hotel and Newport Beach have so much to offer.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Ac didn’t want to work, dirty rag in the bathroom, iron smelled bad when using it, hide and seek with the coffee maker. Nice balcony and view was a big plus to everything else. There is no complementary breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that allows us to re-evaluate our protocols and operations to assure a better stay next time.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Happy Holidays,  Cathy S.

Summary: This hotel was not only beautiful, but very clean and well maintained.  The catered Thanksgiving dinner was fabulous!!  The food was hot, tasty, and plentiful.  All of the staff members I encountered were very polite and cheerful.  I was also surprised our rooms were so spacious. My family stayed in the Bay Building.  I would definitely stay here again and will recommend this hotel to my friends.
Manager Response: We are happy your family chose our hotel to spend Thanksgiving.  We especially appreciate the shout out to our colleagues and your great rating and recommendation.  Hope to welcome you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: My Favorite Place To Stay In Irvine
Summary: Peaceful, convenient, warm place with good food! Just off the main road, but this resort quickly can transport you to a surreal setting!  I came to visit my college son, and was treated to a very nice Thanksgiving dinner without any prep, the table was set for us!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for all of your kind words!  We are especially happy to welcome UC Irvine families to the property with a special rate!  We look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Had a wonderful stay at the Hyatt!  Banquette dinner for thanksgiving was excellent. Staff was thoughtful and the location and amenities are a great value. Looking forward to our next stay at the property.
Manager Response: It is great to hear you had a wonderful stay and Thanksgiving dinner was so good!  We can't wait to welcome you back.  Happy Holidays!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Rundown property that used to be beautiful
Summary: Unfortunately, this obviously used to be beautiful, but it’s been let go and is just rundown and shabby.  Walls are thin, noise travels into your room, and there are stairs everywhere. Plaster was coming off the wall in our bathroom, the shower leaked. That being said, the staff were super friendly and helpful and went out of their way to be as accommodating as possible.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your feedback and comments are invaluable to our leadership and we appreciate it.  Thank you for all of your kind words about our hotel team, it is especially gratifying to hear about our colleagues going the extra mile.  We hope you will visit us again soon.  Happy Thanksgiving!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great service, hotel grounds and pool, but rooms in dire need of update. The beds were also uncomfortable and most likely because they are old. The service was great and so was the food at the restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and feedback.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and we appreciate the time you took to let us know how we're doing.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy Sl

Summary: We spent a night here in connection with the OC Half Marathon which was starting at Fashion Island nearby.  We were upgraded to a room with a balcony and beautiful view of Back Bay.  The grounds were very tranquil and we had a great, comfortable night's sleep.  Our kids loved the water slide and splash pad by the pool.  Would recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  We are delighted you and your family enjoyed all that our hotel has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Everything is here to keep you busy. It's great for a short or long visit. So much to do on the property, golf, tennis, shuffleboard, swimming, sitting around the fire ring with the family. The food and service were A+
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us!  We will take your A+ rating and share it with our team for further encouragement!  We look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Beautiful facilty, friendly staff and wonderful amenities. The cleaninf staff were thourogh and quick. Loved the grounds and facilty. The location was also amazing close to shopping and wonderful local cuisine.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great rating and review!  We look forward to  your next visit!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Nice place for relaxing. We traveled to SO CAL for the OC 2021 marathon and enjoyed the proximity of the hotel to the race venue, Huntington Beach, and other restaurants and shopping. The facility was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review and rating!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Understaffed, dirty and needs major renovations
Summary: The improvements need to come in the hotel itself.  The pull out bed in the sweet that we rented had literally the worst mattress we have ever had to sleep on.  Also when we arrived to the room the coffee table and side table were covered in sticky drink rings and crumbs.  We were comped 2 nights resorts fees but that is just unacceptable.  Also the door to the room was dirty and stained, the bathtub was clogged and never fully drained and the sofa cushions were stained.  I have a well established vocabulary but the most descriptive word I can use to get my point across here is yucky.  You need more staff, nicer furniture, new paint, new carpet and overall a major renovation of the rooms of that Hyatt.  While specific people were wonderful the overall impression was very poor.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that allows our team the make the necessary improvements.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and will be addressed post haste.  Again, we appreciate all of your feedback.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The resort is a bit dated, but very well maintained. The property is beautifully landscaped with plenty of out door amenities. The deluxe King room was very clean and spacious with a great view of the golf course.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, great rating and recommendation!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I've stayed in a lot of hotels, but this room was by far the loudest. The walls are quite thin, the plumbing is old and loud, the HVAC was loud, and of course, know that this hotel is right in the flight path for John Wayne airport. It's a fine facility, but old, and I wouldn't likely stay here again. Staff were fine.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We hope you will reconsider and stay with us again as we are an iconic hotel, formerly known as the Newporter, with so much local history and a located in a great SoCal beach destination.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We stayed here because we had a special rate of nearly 50% off the regular room rate to attend a triathlon race just across the street.  The pool was large and heated with a small slide that kids will love. There was also a large jacuzzi area for families.  So my 10 year old had a lot of fun.  But our room felt smaller and old.  The shower area was cramped and dimly lit.  It was conveniently next to the  pool area, but we had no where to hang wet swim clothes.  These rooms next to the pool had individual AC units that is discreet and much better than most hotels, but can still make a little noise for light sleepers.  This facility is also close to OC airport so you'll hear the planes until around 10PM.  The hotel is also not close walking distance to restaurants outside the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us. We appreciate your feedback and have your comments with our leadership.  We hope you will visit us again soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Celebrated wife’s birthday weekend at the very beautiful Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. Staff at front desk and restaurant went above and beyond to make the visit memorable. Property includes executive golf course included in resort fee. Very convenient access to Balboa island and back bay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing our hotel to celebrate a birthday weekend.  We appreciate all of your kind words and recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: FABULOUS place to stay and hold a meeting!
Summary: My company recently held our yearly Leadership Conference at he Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. The hotel was clean, the staff was AMAZING, and our entire meeting went off without a hitch! The meeting and banquet staff were so attentive, and the food was delicious! I would HIGHLY recommend staying at this hotel, as well as holding a meeting here. You will not be disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words.  We love hearing from our conference attendees and meeting planners!  We appreciate your recommendation and the time you took to write a review and share it.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Booked here for work. Room was fine, breakfast was good, front desk staff helpful. Room smelled of fuel, and rotting room service for days in the hallway throughout my smelly stay. For the price, it felt more like a motel. Long uphill walk with bags to and from self-parking although valet is available and should be used given this. Not a bad place, but their are nicer places nearby for the same price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better stay, it is feedback like yours that allows us to encourage our hotel team to improve its service.  .  At Hyatt we pride ourselves on providing authentic hospitality and superior service and hope that you are able to visit us again soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Giving this property an average rating only because the staff was friendly and it’s in a great location, otherwise would rate lower. I book Hyatt to rack up rewards, so decided to book here for our weekend getaway and to attend the jazz concert, but should’ve stayed elsewhere. It’s hard to believe this is a Hyatt as the Bay building gives motel vibes. The walls are thin, ceiling is super low, toilet is extremely close to the shower and the mini refrigerator hums loudly. Also, it was a little cringe- worthy seeing rollaway beds stored outside near the walkways…curious if a bed is requested, are those the ones provided?? One other note, this property is in the flight path so no escaping noise from the planes above. Won’t book here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your feedback and comments.  We appreciate your shout out to our colleagues and while I wish you had a better stay, it is feedback like yours that allows us to re-examine our systems and protocols.  At Hyatt we pride ourselves on providing authentic hospitality and superior service and hope that you are able to visit us again soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: It may claim to be a Hyatt Regency... but it's really just a roadside motel in fancy dress
Summary: When you look at the web site you are overwhelmed by the stunning photos and are wowed by the gleaming waters of the pools and the lush greenery. However, the reality of this property, when looked up close, is far from glamorous. It is a poorly designed, badly signed, aging property with a huge disparity in rooms based on the building's location and age of the room. While you may request a particular type of room at booking, and you may pay for it in advance, there is NO guarantee that it will be there when you arrive. Also, when you book a hospitality suite and pay in advance and advise them you are holding an event in the room and that you must have access to the room by 1 or 2 PM at the latest and they assure you a week in advance it will be taken care of and fine... don't
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that allows us to revise and improve our current protocols and operations.  Your experience was clearly less than satisfactory and our sales and guest experience teams have been made aware of the many missteps you have outlined.   At Hyatt we pride ourselves on providing authentic hospitality and superior service and we understand if you are reluctant to stay with us in the near term.  Know that we are addressing all of the issues you have outlined.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with very good location
Summary: This is very family friendly hotel near water highly recommended.  Walking and biking trail near by also small golf course 9 hole free for guest.  If you like tennis they also have tennis courts for you play.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words and recommendation.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regard,  Cathy S.

Summary: we rented a villa (3 room suite with pool, fire pit and waterfall feature) plus a single master with balcony for daughters sweet 16th party 8-10 girls. the suite was very nice but the fire pit wasnt lit and the water feature was not working, both of the reasons for selecting that particular villa. it didnt matter the girls had fun in the pool and other stuff. our room was fine but it was easy to hear the guests next door. the after covid cost of the room was high after all the fees and room taxes added another 150.00 it was costly. the proximity to the airport was a drawback since airplanes were practically flying right over you at least that is how it sounded they started at 8:00 am and ended at 10 pm
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your comments and feedback have been shared with our hotel leadership for further encouragement with our engineering teams, to be sure all of our amenities are in working order in the future.  .  At Hyatt we pride ourselves on providing authentic hospitality and superior service and hope that you are able to visit us again soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Gorgeous hotel close to Balboa Island.  Great staff, well maintained grounds.  However, the entire hotel has popcorn ceilings, in the hallways, in the rooms.  This could be a major health hazard to customers as any breaks/damage could result in asbestos being released into the air.  Needs a major update to fix or cover the asbestos.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your valuable feedback, please know that it has been shared with our leadership for further encouragement to our hotel team.   At Hyatt we pride ourselves on providing authentic hospitality and superior service and hope that you are able to visit us again soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: As a Hyatt Globalist, I stayed at this property 3 different times (2x for work, once for pleasure, and this is it).   First, the structure of this property is super old and flimsy. The walls between rooms and hallway are paper-thin while the floor is not sound and solid. You must have a room on the top floor but still will be able to hear everything from next doors and hallway. If you are a light sleeper, trust me on this...stay somewhere else.  Second, activities including golf courses were closed due to the recent Jazz festival, which already ended by the time we were there. We wish we were proactively informed about this. Everyone in our family was let down.  If I have to be in the area for business or pleasure again, I would consider staying somewhere else even at a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We apologize for the golf course closure and any other issues you encountered at our hotel. While I wish you had a better stay, your comments and feedback our invaluable to our hotel team.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great staff and an enjoyable, sprawling property.  Perfect location for a reunion or long weekend.  The green belts made it ideal for a puppy and the To Go options made it easy to have breakfast in bed beyond room service.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and recommendation.  We are delighted your reunion was a success and look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This is a beautiful property with excellent staff. The rooms are clean and very well maintained, the atmosphere is friendly and the staff is all extremely helpful! I was there on business this time but I have been there for vacation previously. The only reason I didn't extend the stay this time was because it was pretty pricey for the weekend, but so is every place else right now. :\
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and recommendation.  We are delighted you had a great stay and hope you will visit us again soon.  We have 15% off offer in effect through the end of the year.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This is not a resort. One restaurant that was not edible.  Room service food was awful.  Med rare was burnt and ended up garbage.  Pastry was so old and dry I had to go to lobby.  Room service coffee Luke warm.  The outside of lido building is from the 50s
Manager Response: We are very sorry your stay was less than satisfactory.  Although I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that encourages our hotel team to re-evaluate our current operations.  It sounds as though our culinary/food&beverage teams missed the mark on more that one occasion.  Although we can't change the year the Lido buidling was built (It was in the 60's), we can deliver a better food and beverage experience for your next stay.  Please contact me directly, so we may be sure you have a great stay with us in the future.  cathy.scott@hyatt.com  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel is in a great location but the establishment is dated and had rats/possums crawling very near the lobby and fire pit areas. The restaurant was very limited. I think the hotel needs an overhaul but for sure new carpet.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This hotel was like a courtyard Inn at st. Regis prices.  It was clean.  The staff was friendly and prompt but simply overpriced for the quality of accomodation. At  ~ $300/night there should be free coffee in the lobby in the am and/or a beverage station.(lemon water?) Also, a guest can not turn off the balcony light at night. Very annoying.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words regarding our colleagues.  While we wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that allows us to re-examine our protocols and amenities to improve our service.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Very satisfied return customer and will continue to come back. Thank you for the relaxing positive vibe and I highly recommend Hyatt regency newport beach. I will be returning in November and for the new year. The best
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent rating and recommendation. We are delighted that you have already planned your next visit.  We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to your next stay.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The Hyatt in Newport was so nice and comfy with so many ammenities. I was married there 33 years ago so it was nice to see how they modernized it with fire walls and a children's area with slide and fun. The food was delicious and the staff was professional.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words.  It is especially gratifying to hear from someone who is familiar with our iconic property and the fact that you were married here is amazing!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Overall a very satisfied guest experience.  Proximity to the beautiful beaches and retail options was a huge plus.  Love the pool amenities such as water slide and miniature golf.  The hallways to the rooms are clean and beautiful, if you stay at the balcony rooms.  Self parking to the premium rooms is the only negative, it’s quite a long walk.  Came for a friend’s wedding, the hotel was very accommodating as far as elevating our room so we can check-in earlier! Thank you so much!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and excellent rating. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Grounds were BEAUTIFUL! Room was below what is expected for the cost.  Bathroom needed repairs: cracked, dirty grout.  Refrigerator was dirty. Direct flight path of airport, so couldn't really keep balcony open. So loud.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and feedback.  We have shared your comments with our hotel team and appreciate the time it took to write a review and share it with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The room overall felt dirty and the ventilation was terrible. Felt like an issue with moisture. Opening windows or turning on air conditioning did not help. Made sleeping rather uncomfortable. Luckily we were only here one night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share your feedback.  Our Engineering team has been made aware of you comments and is taking immediate action to investigate the A/C and ventilation units.  Thank you for your help.  Though I wish you had a better stay, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our teams.  We hope you will give us another try.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: One of California’s Best Beach Resort’s
Summary: This is a must stay resort property. Location, location, location. Beautiful, peaceful, serene grounds. Beaches near by. Excellent Golf and tennis. Restaurant and bar phenomenal. Professional, kind and courteous staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent review and rating.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Room spacious, bed comfortable, front desk made an effort to give me a room with a bathtub. Self-parking was a bit of a walk to get to but perhaps that is the only drawback and not a big one. Waiters at breakfast super efficient and friendly, food was great too.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We stayed at the Hyatt Newport Beach for the Newport Beach Jazz Festival 08-10 Oct 2021. The room we stayed in was older than the room pictured on the Hyatt website. I recommend verifying what building your room will be in before booking. The room that is on the Hyatt website looks like it is newer than the room we stayed in and our room did not come with a chair like the picture shows on the web site.  Our room also had an ant issue and the AC didn’t work that great.  Overall the room was just ok. For the amount of money we paid per night (over $300) it should have been better. It was convenient to stay there but the rooms in the back of the back building need to be remodeled. Don’t know if I would stay at this property again.
Manager Response: Thank you for detailed review.  All of our room types are on the website and noted by the guest room name.  Your comments and feedback have been shared with our leadership team.  We look forward to assisting you when you choose your room type in the future.    Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We attended the Newport beach Jazz festival and stayed on property for just one of the nights. The event was very well organized. It was so nice staying on property so that we could take breaks and retreat to our room for some down time enjoying the beautiful bay views. The hotel has a laid back tropical vibe. the option of three pools and three hot tubs is really nice. I personally prefer the Balboa building or the Catalina building as the Lido building has more of a "motel" feeling and the Bay building does not have a private deck or Lanai. The location of the resort is excellent for walking charming balboa island or taking the ferry to the beach. We love this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  The JazzFest returns in June 2022, we hope to see you there!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Horrible place at an extremely expensive rate with no maid service and a bad attitude
Summary: Our experience was horrendous. No maid service on most days for a $500 per night hotel. Tiny rooms that were filthy (no maid service unless you called several times), AC Receptacles were all lose and kept disconnecting, Wi-Fi is reminiscent of Modems of the 80s. Severely bad attitude from nearly all employees (they think they are doing us a favor), many were impolite at best, extremely rude at worse. Severely understaffed. If you want employees, you have to up your wages today. You need to decide if you want to be out of business or pay more for the employees who risk their lives (COVID) to serve people.
