Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Rest assured that we will share your feedback for further encouragement with our hotel team to ensure personal service and a warm welcome for your next visit.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Not worth the price you are paying
Summary: The Hyatt Regency Newport Beach decor is dated. The room we were assigned bathroom had cobwebs by the mirror. The set-up of the bathroom was not functional. The king bed was dressed with queen size sheets. We were by the main housekeeping storage room, so it was very loud early in the morning with talking and laughing. Is not work the price you are paying to stay at the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We apologize that your stay was less than satisfactory and want you to know that all of your comments and feedback are being shared with our leadership and resort teams so that me may quickly resolve the issues you describe. At Hyatt we pride ourselves on providing authentic hospitality and superior service and hope that you are able to visit us again soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Hyatt Review - Not Worth the Price
Summary: Visiting a friend, understand that pandemic comes with limited staff and such but we ordered two drinks (vodka and redbull) for room service, were charged $52 because of a "30% surcharge," we weren't told about until it was too late. We had termites in our room, dead and alive, especially in the bathroom. When we wanted to order breakfast room service they refused and said we had to go wait in line at restaurant and do pick up. My car came back from valet with all the settings changed on it - my windows wouldn't go up or down and the display was completely different - not sure why they would do that.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our hotel team.  All room service has a 30% surcharge and we apologize if that was not transparent to you.  It seems as though we are experiencing some challenges in our housekeeping department and are striving to correct them.  We hope your will consider giving us another try as things are quite busy during the annual Jazz Festival.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Guest room that they call Villa is just 3 connecting rooms. Website is limited to 3 pictures that don't fully depict and/or detail room type. You would think that for the amount of money I paid, you would get a clean room with decent furniture, instead I got a filthy pool with a crap load of dead palm tree branches all over, old ratty furniture a smelly carpet and a sofa bed that didn't work! Truly disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Although I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that keeps our team informed and ready to reassess our protocols and inspection policies to make immediate improvements in our housekeeping standards. Your comments have been shared with our leadership for further investigation and action.  I hope that you will give us another try to make you stay amazing.  Sincerely,  Cathy Scott cathy.scott@hyatt.com

Summary: room was musty, and as a globalist we were assigned the room with a view of cement walls, hvac equipment. granted this was on a busy weekend but still, this was literally the worst room view i have seen.  service was friendly from restaurant staff. front desk/management seems understaffed.  mask etiquette by others in indoor spaces was poor.   they only have pack and plays, not cribs.  overall, this hotel has a decent location and would be best if you'er able to take advantage of the tennis/golf resources on site. otherwise, would look elsewhere for a comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We apologize for your guest room view and look forward to making it up to you on your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Great Location and Ameneties but Dingy Room
Summary: The Hyatt Regency Newport Beach is in a great location,, walkable to the Fashion Island Mall and Balboa Island. The hotel grounds are huge with a golf course, tennis courts, three pools and two jacuzzis. It’s an easy walk to Fashion Island or Balboa Island. We got a “pool view” room with the pool only visible in the distance. If you want a pool view, make sure you know what you are getting. The room was a bit dark and dingy and had a popcorn ceiling. The restaurant Shor for dinner was great especially being able to sit outside and enjoy the ambiance. The breakfast service was so slow and they seemed very short staffed. Overall, I would return knowing the pros and cons.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words.  Your feedback regarding our guest rooms has been shared with our leadership and appreciate your comments and look forward to addressing some of those issues in the near term.  Thanks for the shout out about Shor and our amenities.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Had a great stay at this property, The grounds are fabulous with a lot of open space and lounging areas. Our room was clean and comfortable. The pools were all clean and quiet with lots of space to social distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  We greatly appreciate your excellent rating and review and look forward to you  next visit.

Summary: Decent hotel for a single night stay, but be careful of the $30 self-parking and $38 for valet parking per night!  WAY over-priced! Also, the dining choice are very minimal; either a $65 prix fixe menu or a $20 hamburger bar.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback.  We have shared your comments about our parking and menus with our leadership.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We recently stayed at Hyatt Regency/Newport Beach as a part of a wedding group. The facility was clean, the bed was quite comfortable and the amenities were awesome! We enjoyed free bikes, pool time and the on-site gym was way better than expected!!!  Every single staff person we encountered was friendly and helpful!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for your kind words and we are delighted you had a great stay!  Unfortunately, the ratings you attributed are the opposite of what we think you meant.  1 is the lowest and 5 is the highest.  We appreciate your shout out to our colleagues and amenities.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Fun, friendly beautiful Newport Beach resort. Stay, eat, play and never leave this relaxing and cozy hotel. Great location just minutes away from fabulous beaches, restaurants, boating, shopping and entertainment.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words!  It sounds as though you have experienced all that our property and Newport Beach has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy

Summary: This place needs updates very old rooms  they also need a diverse staff! It’s sad how people still see color and expect to go to heaven.I would never stay here or even recommend this place so do your research..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.

Summary: Overall a marginal facility.  Older establishment.  Staff appeared overwhelmed.  Perhaps a understaffed facility; as most business are now a days.  A bit over-priced for available quality and quantity.  Consider staying at the Hyatt Huntington Beach location; a much better experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our team.  Our iconic hotel is an older property but we believe the hotel team and the lush grounds and views of the Back Bay and our many amenities, like our golf course, access to tennis and complimentary beach cruiser bikes continue to make our guests and locals come back for multiple stays each year.  Thank you for your comments and we hope you will come to appreciate all that our property and Newport Beach has to offer.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: I thought this will make my family like a vacation, but it is like staying in a motel with HYATT REGENCY NAME. The resort was looking old. Room has no sun. We got assigned to stay in the room where next to the golf court. I even can see people playing golf next to my window.   I told the front house we have a baby and need the convenient building to stay as they have about 5 building. But we got assigned the the furthest building which means it took us 10 mins to walk from self-parking garage.  The ac in the room was not properly function too. I could even hear upstair is using the bathroom. I think it shouldn't be categorized to Hyatt Regence.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our leadership and our hotel team.  We hope you will give us another try as we strive to work out some of the concerns you outline.  Again, we appreciate your comments.

Summary: This has to be the worst Hyatt property I’ve stayed at. It feels like a motel 6.   The rooms feel dirty and dated. There’s popcorn ceiling. Rust on metal parts.   Self parking is also really far from the lobby and probably your room and costs $30 per day.   I imagine the only reason people giving this place a positive review is because it’s near the water.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your comments have been shared with our leadership and hotel team.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to us.  We hope you will give us another try so that you may come to appreciate all that our frequent guests love about our hotel and Newport Beach.

Summary Heading: You don't have to leave the hotel - cafe, bar, restaurant, patio, entertainment, pool with slide OH MY!
Summary: Such a fun stay with everything you need  - great food and drinks. very Nice and clean hotel property and rooms. The restaurant and pop-up cafe has great options for even picky eaters. The outdoor/indoor bar service was excellent. The pool with the big slide was fabulous ..food/drink service at the food was great too!  Nice fitness center and overall hotel premises is very well kept up. Great attitude from staff and servers - thank you so much we shall be back!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: If you were planning to relax in pool and have mini vacation, this is good place to go.  Nice swimming pool & good breakfast, we rarely have to leave hotel.   It is still in nice location if you want to check out pier.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words and excellent rating.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Excellent hotel and thoroughly enjoyed our stay!! They have so many accommodations for every age group. The staff was extremely professional and responsive which always makes for a great experience. Will definitely use this hotel for future visits!!
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and recommendation.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Nice property - flowers and trees were beautiful. Walkable to the harbor. Pools were great. Zach and Sara at the bar were really enjoyable and provided great service.   Bonus: Easy ride from John Wayne airport.  Lido isle also a short ride away.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and recommendation!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and appreciate the shout out to Zach and Sara!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Best Place to stay in Newport Beach
Summary: I always enjoy my stay at the Hyatt in Newport Beach. Friendly service, beautiful grounds, and very comfortable rooms. I did miss the high top table seating in the lounge area due to Covid-19; however there was other seating available.
Manager Response: We love hearing from our frequent guests!  Thank you for all of your kind words.  We hope to restore our high top tables soon and look forward to having you back to enjoy all that our hotel and Newport Beach has to offer.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: A favorite all inclusive resort for years.
Summary: Accommodations and grounds were beautiful and well kept.  Food and beverage service is excellent and accessible. There are several pools and other amenities as well as golf and tennis on the property and the beaches in close proximity
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words, high rating and recommendation!  We are delighted you enjoyed all that our property and Newport Beach has to offer.  Come back and see us soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Staff was so friendly and helpful.  They all truly wanted to help make our stay better.  Golf course and fun pool area was a hit with the kids!  When we needed help or had questions, everyone was quick to answer or help as needed.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words an shout out to our colleagues!  So glad you enjoyed your stay and our amenities.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Our only real glitch was that our mini fridge went psychotic at 2:22am....beeping and turning on /off light ( glass door) . We were forced to manhandle out of cabinet and unplug.  Amazed we weren't comped in any way!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, we do appreciate your feedback and have alleviated the psychotic behavior of our minifridge.  We hope you will give our hotel another try as Newport Beach and our property have so many amazing offerings.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Check in took a while, partially because of a jazz concert which seemed to take employees away from check in.  Bathroom tub drain plug broke and I could not drain the water during my shower. To top things off, the toilet broke after the first flush! This seemed like more a budget motel than a high end hotel. Would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, your feedback in invaluable to our hotel team and we appreciate your comments.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to showcase all of the great amenities our hotel and destination have to offer.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Beautiful, fun location and property for family staycation
Summary: I live in Los Angeles and we were going to be in the area for my son's soccer tournament, so we decided to make it a staycation over the Labor Day Holiday weekend. We stayed for 2 nights. I'm so glad I read other reviews before my stay because I found a lot of tips that made our trip even more enjoyable:  - Take advantage of the on-site amenities included in the resort fee! They have bonfire pits available to reserve for free, which is very relaxing and a good opportunity to just chill as a family. We bought a "Smores Kit" that they have so the kids could make smores. Additional amenities include limited time free rental of bikes and checking out of beach chair and towels. The gym has a Peloton which we were PLANNING to use...but we ended up sleeping in due to being in such a
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your kind words and detailed review!  It sounds as if you have discovered all of the secrets to our property and Newport Beach.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Huge disappointment!  With the Hyatt Regency name I was shocked at this property. I have stayed at many Hyatt Regency hotels over the years. They need to change to a much lower class Hyatt!! Because it is Newport Beech they think we would not notice. I cancelled my next two night stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We hope that you can appreciate our iconic hotel for some of its historic value.  Built in the 1960’s and known as The Newporter, it boasts the classic California low-profile architecture associated with that era, Hyatt Regency Newport Beach was the original luxury hotel in the area and hosted many visiting celebrities and notables, from Hollywood’s elite to Presidential cabinet members. Today, we would consider ourselves a local landmark as our team has been creating memories for guests and locals alike for over five decodes.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Staff is amazing. Conditional of hotel is ok.
Summary: Staff was amazing from check in till check out. The number posted all over the property for any help works great. Got a response within minutes and problem resolved. The rooms were not a 4 star hotel in my opinion. Could use a little more upgrades especially for the price of a night at this place. I would give this hotel a 3 star but staff made it a 4 star review.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words, especially those focused on our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Excellent hotel that offers so many amenities  and recreational choices for individuals and families. The Hotel is centrally located in Newport Beach with close access to shopping, running, sightseeing and entertainment.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and great review!  We are delighted that you enjoyed all that our property has to offer and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Horrible horrible horrible Stay away from this hotel it is absolutely disgusting, and smells like mold. The staff and management a horrendous and I are not helpful whatsoever. This place doesn’t require the guests to wear any masks while walking in the lobby or using the pool. I would never stay at this hotel ever again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Our colleagues wear masks indoors as is the recommendation of Hyatt Hotels.  There is not a mask mandate for outdoors in Orange County at the moment. We wish you had a better experience, but feedback like yours allows our team to re-assess our protocols and services and improve our housekeeping inspection process.  We hope you will give us another try.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We were supposed to go to Lake Tahoe, but because of fires we were forced to change plans at the last minute.  With world of hyatt help, we ended up at the Newport Beach Hyatt Regency.  It was a wonderful stay from start to finish.  The service, the staff, the hotel all A plus.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words!  We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel and hope you can visit our resort property in Lake Tahoe soon.  We look forward to your next stay!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: No sleep or relaxation at this property on weekends
Summary: Don't stay by the pool on weekends!  It's a scream fest!  If you stay here, bring the best ear plugs you can find to keep out the screaming kids going down the slide and the jet liners taking off a few miles away.  NO JOKE
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We do cater to families all summer long.  We suggest you join us again after Labor Day when we have fewer families with youngsters.  While I wish you had a more relaxing stay, we do appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back when school is back in session for a midweek stay.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel was great and the staff provided great service Please note the hotel is not located on the beach and they don't have beach transportation. You would need to get an uber or have a car to get to the closest beach.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I came here for a concert.  Great venue.  The hotel staff were all very friendly.  My room was clean and comfortable.  I had a nice relaxing time.   My balcony looked out on one of the three pools.  If I would of had more time, I definitely would have used the pool
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words.  We are delighted you enjoyed our Summer Concert Series and took some time to relax.  We look forward to your next visit and hope you can take advantage of our pools, cabanas, fire pits, bikes and golf course next time!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We stayed two nights there is plenty for everyone to do golf course three swimming pools bikes you can take out for riding. The room had a mini fridge and if you need a microwave you can ask the front desk to have one brought to the room. The food was very good that we had. The beaches were only a few miles away.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great review!  It sounds as though your enjoyed all that our property and Newport Beach has to offer.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Very comfortable stay in a lovely room with great service, concierge and housekeeping very attentive and personable. All staff helpful and knowledgeable. Bed was very comfortable, was able to request a bathrobe and after hours snacks and extra water.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are delighted you had an outstanding experience and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Underwhelmed by room; Enjoyed the pool
Summary: Room was outdated and could’ve been cleaner- Hand prints on door, fridge and table surface. Shower drain stunk. Remote dirty and not working well. Could not get internet to work well. Could not order a movie. $30 for delivery from onsite cafe to room! Air conditioning loud and cumbersome.   The oasis pool was great- clean and perfect temperature. The water slide was really fun and self contained which was great for the kids.   The grounds were nice and well kept and the indoor lobby and spaces were clean and unique.   Cool place to come for the day at the pool but do not recommend staying overnight.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your feedback and comments.  It sounds as though we faced some challenges with housekeeping issues.  We appreciate you letting us know where we fell short, so we may turn around all of the guest room issues.  While I wish you had a better stay, it is feedback like yours that allows us to re-examine our protocols and inspection process to alleviate the issues outlined.  Again, thank you for taking the time to let us know..  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Customer service provided was excellent from room requests to our meal at SHOR. Industry is probably very short staffed but everyone was very accommodating and seemed to go above and beyond. Jay at SHOR made our son’s first birthday dinner very memorable.  Golf course was included in resort fee and husband had fun playing a couple rounds. Fire pit reservations with s’mores was also fun for the family.  Rooms need a bit of updating. Chipped granite, stains on doors/walls, leak on ceiling, screen door very rickety.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review and kind words!  We are delighted you enjoyed a family birthday at Shor and a round of golf, and s'mores!  Those are our super powers -- so glad you took advantage of all our hotel has to offer!    Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: I will never stay here again.
Summary: The property is in poor condition generally.  The room I requested was for a suite for myself and my wife for a special occasion.  What I received on check-in was two rooms connected by a common door.   One room was for handicapped.  NOT A SUITE!  Walls and floors  are thin, so lots on noise from loud guests above.  Really poor services, it took over 5 minutes to reach the front desk.  I have stayed in many hotels in the Newport Beach area and only tried this property because our favorite "The Fashion Island Hotel" is now closed.  I will never stay or recommend  this property to any one.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that assists us in making adjustments to our protocols and service standards.  Your feedback is invaluable to our hotel team and we appreciate all of your comments.  We hope you will give us another try.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: My family and I stayed for 2 weeks, and very much enjoyed our stay. The hotel is on a beautiful property, with friendly staff and excellent service. During our stay, the hotel refreshed their breakfast menu, and every meal there was delicious.  There were several staff members who were absolutely wonderful to us:  Helena (Front Desk): Helena was so kind to us and made sure we were well taken care of. She was very helpful in solving some of our reservation and room issues. She tirelessly resolved a very complex billing issue and Hyatt membership service. She made several calls directly to the brand, and was so helpful.  Juan and Felix (Breakfast): Juan and Felix were so kind to us and greeted us kindly every morning. They provided outstanding service, and made sure that all
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and shout out to our colleagues.  I hope you will visit us again soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great amenities, staff and options for a personal staycation or family friendly options. Multiple pools, rooms are sufficient and bar and food are on par for price and expectations. Definitely will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words, excellent rating and recommendation.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This place was great! My wife and I went here for our honeymoon and we were not disappointed. From check in to check out, the staff was very kind and accommodating. They made us feel special and welcomed. The facilities were very clean and the pool and restaurant were very nice. We didn’t get to use the free bike rentals or golf course, but hopefully next time. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thanks for your great review!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and hope you can enjoy a bike ride and round of golf during your next visit!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Very OLD Motel. (This isn't a Hotel really. )  Rooms in need of many repairs.  Great location,  great staff and team. But not a property you would expect from  Hyatt.  Surprised this old property, w such a wonderful Staff and Location hasn't been torn down and replaced with new facility with larger room count . Wake up Hyatt team.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We hope that you can appreciate our iconic hotel for some of its historic value.  Built in the 1960’s and known as The Newporter, it boasts the classic California low-profile architecture associated with that era, Hyatt Regency Newport Beach was the original luxury hotel in the area and hosted many visiting celebrities and notables, from Hollywood’s elite to Presidential cabinet members. Today, we would consider ourselves a local landmark as our team has been creating memories for guests and locals alike for over five decodes.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great location--they have it all!  Bikes, children activities, golf, pools, overall a great property.  Close to all the activities in Newport and Laguna.  Can't say enough about this property.  Highly recommend t!t
Manager Response: Thank so much for your kind words and great recommendation.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay!  We look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Solid Redemption Option with Kids  We’ve stayed at this property for several weekends over the summer.  It’s a little dated, but at 12,000 points a night a good option.  Or great use of Cat 1-4 free night certificate.    The main pool with water slide is great.  The water slide does not empty out into the pool, so our 4 year old who can’t swim can do it by himself.  There is also a splash pad.  Pool is huge.  Lots of chairs, but they will fill up on weekends.  Cabanas aren’t unreasonable at $200 for a weekend day.    They are suffering from a staff shortage, like everywhere else right now.  Not their fault and the staff that is working is generally nice.  We get a cabana every weekend, and always reserve the same one.  Supposed to be available at 10am, but no one is actually
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your detailed review. We love hearing from our frequent guests.  Thank you for your kind words and loyalty to the Hyatt brand and our hotel!  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel was nice. The only downside is that the parking is so far from your room and the way that the hotel is set up, you can really use an elevator which made it difficult with wheels. Another downside was that our fridge didn’t work. Oh and they don’t have the chest board set up because they put a fire pit in top of it.  However, the staff was great. The valet would sprint to get your car, the front desk always has a smile on their face, and house keeping was there within 10 minutes of a request.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are delighted you had a great stay.  We appreciate all of your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Beautiful grounds with something for everyone.
Summary: It was a beautiful area with activities for every age group.   The staff were kind and courteous.    The location is fantastic.   Close to restaurants, shopping and the beach.   I will definitely bring my family back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and great rating and recommendation!  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: My adult daughters and I had the best time staying at the Hyatt Regency in Newport Beach! We enjoyed the pool, the restaurant and bar, walking beyond “campus.” All the meals and drinks we ordered were delicious.  The staff was friendly, helpful, and gracious.
Manager Response: We are delighted you and your daughters had a great stay!  It sound as though you were able to enjoy all that our hotel and destination has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This is the best hotel. The location is close to Fashion Island. You you are close to good places to eat and shop. Also, it is great if you have kids. The pool is amazing and they have a slide that the kids love. It is a great hotel and one of my favorites that we like to stay at when we are in Southern California.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and great rating!  We are delighted that you had a great stay.  It sounds as if you took advantage of all that our hotel and Newport Beach has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S,

Summary: Thank you Truc Le for your phenomenal service to help us resolve our issues. Upon arriving late in the evening we found the two double beds were not Queen size beds and couldn’t fit our family of 4, with two grown teenagers. Truc patiently provided us various options, turning our stay a blast. My children were so happy and so were we. Your service were beyond awesome!  Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a rave review and share it with us!  We are delighted that your stay was a blast and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We had an awesome vacation here with our kids. The hotel was great for families and my kids can't wait to go back. The hotel was clean, in a great location and all the staff was very friendly. The waterslide was a favorite!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words, excellent rating, review and recommendations.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Poor guest service and bell hop experience, poor amenities, very disappointed
Summary: Guest service che ck-in not accommodating to get us into a room that met our needs even after paying for early check in.Not even an apology! Bell hop never delivered our luggage! Not enough amenities.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that allows us to reassess our inspections and protocols to improve our services.  Again, thank you for your input.  We hope you will give us another chance to win back your business.  Sincerely,  Cathy S;

Summary: We had a pleasant stay at the Hyatt Regency. The grounds are beautiful and expansive. The pools are nice. We most enjoyed grabbing coffee in the morning in the lobby and then lounging around with family. For this, this hotel is wonderful. The buildings and rooms, however, are definitely dated. It didn't ruin the experience, but it just shows the range of "luxury" for the Hyatt Regency brand. I have stayed in Regency's that are much, much nicer than this one. I'd say this one is on the lower end of the scale for "luxury".
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your candid comments and have shared them with our leadership.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I had a wonderful stay at this property, which is conveniently located a short drive or uber ride to John Wayne Airport, Balboa Island, Fashion Island, Crystal Cove, etc. So many activities are included in your stay - pools, golf, tennis, biking, etc. You really don’t need to leave the property. The staff was hard-working and helpful, which really stood out during the challenges of COVID. I shall happily return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and excellent review and recommendation.  We are delighted that you enjoyed our amenities and activities on property and ventured to some of Newport Beach's awesome attractions.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Remodeled Rooms are nice and surprisingly large. Large grounds with lots of activities for a family. Very nice facility surrounded by attractive vegetation. This resort is comfortable, and the staff friendly and accommodating. It is only a few blocks from the Fashion Island Shopping Center, which is always a treat with good restaurants. Balboa Island is close by and kids love the car Ferryboat ride to the NewPort Pennensula.
Manager Response: Thanks for your kind words, great review and recommendation!  We are delighted you enjoyed all that our hotel and Newport Beac has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I came here to celebrate my birthday and the moment I got there from valet , to checking in, then bell service, I had the best experience ever and it continued the whole duration of my time there. I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and recommendation.  Happy Belated Birthday and we are delighted you chose our hotel to celebrate your special day!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We LOVED staying at Hyatt Newport Beach! We wish to thank the entire staff (front desk staff, housekeepers/cleaning and waiters/bartenders/cooks) for making our family vacation so wonderful. We understand the difficult challenges that business are currently facing and are especially grateful for their outstanding customer service in making our vacation so fun and memorable. Awesome staff, wonderful hotel and great location...we look forward to our return!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  We especially appreciate the great shout out to our colleagues!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: After much deliberation we changed hotels this year. We usually use a Marriott in Irvine but we decided to go closer to the beach and the Marriott seemed like it was going downhill in the recent years. I thought hyatt was a good name and the pics looked like it would be a fun nice place. The rooms are tiny. They are more of a motel style than a hotel. The bathrooms are not private. And they aren’t cleaning rooms daily because of an industry shortage of employees. This is unacceptable. In my husbands business there is a shortage of employees as well but that just means we can take in less business, not that we give in less quality of business. Also we had to pay a resort fee that was insane. Especially for feeling like a motel experience. And we paid $30 a night to park. We never
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Housekeeping is available upon request and we are sincerely sorry that you were not made aware of it.  Our resort fee includes beach amenities, complimentary beach cruiser bikes and greens fees and clubs and putters for up to 4 ppl on our executive golf course.  Tennis is also complimentary and based on availability.  All of our fees are transparent when booking but we are very sorry that it came as a surprise to you.  We hope you will give us another chance to curate a great stay for you as our hotel and Newport Beach have so much to offer.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Horrible Hotel—worst Hyatt I’ve stayed at
Summary: This is the worst Hyatt I’ve ever visited. Worse than airport Hyatt Regency properties and even limited service brands like Hyatt Place. No recognition of my Globalist status at checkin. No mention of any benefits. No early checkin despite plenty of rooms being available. And then when I got to my room, it smelled and there was what appeared to be small splatters of fecal matter on the wall of the bathroom by the toilet. Bed was hard as a rock, and pillows were well past their prime. I have stayed in a hotel room over 100 nights this year and this place is so bad I changed plans and left a day early. Avoid it at all costs.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that assists us in re-examining our current housekeeping protocols.  Rest assured, your feedback is being shared with our housekeeping leadership to immediately remedy the situation with a new and improved inspection procedure.  We hope that you will give us another chance to win back your business and curate an awesome stay.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Clean and fairly maintained, but definitely an older property that feels dated both in the rooms and grounds overall. Good enough place to stay if I had to for a convention or something, but not worth making a destination. One reason the family chose to go here was because there are three separate pools, one of which has a water slide for the kids. The water slide doesn’t even slide into the pool, it just slides into a small area of water the kids can step out of. There are multiple little fire pit areas throughout the grounds where you can just hang out or make S’mores at night. They sell S’more kits for $15 at the front desk if you’re so inclined. The hotel is nearby to Fashion Island and South Coast Plaza if you’re driving, and there’s a marina and small beach across the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review.  We greatly appreciate all of your feedback and comments.  It is especially gratifying to have you compliment our colleagues and especially those by name.  We are sharing your comments with our leadership and know that we have some areas to improve our services and amenities.  Again, thank you  for your feedback.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: This hotel is in a great location.  It is also in serious need of an update. Many of the furnishings throughout the hotel were old and tattered.  We were surprised the hotel was sold out when we were there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your comments and feedback are invaluable to us and we greatly appreciate it.  All of your feedback is being shared with our resort team so we may better improve our amenities and services.  We look forward to your next stay.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Room in Lido section was outdated and musty smelling. Transferred to Balboa section where room was more spacious but still had a stale, musty odor coupled with unbearable and unpleasant scent of Glade plug-ins.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We apologize that your stay was less than satisfactory and have shared your feedback with our housekeeping team.  Your comments are invaluable to our team as at Hyatt we pride ourselves on providing authentic hospitality and superior service and hope that you are able to visit us again soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S,

Summary: This Hyatt is in need of remodeling.  The small bathroom with a shower/tub feature is dated. The popcorn ceilings in the bedrooms, poor mattresses, dated tiling in the lobby and lounge are some examples  of things that need to be upgraded to maintain a luxury hotel status. The towels in our bedroom were beginning to be threadbare and rough to the touch.  The staff was friendly courteous and did their best to make our stay comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We greatly appreciate all of your feedback and have shared your comments with our leadership team.  We especially appreciate your kind words regarding our colleagues!    Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This hotel by far has the best amenities that are included with a resort fee.  A simple but fun 9 hole pitch and putt golf course, volleyball, horseshoes, beach cruisers, water slide, shuffle board, splash pad. The grounds are beautiful and well maintained. The staff does a great job at being present and offering assistance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and recommendation.  We are delighted you had a great stay and we especially appreciate your shout out to our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Amazing experience at this hotel, just the lack of personal in the front desk is annoying because you wait more than 20 mins just to check in, this happend to us multiple times at the hotel, but overall is an amazing place to stay w fam..
Manager Response: Thank so much for your kind words and recommendation.  We appreciate your comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This is an older property, while still maintaining a Hyatt standard. It is peaceful, with clean, comfortable rooms. The spacious grounds give you the feeling of being in an oasis. The front desk service was very professional and accommodating. The choice of pools was perfect for us. We chose Indulge. Starbucks on our balcony was such a nice way to wake up. My only complaint is the air traffic that they unfortunately have no control over.
Manager Response: Thank  you for your kind words and recommendation.  I wish we could control the air traffic for you, but it sounds as if you had a great stay.  We appreciate your shout out about our colleagues and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: No service at all! It took over 13 minutes for someone to pick up the phone at the front desk, had to carry my bags ant the building was far away with no elevator, room was dingy, I gave the valet five dollars to get my car and he said it’s just over there you can go get it yourself! Still haven’t received it bill receipt from online check out two days later!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is a review like yours that allows us to examine our current protocols and daily operations.  We appreciate all of your feedback and rest assured, your comments are being shared with our leadership team for further action.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The property is very tired, has peeling paint, rude staff, and it was very disappointing.  The rooms were clean but had chipped paint on the fixtures (bathroom) and walls.  Dirty smudges of hands and fingerprints on doors were all over.  Much disappointment for such an expensive room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and I am so sorry that your stay with us was less than satisfactory. It appears that we definitely faced some challenges with regard to housekeeping.  Our houskeeping team and I reviewed your comments and have taken appropriate action to resolve the issues. In addition, we are re-evaluating our inspection processes to ensure these types of issues do not occur in the future. Again, we are sincerely sorry that your experience was not a good one, but invite you to give us another try. We greatly appreciate your feedback, as it helps us to improve and provide a better experience.  Please feel free to contact me directly before your next visit.  Sincerely,  Cathy S. cathy.scott@hyatt.com

Summary: I reached out to consumer affairs in reference to the my stay that was not good at all. I made reservations two and a half months ago as a birthday trip. I requested a bay view and didn’t get that. Was put in a old and smelly room with a view of the parking lot. Housekeeping only came one out of the 5 days which is not good giving that we are still in a pandemic. The manager took off $400 which I appreciate but I was never offered a complementary breakfast, lunch, dinner absolutely nothing. My experience was bad for a first time customer staying with you all. I feel like I was profiled to be completely honest. What happen to the room I reserved two months ago?? Who did they give it to??? Why wasn’t I noticed before arriving to the hotel??? I’m not happy and I’m ready to Yelp,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our hotel team.  We recognize that we have fallen short with regard to your stay.  Our operations team is working on new systems and protocols to block our room types more effectively.  Your comments have spurred conversations on how to best manage our room dissemination.  We apologize for your stay and hope you will give us another opportunity to put together an awesome stay for you.  Please contact me directly so I may assist.  Sincerely,  Cathy S. cathy.scott@hyatt.com

Summary: The rooms definitely need to be remodeled. The bedding is horrible... I expect better from Hyatt. No matter the purpose of your visit the location is amazing! Close to shopping, dining, bay, marina, and the best beaches in Southern California. The resort amenities are also a positive and offer guests many options. If the rooms ever get remodeled and/or at a minimum Hyatt starts providing quality bedding, this resort would receive a much better overall rating from me.
Manager Response: Thank you for both your kind words and feedback.  Rest assured, our leadership team will be mad aware of your comments and feedback.  We hope you will give us another try as our resort and destination has so much to offer.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We can’t give tips guidelines because we had no issues.  We had a wonderful time and the personnel were professional,helpful and friendly. We have recommended the Hyatt to many friends and they enjoyed the Hotel and location as we did.
Manager Response: Thank  you for your kind words!  We are delighted that you had a great stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Hotel is not ready, Staff needs training, they need support at the pool area, servers, cooks, etc. Rooms, specifically 284 needs to inspected and furniture that is in a poor state needs to be replaced. Ona. positive Valets are good and provided bottles of water, keep this, as did the concierge, an elderly gentlemen who would hand out water to those in line, nice touches.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, we do appreciate all of your feedback and comments.  Rest assured our leadership team is listening to all of your feedback to ensure better training processes and inspection protocols.  We hope you will give us another try to win back your business.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Beautiful hotel, very clean, and very friendly staff. However... Hidden fees that you won't expect until you arrive. Be aware if you are getting a rental, that they will charge you a $30-40 per day fee just for parking. Then at the end of your stay, you will be charged with a $30 per day "Resort Fee". Not communicated, no warning, nothing. Basically, if you find this hotel for a great price, be aware depending on how long you stay the parking/resort fees add up real quick, and the cost of your stay will increase unexpectedly. Very strange they would do this. if wasn't for the hidden unexpected fees, I'd give it a 5 star.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and comments about our hotel and colleagues.  We try very hard to be transparent on our website about our parking and resort fee.  If you are booking through a third party, it may not be as clear as on a Hyatt branded site.  I hope you understand that with our resort fee guests receive complimentary beach cruiser bike rentals and greens fees on our executive golf course, as well as beach amenities.  We hope you will give us another chance and take advantage of the resort fee inclusions.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Totally bad experience, hotel needs to do MAJOR UPDATES IN THE POOL AREA. VERY DIRTY.. SERVICE WAS RIDICULOUS. WAITED A  1 HOUR FOR A DRINK.. DIRTY CABANNAS, DIRTY POOL. Rooms and Hallways needed some serious help. The smell walking through the hallways was disgusting and them putting air refreshers in the hallway - HELLO DID NOT HELP AT ALL... Rooms were OUTDATED.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is truly invaluable to our hotel team. We are experiencing some serious staffing issues post pandemic and we are moving forward to address those on a daily basis.  I hope you will give us another try to win back your business.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Stayed for four nights. Staff was very accomodating despite being slightly understaffed. Common areas and restrooms clean. Rooms very clean. Rooms are only cleaned if you stay 4 or more nights, so that was disappointing but hopefully as they continue to staff up post covid, they will be able to revise that. Getting fresh towels very easy. Pool areas clean. Grounds lovely.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words.  We are delighted that you had an amazing stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Jessica, the front desk manager was patient and kind. Kudos to her. Unfortunately, her ability to communicate the Hyatt's policy on the authorization/hold policy was confusing. I had to call my bank and put it on speaker, so it was clearly explained to us both. I am not sure if it is the policy or her explanation. I recommend training. The customer before me also had similar confusion.   Also, the facility was not clean, especially not following COVID safety protocols. Many tables were left uncleaned after other guests were seated there. The cushions were soiled. The parking was awful for guests who did not want valet parking. The facility and grounds have seen better days! The rooms were not up to the standard of a resort hotel (toilet seat cracked, pictures on the walls lacked
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us. Summary: Room was In back of property and resembled a motel 6or holiday. My door wouldn't even open or shut properly and the ac barely worked. For the cost I'd stay anywhere but here without thinking twice. Really disappointing

Summary: This hotel was perfect for my family.  My kids loved jumping into the pool at every opportunity and we enjoyed the beautiful view from our balcony.  Just don't make the mistake we did - don't pay ahead, and use the same card for the booking and incidentals, or you may wind up with multiple holds on your cards.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words, we are delighted that you enjoyed our property.  I have shared your comments with our leadership team and we appreciate your all of your feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The room was terrible-   Bed was so uncomfortable and the pillows were either lumpy or hard like a rock - In the 3 nights I spent there the room was never cleaned-It smell like a smoking room - Air conditioning didn’t work -
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better stay, your feedback and comments are invaluable to our team. Summary: I thought the customer service was excellent. The food and beverages are good and affordable! The room and bathroom are definitely outdated but everything worked great! Hot water shower and it never ran out of hot water. There’s 3 pools with 3 jacuzzi. Pool-side service. Walking distance to the bay. Overall it was a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your kind words and have shared your comments with our leadership to improve our amenities and services going forward.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: The resort was nice someplace and the staff was very efficient and friendly the beds are just very small
Summary: Resort was nice it was very crowded the staff was very friendly especially the valet department, To help was very friendly we just saw the rooms are very small and the beds are very small and very uncomfortable to sleep to people and thank you so much that is just my personal opinion
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your kind words, feedback and comments.  Rest assured, your feedback is being shared with our resort team in order to improve our services and amenities going forward.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: We were VERY disappointed in this hotel.  We booked a 3 bedroom villa thinking it would be great to spend time in the private pool since we had really not been on vacation since before March, 2020 due to COVID.  When we first walked in to our room all of the furniture in the living area was stained and very dirty.  We asked for some type of slip covers since we didn't even want to sit down, they were so filthy.  The best they could do was bring us sheets so we could put them over the couches and chairs, which we were willing to do.  We then noticed a broken window downstairs in one of the bedrooms (the window would not lock) and we notice other things that looked run down like a warped and wobbling table and chairs, stained curtains and light covers, dirty floors, etc.  We were
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that allow us to improve our services and amenities throughout the hotel. Please contact me directly before your next stay, cathy.scott@hyatt.com  Best regards,  Cathy Scott Marketing

Summary: Excellent Service great place to stay, looking forward to coming back again. Food and bar was excellent, willing to recommend to friends and Family. Over all, very satisficed with the service. Price was a little high, but worth it.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great recommendation!  We look forward you your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Good hotel, however, Stroller Users/Handicap people Beware!
Summary: First of, let’s start with the positives. This hotel is absolutely aimed towards families, it’s got three pools, one has a slide that is great at keeping kids engaged and happy. Pools are equipped with loads of towels, pool noodles, and even beach balls and other toys.  It’s right by the bay, walking distance to some great restaurants and a quick drive to fashion island.   The service is not bad, everyone is friendly and helpful. They are prompt and use technology to their advantage. Valet is expeditious and friendly.   Now for the bad, there are three areas of rooms. I can’t comment which is the best, they all have different types of rooms with different price points. Now, if you are staying in the bay side rooms which has a view I’d the water I’d your room faces that way. It
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review of our property.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and services.  We appreciate your feedback on room locations and parking.  All of your comments have been shared with our hotel team for further discussion in order to make the guest experience even better.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We had the best time at the Hyatt Newport! Very family friendly with lots of things to do on site and nearby. Can’t wait to return!! Staff was super kind and helpful. If traveling with little kids, check to make sure there is a tub for  bath time. We had our 2yr old and didn’t even think of it! Otherwise, everything was perfect!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for sharing your review with us.  We are delighted you enjoyed our property and Newport Beach.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Not the place for travelers with disabilities
Summary: Good location near the Back Bay with nice people. Accessible rooms are not accessible unless you are a distance runner. To get to my room I had to go through the kitchen . Good elevator to the kitchen. Good shower but very hard to get around clumsy furniture in room
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your comments are very valuable to us and are shared with our leadership team. We apologize for any discomfort you experienced during your stay.  We hope to better accommodate you on your next visit.  Please contact us before your next visit, so we may find better located accommodations.  Again, we appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Immediately arriving at the hotel staff were unfriendly and rude. We did self parking and no one explained that we had to use the hotel key to get in and out of the parking lot so we were thinking that we just had to get a ticket each time. We tried to go out to get dinner and of course being late we ended up with fast food and sat down at an outdoor table and were told that we could not have outside food at the table because it was the bar area. Not even through 1 night at the hotel and this place is awful and I do not have one good thing to say about it. I wanted a resort place for a nice family vacation however i 100% regret booking this place. Will not be staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better stay, it is comments like yours that allow us to improve our service.  We appreciate all of your feedback and have shared it with our hotel teams.  We hope you will give us another try, so we may create an awesome visit for you and your family.    Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: This property consistently does a great job. Great location yet it feels secluded and private. Staff and amenities including the pools (with water slide and splash pad for kids) and restaurant were all great. We are fairly local and continue to visit this property at least once a year for a quick getaway.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words.  We love hearing from our frequent guests and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We stayed in 2 rooms for one night. Unfortunately the booked rooms were not ready yet so we got different rooms than booked. They were comfortable and had a fridge and good size bathroom. Staff is friendly and helpful in all areas. Globalist status was recognized with free breakfast perk and water. No room upgrade was given due to sold out hotel. Pool has free water fountain that is replenished regularly. Breakfast and pool side food was good quality. Walking distance to bay and water park a big plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are delighted you had a great family stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great Hotel, very clean, everyone are friendly specially the valet team and the front desk personnel. This is our go to hotel for our conferences and meetings. Great outdoor experience specially the outdoor auditorium.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  We are delighted you had a great stay and appreciate hearing from our conference and group meeting attendees!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel was very disappointing. Our recent stay had no housekeeping and the sink was broken.  The towels and furniture were old and needed to be replaced The location is great and staff is very nice and helpful
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We have shared your comments and feedback with our leadership team and appreciate your kind words about our colleagues!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: They were very helpful! I had credit card problems when I first got there for the amenities but they bypassed it for a few hours until I got it situated! Room was clean and everyone was very helpful! Food came to the room very quick, the breakfast lunch and dinner was amazing. I was there for a wedding and everything was up to par including the golf course!
Manager Response: We love to see a headline like Fantastic!  Thank yo so much for your kind words!  WE look forward to your next visit!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Loved all the amenities the resort offered- bikes, shuffleboard, water slide, golf etc. something for all ages to enjoy. Location was fabulous, walking distance to Newport Bay and all the activities for the kids.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  It sounds as if you were able to take advantage of all our hotel has to offer!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This hotel is beautiful with a great rest stand several pools. It reminds me of a beautiful resort! I love staying here! The people are friendly, the bed is comfortable, the room is beautiful, the grounds are gorgeous!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank for you taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate all of your kind words and feedback and look forward to your next stay.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The hotel/resort itself is a bit tired… the entire property needs to be modernized! Lots of potential as it’s a huge property with opportunities for loads of amenities. It was expensive ($250+/night) for the condition it is in.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your feedback is being shared with our leadership and appreciate all of your thoughts and comments regarding our property.  We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Nice, but a lot of exercise
Summary: The whole resort was very nice, as were all staff. The room was very nice, but it had a very small bathroom and chips in the tub/shower. While there was an option to text for a golf cart to pick us up, we didn't want to deal with that. So, we hiked up the hill with our luggage. then, we walked up the stairs to our room with our luggage because our assigned room was in a building that did not have an elevator.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words regarding our property and colleagues.  We appreciate your feedback and comments and have shared them with our leadership.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I can't understand all the bad reviews for this place.... We stayed here and loved it and are already looking into when we can come back. We thought it was a fabulous hotel for the cost. There are so many things to do here, a lot of which are free. Lots of reviewers complain about paying to park and resort fees.... where have you been? Almost all hotels do that now and have for years. The restaurant had really good food, the bar was good, as well. The food is a bit pricey but we loved it so we didn't mind. All of the staff was very friendly. The room was clean and we loved having a private patio overlooking the bay. We both slept very well and it was a quiet hotel. There is a lot to do in the area so this is a great place to stay. the pools looked very nice, but we did not use
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your kind words!  Your review was a breath of fresh air as you do understand about resort and parking fees, something all hotels and resorts have. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Every contact with staff from front desk to housekeeping was pleasant and helpful. Our minor issues and requests (extra pillows etc.) were attended to immediately. The room was clean and comfortable, although the pull-out couch, adequate for our 4-year-old grandchild, was pretty lumpy. Advise checking it out right away if you need to use it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and valuable feedback!  We are delighted your had a great family stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: My stay here at the Hyatte was great  Clean and the moste comfortable bed ive ever slept on. Nancy the manager at the front desk was very kind and even let me check in early after sergery at cosmetic care down the street.. I felt very welcomed here exceptional atmosphere.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We especially appreciate your kind words regarding our colleagues!  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Went for our wedding anniversary to get away and decided to stay. Needless to say, the rooms are WAY overpriced for what you get! They are standard rooms with thin walls due to being built back in the '60s. It lays directly in the departure path of John Wayne Airport so forget about relaxing by the pool unless you like airplanes! Our drain in the shower/tub would back up and the beds are not that comfortable. The jacuzzi wasn't even hot, bath temperature at best. Did I mention the parking fees on top of the resort fees that they stick you with? Even if you don't use the golf course or bikes you're stuck. I was expecting a lot more from this property. And the hidden fees don't stop there, room service will charge you a service charge & tax as well as a delivery fee, and then have
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like yours that is invaluable to our hotel team.  All of your comments are being shared with our leadership team and we intend to use much of your feedback as a training opportunity for our various teams.    We are sincerely sorry that your stay was less than satisfactory but we hope you will give us another chance to win back your business and arrange for an amazing stay with us.  Our destination and property both have so much to offer.  Again, thank you for your review and time.  Sincerely,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: Grounds are always beautiful.   Great service and amenities.  The location is perfect for work and fun.   Food and drink selections are terrific.   The separate pools offered for each building makes it easy for families and adults to be happy!!   They seemed a bit short staffed as a result of California’s less the reasonable Covid actions but seem to be getting back.     The beaches and restaurants that are near the hotel are all very good.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words and patience as we ramp up after Covid-19 restrictions.  We are fully open and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: Very nice location and beautiful resort grounds. Next to Fashion and Balboa islands with great shopping and  excellent restaurants. Excellent if you like golf and tennis. So much to look around. Beautiful botanical garden nearby-Sherman library and garden.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and great review!  We look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: This place gave preferential treatment to other customers and the only difference between them and myself was age and skin color. I don't want to think it had to do with either one of those but those were the only differences between myself and others. I was treated differently right in front of my face by the staff and manager, it was horrible.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  It is very disheartening that you feel you were discriminated against at our hotel.  Your concerns are being brought to the attention of our leadership team and will be addressed immediately.  At Hyatt, we pride ourselves on providing authentic hospitality and superior service to all of our guests.  Sincerely,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: Make sure you read the fine print the extra surcharges per day is crazy! 35.00 for resort fee per day 30.00 for parking per day 150.00 for recovery and taxes.  Added to your bill per day. If the hotel was brand new and upgraded but it average…location is the only nice feature.
Manager Response: We are sincerely sorry that you encountered unexpected charges.  Our website and third party sites do outline our parking and resort fees.  Most coastal properties have limited parking and do charge overnight fees.  Our resort fee covers our golf green fees, complimentary beach cruiser bikes and many other amenities.  We hope you will give us another chance in the near future to make your stay amazing.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Had a great stay. Staff was the highlight of the stay. Lacy, Matt and Dave all wonderful people.  Restaurant was good. location was great minutes from balboa land. Pool was nice and clean fun for kids.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review and shout out to our colleagues!  We are delighted you and your family enjoyed all that our property and Newport Beach has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Very average, and thus over-priced. Expect dogs-a-plenty.
Summary: Even with Hyatt status, our room overlooked a parking lot, and a deck that had more than its fair share of bird droppings. Moreover, the walls are very thin, and we could hear every word of conversations (and other sounds) from the neighboring room. The neighbor's dog also barked a lot, and was disturbing, although dogs are allowed on the property. Lastly, our key card did not work to open the parking gate, necessitating a call each exit to the attendant. Service was friendly though.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. I have shared your comments with our hotel team to use as a training opportunity.  If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.  Sincerely,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: Great service from all the staff, especially given how busy they were. For some reason my giant room had a tiny bathroom, which was annoying, but otherwise a great stay. If you’re bothered by crowds and your hotel being a popular destination for parties/weddings, then this isn’t the place for you. Personally, I liked the festive atmosphere.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are so glad you enjoyed our festive atmosphere -- as we are a large property with many events, concerts and reunions taking place throughout the property.  Best regards,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: The bed was lumpy and had no comfort. The bathrooms are 50 years old. The shower had leaks and is very small. It was not an accommodating shower, bath or bed in any way. The room service was basically delivery with a huge up charge. Everything was plastic and low class. There was no convenience for the fees charged.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and I am sure you will appreciate that your feedback is invaluable to us as without such we could not continue to improve our level of customer service. Our goal here is to exceed all of our guest’s expectations. Unfortunately, after reading your comments pertaining to your guest room it is apparent that we fell very short on this occasion. We are dismayed to hear of your disappointment with your bed and mattress. We are sincerely sorry as I understand how important a restful night sleep is, especially when traveling. Please know we are working on correcting this to ensure such issues can be avoided in the future.  Our in room dining program has been adjusted during Covid-19 for safety reasons.  As we move out of restrictive tiers in Orange County, we will bring back our regular menu and be serving with silverware and china.  We hope you will give us another try as we continue to improve our services and guest experience.  Sincerely,  Cathy Scott Marketing

Summary Heading: Hanging with my sis in the OC
Summary: Had a great time, everything beautiful and the staff was very knowledgeable and very accommodating to our needs. There were a few thing that needed to be corrected in my room and the staff quickly jumped in to make sure my experience was perfect.
Manager Response: So glad yo enjoyed all that our property and Newport Beach has to offer.  We greatly appreciate the shout out to our colleagues and we look forward to your next visit!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: You can definitely tell they are trying to update on the surface level, but this hotel is definitely dated. The dining table seats in our room were peeling horribly. To the point where shavings were on the floor if you moved in your seat. The beds were on the firm side but slept well. If you decide to self park it is a chance your room may be on the opposite end of the resort so plan accordingly especially with kids. When we entered the room, I immediately noticed a tissue on the counter, fresh water cup stains on the coffee table and  chocolate debris near the couch foot. I picked up everything and sprayed the room down with Lysol as I do with anywhere I stay  (even before COVID). When my kids came up a couple hours later, my 2 year old brought me an artificial nail he found in
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. I have forwarded your comments to our housekeeping team to use as a training opportunity.  If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great location everything was really nice and kept up. Very close to the harbor and local restaurants. Second time I stayed here, I will definitely return and I do recommend the hotel. Has everything you need.
Manager Response: We love hearing from our frequent guests!  Thank you so much for your kind words and recommendation.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This is a nice hotel, convenient to Newport dunes . The staff is nice and friendly, I also understand location, but to extend the stay was $400 and the rooms are not $400 worthy . Also I was told the hotel was booked to full capacity yet I was able to book online.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and the time you took to share them with us. It is great to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us. Rest assured that we will share your comments for further encouragement with our hotel  team to ensure personal service and a warm welcome for your next visit.   Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: refrigerator does not work, worst hotel ever stayed in.lost item and got back after 5 times I did call.Too old hotel with worst customer service. need remodeling and chage staff ASAP.Restaurant and bar menue same and junk with higer price.I paid over $500 only for one night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. I have forwarded your comments to our r hotel team to use as a training opportunity.  If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.  Best regards,  Cathy S,

Summary: I love this property everyone one of the staff members are very nice. The grounds are beautiful and well maintained. Having 3 pools is a plus for the adults traveling without children, you can find a pool with less kids. The outdoor patio area is warm and cozy. Highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words, especially those about our colleagues.  So glad you had a great stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The manager Anna & her staff were all super friendly and super helpful! They went above and beyond for myself and my family. We golfed, roasted marshmallows by the fire pit and my kids absolutely loved the water slid and huge kid pool. Our room was perfect and I couldn’t have asked for a better weekend getaway in Newport Beach!! Thank you Anna and the Hyatt team!!
