Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words about our property and especially about our colleagues.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S,

Summary: The hotel really felt like a resort with the separate buildings, the garden walking areas, and views of the water. The set up of the rooms was perfect for a first trip after the pandemic restrictions were relaxed.  The staff was great in answering any Covid protocol questions I had prior to our stay, and the on-site staff did everything to make us feel comfortable within reason.  The location of the hotel was central to eating, shopping, and outdoor water sports.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review and share it.  We are delighted you were able to enjoy our property as things begin to get back to normal.  We appreciate your kind words and kudos to our colleagues.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Our first hotel stay post covid. Cleanliness was good, reasonable precautions for guests and staff. Quick response to requests. Price was reasonable for amenities. Parking a bit far from my room, but they have a loading zone. Over all a good place for the family during the week.
Manager Response: So glad you were able to visit us and we appreciate your comments and feedback.  Glad you had a good stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: Our only issue was the bathroom fan. We had a balcony, even if it was overlooking the entrance it was still gorgeous, the whole experience and we talked about it while we were there. As we were leaving, I Stop the maid, and another employee just to thank them for their service.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback and kind words.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: We LOVED our stay at this gorgeous hotel!  A new favorite for sure.  It was clean and lovely, the grounds are beautiful, our room was luxurious, the restaurant was delicious, the service was excellent, and the pool area was the BEST - my favorite part of the trip. Highly recommend and can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thanks for all of your enthusiasm and kind words!  When are you coming back?  We look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I enjoyed a night away for my Mother’s Day gift and the hotel provided everything I needed. The pool was clean and the bar staff was friendly and very inviting. I recommend this location for its great staff and value.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for a Mother's Day getaway!  We appreciate all of your kind words and look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The property is really pretty, the location is ideal and the rooms are very comfortable.The Hyatt Newport Beach is my favorite place to stay in Orange County. I look forward to coming back my next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you!  We love hearing from our frequent guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: My kids and I enjoyed a very enjoyable stay at the Hyatt over the weekend.  This hotel is a little bit older but the room condition is very clean and enjoyable and the staff is top notch.  It's located nearby some good restaurants and Fashion Island and is a close drive to the beach.    Featuring 3 pools and a good size gym, the hotel is great for a lovely weekend trip or business trip.  The pools are wonderfully serviced and of good size.  The largest pool has a water slide for the kids which makes it unique and enjoyable.  What makes this hotel stand out above others is its top-notch service.  I felt like I was in a 5-star hotel in the way they cared for me as a guest and the careful attention to make sure my trip was pleasant.  I was very well rewarded for choosing this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!  It seems as though you were able to take advantage of all that our property and Newport Beach has to offer.  We look forward to your next stay.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: In need of deep cleaning and updating! Hotel employees try hard, but corporate needs to spend money on new linens, paint and carpet. The room was very smelly. It’s very unpleasant to walk into. My guess is they don’t clean until the room is rebooked, so the wet towels sit there and sour? The carpet needs at the very least to be deep cleaned. Ideally, it should be replaced.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  All of your comments and feedback have been shared with our leadership.  Thank you for acknowledging our colleagues.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: My wife and I spent 2 nights, 3 days at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach, it was a very nice Hotel, Rooms were clean, the grounds were clean.   The Pools were very clean.  We live 30 Minutes North and decided to spend a few days at the beach for my birthday.   The cost of room per night was very reasonable considering we got a Bay View and accommodations for a large bed.   We enjoyed the hotel and its surroundings, there was lots of quiet areas to sit and relax and read.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your Bay View guest room and all that our property has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: It was ok. Not what we expected but still had fun as a family of 4
Summary: It was ok. Not what we expected. The rooms are not upgraded. Newport Beach is a very nice, clean, and wealthy area. We expected the rooms to be better and more clean! Otherwise the service was great and the pools were fun! The food was ok, could be better for the prices and more options!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us!  We appreciate all of your feedback and have shared it with our leadership.    Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: For a good time call Hyatt Newport
Summary: We had several choices of extended stay hotels or local apartments on our move to Newport Beach but for a six week stay we chose the Hyatt.  Lucky us!  The high cost of seasonal housing by the beach, coupled with the cost of renting furniture, setting up cable and utilities, etc. caused us to just "hotel it" at the Hyatt.  We sat by the pool, ordered room service, had maid service, coffee maker, lots of clean towels, and ROOM SERVICE !  I even had Total Wine deliver wine to my door.  The staff was so nice and they always were around to help schlepp stuff to our room.  It was smaller than a hotel and I lived without a microwave but so what!  The location is amazing - I walked to Balboa Island, the beautiful nature preserve of the Back Bay loop, watched sting rays, ducks, blue
Manager Response: Thanks so much for all of your kind words!  Good luck back in your home and we are so glad you chose to stay with us for so long.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: We stayed here for a business trip and the staff is very solid and the grounds and lobby were beautiful.  Our room needed work.  First, I was supposed to have been upgraded to an executive suite based upon an email upgrade offer but when I arrived I was told that it had not been assigned to me and there was none available.  Ok, no worries- disappointing but not a big deal.  Our room was decent but we noticed that a lot of things didn't work: The tub didn't drain well, the sink stopper didn't work and on the last morning, I tried to make coffee before we left for our flight and the coffee maker didn't work.  The worst was on the last night,  a cockroach/palmetto bug crawled across my son's bed while we were watching a movie.  A maintenance worker came and caught it and took care
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful review.  While I wish you had a better experience, we fully appreciate all of your feedback and will share it with our leadership.   Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Listen,  this place is a gem.  didn't know much about it before.  but it was reasonable cost.  We bought a package with breakfast and it was not the holliday inn buffet line.  This was a legit breakfast.  I had crab cakes egg benedict.  The staff had the best customer service ever.  free bike rental.  close to balboa island. it was a win
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay and crab benedict!  Our restaurant, Shor, is quite popular all day long -- but breakfast, is, indeed, a favorite.  Thank you for your shoutout to our colleagues and we hope to have you visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy

Summary: I decided to stay here because it was close to the doctor I was going to see, and because I usually like Hyatt Regency’s. The location is very good because it’s close to Fashion Island, Balboa Bay,  beach and water. I was very disappointed in my room, however...because it looked like a typical midwestern Hyatt Regency; it’s in need of renovation. The desk was black, the desk chair was black, the head board of the bed was dark gray, the bathroom tile was dark gray, and the rug was dark. This is California, near the water and the beach, but you’d never know it by this room’s decor.  There have no Regency Club here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate all of your valuable feedback and will share it with our leadership.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: My 1 and 6 yr old loved the pool and the slide. The water was perfect temperature and nicer than the freezing cold beach water. Many restaurants and shops near by. Overall, the property was clean and the rooms well kept. They brought the microwave and pullout bed very quick and were on top of things! Will definitely stay again and recommend to anyone who has kids and looking for a relaxing place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  It's true we love dogs and kids!  We look forward to your next stay and hope you can take the time to relax and enjoy all that Newport Beach has to offer.

Summary: We were warned that the property was outdated, and in some cases it was, but overall the property is well maintained, clean and we had a great stay. We also saw negative reviews about the staff but we had noting but positive experiences from them, especially that they didn't charge us for the last night since we had to leave a day early due to a death on the family.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your feedback is invaluable to our leadership.  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I love staying at Hyatt hotels and this one is one of my favorites by far, it is very family-friendly with a pool and a waterslide! Throughout the rest of the property they have other outdoor fun games as well like volleyball, ping pong, a water fun zone for the kiddos, shuffleboard and several fire pits that are free to reserve! If you're lucky they'll even drive you to your room in a golf cart with your luggage :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  It sounds as if you took advantage of all our property and Newport Beach has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We absolutely love the staff at this location. From the highly personable and friendly valet to the warm welcome at the front desk; the people genuinely seemed happy. The grounds are quiet and tranquil, which makes for a great walk first thing in the morning. This was our 3rd stay at this property and truly it all comes down to them having a wonderful team of employees.
Manager Response: We especially appreciate the shout out to our colleagues and are so happy your stay was great!  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Beautiful location, well priced in relation to services and amenities, very family friendly. This was our first time staying here, we travel to Newport often on the weekends so we only booked one night but it was WONDERFUL. Food and drinks were priced as you’d expect at a hotel/resort of this stature and area but it was delicious too! The hotel normally has more kid friendly events (movies by the pool, etc) but those are on pause for now. The splash pad, water slide, bike rentals, golf and restaurants were open so there’s plenty to do for kids. I can’t say enough good things, we will stay again in the very near future
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a detailed review!  We appreciate all your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I loved The stay. It’s a golfers paradise with family fun features like water slides. The fashion mall and balboa island are very closely located you can rent a bike from the resort and bike to balboa island. It was a well needed peaceful gate away with my family, our toddlers enjoyed it so much more.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words.  We are delighted you were able to enjoy so many of our amenities and activities.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: This is definitely an oasis in the middle of busy Newport Beach. Though the hotel could use a little refurbishing, the 26 acres of beautifully landscaped grounds are hard to beat. Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Thanks for your kind words and recommendation.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: People smoking in the room below us stopped us from using our balcony. Room stunk like cigars and and weed for my kids.   For the amount of money to be paid, there is 0 room service. No house keeping, elevators broke on the third day. And between fees and parking you are over $100 per night before the room charge.
Manager Response: We are sincerely sorry that your stay was less than satisfactory.  I can assure you that your comments are being shared with our leadership team.  Your feedback is extremely important to us. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short.   If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel overall is great but, some staff members made our stay not so great. If we can remove discrimination this hotel would be amazing. Remember my money has the same value no matter what mu skin color is.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing your concerns about our colleagues to our attention.  We take these comments very seriously at Hyatt Hotels.  Our leadership team has been made aware of your feedback and I can assure you these concerns will be addressed by our team members immediately.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: This is a hotel in a good location and is built on a good concept.  It would be good for families as there is lots to do.  It is a bit tired and needs upgrades to the carpeting, fixtures and appearance.  It looks old and in places smells old.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Your feedback is very valuable to us and all of your comments have been shared with our leadership team.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Everything was great.  Clean rooms and other facilities.  Free golf was a plus.  Everybody was professional and polite.  Multiple pools make it so it wasn't crowded.  The dinner we had the first night was great.  I would recommend this hotel to family and friends.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for a great review an recommendation!  We look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel provides activities for families and is still a favorite for celebrating weddings, receptions, and parties. The kids loved that the room was across from the pool. Pool slides were a surprise and bikes to ride in the Back Bay aviary and wildlife preserve are wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words.  We are delighted that you and family enjoyed our property and activities we offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: More than Subpar for a Hyatt Property
Summary: The front desk person was very pleasant and helpful.   Other than that, this particular Hyatt needs some series attention.  My room smelled of mildew, even the sheets and pillows had a horrible smell.  The outside patio was filthy.  There were cobwebs in the corners and the chairs and table looked like they hadn't been cleaned in months.  The bathroom had chipped chalking, the shower head was wobbly and the closet door was janky.  I have much higher expectations from Hyatt than what I experienced at this Hyatt.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us  While I wish you had a better experience, we are sharing all of your feedback with our leadership team to immediately address some of the issues your encountered.  We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this was not the case. I have shared specific examples with our engineering and housekeeping teams to use as a training opportunity.  If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Although this property has been "reinvented" many times, we enjoyed our stay and loved the location and such garden grounds.  With Covid restrictions, we didn't use much of the hotel, but look forward to a future stay.  Loved proximity to Fashion Island and Balboa Island...both within walking distance. Only downside was that our bathroom was very small and had loud fan.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and we are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay.  Your feedback is being shared with our leadership team and we hope you will visit us again soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Definitely in love with this resort, there’s sooo much to do!! And it’s literally across the beach, staff and hotel was amazing!! They also have three different pools to go to!! As well with two bars and a open golf court !
Manager Response: Thank  you for your kind words.  We are delighted you had an amazing stay!  It sounds as if you enjoyed all that our hotel has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy Sl

Summary: Hyatt did a great job of balancing available staff and amenities with not a lot of guests during our mid-week visit. We felt comfortable with all Covid protocols and overall it was a great experience!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback and kind words.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Our room was exceptionally clean!  We also loved the amenities including the heated pools, the numerous fire pits and the overall ambience of the property. The staff was professional and welcoming. We will return to this place next time we are in Newport Beach!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and great review.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Amazing pools and hotel facilities.  Welcoming and attentive staff as well.  Loved the room and my room opend up to the lawn where I took coffee in the morning with a view of the golf course.  Overall high marks all around.
Manager Response: Thank you so  much for your kind words and feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: I booked one night here to check it out, and I love the pools and slide. It has 3 pools with 1 slide. Three jacuzzis and they all were open.   The hotel’s amenities and overall performance were exceeding my expectations and as soon as I checked in, I booked for two nights in May for me n my 3 kids.  Hotel is family and dog friendly. So expect to hear happy excited children running around.  Pool service was slow (two days), and drinks taste amazing but pricy. I got two drinks (small cups) for $19 and $15.  Walls are paper thin. I can hear every conversation from next door and the couple next door blasting the music all day and all day long.  Finally at 2 am i texted guest service and they sent security, then i was able to somewhat sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us. We appreciate all of your feedback and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Not horrible but won’t be back
Summary: My gf and I went for a weekend getaway. We only stayed one night but that was plenty long enough. Honestly the hotel is very old and reminds me more or a motel than anything. Our room was in the main tower so we were closest to the front lobby. The hallways are LOUD.   Hotel grounds: cute set up, lots of greenery. The bartenders at the bar in the evening were nice. Lots of children. Small slide at one of the pools.   Room: The room was very basic, nothing to write home about. The walls are VERY thin. You hear every time someone closes a door 12 rooms down. You can hear basic conversations from the hallway and next door rooms. And this one really got me....I have NEVER stayed at a “resort” where I can hear the people walking above me. Literally. Footsteps, bed above squeaking,
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear that your stay was less than satisfactory.  All of your feedback is being shared with our leadership team  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  Thank you.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: My family and I enjoyed our stay. The staff was kind and helpful. There were fun activities available, the location was perfect, and the price was pretty good. Despite COVID, it felt like a resort from the 60s where families are about the property engaging in the activities such as golf, bike riding, swimming, shuffle board and roasting marshmallows. I wish we could have stayed longer. The beds were comfortable and the rooms were clean.
Manager Response: We wish you could have stayed longer too!  So glad you had a great stay.  Thank you for your great review and shout out to our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best,  Cathy S.

Summary: The service at the pool and the restaurant were slow, but the hotel was clean and the staff was friendly. My biggest complaint is the beds were very uncomfortable. The pool area could have been cleaner and they kept running out of towels even though it wasn’t very busy.
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  I sincerely apologize for your issue with our beds.  Rest assured, your comments are being shared and addressed with our housekeeping team.  We hope you will give us another try to make your stay among one of the best you've experienced.

Summary: Overall experience was awesome. Good break fast and the staff was very nice. room need a little deep cleaning. My family and I had a great time. My kids enjoyed the slides at the kids pool. We enjoyed the quite pool!
Manager Response: We love awesome reviews!  Thanks so much and will share all of your feedback with our team.  Look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with kids and close to everything!
Summary: I took my 2 daughters for Spring Break getaway and was pleased with the kids pool, cabana areas, waiter service and friendly people. You can also walk over to the public beach area with playground, lagoon, walk/bike trail, paddle boarding, etc. Quick 5 minute drive to the Balboa Ferry which my daughters loved. Parked and enjoyed the boardwalk, arcade, pizza by the slice, snow cones. Great sunsets from the balcony and into the Newport lagoon. Great for family fun and would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Wow, it sounds as if you tapped into everything that Newport Beach and our property has to offer.  So glad you had a great family stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thanks so much for the recommendation and review!

Summary Heading: Quick Bday trip to enjoy nearby Beaches
Summary: First impression with lobby was nice. Room appearance as you approach leaves you wondering what is coming. Room had stale air not aired out in months. AC unit had mold growing on blades. Our stay went fine considering we left sliding door open entire stay. The place over all was ok considering the price. The pools/ambiance was less than desired. My child loved the pool slide. There was no music which I think would be nice to have. The landscaping is beautiful. We have 3 gluten allergies in family and were disappointed they didn’t have meal choices available as menu and hostess told us they would have. Including GF carrot cake and it was my bday so no cake for bday. Bummer.
Manager Response: I am sincerely sorry that your stay was less than satisfactory.  All of your feedback is being shared with our leadership so we may improve upon the guest experience.  Your menu concerns are being addressed by our culinary team and we hope you will give us another try to deliver an amazing experience that so many of our guests have come to appreciate.

Summary Heading: Hard to Beat Hyatt Newport for the Money
Summary: The Hyatt Newport is by far the best value stay hotel in Southern California. The location is amazing, the staff is great, and the food is delicious. Their pool food, which is typical wings, burgers etc, is on par with any hotel, bar none. We have stayed 2 times in the last 6 month as a getway since we are Southern California residents, and will probably make it, at least an annual thing. As long as the prices stay where they are. I can only assume if they ever do a full renovation the prices will go way up, so et iint while theyre still super reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind and gracious words!  We appreciate your loyalty and love hearing from our local guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This place is great! There were three pools and hot tubs. They had complimentary bike rentals, tennis and my favorite, a par 3 golf course. I'm a beginner so It was really fun ( and free). The food was quite good and the grounds were very nice.
Manager Response: It sounds as if you were able to take advantage of all our property has to offer!  Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Unlike many hotels that have most everything inside, this Hyatt has lots of outside experiences (seating, pool, etc).Very refreshing. What it lacks, however, is a variety of dining restaurants, there being only one with a small menu.
Manager Response: Thanks for enjoying our great outdoor spaces!  We hope you will visit again as we expand our dining options over the summer.

Summary: The service was amazing and everything super clean!! The Newporter has a great menu, Wings, Pizza, and Kale!! Helena was a great front desk person. The drinks were cold and the kids enjoyed the waterslide, ping pong table and jacuzzi. The facility has three pools so you can change it up on long stays.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I recently had one full knee replacement and with Covid shutting down the elective surgery.  My other knee is next.  Everyone is very accommodating to the. room I request and the 2 extra foam pillows that I need.  The entire resort, is safe, clean and welcoming.  On the drop down to select "When did you travel, it is every week, almost for the last couple of months.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We hope you are able to get your next knee surgery scheduled soon  We are delighted that you were able to enjoy your stay with us,  It is especially gratifying to receive the feedback of such a seasoned traveler!  Best of luck with your upcoming surgery and swift recovery.  We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: The hotel is fine but for the price I expect quiet at night. The floors are so thin you can hear every step, if you get kids above you like I did it’s awful. The lighting in the bathroom is unacceptable, no way can you see to put makeup on. Other than that the service was good, valet was excellent, and the employees were nice. But if I’m paying over $600 for 2 nights I expect better accommodations.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We are sincerely sorry that your stay was less than satisfactory.  We appreciate your feedback and  rest assured all of your comments will be shared with our leadership.  Thank you for your shout out to our colleagues and we look forward to welcoming you back during a quieter time of year.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Pros: Lovely hotel, the kids LOVED the water slide. The grounds are beautiful and the location is great.   Cons: They charge a lot for bringing a pet, which was a shocker. They don't start serving at the pool until 12pm, which means they don't take orders until 12pm and you don't get your food until much later, so bring snacks to hold you over.  They close the pools and hot tubs at 8pm, so your kids might be bummed to have to get out early on their vacation.
Manager Response: Thanks for your kind words and we appreciate all your feedback on our pools and pool service.  Rest assured that we will share your comments with our leadership.  We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: First time at this resort and pleasantly surprised - beautiful grounds, friendly, helpful, personalized service, very clean & comfortable. Added fun: Par 3 golf, shuffleboard, 3 pools, multiple fire pits Close to everything we enjoy doing including the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words.  It sounds as if you were able to take advantage of all the activities and amenities our property has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: Hidden fees and lack of COVID-19 protocol enforcement
Summary: $30 resort fee and $30 daily parking fee were not properly disclosed on Expedia.  Staff did not enforce mask mandates.  Guests were frequently in the hotel without masks.  Social distancing was non existent.  Bathtub was backed up and not draining properly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  I am sincerely sorry that your stay with us was less than satisfactory.  Your feedback about our resort and parking fees is being shared with our leadership.  Your concerns about mask mandates and social distancing are greatly appreciated.  After reading your comments, it is apparent that we fell short on this occasion.  Please know that we are working on correcting these issues to ensure this situation can be avoided in the future.  We sincerely hope you will give us another try to earn back your trust and I can assure you will will do our best to give you the great hotel experience for which Hyatt has become known.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: This place is in an excellent location, but the rooms and grounds need TLC. We will forever refer it as the Hyatt Backwards Toilet as the commode faced inward. VERY strange. The parking is FAR away and down a steep hill. For $30/night, there should be a regular shuttle.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for sharing your feedback.  We will certainly let our leadership know your comments.  Best regards,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: Hyatt always has the best locations and value for their guests.  I’ve been Globalist/Diamond with them for 15 years.  Great opportunity to earn status and upgrades.  Best in the industry.  I will continue to stay.  Hyatt Newport gives guests access to so many amenities for families.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words.  We are delighted to hear from our locals and members of our loyalty program!  Best regards,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: Great hotel, great price! Spent the day at the hotel to get some work done, needed a change of scenery. Easy and quick check-in, check-out process. Very clean. Great staff. This is one of my favorite, local hotels for a day trip.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words.  We are delighted we could provide a work space and change of scenery for you!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary Heading: Just Average... good location, amenities but poor room quality
Summary: I took advantage of a low points, overnight stay. Let's start with the good... convenient, resort atmosphere. Families were actively enjoying the many amenities.   I knew the property was old but was still disappointed in the general facility condition. To me, the wear was excessive for the Hyatt Regency and probably the worst I've every experienced with the brand. Rooms were worn and felt unclean. There was also considerable noise transfer between rooms with the hallway and other rooms.   Overall, this is a good family destination and ready for your kids and pets. I can't recommend it for adults, looking for the refinement of the Hyatt brand.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your comments and feedback.  We are delighted that you took the time to share your impressions with us.  We are definitely a family destination and so glad you recognized that about our hotel.  Best regards,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: The staff was lovely. The amenities are nice. Love the outdoor facilities (pools, bikes, golf course). The condition of the hotel itself was a little trashy. Needs to be updated with fresh paint, clean and unbroken furniture. Also, the walls are thin and we could hear everything happening in our neighbors’ rooms (crying, coughing, walking, you get the idea).
Manager Response: Thank you so much for writing a review and sharing it with us.  We appreciate all of your feedback and will share your comments with our leadership.  Again, thank you for your kind words as well as other feedback.   Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times. Each time the staff if friendly and welcoming. The bathroom and room is clean and well kept. I will be staying here again on April 10th. If the service continues to be good I will stay here many more times in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  We are delighted that you are coming back to stay with us so soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back next week!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: As locals in Orange County, living only 20 minutes away from this property, we couldn't be more thrilled with our stay here.  Rooms were clean, staff was friendly and helpful.  I felt safe and welcomed.
Manager Response: We love our local guests -- thank you for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: The staff was very nice professional and accommodating.The property was well kept and really nice. The food and drinks was really good and the servers were amazing.  I will definitely revisit this place :)
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Staff is helpful, courteous, and very pleasant. The additional charge for parking seems excessive, though not unique. And I don't understand resort fees. They are mandatory, so why not call it part of the nightly rate?
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and review.  We appreciate your feedback and will share your thoughts with our leadership group.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: I would highly recommend Newport Beach Hyatt Regency staff is awesome accommodations are awesome beautiful setting we really enjoyed ourselves we are planning to return at a later date Also plenty of things to do
Manager Response: Thank you for your strong recommendation and kind words -- we look forward to your next stay!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Great hotel in Newport Beach and staff was great. The restaurant is excellent for breakfast. Juan our server did an excellent job. I highly recommend this hotel. The room was very clean and the hotel pools were nice too.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review and recommendation.  We so appreciate your kind words and shout out to our culinary team and Juan!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary Heading: A motel would have treated you better
Summary: The hotel staff is less than servicing. The check in was rushed and not fully disclosed. They argued over the request for a rollaway bed. They delivered towels in a garbage bag and the bellman is only good for wheeling luggage not taking it off, but still expectant of a tip. They left foil wrapped candy throughout the resort which is a disaster for dogs. I’ve slept of comfier beds at a Marriott or Sheridan for the price, you can do better elsewhere.
Manager Response: We are sincerely sorry that your check in experience was less than satisfactory.  All your feedback is being shared with our leadership team and we greatly appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share it with us. At Hyatt we pride ourselves on providing authentic hospitality and superior service and hope that you are able to visit us again soon and to give us an opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: This hotel was clean, the staff went above and beyond with their customer service as they were kind and gracious. The beds and pillows were incredibly comfortable and the room service was extremely prompt.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review!  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your kind words concerning our colleagues.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Had a great experience, excellent customer service, room was clean and cozy. The only downside is that the walls of the bedroom were very thin so we could hear everything going on in the adjacent room and on the corridor.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Cathy S.

Summary: Entire facility was super clean, modern and beautiful over-all. My wife & kids and myself stayed for a short getaway for the weekend and were greeted by super friendly staff and a beautiful room with harbor view. We took advantage of the free amenities (Bike Rental) and had a wonderful morning following our stay. 10/10 would recommend and will be returning throughout the year. Thanks Guys!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your outstanding review and recommendation.  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Beautiful grounds, nice rooms and I really enjoyed my stay at this resort! incredibly friendly and helpful staff! Resort is centrally located and a short drive to the beach. would recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and recommendation!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Cathy S.

Summary: Very clean great staff great location. I stayed 1 night and wish I could have stayed longer. Will definitely be back. Had a nice room overlooking the pool. Very clean I love how clean actually. That's the one plus with covid traveling! Highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and recommendation.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: there is a catch when you reserve, I wish I knew all the fees you were going to add up, the host wast terrible and the breakfast was over 10 min before the due time, first time at a Hyatt hotel and the last one for sure
Manager Response: We are so sorry your stay was less than satisfactory.  As we extend our amenities and services through the many government mandates throughout the pandemic, we hope you will be patient with us and give us another try.  At Hyatt, we strive to make your stay memorable and hope to take care of our guests so they may be at their best.  Thank you for the feedback, as we will use it as a training opportunity for our food and beverage team and guest experience team.

Summary: This hotel is a beautiful resort located in Newport Beach area. It is a short drive from fashion plaza shop mall with modern shops and excellent restaurants. This resort occupies a piece of land with numerous well appreciated rooms, three large swimming pools and a par three golf course. You can enjoy yourself by just walking around the property in addition to swimming and golfing. It is very relaxing. The restaurant, Shor, serves breakfast and dinner. The food is excellent and I really like to compliment the chef for his skill. The waiters are very friendly, like other staff members. They will tell you what to do and where to go in the area. The friendly atmosphere is overflowing.. we spent only two nights this time, but are planning our next trip for five days.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  We are delighted that you were able to enjoy everything that our hotel has to offer!  We appreciate all of your shout outs to our colleagues and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Walked in the front door and headed for the bathrooms and some asian guy started chasing me asking me where I was going and I said, "the restroom " and he shook his head no waving his finger ,"no no you not a guest here!".......how did he know if I was a guest or not?!
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for your experience in our lobby. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. I have forwarded your comments toour leadership team to use as a training opportunity.  If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel stay that so many of our guests have come to experience.  Sincerely,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: My stay was amazing! It was very clean and tidy. The rooms layout was really great and made the room feel a a lot bigger. The bathroom also had a very lit vanity style mirror which was great to get ready. The staff was very kind even late at night when I needed something at 2am!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words.  We are delighted you had a great stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: This is a great place to get way. Very clean and just a beautiful place to stay. I would advise anyone that wants to sleep in a nice place that they go here. Their restaurant was excellent. I had the Poke Bowl and my Wife had the Steak and it was delicious. I highly recommend eating there as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share it with us!  We are delighted you had an excellent stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thanks for the shoutout to our Shor Restaurant as well.  Sincerely,  Cathy S. Marketing

Summary: We enjoyed our stay by different activities such as riding bikes near the bay/beach, relaxing around the bonfire. The cleanliness of the hotel and the hospitality of the attendant gave us a good experience. We highly recommended this resort hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review!  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Very unhelpful staff, had trouble finding my reservation even though i booked 2 weeks before my stay. booked through the hotel itself via reservations, told me i prepaid my reservation and then proceeded to charge another resort fee even though i had already been charge a $60 resort fee when i reserved.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We are so very sorry that this is the experience you had at our hotel.  We will be sure that the feedback is shared with our management team as we are constantly doing our best to maneuver in the current environment we find ourselves in.

Summary: I love the Hyatt Newporter at Christmas -- especially my room in the Catalina Building..  The property overlooks the Back Bay and Newport Dunes.  The Dunes had festive floating lights and a boat motored past playing Christmas carols during a beautiful sunset.  It was perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review!  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: I had a wonderful stay with my family at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach! We enjoyed  playing golf, the beautiful pool and water slide! The property is beautiful and clean! We were graciously welcomed. Thank you to the front desk team who was always available, kind and accommodating! We will definitely be returning!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review!  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Wonderful hotel. Beautiful grounds. Excellent room and staff. Valet parking  is always a plus and even tho they weren't offering it at the time due to Covid, the staff was very accommodating and helpful in lieu of no valet. I'd come again and again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review!  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: I usually stay at the Hyatt Regency at John Wayne airport when I am visiting Orange county, but thought I would step it up a bit and stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. I only stayed one night and then went back to the Hyatt Regency at John Wayne airport, it's half the price for a more modern, updated room and even though it is right by the airport, the rooms are more quiet !   The Hyatt Regency New Port Beach's rooms have thin walls.  I could hear all the hotel guests coming and going from their rooms, talking, laughing, etc.  It was annoying !
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We are so very sorry that this is the experience you had at our hotel.  We will be sure that the feedback is shared with our management team as we are constantly doing our best to maneuver in the current environment we find ourselves in.

Summary Heading: Hotel and staff out of this world
Summary: Absolutely fantastic resort! The staff was incredible and the resort has so much to offer. It was my sons birthday and any time a staff member saw him they would ask how his birthday was going. So personable. The rooms were so nice and the resort is gorgeous! Almost didn’t want to post this because I want to keep it a secret! 100/100!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review!  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Hyatt has gone out of its way to protect and care for guests. Everything was spotless, and the employees were all upbeat. Given the restrictions, employees went out of their way to make the experience relaxing.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review, and continued loyalty!  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Great eclectic fun and business hotel.
Summary: I have been coming to this hotel for over 10 years at least once a month. Staff is exceptional and the surroundings are clean and beautiful. For the price I'd be as bold as saying there is none better.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review, and your continued loyalty!  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Adequate, won't surprise you except for the parking situation
Summary: With the massive caveat that it's a very difficult time to be running a hotel, we were frustrated by our stay. The hotel, by default, applies a resort fee, even though many of the facilities (i.e. gym) aren't open, and they aren't doing room cleanings during the stay. It's also absurd in a property with literally hundreds of unused parking spaces that they charge you $30 a day to park your car, as a guest. There is no competition for parking spots, and it would literally be cheaper (but less safe with Covid) to just Uber wherever you're going.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We are so very sorry that this is the experience you had at our hotel.  We will be sure that the feedback is shared with our management team as we are constantly doing our best to maneuver in the current environment we find ourselves in.

Summary: We visited the hotel for the Thanksgiving weekend with our two children.  Great staff, plenty of amenities for our family, and an ideal location near shopping, restaurant options, and reasonably close to the beach.  Clean, comfortable rooms, and best of all for us, pet friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review!  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Globalist benefits: No complimentary upgrade, room was small and dated. No breakfast at the restaurant due to covid, was given 500 points instead (which I had to reach out to Hyatt customer support as the hotel did not automatically credit the points)  Pros: Lots of amenities to keep the kids busy. Also several firepits for s’mores  Cons: Parking lot is quite far from the entrance and was a pain walking up the hill Lots of kids running around, seems more like a hotel better suited for family vacations than a couple’s trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We are so very sorry that this is the experience you had at our hotel.  We will be sure that the feedback is shared with our management team as we are constantly doing our best to maneuver in the current environment we find ourselves in.

Summary Heading: Disappointed on condition of the property
Summary: Overall we were pleased with the staff and customer service. However, the overall condition of the hotel and lack of amenities was really disappointing. For a Hyatt at this level and cost we expected a lot more and instead found a property that is old and tired.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We are so very sorry that this is the experience you had at our hotel.  We will be sure that the feedback is shared with our management team as we are constantly doing our best to maneuver in the current environment we find ourselves in.

Summary: I stayed recently at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach and truly wish I could write a glowing review. I am a Yelp Elite member and also travel frequently for work. I have stayed at many hotels, including the Hyatt properties, JW Marriott and Hilton properties. I do have to say I would rate the JW Marriott over everyone else. Especially in this economic climate. Not one person in the hotel said "hello" to me during my stay, with the exception of the bartender who was taking my order. I passed many staff members and they all seem to busy to even ask how everything was. I once stayed at the JW Marriott in Scottsdale Arizona an I couldn't remember a staff member not saying hello or asking if I needed anything. For what it costs and the location, the level of service and experience at
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We are so very sorry that this is the experience you had at our hotel.  We will be sure that the feedback is shared with all of our operation departments, as we truly want our guests to feel welcomed and cared for and it appears that we did not deliver on either during your stay.

Summary: I go once a year for an event held there. I have always enjoyed my stay! Staff is great! Location is great! I am so happy when I hear that this is the hotel that worked out for the retreat. All my friends feel the same
Manager Response: It is awesome to see that you visit us annually and always enjoy your stay!  We look forward to seeing you again in 2021!

Summary: The room was large and the bathroom clean. I had a cute patio right outside my room overlooking palm trees. The staff were very kind whenever I needed help! I loved the outside areas they had to sit and explore (manmade beach). I would definitely come back here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We agree that the outside areas are awesome.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: The breakfast served at our conference was excellent! The bed was great! Staff was well trained in customer service. It is a great location for a conference. The scenery was very tranquil. I will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review!  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: STUNNING!  You must visit this Hyatt!
Summary: Hyatt Regency in Newport Beach, California is immaculate with beautiful surroundings and very attentive staff.  It exceeded my expectations.  Had a quiet room with a balcony equipped with table & chairs & a view of the Bay.  Cannot think of one thing to complain about - indeed a rare occurrence.   Bathrooms were up to date & very clean, hotel toiletries good quality and the mattress was heavenly.  I really did not want to leave.  Staff so accommodating, especially young man named "Matt." Had fresh, creative breakfasts in the dining room on the weekend.  Usually don't care for hotel food but this was surprisingly wonderful & hot!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience!  It sounds like you had a great stay.  It is awesome to see that Matt made such an impression!  We are thankful to have him on the team.  We hope you will stay with us again if your travels bring you back this way.

Summary: Had to waste hours to check all the charges they put on the card. First overcharged before the check in. Charged resort fees with everything closed and there are 10 other different fees. Transparency is not the strongest point there
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are sorry to hear that your experience was such a disappointment.  If there is anything additional we can assist with in regards to the billing please let us know.

Summary: Honestly its had because of restrictions of COVID-19 The parking fees are out of line considering  time of year and hotel occupancy level. Just add the cost of parking to room charges and include them in total cost of overnight stay!

Stumbled upon this location while looking for the John Wayne Airport location. Location is huge! Multiple pools and limited room service is available. Grounds are kept clean. Some area of the resort need some updating but I would strongly consider staying there again once all ammenities are available.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back to the hotel in the future.

Summary Heading: Expensive villa sucked but the front desk was amazing.
Summary: Haven't ventured out much since quarantine and finally decided to rent a villa for my husbands' birthday. I disinfected/cleaned EVERYTHING upon our arrival and I was shocked by how dirty things still were. Must have had party in there before us (which is fine) but the balloon strings and tape were still stuck to the wall. Kitchen sink pipes burst and we had water all over the floor. Had to use numerous towels to keep kids from slipping. Told we'd have to leave for 1-2 hours for them to fix it (after I just cleaned and we got settled). TV in the MASTER bedroom just stopped working. Next day, the shower knobs wouldn't turn water off. Had to call maintenance again. At this point, we almost asked to move to another room but I was nervous about the virus and cleaning again. There
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am so sorry to hear that your experience with the cleanliness and working order of items in the villa was such a disappointment.  We will be sure that this feedback is shared with the appropriate teams and that they have a strategic plan for making sure these are not issues in the future.   Zach at the front desk is awesome!  It is wonderful to hear that the customer service he provided would be a reason to return in the future.

Summary: Great location on Jamboree and PCH. Also near South Coast Plaza! We have stayed here several times and going back is an easy decision for us. Under the onerous requirements wit the virus requirements they did a great job!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!  We are so pleased to hear that you have stayed with us on several occasions and that  during this unprecedented time the staff did a great job.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Our overall stay at the Hyatt was pleasant. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The only issues we had were with the rooms. We stayed in the premier suite and really it was just a standard room connected to a king size room. Definitely not what we were expecting. Amenities were not updated, and we found bed and pillows to not be that comfortable. The grounds of the hotel were gorgeous, and the hotel was centrally located near any and everything. Laguna beach, Huntington Beach, downtown Disney, LAX and all local dining were within 30 minutes or less.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We are so pleased we were able to provide great service.  We are sorry you did not enjoy your accommodations as much. We will forward your note to the proper departments so we may continue to improve in the future.

Summary: Fantastic visit at the Hyatt! We celebrated 36 years of marriage this weekend and booked our room here in Newport Beach. At check in Lacy put us in the perfect room and even sent us a bottle of wine, thank you Lacy! Our room was spacious and overlooked the pool. We played cards on our balcony one evening and watched the sunset.  In the lobby we found the perfect coffee and snack bar that kept us on property. We were impressed that other hotel guests respectfully wore face masks. We had a delicious dinner and cocktails Friday evening on the patio just outside the lobby. We have stayed here before and it’s always a great time. The property is just beautiful with benches here and there to take in the beauty surrounding you.   Off property we spent our time in Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! We are so pleased that you were able to enjoy our beautiful grounds. We cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Awesome we will go again soon love everything about this place
Summary: Awesome we will go again soon love everything about this place love the golf course and bike rentals im very satisfied although parking was kinda far but I had a wagon to carry all my stuff maybe I’ll go back in December only if the pool is much more warmer then my last visit I’ll be calling to make sure before going
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback. We are so glad you had the opportunity to experience some of our fun amenities included as part of the resort fee. We do keep our pools heated year round. We cannot wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I paid for upgrade for balcony but could not even utilize balcony due to strong odor of marijuana coming through slider as well as ventilation system... woke up to the same odor and when I attempted to notify hotel staff I was brushed off and told they can not control that type of situation ... Asked if anything could be done regarding the upgrade charge but Hotel manager advised that they could not and that was not his problem .. Explained that there’s children all throughout the facility and was not a good environment but he did not want to hear it ... I strongly recommend that if you are planning on staying in that area you check out the Marriott Hotels nearby ... I should’ve just booked there instead but wanted to try the Hyatt ...Bad Choice
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. As a non-smoking property, this should not have been part of your experience and for this we sincerely apologize. It is our goal to correct any issues during the stay, and we are sorry this did not happen. We will certainly address the concerns with the appropriate persons.

Summary: Trashy, old and low standard. Reward point room did not have any usb ports. People were smoking weed and drinking at patios. Noisy rundown building. Irvine airport one is much cleaner, newer and quieter. Never again here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. As a non-smoking property, this should not have been part of your experience.  We are so sorry your stay was disappointing and will continue to work on preventing this in the future.

Summary: If you want a hotel that screams California Dreams, this is it.  It is incredibly beautiful.  3 pools.  The lower pool has a slide and water park area for children.The pool makes you feel like you are in Hawaii. I love this hotel, but am concerned that it is not being maintained at the highest level.  We had several problems.  The fire alarm sounded for several minutes at night and then went off.  No notification of an "all clear."  It simply went turned off.  Top bed linen was threadbare (hole), mirror was desilvering, debris (likely coffee grounds) on bathroom counter and in sink.  Not Covid-clean.  No masks at pool area.  I have stayed at this hotel for over 20 years.  These may be minor problems but they certainly need management's attention.  Parking fee is outrageous,
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you so much for a stellar review of our property grounds. We have been working diligently to enhance our sanitation and inspection process for each guestroom. We can certainly understand your concerns surrounding Covid-19, and hope you’ll reach out to us directly before your next visit so we can personally enhance your next stay. We sincerely appreciate your past business, and look forward maintaining our relationship with you for years to come.

Summary: We checked this hotel out a month ago as we wanted to spend a weekend there.  The approach looked very appealing, the rooms at the front of the hotel the same, so we decided to stay.  We checked in then went to the Lido rooms, it was like going back into the fifties and staying at a motel 6........drab, dreary looking area, nothing like the front......majorly disappointing.  All this for $300 a night!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share valuable feedback with us. We hope that we can welcome you back. If your travels bring you back to Newport Beach, please do reach out to us so we may personalize your visit.

Summary: A last minute 3 day getaway to escape the heat, we were recommended to try Hyatt Newport Beach - enjoyed the adult only pool and our waiter Luke was very accommodating, polite & personable. There were a few children which kinda put a damper, but not too bad.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are pleased that you enjoyed your recent getaway to Newport Beach, and that we were able to provide great service. We hope we get to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Don't make people who are having a quiet conversation move to another area for no reason- that makes no sense.
Summary: I mentioned it earlier, 10 of my friends and I were ask to leave the very large area behind the main pool because the pool was closed.  That's a rediculous  rule and should not have been enforced on guest who were gathered to have a quiet conversation and enjoy each other's company.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We completely understand your frustration with your experience. We are so sorry that it was not handled with more finesse.

Summary: Breakfast was very poor ,not only the taste but the serving size ,I understand it’s during COVID 19  but this is a Hyatt they can do better, Also ants were crawling on me overnight that was very unpleasant
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate any opportunities we have for improvement. You should not have experienced pests, and we have made the proper departments aware to correct this issue.

Summary: Overall our experience for a family of 4 including 2 adults and young kids was good b not perfect and I will go over the reasons why in details.  Let’s start with the positive aspects. We like the overall feel of the property which was very lush and green. It was great to also be able to self-park for free since we had booked with Hotels.com with VIP benefits. We loved our room which was towards the back of the property next to the pools and with a magnificent view of the bay. The room was very roomy, clean and the beds comfortable. The various pools were great and the kids thoroughly enjoyed them since they were large and had plenty of seating areas around. The hotel lobby / bar area was beautiful along with the outside patios / garden where you could relax in canopy style
Manager Response: On behalf of the entire staff, we would like to thank you so much for your valuable feedback. Since recommencement of operations we have been working diligently to improve processes and refine staffing levels to ensure that we are providing an exceptional customer experience. We are thankful that you brought this issue to our attention during your stay, thus giving us an opportunity to correct the experience before your departure.   Your feedback truly gives us opportunities for improvement. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Please reach out to us directly so we can ensure your stay is tranquil and enjoyable.

Summary: Our room was extremely clean, we were not worried about Covid.  We won't stay any where else. We have two little dogs and it is pleasure for find a place that accommodates the dogs so we can see the grand kids.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great review. On behalf of the entire staff, we are so happy you and your pups were able to enjoy the resort. We love having the opportunity to be  your home away from home. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We love, love, love staying here. We get good rest and have a relaxing time while enjoying the pool by day and fire pits by night. The staff are amazing. I always feel like the most special guest.  We come here every year.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your remarkable review. We are so pleased we get to welcome you back year after year. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Generally speaking a very nice property. All staff members went out of their way to be kind and helpful.  The property is very nice and well maintained. The room size in the Balboa building was great for a lengthy stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We are so pleased we were able to provide great service. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Newport Beach!
Summary: Affordable and clean!  Staff was very friendly and helpful.    Hotel was very clean.   The rooms have all the amenities and the wifi was fast.   We took a mini family vacation during the middle of the week and had the kids do their distance school learning from inside the room.    So we appreciated all the technology that the room had from the usb plugs to the fast Wifi.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your outstanding review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and that we get to be your home away from home during your visits to Newport Beach. We cannot wait to welcome you back!

Summary: We stayed 2 nights. We had a double queen partial ocean view on 4th floor. Room was spotless. Great view of ocean from our balcony. Food at Watertable (only had breakfast) was excellent! The staff were at every entrance ensuring people were wearing masks when inside, they all had boxes of disposable masks & tongs so they could hand out masks safely to those who did not have one. I enjoyed their shops & bought a few things there. It’s a very large & roomy resort. I loved all the fountains throughout the resort. There’s a lot you can do outside safely because the beaches are so huge. We rented electric bikes & rode up to Newport Beach & back. We will definitely come back & stay here again!

This is our second stay at this hotel. It’s probably the only hotel we’ve stayed at that is worth the resort fee. I’m always a little worried that a hotel will give us a mediocre room when we use rewards points, but we were happily given a large room with a sofa bed close to the lobby. Mask protocols were in place and most guests seemed to be complying. I felt my family was safe. The room was clean, updated and spacious. We didn’t use the pool this time because we had other activities planned, but we did play a round of golf and took a leisurely bike ride around the bay. Both activities are included in the resort fee. I also loved that the bay is right across the street. We walked over to the Newport Dunes Resort and rented paddle boards and ate at their hamburger shack there.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback!  It is great to hear that you have had the opportunity to experience the awesome amenities that our hotel offers as part of our resort fee and that you and your family felt safe during your stay.   We hope that you have an opportunity to come back and see us again soon!

Summary: Friendly front desk during check-in. Nice pool area with a slide that the kids really liked.  Food & drink service at the pool was fast & Friendly.  Rooms we just basic, nothing special.   Great Place to come for a weekend to enjoy the pool,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We love seeing friendly in your comments regarding the front office staff and pool staff!  We agree it is a great getaway to relax and get in some pool time.  We hope that you will stay with us again if your travels bring you to this area!

Summary: We only stayed for one night and did not use any of the amenities.   So it sucked to be charged a resort fee for nothing.   The location is great.   The first room we got stunk and had bugs flying it it but we moved to another room.  Not a big deal.   The fire pits, pool and other activities make this place worth it.  We did not book direct and saved about $100 off the standard room rates using a third party site. Hotel is close enough to explore Laguna, Balboa and Huntington Beach.   If you want to kayak or paddle board, Newport Dunes is less than .5 miles away.  Plenty of restaurants to try in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the information about your experience.  We agree that our location is ideal to access a lot of fun activities in the area!  Hyatt does have a best price guarantee!!  Next time if you find a rate available on a third party site lower than the rate on our website please let us know, not only we will match it, but we will award a 20% discount.   We do hope you have the opportunity to come and stay with us again soon to enjoy all of the amenities the property offers.

Summary: We stayed for two nights in the Balboa section in a one bedroom premier suite. It was basically two hotel rooms with a connecting door, so we had access to two bathrooms. One room had ants, but it was not terrible, so we did not request a change. The beds were quite comfortable, and we enjoyed the balboa pool which seemed a more comfortable temperature than the oasis pool. Room service here is currently in take out containers. The food was okay and cafe shop style. The valets did a great job moving the cars quickly. The front desk worked to resolve errors in my folio.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate the insight on the pool temps as well as the food quality and style.  It is great to hear that the beds were comfortable and that the valet and front office were able to meet your needs quickly and effectively.  I am so very sorry to hear that there was an ant issue in one of the rooms in the suite.  We have connected with our pest control partner to ensure this is taken care of.  We hope you have an opportunity to come stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Trying really hard to get back to Normal
Summary: We, like many of us right now, needed a short getaway and time out of the house. We like the Newport area so we thought we would try the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. They recently re-opened (Fathers Day Week-End) and have many COVID-19 protocols in place. There could be better enforcement of the mask policy as we saw several guests without masks in the lobby and other public areas. Overall, the property is nice, the only thing keeping my rating from 5 stars is some of the walkways, paint on buildings and hallways could use a refresh. Some areas just seem a little dated.  The staff was trying very hard to make it a wonderful stay. They are running a short crew and at times you could really tell. The text number for service worked great. Quick responses but sometimes the service
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We truly appreciate the suggestions and love that you utilized our text service.  We are several weeks into our recommencement of operation and have now reactivated a lot more of our team members.  Additionally, we have implemented a new strategy for ensuring that everyone in the public spaces is wearing a mask.  We sincerely hope that you have an opportunity to come stay with us again soon.

Summary: All staff were kind, caring, & attentive. They were very grateful for us choosing to stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach  location despite the pandemic. The hotel & rooms were impeccable. This was such a calming & pleasant experience especially with the Covid-19 crisis. We will DEFINITELY return.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback. We are so pleased you were able to enjoy your visit with us. We cannot wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Villa’s not up to Hyatt standards
Summary: We stayed at the Hyatt Newport Beach in one of their Villas. The villa was relatively roomy but they need updating. Furniture was stained, kitchen table was in rough shape, cigarette butts around the villas private pool when we checked in. The staff did what they could (came back to pick up the butts, get the dirty towels out of the pool area, etc. staff is friendly and tried to be helpful. Food at SHOR was pretty good.
Manager Response: On behalf of the entire Hyatt Regency Newport Beach team I would like to sincerely thank you for your recent feedback in relation to your stay here with us.   We genuinely appreciate this honest and constructive feedback. There is no excuse for poor cleanliness and it definitely sounds like we let you down here and we apologize for this. I am pleased the team came and cleaned up the area promptly, but they should not have needed to.   We appreciate the comments about the team here and we're pleased you enjoyed the food at SHOR.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

Summary: The customer service was nice and professional. The pool was hot and awesome! Enjoyed the bar in evening and Starbucks in the morning. Didn't get a chance to golf; maybe next time. I will definitley be back again.
Manager Response: On behalf of the entire Hyatt Regency Newport Beach team I would like to sincerely thank you for your recent feedback in relation to your stay here with us.   We genuinely appreciate this feedback. We appreciate the comments about the customer service here as we certainly do have some wonderful team members who are very passionate about hospitality. Very pleased you were able to enjoy the pool, bar and coffee shop. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: The location is exceptional.  Right on the back bay with a lot of amenities.  The staff was very friendly and attentive.  The food service was good but a little pricey.  The rooms were another story.  We stayed in the Balboa section.  The rooms are decent size but very outdated.  The bathroom was clean but the couch in our room was disgusting with stains.  I had to put a towel down to sit on it.
Manager Response: On behalf of the entire Hyatt Regency Newport Beach team I would like to sincerely thank you for your recent feedback in relation to your stay here with us.   We genuinely appreciate this feedback. We appreciate the comments about the customer service here as we certainly do have some wonderful team members who are very passionate about hospitality. It is also great to read you enjoyed the amenities here and food options.   However in regards to the room it is disappointing that the couch was as stained as this is of course not acceptable and we will look into this right away.   We do look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great piece of Newport Beach History and wonderful staff.
Summary: I stay here every month and have for a 10 years. I have plenty of other options but this place is great. When I come solo for work or when we visit as a family with the kids it's perfect. I vote with my wallet and they are then best.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Beautiful Place to visit. Family Friendly, the pools are perfect for kids. Service at check in and out was great. Only down side was the food options were very limited. However, downtown Newport is only a few minutes away.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Despite being a good looking resort - the room walls are paper thin and we had to call management for the next door occupants toning down the kid's noise. We had to turn up our iPad music volume to drown out the noise. This happened two nights in a row. Management did not seem to be very caring. The breakfast was a very expensive $26 for some very average fare - not worth it The "happy hour" had decent ambiance outdoors and wine prices were on par with outdoor bars.  I used Hyatt "points + cash", was still charged the $30/day and overall the property did not provide the experience a Hyatt resort should provide.  Will not recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Please accept my sincerest apologies on behalf of our entire team in regards to the noise and other issues throughout your stay. We take great pride in delivering exceptional experiences and it is clear that in this case we have fallen short. If your travels do take you back to Newport Beach please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly at julie.lacey@hyatt.com prior to your stay so I can ensure that you are provided the kind of experience you deserve to enjoy with Hyatt.

Summary: Great rooms and service, extremely friendly and efficient employees. Meeting room was great too, very efficient. Recommend for business and pleasure. Good cocktails too (much needed after a full day meeting :) )
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Overall the property is nice. I did enjoy walking throughout the property as there are many great sights. The property is frequented by raccoons at night and they are very cute. We also noticed many beautiful birds. The room was nice and the food was okay. I found the food overpriced but I think this is probably the norm for hotels. One thing that really put a damper on our trip was the rude waitress, Shannon. I overheard her yelling at another employee and found her to be rude, bossy and unprofessional.  Why she is allowed to speak with her coworkers in this way is beyond me. In addition, I felt very rushed by her.
