It was my first time visiting the hotel and I decided to grab a bite to eat before heading back up to my room. I didn't even feel like I could get a breath in. It
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback. I am the Guest Experience Manager at the hotel and I wanted to sincerely apologize for the experience you received by a member of our staff. We take great pride in providing exceptional service and care to all of our guests, and it is clear that this was not the case which is not acceptable. This is something we take very seriously and if you would be willing to speak with me a little more on your experience I would be so appreciative of your time. Please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly at either: julie.lacey@hyatt.com or my direct phone line at (949) 729-6011. Thank you again for sharing this with us and I hope to speak with you soon.

Summary: Nothing better than a locals get away to revamp.  It was just a 45 minute drive for us and so well worth it. The beds and the Room. Everything was super comfortable  And very clean. The price was super affordable just to stay the weekend and have fun
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Attended a conference, had no complaints, great location. Hotel was clean and staff was friendly. It would be nice to offer rooms with 2 queen beds, the double beds were pretty small and there was 3 people in my room.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Overcharged my card repeatedly and still have not received a refund was told i did not need to pay for parking but i was still charged not once but twice $30 each time for parking. Be prepared for a lot of hidden fees. Watch out verizon this place is competing for best at hidden fees.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. I hope you will accept my sincerest apologies on behalf of the entire team and if there is anything I can assist with or discuss further please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly at: julie.lacey@hyatt.com

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a business conference and could not be happier.  Everyone was very friendly and the staff was excellent.  The bell staff was very helpful.  We also used the valet and it was easy to use.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel and for your kind words regarding our team members. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This hotel was wonderful. We were treated well, room was clean and everything was perfect for our getaway. Amanda at the front desk was excellent!  Close proximity to shopping, food and all things fun. It was a perfect and quiet place for us to get away for a weekend. Would highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel and for your kind words about Amanda! We are so glad she was able to provide the service you deserve and we will be sure to pass along your compliments. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great Location. Tired Rooms. Horrible Food
Summary: For the money, it’s ok. There’s plenty of options nearby. The room service food was disgusting. No other words can describe the food. Rooms are really old. Service is very casual 90’s style. The property has not kept up with the competition.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. I hope you will accept my sincerest apologies on behalf of the entire team and if there is anything I can assist with or discuss further please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly at: julie.lacey@hyatt.com

Summary: I had 2 brand new adidas sweat suites disappear from bell services taking out of my car and delivering into my room and when I asked staff nobody had an answer or even got back to me at all about it other then that actual hotel was very nice tho
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I hope you will accept my sincerest apologies as to what happened. I would love to assist in any way I can. If the items have not been returned at this time please feel free to reach out to me directly at julie.lacey@hyatt.com at any point and I will do anything I can to assist. I hope the remainder of your stay was enjoyable and our team members were able to take good care of you during your time with us.

Summary: Everything was great and we are repeat customers because we just love it.   It is close to so many places and it has a bar, restaurant, and coffee shop all on premises.  The grounds are beautiful and you have three pools to choose from.   Also included for guest  are a 9 hole golf course, a fitness center, and bikes.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Good stay for a business trip. Helpful staff, lovely range of facilities. Would revisit. Especially liked the pool and hot tub! And drinks/food service to the pool! Comfy beds and clean rooms. Only thing I could fault is they didn’t have a diffuser attachment for the hairdryer!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! Thank you also for your feedback regarding the hairdryers, we will be sure to address this so that moving forward you have everything you need during your time with us. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I've been here a few times over the years for conferences and love it.  The hotel & grounds are beautiful.  The collection of succulents is amazing.  The rooms are comfortable and clean, the staff is awesome and the vibe is cool.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We booked our stay and meeting at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach for our recent corporate sales meeting and we would definitely use them again!  Every member of each team was so helpful and easy to work with.  It made running our event go smoother knowing that they were there to take care of things.  I appreciate everyone's help!  I definitely want to give a special thanks to Sebastian Lorefice (Events), Nick Gonzales & Richard Riding (PSAV),  and Luis Prado (Banquets).  The facility itself was gorgeous, providing our guests with plenty to do.  Many of our guests were from out of California, so this campus was perfect to show them the best socal has to offer. We would absolutely recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel and for your kind words about our team members. We will be sure to pass along your compliments. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Enjoy Beautiful grounds, lawn activities, bikes, pools with a friendly, professional staff. Great for doggie travel.  For the business professional, this is a great meeting destination with a variety of meeting rooms and ballrooms that can accommodate any size.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Weekend at the Hyatt Newport Beach
Summary: If you are looking for a quiet get-away for the weekend, this hotel is not the place to be.  We had to suffer with next door occupants who had there television at full volume plus a barking dog into the wee hours of the morning.  Finally after three phone calls to the desk and a personal visit to the night clerk something was finally done, but it took over two hours which means we lost precise hours of sleep dealing with this issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Great staycation getaway for Valentine's weekend and to meet up with out-of-state friends.  We always have fun at the Hyatt Newport Beach.  The is a great location and the staff are superb.  It is close to restaurants and close to the marina.  Beautiful grounds.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Great hotel, fantastic ambience and views. Balcony view rooms are OK. Fairly small and not represented accurately in the photos on the website. Make sure you ask them to clear the air conditioning filters and vents to prevent any allergens or germs from causing you respiratory issues. Good chance you’ll get a rowdy couple or group next to you if you have an adjoining room which is bad news for any rest or relaxation you may have hope for, especially if you requested a quiet room like we did. Had to call management to get involved because they were loud, banging on the walls and smoking marijuana which creeped into our room. Bed is Extremely firm. If you’re not used to that, bring a mattress pad otherwise you’ll be like the hunchback of Notre Dame when you wake up. The in-house
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. I am delighted however to understand that the food and staff members were able to provide the kind of experience you deserve. I hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our hotel soon and provide the overall experience many others have become so fond of.

Summary: We liked this place as the pool, waterslide, and outdoor activities at the resort were great for our son, and the hotel was 30-40 minutes from Disneyland. If traveling to Disneyland, i would recommend getting at least a 3-day Disneyland pass to maximize the experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Horrible. Will Never Stay Here Again
Summary: This hotel experience was horrible. The staff (Janine) was rude.  I checked in and the person checking in next to me was offered warm cookies, late check out, etc.  I am also a rewards member staying here on points however was not offered any “perks” besides my room key even when I asked about them.  The walls are paper thin. They put my room next to an adjoining room with 4 adults and their children. I could hear every conversation. They went to bed late and were up at 6 am; needless to say, so was I because i couldn’t sleep due to the noise. My room was on the first floor (which I didn’t feel comfortable with being a single woman) and absolute no view. I couldn’t wait to check out.
Manager Response: I am so sorry that this was your experience at our hotel.  It is our goal to provide a great and personalized experience at check in for each guest and based on this feedback it is apparent that we failed.   Additionally, I can certainly understand the lack of comfort being a single female traveler and being placed on the first level.  Please know that we will share this information with our guest services and front office teams, as well as Janine, as a coaching opportunity on the importance of consistency and recognizing the needs of each of our guests.  Again, my sincerest apologies that this was your experience.

Summary: Disappointing in that the "reservation" somehow indicated a handicapped room and we were then sent to an older section.....the front desk staff were not helpful in resolving the situation!! So both the reservation team and the onsite staff mishandled the stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Stay away from Lido section it is a motel setup with paper thin walls. $30.00 self parking is quite steep,  walking about 1/4 of a mile to your room. Be aware they will try to charge extra for room upgrade. HVAC was not working in the room 269 (and did not get fixed).Gym, and landscape, and water pressure are good. No coffee at hotel lobby before 6 am (not free)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Great location, and with some update's in the hotel, and golf course (pitch and putt).
Summary: The location is outstanding but the hotel could use some modernization. The small "Pitch and Putt' golf course could also be outstanding if they actually maintained the greens a little more to make them actuall puttable. They could also remove a few tree's ( # 2) that are presently right in the middle of the fairway, making it unplayable. Julie at the front desk is incredible, and will make your stay wonderful. I didn't have the same experience with many of the other front desk people, and you should ask for her, or wait until she's on duty to deal with RSVP's. The bell staff, and valet were also very good, and helped a great deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! Feedback like yours helps us ensure we are providing the best level of service and creating the kind of atmosphere we pride ourselves on. Thank you also for your kind words about our team members, we are so glad they were able to provide the level of service you deserve and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Everyone was so rude... everyone from the valet to the front desk receptionists. Coming from a customer service background and owing a business that is built on customer service and a sense of community this was by far one of the worst experiences I have ever had. I am so glad that my team was with me so that I can show them an example of what NOT to do when dealing with our clients. They charged my card twice and when I asked why that happened her response was “we want to make sure you have enough funds in your account to pay for your stay” WHAT? I understand charging the 220 for the 1 night stay and I even understand the $75 incidentals deposit. But to charge me an additional $300 and say it’s for their security...I’m baffled. The ritz Carlton doesn’t even do that. Needless to
Manager Response: I am so sorry that you had such a terrible experience and that the response you were given regarding our processes and procedures was delivered so poorly.  If possible I would love to connect with you to find out some of the specifics regarding additional experiences during your stay in the hopes that we could provide the proper training and coaching to those involved.   I am embarrassed and saddened that we failed to provide you with a better stay.

Summary: Great stay with our young family. Loved all the games, free bike rentals and pools. Kids loved getting therr own drink cups with free refills throughout there stay and chocolate cookies upon arrival! We would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  It sounds like you and your family had a great stay and were able to use some of the awesome family friendly amenities that we offer.  We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back for another  great stay!

Summary: the complex is very nice, could use some updating in almost all areas but clean and friendly. the pools should be a few degrees higher for january. drinks were expensive, adding outdoor TV's should be considered or made available if there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: will probably never return there................stayed there years ago & had no problems.....bar was fine....hamburger was fine......bathroom was very tiny......room location was very poor...and hotel was not crowded so no excuse........
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Nice conference setting, but it is obvious they know you have limited food and drink options so be prepared to pay maximum pricing for any on site food or beverages. During conference it was even difficult to get a drink of water. I had to go back to my room for water.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: CalBal 2020: excellent customer service and a romantic atmosphere
Summary: I stayed here for a three-day event. I loved everything about the hotel. This is a property with several old buildings, three swimming pools hot tubs and a golf course. The harmony with nature is more than welcome especially when you are at an inside event. Because the buildings are spread out, there is quite some opportunity to walk outside without feeling cooped in for days. The second you get into the drop-off area, you can feel the old Hollywood flair that this property has. Customer service is excellent - from early check-in to very forthcoming servers - everything brings in the California laid-back life-is-good-and-should-be-enjoyed vibe. The dining area is beautiful and it reminded me of a French veranda. Looking forward to next year's CalBal in the same place. I would
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Personal time. Just needed to get away to relax. Grateful for my stay. It's my home away from home.
Summary: It was my personal time to get away n relax. M home away from home. . I come to the Hyatt frequently for the concerts n other activities. Always refreshing n the staff assist with my needs. Very gateful
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Not The Hyatt brand I know
Summary: I am staying here in a King room and was allocated one by the pool.  This section of the property looks like an old motor lodge that has been upgraded at some point.   My room even more so feels this way with a budget motel room layout with a very small window (roughly 4 feet wide) resulting in a cave like ambiance.   The bathroom is fairly large but the shower, toilet and sink are all crammed to one side in the tightest configuration one could ever imagine.   It's just not the hyatt that I know.  The rate at $237 for the night plus $30 resort fee plus Parking and taxes makes it pretty over priced.   It appears that the main part of the lobby building has rooms that are accessed from a hallway and likely are more to the hyatt standard.   That said, this is a 3 star property at
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. Summary: This is not the newest or fanciest Hyatt Regency but it is a cute resort I enjoy, especially for a category 3. Gorgeous views. It also has bike rentals, a lawn chess game, shuffleboard and three pools/hot tubs. Fitness center is small but well equipped. Great activities for families! It’s also under 3 miles to Fashion Island.  The rooms are OK. Nothing special but I’m not in them during the day much. I’ve read the walls are thin but I haven’t experienced this myself. No weight scale in fitness center. :(.

Summary: The staff is really nice, and the location is impeccable but the rooms are lacking. Lot's of great amenities but if you're booking a room just to spend the night, maybe look elsewhere. Rooms are visually cold and we had old toiletries...The self parking is really awkward and expensive for the location...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Staff is wonderful, they have a wide variety for items you may have left at home. While there are no microwaves in the room, if you ask they will bring you one free of charge. They also provided me at my request with a vanity light up makeup mirror. Front desk staff are very responsive and helpful. The rooms tend to be a bit humid even with the ac on so I had to crack my sliding door a bit. Any room in the lobby building is not recommended, you can hear all the noise from the weekend drinkers down at the bar and you can hear everything in the next rooms. I didn't get much sleep the five days I was there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I am delighted to understand that our staff was able to bring you the level of service you deserve to enjoy. While I wish you had an overall better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: I've stayed here before and they do not disappoint.  Hotel was clean and folks friendly.  I didn't eat there other than conference food and it was ok.  Bar was always busy, fun place to hang out. Lucky for me the weather was perfect for being at the beach, and walking around the grounds was super enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: My husband did the Newport Dunes triathlon on Sunday and this was the recommended hotel.  Location was perfect and close to the race site.  Accomodations were lovely...room overlooking the bay.  Food was outstanding.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Great place to stay at, the resort is close to beach and highway 101 which makes it for easy travel up and down the coast. The rooms are spacious and quiet. The pool temp is advertised at the gates which makes it nice when deciding to take a dip.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Love the ambiance, makes for a very relaxing stay. I was there for 3 nights and slept well. The coffee shop closes at 11am and they turn it into a bar. It had several pools and they were not crowed at all
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I was here for a busy, 3-day conference so wasn't able to enjoy the large resort.  The rooms were spread out over several buildings on the property.  I was in the main building where you check-in/out and wasn't that impressed.  The floors in the hallway were squeaky and didn't feel level.  Not really a big deal, but not what you expect at an upscale resort.  There were multiple pools and 1 even had a twisty water slide, so maybe if you are there for pleasure instead of business and had kids, it would be fun.  If I visit Newport Beach again, I would rather stay by the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: I stayed  here for a work-related symposium and found the room (spacious, well equipped), the staff (personable, welcoming, efficient and excellent all-around), the grounds, the food (good variety, well-prepared), and the location to be very enjoyable..
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Overall stay was very pleasant. I would recommend Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. The resort was very tranquil, quiet and nicely laid out. Staff were very friendly, polite and willing to assist. I am looking forward to my next trip to the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Best option in the area. It’s my go to every time and I’m always disappointed if they are booked full. Staff and experience are always, yes always, very pleasant. It’s also a good spot for morning or evening walks down to Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Needs update to rooms. Not as spot on as you should think. Little details need work. There should be no water damage seem and painted over. Great place to stay but lacking a professional touch. Shouldn’t have to call three times to make sure room is what I want.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Beautiful room. Wonderful and helpful staff. Food was excellent. Having the patio access to outside was wonderful since I had my dog with me. Would definitely recommend. Next time I  am in Newport I will definitely stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel for a number of reasons. First of all the staff was friendly and my doubles room was clean and spacious, although the bathroom was kind of small. I enjoyed having a patio that I could sit outside and read with lots of lovely surrounding plants. It was peaceful just taking walks around the grounds.   There were several pools, one with a small water slide, none of which I had the spare time to enjoy. They also offered other activities such as golf, tennis, bike rentals, and even motorcycle rentals. The on-site restaurant food was delicious. There were many beautiful sitting areas.   There’s a lake/campground across the street that I took nice walks around. And the weather was perfect in October! Although I gave it a 5, it would’ve been nice
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: First time at this property, it is beautiful with many amenities, there are multiple pools, one with a water slide.  They have bicycles you can borrow, a gym, a spa, and I believe there is also a golf course (not that I had time to check it out).  The staff was very friendly and the check in and out was fast and efficient.  Hope to stay there in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Hyatt Regency in Newport Beach, CA
Summary: We enjoyed staying at this resort since it gave us an opportunity to be near our friends while attending a high school reunion. It seems like a family-friendly place with bikes to rent, shuffle board and several swimming pools as well as next to a golf course.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The staff were amazing to me and my family. They even sent staff to watch my children on the water slide and let them go on it for a significant amount of time . The food was delicious and the room was very clean . I would go back in a heartbeat
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Drove several hours to get there but upon arriving, the staff was very accommodating and assisted me with my car and bags.  Provided me with a delicious cookie, which was a wonderful snack after getting off a long road trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Nice choice for a conference.  Restaurant was nice , food good really enjoyed the Seared Ahi Tuna.  Drinks were good and the staff was very friendly.  Thanks for making my experience of Newport Beach so wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The rooms were comfortable, clean,  and the staff was very friendly, housekeeping especially!!   I would reccomend the Hyatt Regency in Newport to a friend or colleague visiting! It looks like a great hotel for families traveling with children as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Jazz night at the Hyatt Regency
Summary: From check in to check out we had a very positive experience.  Bar staff recommended great restaurant choices in the area and front desk and housekeeping were definitely top notch.  The Shor restaurant puts out great food and service and the grounds and amenities are great.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great place to relax and enjoy!
Summary: This is a really nice resort hotel.  The rooms are very comfortable, with well-thought-out, and top quality amenities provided.  No shortage of activities available (3 pools!), a very nice restaurant and in a good location (easy walk to Balboa Island).
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We had a family vacation here and it was one of the most pleasant stays we have had. The employees at this hotel were among the best we have encountered. Especially the host Chris Sakai, he went out of his way to make our stay as comfortable as possible. We were evacuated from our home due to the fires and he really helped make our stay there memorable! Thank you everyone for your kindness, we will be back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I stayed at this property for four days for a conference.  The service was excellent, and the food (on property) at Shor was great.  The property could use some updating however.  The hallway smelled musty, and the air conditioning was broken in my room.  Other than that, the property is lovely and is a great place for a conference.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Excellent! Everyone on the staff was great and helpful. The location is ideal. The room was clean and the cleaning service staff were very friendly. The valet staff were especially helpful since they helped me open my car door when the car lock didn't work.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Every employee made us feel welcomed after a long drive from Arizona. Our room was very nice. The pillows and the bed were really comfortable. We ordered room service and the service delivery was quick.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Recently spent an evening at the Hyatt Newport Beach. Food and drink were great. Stayed in the Villas and it was very nice. The private swimming pool was great. The staff was very accommodating as usual and I will stay there again when I'm in town.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We didn't sleep well the night we stayed. The hotel needs to improve its sound insulation for rooms. We can hear the person from next-door walking and using the bathroom.   When we checked out, We were instructed by the front desk to use the card to open the gate. However, it didn't work.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: When we arrived our room was not ready so we headed to lounge to grab a bite and a drink.  Ended up waiting for 30 minutes and finally went to bar to request server.  Waited another half hour for them to notify us our room was ready (and promised 15 minutes earlier) to no avail.  Went to front desk to find out person checking us in did not complete the process.  At this time the only room left was a handicap accessible room on the opposite side of the property from self parking.  Worst Hyatt experience ever.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: This was a stop over vacation to see this resort. While the staff was outstanding, the resort is old. We had a few minor plumbing issues, electrical , cable and PIPE noise !! The shower pipes must run right over our room. Every time someone took a shower, we heard it... They fixed all but the night light. Nice but old and dated. Not up to Hyatt Standards... little disappointed...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: many freebies that made our stay and visit of Newport Beach awesome.   Especially the concierge.  Excellent suggestions of how and where to get the most out of are vacation.   Generous portions for all meals.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Nice place to stay, very accommodating, though the taxes etc caught us out with our final bill. Restaurant was very good. One of the nicest places we ate whilst in California. Great to see healthy options on the menu and of course New Zealand wine!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: My husband and I stay at about 50 hotels every year between business and vacations and this was one of my worst experiences to date.  I checked in online prior to my arrival and mentioned it at the front desk when we arrived. The clerk seemed to have no idea what I was talking about and then went through the check-in process but never asked for a photo ID to confirm it was me. She finally handed me the keys and literally directed around a building to get to our room only to find that our room was at the end of the hall closest to the lobby (and you could see that doorway from the lobby's door). When I arrived in the room, it was very musty but we were now running late to get our event so we left the A/C running in hopes that the air circulation would reduce the smell.

Summary Heading: Nice grounds - shame about the customer service
Summary: If you are travelling with small children, the king room with the pull out sofa bed would be sufficient. We travelled with a baby and a toddler, and the toddler used the sofa bed, whilst we had a crib in the room too, and there was sufficient room for all of us.   Disappointing experience with the reception staff, who did not seem to be particularly interested in the issues that we experienced. To be fair they did move our room (twice), but on one night where there was a wedding in the hotel, and guests were being unbelievably anti-social into the early hours of the morning (at least 3am) by running down the corridors, shouting, banging on doors and smoking cannabis. Their actions are not the fault of the hotel, but having reported this to them twice during the night, security

Summary Heading: Very average room. Not Hyatt Regency standards.
Summary: My wife and live on our sailboat and decided to use reward points on the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach as a splurge away from the boat. The room was small, the decorations, wall texture,  bathroom fixtures and layout are very outdated. Clean, yes. Nice grounds, yes. We were ready to go back to our boat after one night.

Rooms were very clean and comfortable. I was a little worried about the beds  being comfy,not the case.  The night life her was amazing. Went for a  wedding on a yacht followed by after party there in the bar area. Beautiful kinda pricey but well worth it.

We booked this hotel as a base while sightseeing around Southern California.  The hotel is set in lovely, well-maintained grounds and covers a large area, including a golf course.  This is really a resort rather than just a hotel.  There are three pools, one of which is ideal for children while the other two are perfect for a relaxing day sunbathing and cooling down in the pool.  All the pools and the areas around them appeared to be well kept with comfortable loungers, fresh towels available daily and a water cooler if you don’t want to use the pool bar service.  There is a very large car park at the side of the hotel and although people have mentioned the steep hill up from this car park, I would suggest that it is more of an incline than a steep hill.  There is also a walkway

This Hyatt really has a resort like feeling with super friendly staff. There's a gorgeous view of the harbour and you're only one block away from the harbour.  I believe there are 3 pools, a decent fitness center, lounge and on site restaurant.

Summary Heading: AVOID!! Charges added to bill for things we did not buy upon check out & no response from hotel since
Summary: Stayed at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach for part of our honeymoon from 28th Sept - 3rd Oct. Our flight was at 7am on 3rd Oct from LAX, so we went to check out at 4am to be told we wouldn’t be able to be checked out until later that morning. We left trusting the hotel to take care of this & upon arrival at our next destination had an email with a bill attached which included every days resort fee (which we were aware of) but also had ‘Lobby Bar Food’ & a total next to it. Both my husband nor myself had any food within the hotel, so I have been trying to contact them for the past 2 days to have this removed from our bill & have the money refunded to my husband’s credit card. Both the concierge & consumer affairs are ignoring all my emails (I don’t have a US SIM card to call them

I was in town on business for a week so I stayed at this hotel. The room was a little disappointing for a 4 star hotel. The room is clean and very basic but it does have a nice private balcony that you can sit outside on which is nice. The only thing I hated about the room was the shower. It was like hot stinging rain pelting my body. They make up for the plain room with the beautiful surroundings and pools and golf course. The hotel is in a quiet area and not too far from Laguna Beach which is beautiful. The food at the restaurant is pretty average and overpriced so I would suggest eating out instead.

Great accommodations, wonderful service, professional staff, strongly recommend! Brendon is a great manager, friendly and professional! We spend here 5 days every few month and always love it! Lots of activities, great for kids. Delicious buffet breakfast. Concerts under the stars.    Will come again!!!

Summary Heading: nestled in the dunes of Newport Beach
Summary: The HYATT Newport Beach was a welcome surprise, nestled in dunes this property was styled retro surf w a flair. The Community room off the bar is lively and they even offer weekly concert series with some well known artists-The pool areas are nice-Main pool features large swim area and kid zone w slide,and Jacuzzi. Another pool for quieter sunning. Gym offers no excuse to pass on working out. Best part so close to Balboa Island ferry and a drive up hill to Crystal Cove state Park

At check in they didn't have the room I booked, (one with a balcony) so I was given one without and told the resort fee would be taken off the bill. Needless to say it wasn't taken off and by the time I got the email receipt I was 2 hours from the hotel. On the plus side the room was nice, the beds were comfortable and my kids enjoyed the oasis pool with waterslide.

No way this should be rated a 4 star. The common areas are beat up, the rooms are dated and small, the bathrooms stink because the ventilation is so poor. The only reason I wasn’t furious is because the price point was probably spot on at $130 per night. In Newport Beach!!! I have it two stars instead of one because the pool staff was great and my daughter did love the slide. Considering the price and the location it’s fine but just expect more of a lower end experience. Not an exclusive resort.

Went to the Oleta Adams concert.  Music was wonderful and relaxing. Met some wonderful and interesting people. Thank you Cynthia for a great day and night. View was great......from all angles....Will do this again soon... Well worth the money....

I couldn't have had a better overall experience. the only thing to expect is that there is only valet parking and no where else nearby to park, and it was not cheap. But the hotel offers great rates for nice rooms.

I stay in many hotels for business travel, but this hotel far exceeded my expectations.  I was expecting just a regular Hotel. As it turns out, this is not a regular hotel, but a resort. Yet, there is no resort fee. Even the self parking is free. Yes they do have valet parking also.  The rooms were nice, clean, and updated. But what really impressed me, was the large grounds full of entertainment options. There is a 9 Hole Golf Course on the property, free of charge. They even provide loaner clubs and balls. Amazing! There was a sand volleyball court, Half-Life sized chess set, shuffleboard, swimming pools, walking trails. I believe I saw tennis courts to, but not certain. There is a very nice exercise room. There is an area that looked like it was set up for an outdoor wedding.

Summary Heading: The rooms are clean but need upgrade
Summary: This hotel is still in a great location but rooms are tired. The staff is top notch and location is great. I would still stay at this location even with the rooms needing an update they are clean and once again the staff is top notch.

The Hyatt Newport Beach was a great little vacation spot for us.  The staff are friendly and very willing to help.  Located on the Back Bay, once known as the Hyatt Newporter, the location is great and central to all that Newport has to offer.

Great location, huge pool, food & service very high level, rooms clean & comfortable. Selected this location as between Laguna Beach where we visit annually and Buena Park where we took the family to enjoy Knott’s Berry Farm Park. Newport Fashion Island Mall is outstanding.

This is a lovely hotel with great service! It is close to beaches, restaurants, and shopping. The entire staff was personable, courteous, and very helpful. the room was large and well appointed, and the balcony was a great plus. I will make this hotel our go to when next we come to Orange County - which is twice a year.

This place is dated, over priced and not worth the money. Stayvsomewhere else! Rude service at front desk. Paper thin walls. Broken A/C unit. Bathroom doors that don't actual close and lock. Popcorn ceilings.

We stayed at the Hyatt Regency Newport beach for two nights for the purpose of attending one of their amazing summer concerts. We love the location. It is within walking distance of Balboa island and lots of shops restaurants and beaches. The water slide was so much fun for our 4 year old granddaughter who was with us.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at the hotel.  It sounds like you had a great two night stay!  we loved that you were able to catch one of our concerts, explore the area and spend time with your granddaughter at the Oasis Pool.  We certainly hope to have you and your family as guests again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Location - easy to get to Marina and Beach
Summary: Excellent accommodations and service. Very nice grounds, Golf available on grounds. There is a great walking and biking area just out the back of the hotel property. Service for bar and lounge area was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The room we had was nice overlooking one of the pools. The floor was just kind of old and made so much nose just walking around our room.   Valet seemed kind of slow and not consistent with opening our doors.   Chris at front desk was awesome with our check in and the bellman at arrival and departure were great as well.   Had dinner at Shor restaurant end enjoyed the lobster Mac and cheese.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I do want to apologize for the valet service and the noise issues throughout your room. Thank you very much for your kind words about Chris, I will be sure to pass your compliment along. I hope to welcome you back to Newport Beach again in the near future.

Summary Heading: great facility but cleaning staff needs more training
Summary: loved the facility and the bar area (coffee in the morning)  but the cleaning staff needs more training.  the facility had so many things going on, we will revisit with our grandkids---they would love it too.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We appreciate your comment regarding our housekeeping team and will share the feedback.  We would love to welcome you and your grandchildren back.

Summary: I didn't like the bed room.   Bedroom building has moldy smell as well as the hole way with moisture. Location is excellent.  It is located very close to the Fashon Island.  Conference setting and food was excelent.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay overall and hope to see you again very soon. I appreciate your feedback in regards to the room itself, I will share this with my housekeeping team to ensure that all parts of the hotel are up to the Hyatt standards you deserve!

Summary: Our room was smaller than described, also shower area and bathroom area was dirty. I am not shy to say we paid $185 to stay for one night for that type of a dirty room and being so small placed in the back of the hotel with no view having to walk from a parking lot 2 to 300 yards away then walk to our room another 150 yards carrying heavy bags when no one offered to help just seemed like poor service. I could’ve stayed at a comfort inn or best Western or even Motel 6 and receive the same service for a $59 a night room. Think twice before staying here because I can’t say I got what I paid for. For a Hyatt, I expected over the top service with comfort and no stress and I got the exact opposite.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: We stayed for 3 days it was fantastic. Staff lovely and polite and always keen to ensure your stay is comfortable. Should be a 5*hotel. Food excellent service excellent. Rooms clean and tidy. Staff very helpful and willing to help. Great location only 2 mins drive to newport harbour
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I took my daughter and a group of her close friends to the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach for her 13th birthday.  From the moment we arrived until the moment we left, the service and stay was absolutely perfect, actually booking my two rooms was a great experience as well. The girls were able to celebrate with fun games on the premises as well as with ones we brought and they also had a great time in the pool.  We will definitely be coming back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: My family and I had the most amazing stay st this hotel. The staff was incredibly helpful and courteous, Ana Rosales made this whole thing possible. The kids and the adults all really enjoyed the trip, it was a success!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Desperately needing refurbishment. Pool area is damaged, paint on the walls is falling off, carpets smell funny... Room was clean, but somehow dark inside, not enough lighting inside, dark furniture, just plain old fashioned. This hotel is definitely in need of refurbishment. Service is great, no doubt.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: We appreciated the high quality of everything.  The rooms were great.  We enjoyed the swimming pools and spas and even the golf course and horseshoes.  We also appreciated the proximity to the island restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Paid mandatory 'resort' fee to access basic amenities like swimming pool and gym. Room was clean but in poor condition, and nowhere near what it should have been for the price. Overall, the facility was decent, but the room fell far short and I was forced to pay for many amenities I wasn't able to use due to my work schedule.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: A wonderful stay, the grounds are just amazing! You can wander all around, and it really is beautiful.  With the 3 pools, and one having a water slide, would be amazing to take kids too!  Stayed in one of the executive suites, an extremely nice room, probably a little larger than we needed, but very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I was in Newport Beach for work, and so enjoyed my time in the mornings and evenings. Sitting by one of the 3 pools, with wait service and really plush towels made my work trip feel like a vacation! It's a little hard to navigate without a rental car, but the rideshare services were convenient enough to get around.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Hyatt is normally a very friendly and accommodating chain. Not this location. This was a seedy motel in the middle of a Trump rally. I have never felt so unwanted.   The hotel has hidden daily parking and “Resort” fees that are not listed on the Hyatt app or website.   The valet lot is more expensive but right next to the property. The self park is about 250 yards of hills and blind corners away from the rooms. There is no established walkway and no street lights.   The rooms are disgusting. There is no sound insulation so you hear everything. There is water damage, exposed wiring, rusted fixtures, front doors that don’t close all the way, showers that scream, and mystery stains everywhere.   When we brought this to the attention of the manager, he just said that he was aware of
Manager Response: I am so very sorry that you had this experience at our hotel.  My understanding is that our General Manager connected with you directly to discuss, as he wanted to ensure that no one ever has to encounter this treatment again.  Inclusion, Diversity and Care are very important to us and sadly it is apparent that we failed in all aspects to provide you with any of these things.  Please know that following this review we did a refresher training with the entire team and utilized this feedback.  Again, my sincerest apologies that we failed to provide you with a better impression and experience during your stay at our hotel.

Summary: Good Value for a hotel near the beach. Great for a family vacation with 3 pools, golf, sand volleyball and bike rentals all on site. Very close to Fashion Island for shopping, eating out, Whole Foods and so much more.

Outstanding service and dedication from the staff.  Everyone made to feel very welcomed.  As a Globalist with Hyatt, you are treated with enthusiasm and gratitude.  I would always recommend to all the Hyatt Regency In Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for loyalty to Hyatt Hotels!  It is always a pleasure to have a Globalist member as our guest.  It is great to hear that you had such an outstanding customer service experience with our team.  We, like you, truly believe that our staff make staying at our hotel a great experience.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: A few years back we hosted our annual sales conference at this location. We decided to circle back around and host this years conference and it was a huge success. Everyone loved the meeting space, amenities and how close everything was to activities in Newport. The property is a ton of fun and a great place for business and fun.

My husband and adult children have just returned from Newport Beach.  Having read mixed reviews about this hotel we decided to give it a go and are so delighted that we did. The place is fab, the staff friendly and helpful and amenities just perfect for a family holiday.  If, like me, you are in two minds about booking this hotel due to the adverse reviews ignore them. Not sure what the one about the parking down the slope was all about.  I was expecting a trek and it was an incline to the reception.   Breakfast is really varied and delicious. Gym is full of the latest equipment with towels Golf course is perfect for family fun but probably not for the more serious players. Rooms are clean and you can borrow hair straighteners and the like and if you run out of toiletries all

Summary Heading: Decent, but hidden resort fees and unwelcomed entry by staff
Summary: They tack on resort fees ($27/day in my case).  You might be able to have those removed if you complain.  Also, they entered my room (left all lights on), even though I had the door tag hanging.    Other than those issues, the property is fine.  Very clean and comfortable.

The valet parking attendance were outstanding. They carted me to and from my car to retrieve some items I had left in it. They also drove me to the bike rental area to make sure I got a bike.  Always had a smile.

Fun place to stay with lovely grounds and 3 pools, we had a partial bay view (2nd floor Catalina Building). The food is nothing to write home about mediocre at best. Unfortunately the hotel was in the flight path of I presume John Wayne Airport the noise was horrible. We smelled cigarette smoke drifting into our room morning and night.

For the past 16 years we travelled to Newport beach for amazing weekends away from our hot desert temperatures.  Once in awhile we stay at the Hyatt. Because we booked with Expedia and get discounted prices Hyatt always gives us the lowest standards room next to their dog friendly rooms. This property quality overall has changed ever the years and it is a sad thing to watch.

We stayed a few nights for business, and then a few nights added on for fun. The property is very relaxed and pretty. Great pools, nice jacuzzis and great workout room. We stayed in a Pool View King, second floor in the BALBOA Building. This is an updated room; excellent quality King Size bed; nice bathroom and lovely view of the pool from a small balcony where we could sit and have morning coffee. Hallways and between room walls ARE thin. So I would strongly advise requesting second floor. I suspect some of the lower rated reviews were in other buildings, or on the ground floor with toddlers banging about. Also, ask for a non-connecting room; I could hear the guest next door's every word of his one-way cell phone calls at 7Am one day. They have lots of fun activities on the

I stay here a lot and it’s always a nice little getaway. From the pools to the food, I am always very please with my stay. I highly recommend the Lido Building if you want more privacy...it’s my favorite.

We travelled here for my wife’s birthday. The staff upgraded our room and made our one year old feel very special. Excellent customer service attentive staff nd beautiful grounds a really great experience.

Summary Heading: Relaxing break on a 6 stop tour of America
Summary: Perfect location to really get the most out of a beautiful area, from relaxing by the pool, to cycling around back bay, to walking to Balboa Island. Really is lots to do. Don’t let first impressions put you off although everywhere is spotlessly clean, friendly staff, great breakfasts and fun bar area. Can’t fault our stay. Thank you

When I checked in at World of Hyatt desk the lady asked me if I am a member of the Hyatt before she even asked me how are you doing or even greeting me.  she did check me in and asked me to wait for my room to be ready an hour to an hour and a half before the room get ready. She offered me access to the poolside.  later on I was lucky to have the Guest Experience Manager Miss, Julie Lacey who was very professional and great personality.  Who managed to have a room Ready for me in less than twenty minutes and offered complimentary breakfast as a Hyatt member guest.

Not much to say. There were bugs in our shower when we checked in. The bathroom doors were like wicker closet doors and provided zero privacy. Room did not have central AC, just a wall unit. Won't be staying there again.

From check in to check out this was a world class destination.   The facilities are great yes, the food immense etc. But what makes this place World Class is the way the staff made me and my family (2 kids aged 8 & 9) feel. In a word - special.   The whole trip the staff were immense and made us feel as welcome as we’ve been made to feel anywhere. (Perhaps our local pub the only exception). As with any world class team there are always a couple of superstars and for us they were Alisha (poolside) who made our children’s stay what it was with her care and attention and Rob our server in the evening. Nothing was too much trouble and he went above and beyond for us, a big thanks to you both.   Keep up the good work and we will be back.

This is a decent place to stay, but nothing special.  My room was comfortable with no frills, but without any major issues. The hotel overall needs a big overhaul. It's outdated, and doesn't feel like it should have a resort fee attached to it.  The room had a weird sliding door that was not easy to close and had gross marks all around it from everyone trying to slide it shut.  The artwork is also out of place for the hotel (but not the location) which gave the room a strange vibe. Otherwise it was perfectly comfortable.   The location is very convenient and I was able to walk to Balboa Island and take quick, cheap Ubers to Laguna Beach, Costa Mesa, Corona Del Mar, and Santa Ana.    The pools looked outdated and a bit grungy.  There's a lot of families, and it didn't seem to be

Summary Heading: Hyatt Regency Hotel in Newport Beach
Summary: Everyone at the Hyatt Regency Hotel in Newport Beach was terrific. From suggesting places to get our clothes pressed for the wedding to getting our hair styled and recommending great restaurants in the area. The staff was top notch. The staff made the trip that much more enjoyable.

Wonderful beach location and resort in Newport Beach.  Ammenities include pools, restaurant, bikes, excersize facilities, volleyball, and small golf course.  Pretty grounds well maintained.  Nice friendly staff.

I have made a review on this hotel before, as we keep coming back twice a year. But the latest one (on a Labor Day weekend) was our best stay so far... a big shoutout to Ana Rosales, a very professional and amiable Front Desk staff. She’s happy with her work I can tell, that’s why she can make guests happy as well with her close to perfect customer service. What I want to add to my previous review is that I really recommend this hotel. It’s a real vacation with all the amenities it offers, plus it’s so very close to Balboa Island and The Fashion Island Mall, with unlimited sight-seeing, dining and shopping...a real break from the daily grind.  It’s definitely worth your time and money 👍

Summary Heading: A Blast At the Newport Beach Hyatt Regency! :)
Summary: I had a very nice time at the hotel.  The staff were great -- very helpful and courteous.  The check-in was ok. I paid to check-in early but because I wanted a double bed rather than a queen, I was told I'd have to wait to check- in.  However, since I paid extra money to check in early, I declined the wait.  Having to wait was not the main issue...the main issue was that the check in clerk made the change to the room for a double bed before she explained to me that there would be an extended wait-time...so once I inquired why I had to wait until approximately 4pm to check in, then she explained why...and therefore I declined to wait and accepted the room that was available.  I was able to add an extra day to my trip and remain in the same room at a discounted rate which was

The Hyatt banquets team is the best and they deserve an award for best service!! They were super accommodating to all of our last minute request and never hesitated to make sure that our event look flawless. I could have not done it without them. Thank you Brittany, Luis, Jose and Monica! You made my event a very memorable one.

Summary Heading: Successful Birthday Celebration in Newport Beach
Summary: I was looking to find a resort hotel to celebrate my wife's birthday in the most special way. After booking the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach for 5 nights this past week, I spoke with multiple staff members (Mitchell, Michelle, and finally Helena) who at first were instrumental in assisting us in getting an upgrade us to the Executive Suite which had a nice king bed, pull out couch, large dining table, 2 medium-sized porches overlooking part of the par-3 golf course and extra room for seating. Unfortunately, I was told my wife's birthday was actually on Labor Day weekend and they at first could not do anything for us, but after re-checking with Zachary the front desk manager, who was extremely accommodating, he found us one of their 4 exclusive Villas for the last 2 nights, and

Love coming here and it is super  family friendly including our fur baby!! Love it here. The kids have so ouch to do and the bike riding is our fav !! There is games everywhere for the kids and the pools are so fun

Summary Heading: Business at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach
Summary: Very nice location; however, Professional business people may be challenged for peaceful conditions during summer travel. Significant noise late at night, children run the halls during the day making in-room work difficult.

Summary Heading: Don’t come here for the pools
Summary: The resort grounds were lovely and the room was very nice, where they serve food and beverages was over crowded and disgusting. There were large pileups if used towels on the floor and bags of food trash on the lounge chairs and the perimeter of the pool. The chaise cushions were stained with ketchup and who knows what else. Families bring their kids to enjoy the facilities which are nice, but the resort seemed understaffed and inattentive in maintaining the pool area clean. It was pretty gross. We downed our cocktails and left in 20 minutes.

Needs updating. Paint not completely finished. Grout old. Beds were double beds. Fridge was awkwardly placed in a cupboard that kept it hot.  No microwave. Horrible sofabed. Springs stick out extremely thin. Property is beautiful though. Just needs good cleaning and updating plus Queen BEDS, who sleeps in double beds?

Summary Heading: Third visit and still our favourite
Summary: This is still a great hotel after three visits.  We have stayed in many hotels on our US road trips and have yet to find another hotel which offers genuine service, wide range of amenities and value for money.  Mitchell arranged our room and suggested that we could have the small sofa made into a sofa bed.  This was completed within the hour (compared to our previous hotel where we had to ask for linen 3 times for the sofabed and make it up ourselves) This service is what has impressed us at the Hyatt Newport Beach.  There are 3 pools and  we have now moved away from the children's pool to a quieter pool, but noticed that they have added football tables and other games for children. There were always free sunbeds and good quality beach towels provided.    We never use valet

Very ignorant staff. Bellboys were ignorant and reluctant to help carry luggages.  There is no elevator and we had to carry our luggages up & down the stairs Parking is too far for self parking and it is not acceptable to pay additional fee for valet parking whereas the valet parking staff is already getting tipped Hotel and rooms are too old and walls are very thin. No insulation or sound proof thus all the talk in the next room is clearly heard Telephone in the room was not working People in the next room was partying with a lot of extra guests with loud noise, cursing words, music and drinks Hotel is far from the coast, shopping and leisure facilities; you need to drive to go to any of those, not a walking distance

We visit the Hyatt Newport yearly for birthday celebrations and they never disappoint.  The staff is   always friendly and the rooms and food were great! We enjoy the grounds and the games located throughout.  We played shuffleboard, chess, and golf.

This hotel is probably one of the best hotels we have stayed at, the hotel and grounds are simply fantastic, it has three pools a par 3 golf course and large grounds with restaurant outside and bars. The other great thing here are the staff, Mitchell in particular on the main desk was extremely helpful and informative regarding the area and where to go visit, you are only a 29 minute walk, or 10 cycle from balboa island another stunning sight to see,only knew about it because of the info from Mitchell. We played the par 3 course twice, my wife does not care too much for golf, but the views and wildlife around this small course was a truly stunning experience, to see those views with small wildlife running around your feet was breathtaking. We used the infinity pool and it was

Great hotel, great location, absolutely great customer service only negative is the hotel is a bit dated and can use a major renovation otherwise not much to complain about... breakfast is amazing and is an absolute must!

Summary Heading: Great Location. Rooms dated. Not clean.
Summary: Stayed here to be close to Laguna and Corona beaches. Outer areas are very nice. Service was good. Parking is a bit far.for $27 daily. Rooms are dated. Bathrooms not the cleanest. Will seek Grand Hyatt next time.

The Hyatt Newport Beach was a lovely surprise, not your typical Hyatt hotel.  The grounds and pools were beautiful. The staff were friendly and helpful, it was nice having the little store full of different things that you could purchase if you forgot to pack.  We look forward to returning.

The location of this resort was perfect for both my business purposes and the added in weekend leisure plans.  The amenities offered such as the fitness area, variety of pools, as well as the rental bikes and beach chairs are great.  The staff in all areas, restaurant, front desk, bar and housekeeping are beyond compare.

Summary Heading: Awesome customer service and very clean, nice rooms, reasonably priced
Summary: We had a great girl's weekend there and were spoiled by staff and thoroughly enjoyed our stay! I definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.  Also, because they had multiple pools families with kids or those wanting to avoid kids can all be happy!

The Hyatt Newport is a welcoming hotel in a fabulous location.  They cater to families, business associates, etc and their hospitality is commendable.  The rooms are spacious, sufficiently supplied with all the necessities and the staff is very responsive for guest needs.  Alwasy enjoy my stay at the Hyatt NB

There wasn't one thing about our stay that I can complain about where you wouldn't find the same at any other hotel chain. Sure you have to pay for parking and you can hear noise from outside in your room, but you will have to pay to park at any hotel to park your car nowadays unfortunately, and you'll always run into some inconsiderate guest who can be heard from the hallway (and also seems to be up very late coincidentally...).  But the things that can be controlled are done with excellence at this Hyatt. There are multiple pools that cater to everyone from Newlyweds and NeralyDeads to young families with children that scream with glee when any part of their body touches water. The rooms are spacious and very clean, the grounds are impeccable, and the staff is very friendly.

Exciting times call for excellent accommodations!  Hyatt Newport Beach was perfect for us as we traveled and settled in for our son's wedding week.  Family and friends joined us here which made our time extra special.  We enjoyed the amenities, service and friendliness of the staff.

Problems with the bed, not corrected, although promises were made. Maid service poor, food poor, room noise poor, parking situation expensive and poor. ADA access from parking lot non=existent. Overall a very disappointing experience.

This is a great resort for a weekend away from LA. Beautiful grounds with lots of quiet places to sit and relax and 3 pools. They even have an app that lets you order food and drink from the pool. Rooms were spacious and comfy and staff was very helpful. All around great experience.

Hotel was not up to standard the only good thing was the location which was right next to fashion island. Overall service was okay but slow and rooms where not cleaned properly at all. However, there was a stain on my “clean sheets” which looked like blood disgusting .

I enjoyed my stay here, my wife and I stayed here for 5 days for vacation. The room was nice and very clean. The food at the bar and the reasturant was very good. The pricing is right for the area. There is outdoor seating with fireplaces to relax at in the evening with bar service. I will stay here again!

Family fun with pool and water slide.  Good location and fun layout of hotel which feels a bit 1970s.  Hotel needs to sort out its sewage issue as there was often a smell in main lobby/bar/breakfast area.

Stayed here back in June/July for a short trip with my best friend. It was my first time in California and I was blown away! The valet staff were fantastic and very personable. Everyone who worked at the front desk were 10/10 - so helpful and engaging. They were also very accommodating with our request for a late check out as we had a red eye flight.  The pools were great, and the towels provided at the pool were quite comfortable (not always the case at other places I have stayed). The bar and seating areas around the property were also fantastic. Location is great! Easy drive to get groceries, and to fashion island. Quick uber rides around the area as well. Good proximity to the beach  They also have a great amenities list in case you forget anything  Can't wait to come back

Great stay with excellent customer service, safe, comfortable and friendly environment. My stay was business and provided a great location to meet and engage. I would highly recommend this site to multi-national companies to use for any conference and meeting space.

I left something really important in my room, the whole reason I went to California, and the Housekeeping supervisor, Chris, shipped it FedEx to me. I was incredibly impressed by that!!!! I can't wait to go back, just because of him! Thank you, Chris! You rock!

Particularly friendly and helpful staff. Several great pools, next level Villas for groups, and a bargin for this area. Slightly out of date rooms, but at least the bathrooms were updated: large, and had a fan (lots of hotels skip that one) Also- a great gym! (which is rare in ho)

Awesome hotel near Balboa Island. Great pools and staff. We had dinner at the hotel restaurant and it was delicious. Our suite was very spacious and clean. Lots of amenities. We brought bikes and rode to Balboa Island for a beautiful scenic morning after our stay at the hotel.

I was placed in the Balboa building since I requested an extra bed aside from the two queen beds. The extra bed was a love seat that pulled out into a twin bed. There was five people in our room. Overall It was a comfortable stay.

Hotel is lovely, wonderful staff (we mainly worked with Mitchell), lots of free amenities to take advantage of, and nearby locations are amazing. We would recommend to anyone, couples, families, businessmen and women etc.  The walk up from the self park is around 200m and is not a difficult walk up hill. We did it with suitcases without problem. A member of staff did offer to call someone down to help us and even apologised to us for not being able to help further (she had finished her shift!). If you've walked around Durham or anywhere in the UK with a few hills (or San Francisco!), you'll find it easy. No idea why people complain about it!

Summary Heading: Don’t get hung up on negative reviews
Summary: I was worried prior to staying as there are a lot of mixed reviews. I can say, honestly, this resort is excellent. Staff are brilliant, location is perfect, rooms spacious, clean and comfortable.  The only negative, and it is a big negative, is price. The hotel is expensive and then the self parking is over priced. What spoiled it for us was we stayed for 12 nights and for parking and resort fees added nearly $700! You would of expected a concession for staying that length of time.  We would go back though.. Suggest you request a room in the main building if you don’t want to feel like you are at a motel though

When I made this booking I was aware of additional resort fees but not the area fees and CA tourism assessment fee which are also charged per night... and parking. This increases the room rate by approximately £60 per night

We spent 4 nights here and enjoyed every minute of it. Very friendly staff and good service. The 9-hole golf course is lovely and fun to use, even with kids. The food and the drinks are very nice and it is the perfect location for weddings etc.
