For a Hyatt Regency, this is a very tired property. Average/claustrophobic rooms, particularly those around the pool area.  Dining options are limited.  We've stayed at this Hyatt a number of times in recents years, unfortunately the value has deteriorated markedly over time.

Friendly staff:very accommodating. Great view and nice amenities. My only struggle was that the beds were very hard and hurt our backs. So, we didn’t rest well. I would stay again-but ask for different rooms with different beds.

Enjoyed my stay here for 2-day business meeting.  Check-in efficient, friendly staff.  Food is ridiculously expensive for what you get.  See my posted picture for a $35 breakfast this morning.  But, place seems good for families that want to find a place for their kids to play with a pool.

Summary Heading: Another Great Weekend at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach
Summary: We have been staying at this beautiful resort hotel for 31 years (since 1988) and it has never disappointed us.  The grounds are beautiful, three pools to choose from, golf, bicycle rentals, volleyball and more.

Nice surprise - great service, comfy and updated accommodations, and remarkable food. Was there for a business meeting and will recommend this location for future team meetings. Not sure I’d make it a family trip destination, but GREAT for a work stay.
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you very much for your message. I appreciate all your kind feedback and am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time here with us. We look forward to having you stay again with us in the future! Please reach out any time for anything you may need.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Perfect resort for families. Beautiful and fun with so many amenities in a prime location. Service was superb also. Rooms, very nice. Exceeded expectations. Definitely will return. Made some awesome memories at this resort in Newport Beach.

Immensely enjoyed our one night stay here.  Our room was on the 3rd floor of the Catalina building which is adjacent to the lobby and hotel restaurant. With double queen beds, the room was very spacious and had a balcony overlooking one of the pools. The property is so charmingly beautiful and well maintained, we didn't want to leave. Decided to stay on property for the entire evening. We were pleased to find out we could sit on the patio outside and still be served food and drinks off the bar menu. We had a lovely relaxing evening.  Our family also enjoyed the pool (one of three pools actually) hot tub, lawn games and ping pong.  Self parking available for $27/night and is just a short walk away.  Fantastic hotel property! Would absolutely stay here again!  Location was great!

When we arrived at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach, we saw a familiar face at the front desk. We remembered Julie from the Hyatt Regency Huntington Beach from when we stayed there in May earlier this year. She was as sweet as can be, very helpful, and very professional when we met her before so we remembered her immediately as she made an excellent first impression. She did not disappoint this time either! This is our first time returning to this location in 22 years so we are not up to date with the restaurants and activities around Newport. Upon hearing this, she made sure to give us a list of places/restaurants that she thought we might like and even looked up the addresses so we wouldn't have to later. We truly appreciate all of the help she has given us both times we have

We come down to Newport Beach every year for the past 15 years and have stayed the last 7 years at the Hyatt Regency.  Friendly service, comfortable rooms, close to Fashion Island. 10 minutes from the Orange County Airport,

Since the hotel was a block of rooms reserved by our Team, we stayed here.  The grounds and pools are beautiful, lots to do in the evening..  although our time was consumed with games, so we were unable to fully enjoy it.  Therefore a little overpriced for us not being able to use the amenities. Food/Bar Service was good, clean rooms, a little outdated.  Friday night parking was a nightmare returning after 8pm, apparently a concert was going on.  However it all worked out.

Excellent location that is centrally located in Newport Beach.  Chris at the front desk demonstrated a high level of customer service.  Shor restaurant has great food with great service.  Nice property with great swimming pools.  Valet personnel are courteous and friendly. Highly recommended location.

This is an older hotel that has been well-kept and is in a nice area of Newport Beach. I'll be coming here again for more of an extended stay and can comment further about the place. I like what I experienced during the one day I stayed last week.

The hotel is an excellent location and all the ammenities were free.  It's close to a beach where you can ride a rented bike. The staff were more than friendly and helpful.  I had a wonderful 3 day weekend and look forward to going back again

The hotel was built sometime ago and it shows at some places.  The guest rooms could be more soundproof. The grounds seem very nice and relaxing.  I could not get an answer at the front desk to report some issues with the TV remote.  Once reported, the problem was fixed quickly. The front desk staff could be more welcoming.  Very matter of fact.

Summary Heading: Great staff, great location - room was ok
Summary: I had a conference in Anaheim, but decided to extend a few extra days elsewhere for a little r&r.  The location of the resort was convenient to everything.  A quick walk across the highway and the beach is fantastic. A quick drive and you can enjoy Fashion Island.  Even better, a quick drive to Balboa Island or Peninsula.  The staff was great - friendly, accommodating, and helpful.  The room was average.  There was a lot of noise heard from the pool area and general foot traffic down the hallway.  Also, the doors to the bathroom do not provide much privacy.

Excellent family vacation choice.  Kids enjoyed the swimming pool.  Cloase to Balboa Pier and many things to do around.  Hotel staff was great, service was great.  We had a really good time. Highly recommended.

Check in quick but staff pretty disinterested. Pools are nice - kids pool noisy but others very chilled.  Rooms fine but more like a motel. Beds comfortable. Overall standards at hotel not great - eg other guests left used crockery on floor outside their room and it wasn’t moved for 2 days. Whole hotel is a bit scruffy (not sure they ever sweep up or use a leaf blower) compared to Hyatts  in Europe. Restaurant, bar, parking etc all expensive. Breakfast is a rip off - if you’re 4 people plus a car add $120 a night for parking and breakfast (or go to Whole Foods 5 mins away). Free bike hire is great and well worth doing the 10 mile circuit round Back Bay nature reserve.

The hotel overall was nice and in a great area. I didn't like my room location it was on the first floor at the very back of the hotel  and it backed up to a downward slope with some bushes ... it was not a pleasant view but I guess it could have been worse?  I didn't stay long enough to take advantage of the amenities....but I believe they had some cool things they offered?

It was a Great trip with our grandson. He loved the pool area with the slide. He must have gone up and down the slide 200 times. Close to the ocean. Just a perfect location. The hotel was fantastic. Wouldn’t have changed a thing. Perfect

Gournda were beautiful and the hotel was close to Newport Beach. As mentioned by others, there were $497 worth of charges on my account that were not accurate. We did not have access to that money on our vacation. People make mistakes but there was no urgency or empathy from the staff. Very poor customer service. This definitely added stress to our 4th of July holiday. Have always loved staying at Hyatt hotels but this was the worst experience with a Hyatt I have had thus far.

Front desk service was very poor.  The other services were good and the location was very nice. If i hadn't had such poor check in/check out service i would recommend your facility to others.  but i still don't have the billing rectified.  Very frustrating.

Staff is very friendly and helpful, rooms are comfortable and clean, the layout is such that you feel like you’re truly away from it all. Great running path on Back Bay, bike rentals fun to take to Balboa.

Beautiful landscaping throughout.  Loved the layout and finishes of my room and bathroom.  We were near the pool with the waterslide - gorgeous landscaping and spent a lot of time around the nearby firepit.  Close to the beach and many restaurants.

We had a large clean room with a patio ( nice and quiet).   Our grandson loved the pool and slide area.  The grounds are well kept and plenty of activities to do; shuffleboard, corn hole, ping pong, volleyball golf, and swimming.  Close to the beach too!

Been going to this hotel for years. Great location in Newport Beach that offers 3 pools, fantstic restaurant, pool side service and friendly staff.  I wil continue returning for years to come for both business and pleasure.

The Hyatt really provided everything we needed and went above and beyond what we expected as far as ammenities. They provide beach chairs and towels, golf if you like every day, and a beautiful atmosphere.  Great time!

Summary Heading: Amazing Stay at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach
Summary: My family and I stayed at this facility in July of 2019.  We were very impressed with the facility and all of the activities that were available.  There was so much to do, that we couldn't fit it all in.  I couldn't believe what we got for the price we paid.  We will definitely be back!

My Texas family booked here after three days at the Disneyland Resort.  It was the perfect 2nd half of our vacation. With 4 nights, we still didn’t have enough time to do all that we wanted.  My family was aged from 72 to 9.  We had a villa that was perfect.  We will be coming back for sure!

Summary Heading: Over priced and a compete disappointment
Summary: At check in, they put us in a building and room that were disgusting.  They should be ashamed they even offer those rooms and that building. They were old and not kept up.  Had to ask to switch rooms.  The pictures on the websites were completely misleading.  Don’t waste your money.

I liked this hotel for its location. Near the beach and Balboa Island. Has a great shopping mall within walking distance. Now for the bad, this hotel does not have double queens for accommodations, only King or doubles. This makes it really challenging when traveling with family. The only solution is to get 2 adjoining rooms, which is costly. I played the “golf course” which is a little larger than a miniature golf course. The greens were terrible and the holes had tree obstructions from the green. The course needs a significant overhaul. The tennis courts were nice and the pools were nice. The overall impression of this hotel is that the landscaping is well maintained. The bed was comfortable, but the sheets were torn. The shower was made for a short person and had cracked

We held our family reunion at this resort. Everyone had a great time! Hyatt Regency Resort offered lots of amenities for adults & kids. Staff was friendly and accommodating. All guest rooms were updated & clean. Hotel location was close to beach, shopping and many restaurants.

Love this hotel! The rooms are clean and inviting, the pools are relaxing and the location is excellent.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  There a nice little golf course, bikes for use and other fantastic ammenities at this hotel.  I always look forward to my stays at this Hyatt resort.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach . More like a resort than a city hotel. Expansive grounds and landscaping throughout the property with low rise buildings and three beautiful swimming pools .also 9 hole golf course and tennis courts. Food at the restaurant is outstanding. Hotel services are attentive and very friendly. We look forward to a return visit soon.

Fantastic pool with a slide for kids. Lots of family activities to do. They go the extra to make kids feel welcome. We will definitely go back. Walking distance to the Dunes where they have a waveless beach.

Really love this hotel.  Very family friendly.  However, not very environmentally friendly.  Beware that if you order room service everything will arrive in disposable plastic containers inside a paper bag.  Not appetizing and definitely not environmental.

the grounds are well kept and the pools are large and fun for the family. great food and great staff and not as expensive as other bech resorts. we had loud neighbors with crying kids but otherwise wonderful visit.

I decided on this hotel to enjoy the Dunes fireworks and tennis next door at Palisades.  Its been many years since I've visited Palisades and was shocked to see how old and run-down it became especially for a private club. I was also surprsied to see how aged the hotel has become.   I hope there are plans in the near future to bring both properties up to date.

Absolutely marvelous! The gym was great and we enjoyed the Peloton bike experience. To have three pool areas with different focus is clever and added to our positive view of the hotel. Being able to borrow bikes was a huge plus and made it easy to explore the area.  Would love to come back!

Summary Heading: Very nice stay in a comfortable room
Summary: It's been years since I've stayed here and they've made lots of upgrades. We had to wait a short time to check in, but they sent a text to me when the room was ready. The room was clean and quiet and nicely decorated.

What a gorgeous hotel.  The grounds and pools were well kept.  Everything seemed so clean and manicured.  The staff were friendly, helpful and professional.  Looking forward to our visit there next year for the 4th.  Added bonus was the fantastic fireworks show put on by Newport Dunes below the hotel.

Will always stay at this hotel.  The staff, the grounds and the view from our balcony was GREAT.  The 4th of July fireworks were FABULOUS!!  Hoping to convince my high school reunion group to pick this hotel - next reunion in 2021. 50th was as the Regency in Long Beach and it was TERRIBLE.

Summary Heading: Good resort for family with many kids, and parents who loves golf
Summary: It has fun pool and golf so many kids love this place but it makes hotel quite noisy. The hotel has no regency club so simple breakfast is served in restaurant. Overall, hotel is beautiful and located not far from harbor and islands (20-30min walk) and gardens are well maintained. But it is too crowded in summer and under staffed. The rooms are one size only, relatively small compared with newer Hyatt regency elsewhere, not as good as you usually expected from Hyatt regency resort.

Very annoying how we had to sit inside the restaurant and not be able to order from the bar menu because we had a baby and couldn't sit in the bar area or outside because the weather was to cool for the baby. Highly disappointed in this. Also, paying for parking is basically just stealing money for no reason, where else could we park with a BABY & all the hundreds of things that come with taking a baby on vacation? AC wouldn't work, slept in a hot room all night, and we could hear EVERYTHING going on in the rooms/halls.

The grounds and outdoor space was very beautiful, well planned and easy to enjoy.  The restaurant was a very pleasant environment, open to the rest of the property and had delicious food.  We would stay here again.

Hotel amenities are nice, mattress was poor, walls are paper thin. Not worth the over $400 we shelled out for the room. Do not stay in the Bay building if you are looking for a nice quiet comfortable evening.

I love this hotel. The grounds are so beautiful and they offer so many activities for children. Plus the food was awesome! We will be back.  Only negative was the beds are a little small for 2 adults. Other than that, great hotel.

Really enjoyed our stay here, very reasonably priced. Great lobby with amazing outdoor seating for a glass of wine in the evening.  This resort is close to the shopping and balboa island.  Didnt try to the restaurants but they looked very god.

Amazing location! Great views, plush rooms. All staff were very pleasant and accommodating.  4 Stars because lots of stairs to get to rooms with still more walking to get to your actual room,  problem for anyone not able to tolerate the workout to your room...

I like to stay in the Balboa Rooms, and walk out right to the Salt Water Pool.   The staff and service is always amazing, and ate at the The Restaurant Shor for the first time and it was amazing.  I have been here multiple times and I always have an amazing stay.

Stayed with my wife for a quick night on our way to Oceanside. Great property, rooms and fitness center. Wasn't too happy when I got the bill though. I expect taxes and fees but almost $60 in resort and parking fees would have been nice to know upon booking or at least check in.

Summary Heading: FIRE IN THE BATHROOM. STAFF COULD CARE LESS :-((
Summary: Fire in our bathroom. Notified front desk. Sent maintenance up. Disconnected lights. We were never offered another room. We were never contacted by staff, namely the Manager! Disappointing! Not returning

I stay here for business and conferences. Great venue is exceptiona land the staff are helpful and friendly . The grounds are meticulous and the rooms are clean. The gym provides enough equipment for most needs and pools are all beautiful.   The SHOR tops most other hotel restraunts.

Location of the property is great. Overall ambience is superb. Staff was very polite and treated us as valued customers. We enjoyed the strolls around the property. Even in June, for some reason when we were there, it was only in 60s. In the late evenings, it was a bit chilly and we felt outside hot tube would have been great.

The resort was a lovely, relaxing place to stay. The grounds were beautiful and the staff was very friendly. Our room was very clean and centrally located. I would caution people booking rooms to request to stay in the new parts of the hotel as certain older areas appeared more "motel-like" and showed signs of aging.

Summary Heading: Newport Hyatt is a great location
Summary: Accommodations were nice and grounds well maintained.  The conference I attended had a nice layout for accessibility and networking.  A number of nice restaurants are within walking distance.   networking.

Summary Heading: Lovely property; Bay beach access walking distance
Summary: The property is very well maintained; the rooms were nice and well-maintained.  The self-parking is a little far, but in nice weather, it was a good walk.  The pools are very nice, and near each building there is one.  The food the hotel catered for the conference I attended was very good.  There is a beach on the back bay across the street from the self-parking lot, and the Newport Pier and oceanside beaches are not too far either.

I attended a conference and stayed at the Hyatt for 2 nights, 3 days.  The hotel staff were friendy and attentive.  The rooms were quiet and clean and the grounds were well maintained.  I would recommend this hotel for business or vacation.

The grounds and surroundings are extraordinary and well maintained. The staff really goes out of their way to accomodate your every need and they really make everyone feel important. This carries over to the guests, because everyone seemed really relaxed and not in a rush

We rented a cabana here for the day booked on Resort pass.  It was great. Right when parked in the self parking a worker in a golf cart comes up and gives us a ride to the lobby to get out key for the pool. We had 3 little ones with us so they were thrilled.  The concierge was very nice, the pool attendants and wait staff were excellent.  The pool was slightly heated for the kids. They had a slide, ping pong table, mini golf, hot tub, corn hole, and fooze ball.  It was a great day.

2nd time staying at the hotel. All around good family hotel. 3 pools, pitch and putt golf course, and free bike rental. Close to fashion island and excellent surfing beaches. Only downers are being charged for parking and aircraft noise from Orange County airport. Other than that I would highly recommend this hotel to any family visiting Orange County

Summary Heading: Pools good but room not worth it
Summary: The rooms were dingy and reeked of bleach for a day after arrival. Carpet was wet and bug found daily in room. Lighting is dim. We could hear every footstep above us at night. Pools were beautiful and kids enjoyed them. The gym was pretty good too. Service was ok.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay (especially if you're never been to SoCal)
Summary: Beautiful hotel, easy location to get to, close to everything, friendly staff. On-line check-in was available and I received notifications that my room was ready. Room was small but adequate enough for one night and for my family of four (two were kids). I feel it would just be tight with four adults.

We did not get the experience expected - hotel is somewhat refurbished, but still feels 'old'.  staff we nice, but experienced constant problems.  Was not 'beachfront' as described in the booking tool - there was a waterway and a beach of sorts, but definitely not what one thinks of as 'beachfront'.  A reasonable walk got us to Balboa Island/beach which was nice.

We used our free night for a stay at the Newport Location. Once we checked in we tried to nap due to the long drive and the maid knocked & walked in insisting she left her cell phone in our room. I told her several times there was no phone in the room so she left & immediately started calling the room! Parking garage access was a pain because our room keys would not activate the sensor to open the gate. We even had the front desk rekey the cards and they still didn’t work. Location was nice, but the hotel was a little dated.

This hotel is wonderful. We love that the staff, the food, and the grounds are amazing! You don’t even have to leave the hotel if you don’t want to because there are plenty of places to walk around, to golf, to ride bikes, to eat (The Shor Restaurant is so dang good), to socialize, to work out, and to swim. If you do feel like leaving, their shuttle will take you to Balboa, Fashion Island, or to John Wayne Airport. The staff is amazing and friendly, and helpful. Just a great hotel at a great value.

Summary Heading: As always Hyatt Regency stay was awesome thanks again
Summary: We recommend come here at least 2-3 times and always enjoy ourselves. Great staff, services, clean facilities. This place is located close to shopping eating . Its paradise away from home. The pool area for the kids is one of the best, lounge great for drinks and snacks

Stayed four nights at this hotel, good location not far from Balboa island and Fashion island. Great facilities, golf, tennis and gym. Three pools, one outside the back of the main entrance which was busy with slide and more suitable to families, two quiet pools surrounded by two storey rooms. Must say with regard to the pools it would be good if the staff stopped dogs being brought into these areas. It does say on the entrance gate no food, drinks or PETS!! Room large, comfortable bed and decent bathroom with bath and shower. Fridge and tea/coffee making facility. There is one really annoying thing with this hotel and that's the parking which for self parking is quite a distance from the reception area and even further to accommodation. For this facility there is a charge of

Our trip was centered around a surprise birthday party. I have stayed at the Hyatt many times and recommended family staying at Hyatt, great location, property well taken care of, great staff. Excellent food in bar and service.

I been to better hotels with better rooms and not being treated properly at. heck out. Not happy. will never stay at this hotel ever again. We were lied too and treated poorly. Be careful buying from hotwire. They treat you like scum.

June 14th-16th Bay view room 3rd floor.  Arrived at the hotel to find quite a line of cars in the small drive. We sat in line for about 5 minutes.  When we finally pulled up the bellman asked if we were checking in and if we wanted the to have the valet park the car. We said yes to check-in and no to the valet. His friendly attitude changed and then wanted us to Self-Park first before we checked in(which is quite a distance from the lobby) and didn’t want to help us with our luggage. We insisted on help first and he seemed bothered but did help load a cart for us.   Check-in was good and the staff was friendly.   The Room: Beautiful view of the bay and lovely sunsets.  Mini fridge and coffee maker Nice shower/tub No Microwave  Very Noisy: you can hear ALL the neighbors in their

I only stayed one night due to attending a one night event on their grounds.  It was an easy check in and out.  The grounds are well manicured and the staff and employees were friendly.  The hotel is close to a shopping center, yet secluded enough to not hear the hustle and bustle.

Summary Heading: Disappointing, website made the hotel look nicer
Summary: This hotel is in desperate need of a renovation. Although the hotel did do a soft goods update recently, everything appeared to be tired. The furniture in my room was tired; the  bathroom door had dents in it. I wasn't a fan of the "motel" style buildings. The pictures on the website make this hotel look so much nicer than it is. Also, I could hear the toilet flushing in a room next door above me. I heard a lot of noises in the room next door as well.  The front desk got confused on my reservation, which is totally fine but I would have liked an apology. They needed to work on their customer service.  The restaurant and outdoor space is very nice and the hotel has great amenities. It just needs to be modernized and brought up to Newport standards.

Summary Heading: Be sure to add resort fee $27 AND parking $27 when looking at total cost
Summary: The hotel is nice, but for just an overnight stay it was more than we needed. You pay for the 'extras' with a $27 resort fee AND you have to pay an additional $27 for parking (there are no other options). I thought the resort fee included parking so I was surprised by the extra charge ... wanted to be sure others knew.

Every person we interacted with from the valet to the cleaners were brilliant, all super friendly and very helpful. Our room was upgraded for some Unknown reason and it’s was fantastic!! 50” tv which was easily linked to Netflix, which is a nice touch. Air con is super cold and water In shower was super hot and room was immaculate. Lots of things to do like shuffle board, large chess and volleyball, gym, golf etc I can see why people stay at the Hyatt regency as it’s a great experience

Everything over priced. No free coffee in the lobby and Starbucks not open until 6am and over priced. Gust services was rude. Restaurant very expensive and food is average, small portions. Rooms are clean but mine was noisy as the pool was close to it.

We absolutely love staying at this location because of all the amenities. Staff is super friendly. Only reason for the three stars is the airplane noise, very annoying at 7am in the morning. Otherwise this is the wonderful place to stay

Very nice looking hotel with decent rooms.  Compared to all other rooms on our trip, this was by far the smallest.  Unfortunately the rooms are not sound proof.  Feels like you are sleeping on a runway. Beware you won’t be able to sleep in.

Hotel was nice as usual.  Staff were friendly.   The self parking and people driving back and forth is extremely dangerous especially for children.  There should be a designated walk area.  I get that the hotel is old but the noise above our suite was horrible.  Had to complain and it still continues.  Very loud

The staff was very friendly and the check in was very fast and easy. The location was great and the outdoor area was exceptional. The room was very clean and the whole stay it was very quiet and very comfortable. my whole experience and food was exceptional.

Found someone else's pubic hair in my bed when I checked into my hotel room, the restaurant service is terrible. We wanted OJ for breakfast only to be told they were out. One minute later the table next to us got a fresh order of OJ, This place is a joke

The room service food was horrible and the wait at the bar when I ordered one cheese quesadilla was over 30 minutes. The staff made it a point to tell me several times that I was not allowed to use the amenities at the hotel because I was getting a $10 discount on my room by booking with my company's convention package. Horrible food service, very expensive and was served on very cheap paper plate and cheap plastic fork.  My  pillow was dirty with another woman's makeup.  I wrote a detailed complaint letter and left my name and contact information. I requested a response back and still have not heard anything. I am continuously getting Hyatt Regency Newport Beach advertisements even though I have "unsubscribed" twice. The PR department needs to be more proactive. I will not be

I am surprised Hyatt runs this property. The rooms in the Bay section feel like--and look like--the rooms in a motel. The exterior doors desperately needed to be painted. The interior felt damp and looked depressing. The hallways were not especially clean. The hotel is situated under a flight path and planes are quite audible from early in the morning until fairly late at night. The beds were OK and so was the air conditioning. Otherwise, I can't think of anything positive to say about it.

The rooms were nice. The food at restaurant and bar was good.. Jazz festival at hotel was great.. Everything came out right. Would definitely stay here again next year. Perfect getaway hotel also.....

Summary Heading: You can see the ocean from atleast one section.  The interior feels old.
Summary: You can see the ocean from atleast one section.  The property smells old.  The staff were very helpful and present.  The responded quickly to our request.  The food was pricey.  I had a salad with organic green; it was delicious.

Beautiful hotel.  Friendly, courteous & professional staff.  Clean room. Comfortable bed.  Great selection of in-room movies.  Great festival weekend.  Various artists.  Lots of vendors.  Friendly crowd.  Lots of fun!

The staff here, from room staff, front desk, bellman, valet parking attendant and concierge was very accommodating, especially with the Festival that was going on this past weekend. Shelley Callahan, awesome

Everything from the well manicured grounds to the crisply clean room was great. Attended the Newport Beach Jazz Festival at the Hyatt and the lineup and performers were super. Customer service was excellent, at every restaurant and the Festival grounds.

This is a very nice property with beautiful grounds. The look of the hotel room buildings looks a little old style. But again the grounds are beautiful. Lots of weddings going on while we were there, many different options for weddings and parties.  The Bar and lounge/library area is very nice, we enjoyed the out of doors area bar/lounge.  Bar menu just ok, nothing really special. The restaurant on the property is nice (SHOR) but the food was either over seasoned or under seasoned, meat was tough.  I would recommend it, if you did not want to leave the property for dinner, but there are many options for eating at the beach and the concierge has a wonderful list of great restaurants in the area. 3 pools all with a different look and feel, some more kid friendly than others maybe

Summary Heading: Great Property - Great Restaurant - Will definitely stay here again soon !
Summary: Great Property - Great Restaurant - Will definitely stay here again soon !  Rooms were clean - next day room refresh was timed perfectly !  I ate at the Restaurant twice and both meals were fantastic.  Very Satisfied

This property needs the Discovery channel hotel renovation show stat.  Popcorn ceilings, paper thin walls and it's amazingly embarrassing that this property is considered a Hyatt.  The grounds are amazing, but if the property took the same level of pride in the rooms as they do with the grounds upkeep, it could be a great property.  Keep in mind this property is in the flight path of SNA.

The staff at the Hyatt go above and beyond to make your stay as comfortable and convenient as possible. The grounds at the Hyatt Newport were so beautiful. Our room had a balcony that overlooked the bay which completed the ambiance.

Large property with many activities (3 pools large chest shuffleboard) to entertain kids and adults. It was the start of the summer programs (smores out door movies) we did not have time for any of them but they liked good. The 3 pools are great one pool with water slide small but fun and 2 more adult quite pools. The property is older the room we had was not bad had ac. Near the beach so we just had the slider open for air. Self park is a little bit of a walk. The 27 for parking and 27 for resort fee were a little high. Next to the mall in New Port with good food options. I would stay again but the price would have to be right.

My only tip is: this property is in dire need of a renovation. The ceilings in the rooms are popcorn which usually means they're made of asbestos, that's incredibly unhealty and is quite surprising this type of material even exists anywhere in the state of California due to their strict health and environment laws.

Everyone very helpful, grounds were beautiful. Walked the grounds a number of times and every staff member was friendly and courteous. All questions were answered and suggestions taken. Not disappointed

Summary Heading: Not impressed for the price I paid !
Summary: Didn’t like it ! For the price I paid ! Very old fashioned looking !!  I was here to celebrate my child’s birthday and I was not impressed at all the beds if it were very small and I can hear the foot traffic from the top floor I stayed in the second-floor very noisy at night !  I would not stay here agin ! Until they upgrade, didn’t like it at all !

This place was disgusting to say the least, I uploaded photos on to YELP, as they cannot be uploaded here. I am so displeased with my stay. The sheets, bedding, blinds, tub were all disgusting. Walls are paper thin, you can hear airplanes at all hours of the day/night, the ac kept going out so we had to turn it off and on all night, there are NO elevators up to your room so prepare to lug all of your own luggage up and down the flight of stairs as people try to push past you. It was MISERABLE. Also, they claim to have many food options on-site but they all have the same exact menu- from room service to the lounge to the restaurant. This is the worst Hyatt I have EVER stayed at. The outside was beautiful- too bad they take no pride in their rooms and only in the grounds/course

They have so much to do: free golf on a 9 hole par 3 course for guests, volleyball, horse shoes, shuffleboard, chess, pool with a slide and it's dog friendly! Everything all in one place! Definitely recommend!

Summary Heading: Great family vacation with luxury amenities
Summary: Our family of four had a great family vacation at the hotel. Hotel had all the luxury amenities the adults would want and they went above and beyond to make sure the kids had plenty to do with the waterslide, games and movie night.

We wanted a cheap weekend away without spending a lot on extra things to do. This resort had so many fun things to do at the resort. Horseshoes, volleyball, shuffleboard, and the par 3 golf course that is free when you stay there. We golfed 6 times while we were there. So much fun and only spent money on food. Close to Balboa Island (we walked to it), walked to the beach, and went to fashion Island for dinners. Great family getaway!!

This was a great place to stay  for our family.  My kids loved all the outside games they had, life size chess, shuffle board, foosball,  and ping pong.  My kids loved the pools and water slide.  The staff was very attentive to our needs and continued to check in with us.  The location is great and easy access to the beach and bay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  Ana Rosales

Summary Heading: What you would expect for the price of accommodation
Summary: Trip was for a conference held at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. The room was perfectly cleaned on a daily basis, only coffee mashine wasn't functioning properly. Loved hanging out at the pool post conference!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  Ana Rosales

Summary: I have stayed at this property many times in the past. The hotel has become dated and it was not clean. It is a great location and I was extremely disappointed. This property needs to be updated/rennovated and a change in management.

Summary Heading: Relaxed. Understated elegance and comfort. Friendly, professional staff.
Summary: I enjoyed the people who work here. The hotel is great but they are the ones who made my visit. Food and wine are quite good, and for a hotel of this caliber and location are reasonably priced. For those like me without a car, Balboa Island is a 20-minute walk away.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel in a super location
Summary: Beautiful location, well manicured grounds, excellent bar and restaurant service. Lovely rooms with patios or balcony. Multiple pools and extensive walking path opportunities. Can’t go wrong for a Newport Beach location.

Dennis was amazing with getting a nice room for our honeymoon. Majority of the staff we interacted with were hospitable and friendly. Lovely location with lots to do on property that you really don't have to leave!

The catering for the conference I attended exceeded my expectations. The grounds are beautiful and well maintained. Check in and check out was a breeze by email. The rooms could use a big update and potentially some softer sheets. Only one issue- shower handle broke off, but they fixed it within 10 minutes by replacing it with a new one.

Summary Heading: Great staff and Great conference food.
Summary: The staff at check-in were kind and efficient. The conference food for the weekend was very good . The environment is beautiful. The sheets on the bed were my only complaint ... too stiff made them unpleasant. The beds and pillows with nice.

Summary Heading: Great property to rest and relax, or for business like it was for me
Summary: It is a lovely property, lovated in a very quiet área with great options to go out and hike. There is a lovely trail that starts behind the hotel and goes to the mountains, great to take a stroll or a quick run.

Summary Heading: Popcorn ceilings, musty smell, not sure why this is rated 4 stars everywhere
Summary: This hotel is fine, good for groups/families. Be sure to request a room in the main building or towards the front of the resort - the back building is gross and feels like a motel. Even rooms towards the front/main area smell musty and aren't up to normal Hyatt standard. Slight room updates are the saving grace but I hate popcorn ceilings so much. Pool cushions are dirty but grounds are well maintained. Food at the bar was bad, staff was helpful however. Had a scary incident when using the self-park - 2 men came up to my car who were clearly messed up. I told the front desk receptionist and never heard about it again.

Absolutely great establishment! Rooms are comfortable and clean, super great amenities and amazing and friendly staff! Would highly recommend to anyone in the area looking for a vacation or a getaway.

Beautiful hotel and grounds. Greeted by very friendly, accommodating, and professional staff. Clean safe and a little need to leave the resort. In my opinion, this is my favorite place to stay in Newport Beach
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Took my family on a stay cay about a hour away from home. From my arrival to the very end was a pleasant experience.Brendan Turner helped and guided us through our weekend full of surprises. I wanted To do something special for my girlfriend the mother of my child and Mother’s Day weekend was it. Brendan Turner accommodated rose petals , candles and a beautiful room for our stay, can not thank him enough and his team for our wonderful experience.  I will Definitely be back this summer and future stay cays. Thank you !
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We will be sure to share your kind words with Brendan. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Experience was quite pleasant and the staff was very accommodating, especially housekeeper Norma who maintained our guest room. The gym being open 24 hours was an added bonus and the closeness of the shopping centers and nearby restaurants was also very accommodating for some dinner nights away from the conference site.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We will be sure to share your kind words with Norma. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Decent Hotel, but in the noisy flight path for John Wayne Airport
Summary: The hotel and amenities were decent. There was a time I walked into the bathroom by the pool, and it smelled like cigarettes as if people were smoking in there.   This hotel is in the nearby flight path for John Wayne airport, and their windows/walls don't reduce the sound that much. Sleep was interrupted due to jets taking off every couple of minutes.

Gather your friends and enjoy the Hyatt Regency Newport.  Beautiful surroundings and friendly staff! Lots to do with Fashion Island close by as well as Balboa Island and Laguna Beach!Summer brings a series of concerts to enjoy. So you know I will be back with my posse of girlfriends!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: This hotel is in a great location. Staff is awesome and this is the first hotel that your “resort fees” actually pays for worthwhile like golfing, bicycle rentals. The staff are eager to please and never said “no”. The exterior of the buildings really need updating as (the Lido building) has all the ambiance of a roadside motel. Rooms facing the back bay can be noisy from the concerts. The hotel, grounds and rooms are clean. Would I recommend—absolutely!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: This property was a blast from the past but not in a good way.  Very early 1980's, old sidewalks, and all paths crossed the main entry.  Rooms updated, but bare minimum.  Bedding minimal, we had to ask for a blanket.  No robes, and the tiniest shampoos I have seen anywhere.   Lots of road noise.   Food at our conference was "old folks home" themed.  Depressing meeting rooms.   There must be a story here, who'd imagine that a Hyatt (Regency??) in NB could be so dowdy!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Large resort with a retro boutique hotel feel
Summary: This hotel offers something for everyone -- golf, tennis, water sports, multiple pools, a great exercise room and a variety of dining options from casual breakfast bar that converts to a full bar, and plenty of comfortable outdoor living areas.  Rooms could have better amenities (a la Kimpton Canary), but beds are comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: Attended conference, then stayed over for vacation.  Beautiful hotel with serene, relaxing environment.  Staff friendly and helpful - took time to answer questions and offer assistance.  Food was excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: I was speaking at a conference here over the past weekend(May 4th & 5th).  I was booked for two nights and the hotel was so poorly maintained that I canceled the second night and stayed at much nicer hotel down the street.    I don't know where to start with how bad this property is.  First off, the hotel lobby has white chairs that are so old, they have black stains covering the seat cushions.    When we got to the room, where the carpet and the hard surface flooring meet had tons of carpet threads two and three inches long sticking up.  The headboard had dark stains on it and the desk/dresser looked to be from the 1990s.  You can see that they did a small renovation to the room(we stayed in the Lido building) but was cheaply done and only highlights how the owner isn't
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Terrible motel vibe room with old AC unit that kept me up all night turning on and shutting off. Old janky window would not stay open for fresh breeze. Only window looks out onto catwalk so had to select privacy or natural light. Poorly laid out bathroom area with oversized useless seating area and cramped, dark toilet and shower area. Property boasts a recent multimillion dollar renovation on marketing materials and even on their in-house television station, but someone must have forgotten to focus on the rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Would have liked a bar at one of teh pools for self service, wait person not always available. Pool restrooms were not ID'd, was walking through lobby to use restroom. Valet staff was very nice and helpful.

Larger groups arrived and they down graded my room upon check in and it was our 22 anniversary. I had our room booked well over a month in advance. What a way to celebrate and travel over 300 miles to be told you get 2 doubles
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We would love to review your reservation to see why this may have happened. I can guarantee you we did not intentionally downgrade you on your anniversary. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: The premises and personnel are great. I was surprised, but very pleased with the fast response to every inquiry. The gardens and pools were clean and inviting all the time. I stayed at one of their villas, which was very relaxing and enjoyable; having a private pool made a big difference.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The property was nice and relaxing, I appreciated the customer service job. I didnt get great vibes from the bartender, he seemed to be overwhelmed or something. But I would definitely use this hotel for future trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The Hyatt was a lovely hotel with friendly staff. My mom was turning 80 the next day and they made her a delicious Panna Cotta and an Irish coffee. The staff made us feel very welcome and special even though it was late and our order was very small. I would come back in a heartbeat!!
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating with us! We appreciate the great review of our hotel! It was our pleasure to make your mother's birthday special. We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Didn't like the room. It was outdated and air conditioner in the room was loud. Room has no insulation so we could hear conversation from outside our door. Cottage Cheese ceilings and blankets were very loud. I would not recommend this hotel to our friends or family. Even though their video said they just renovated all the rooms, I don't see what they did. Maybe it was the floor and bathroom,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: I recommend any human being who cares about rest and sleep, please do not book this hotel. Everyday at 830 am, the gardener begins to mow the grass for almost 2 hours straight. The windows are old and thus there are no effective sound insulation. The walls and the door are also very thin and old - you will hear when the door closes down the hallway.  What is even worse is when I tried to bring this to the attention of the staff, I was simply told that no one ever complaints about this problem for the six years the staff had been working there.  The staff are unfriendly, the hotel is poor. I suggest to book other hotels that deserve your money.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I apologize that you were misinformed by our staff, we would have gladly called the landscapers to move to another area of the hotel if they were disturbing your sleep. With 26 acres of property, we have plenty of areas to tend to and could have easily moved to another area. I have forwarded your experience to our front office managers to use as a training opportunity for our staff.  We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel not walkable to anything
Summary: The hotel is spread out and grounds are Disney like.  The rooms are a bit dated but very clean and comfortable, bathroom a bit small. Remote was not working. Food at Shor was good and reasonably priced, friendly staff. The parking lot was quite a ways from our room, which was back from the reception area, but there were 3 pools, one near us with hot tub, very quite and nice. Chug to parking was a bit more than most hotels and you really had to drive everywhere, not near anything.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: We had some trouble with our pool cabana as well as related food service issues. However, due to the great caring concern and customer service of KARRIN, and RUBEN VALDOVINOS, everything was made right, and we deeply enjoyed ourselves. CHARMAINE at the front desk was also fabulous. We will definitely be back for another great staycation.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We will be sure to share your great comments with Karin, Ruben, and Charmaine. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Hyatt is the place to stay
Summary: Great customer service and awesome location. Tons of amenities for couples or family.  Staff was extremely friendly and very helpful. The facility is inviting and very clean, food and drinks were on point too.  I would recommend this hotel to all.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Location location location! You are within walking distance of Balboa Island and from there you can take the fairy to the beach. Most of the hotels common areas are lovely and tropical and the service is good. I would recommend reserving a room with a balcony as these are the better rooms (especially the bay view) .
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The facility was beautiful! However, I was unhappy about being charged a $27 resort fee when I stayed less than 10 hours and had NO opportunity to use any of the amenities. Essentially, I spent the night there after a business meeting and left early the next morning. I asked the receptionist to remove the $27 fee and she said she would - but when I got the invoice via email a few hours later, the fee was still charged. That seemed a little disingenuous.

This is a rather large resort with three separate pools and a fair number of amenities, but it certainly didn't wow me.  Pros: Lots of space, very large with a lot of outdoor areas, good meeting and conference spaces. Several pools including a kid one with a water slide that will be a hit with little guys. Room is about what you would expect....clean, has a fridge and appropriate toiletries, needs updating  Cons: Parking (self, not valet) is $27/day. It is also REALLY far away from the hotel. Room service menu is uninspired and much more expensive than the quality would justify. On site restaurant is very meh, although the staff are very friendly and accommodating. Early morning flights make a lot of jet noise...bring your earplugs. No bathrobes, bring yours! No spa.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: We had a BLAST! Gorgeous hotel and wonders staff ! Lots of stuff for kids to do and plenty of stuff for adults too. Clean rooms and poolside service really made this resort feel like a five star resort!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: We had requested specific accomodations days prior to arrival, however, were not available when we arrived. It took a day after arrival, with the aid of a manager, to resolve our issue. From that point on, we very much enjoyed our stay. The assistance and courtesy extended by Brendon, a manager, was greatly appreciated.  My only "complaint" is the sheets on the mattress do not stay snug.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: Everything you'd expect from a Hyatt - friendly staff, clean facilities, nice rooms/amenities, ridiculous resort fees, etc. The only surprise - the large number of families/children enjoying the Oasis pool. Definitely not an Oasis if you're expecting something more adult and quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful property and very nice rooms
Summary: 3 pools (one with water cannons and a water slide for kids), great food, beautiful property....what more can be said? On site parking. Courtesy use of bikes, quiet (other than an airplane or 2) but no street noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This was a business trip but it was difficult to focus on work. The Hyatt feels more like a resort than a hotel. My room overlooking the golf course was so quiet and then there were several pools, good food, and a half mile walk to Balboa Island. Just over it!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Great for conference meetings. Clean and open atmosphere. Close walk to Balboa Island and there's a nature preserve and a marina nearby. Nice and clean workout facility. Pleasantly surprised. Bring your own food if you're gluten or dairy free-not a whole lot of options there. The little corner store on site was great though-kombucha, energy drinks, clothing, and lots of nice qulity souvenirs if you're into that.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your conference at our hotel and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This is a nice resort. Listing thoughts in categories below. See pics.   Pros:  The staff was very friendly from the check-in to the host in the restaurant and servers. One concierge could’ve been kinder in disposition, but maybe she had a rough morning. She did answer my question.   Large outdoor pool with water slide! I didn’t get to enjoy it because I was attending a conference there and the sessions didn’t leave space. It was also windy and a bit chilly most days.   Nice meeting rooms for conference with beautiful outdoor fireplaces and fire pits for this time of year.   Nice gift shop with a wide range of snacks and gifts. Small but well stocked.   Located across from a Bay Area with a nice, paved walking path that goes all the way around. Beautiful scenic walk!   Nice
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed experience. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We will be sure to share your room comments with our engineering team to get your room looked at. Thank you again for your review and we hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: I think this hotel is in a great location:  It is close to beach, Balboa Island and Fashion Island.  It was an easy drive to Corona Del Mar and Laguna Beach. Our room and the grounds were very clean and staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This property is beautiful (aside from the smell near self parking) staff was very helpful and Shor staff was very knowledgeable for the most park. Large selection of gluten free options with well informed staff of cross contamination for all the Celiacs. Room has a fridge just wish it had a microwave for quick snacks
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The hotel grounds are beautiful however the time need some updating. The ligting in bathroom is very dim that I had to put my makeup on in the other room. The light in doorway went out and no one came to fix it. Hotel staff were very nice however ppl at front desk that helped us seemed like they couldn't be bothered.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Our room was very clean and although the shower hinge broke, they quickly sent someone to repair it. Our stay was comfortable. Our retreat experience will be repeated. The service staff we're very friendly and helpful. Thanks a lot!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We went with the church and planned to go into the town to eat and shop. However we so enjoyed the accommodations that we didn't leave. Very relaxing and with the restaurant on site we didn't have to go anywhere. The Server were so kind the serves was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Large resort with plenty of space to find a quiet spot to relax
Summary: Our room was a king, comfortable bed, clean with a good shower and plenty of fluffy towels. It was quite a walk from main check in, but right next door to a lovely pool with plush comfortable loungers and a hot tub, along with fluffy towels to lay on. Bar area was pleasant and we enjoyed a night at the on site restaurant. My only negative is the hotel seems to be on the flight path of the nearby airport, so at 7.30 in the morning it got real noisy while all the early flights departed, so if you are a light sleeper and are looking for a long morning sleeping, this may not suit you.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our the majority of our hotel. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: Who would guess that behind a 1962 build, would be these awesome villas! The hotel underwent a renovation in 2013 but if the interior designer saw the beauty of this hotel, redoing this classic with a bit of mid-century modern would be genius.  Review is just for the 3 bdrm villa:  Pros: *Attentive staff *Take a ride in the golf cart with your baggage, it’s worth it! *1 of 4 personal pools *Good for large families *1 room downstairs, master + 3rd room upstairs *full-size fridge is a plus *lots of on-site activities: volleyball court, bike rentals, pools... wish we saw more! *Cookies!!!!  Cons: *room facing pool is loud in the morning  *don’t just rent the upper 2 rooms because there is no access to the pool. Book all 3 rooms. *pool towels are too rough *needs
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay in our villas! For future stays in the villa, please note, there are plates/utensils/cups located in the cabinets in the kitchen. If you need more, our room service team will be happy to bring you more. We also have toasters and microwaves available upon request. I will send a note to housekeeping about replacing the towels, thank you for bringing that to our attention.  We are happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: i could have saved a ton of money and stayed at a Hampton in.  The breakfast is $29 and is basic scrambled eggs, potatoes and bacon.  The comforter on my bed was to small, and the sink faucet was dripping all night.  While not a bad stay it certainly was not what I expected from a resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Our family enjoyed the Hyatt Regency so much we can't wait to return! Family friendly, relaxing and luxurious. Our room was a little tight for 4 people, but we made it work. In-room fridge allowed for us to have milk and cereal for breakfast. If you're on a budget, that is helpful. Bring earplugs -- the airport flight path is right over the hotel and we frequently heard planes while sleeping. But it was ok with earplugs.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: Staff was outstanding. Check in with Ashley was very easy and she was very helpful.Robert DiNunzio with the Valet staff was a pleasure to deal with. He had a smile everyday along with the rest of the Valet staff.Vehicle parking price I believe is overly priced.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! It was my pleasure to assist you! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, great outdoor space, paper thin bedrooms making sleeping difficult
Summary: This is a beautiful property in a 1940s/1950s old California style located on the Back Bay of Newport Beach.  Great outdoor space and pools.  While the furnishings in the room are up to par with Hyatt Regency, you will be challenged to get a good night's sleep because the walls are paper thin.  You hear every person at the pool, every person in the outdoor motel-like walkway and every person talking normally in the room next to you.  They can give a white noise machine at the front desk -- tells you the problem right there! -- but I only found out about it after I checked out and gave them a not-so-good rating.  They are "actively" trying to find a solution.  Until then, if you value your sleep, might want to go somewhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Stayed here as a couple for a last minute weekend trip to the beach.  Overall, the stay was pleasant and I would stay again if the price was right.  The hotel grounds were very impressive, with a lot of plants, gardens, multiple pools and courtyards.  The property is very large with low floor multiple buildings spread around.  The room we stayed in was pretty basic.  Two double beds that were comfortable, plenty of space for two people.  Had a small patio with slider that overlooked the golf course.  The bathroom was on the small side, but good enough for a couple of nights.  Parking is not free, and as others have mentioned, the self parking is a little bit of a hike, up a hill.  Cost was $27/night.   The restaurant/bar was ok.  Nothing special, and I thought overpriced.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: I attended a conference held at the hotel. The hotel is located near the bay and an estuary. Check in was easy but the bell hops and door men seemed inattentive. I was put in a room in the Lido building. The building is a 2 story U shaped building with a pool and jacuzzi within. The gym is also housed in the Lido building.   The room was clean and comfortable; however, you can hear everything in the room next to you. I mean everything. It was awkward and when a family moved in, it was loud. You also have to walk up stairs if on the second floor- if you have mobility issues this building is not for you (be sure to let the hotel know at the time of reservation).  The hotel has 3 pools, bikes to borrow, a nice restaurant, Starbucks in the morning in the lobby, golf, and you can
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I apologize you did not feel the bellmen were attentive. I have forwarded your concerns to our front office managers to follow up with their staff. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Beautiful hotel. Very clean.  3 beautiful pools.  Beds very comfortable. We only had appetizers and drinks at the restaurant so I really cannot give an accurate review. Staff was very helpful in every area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: For such an upscale location and lovely grounds this hotel is in need of room refurbishing. We stayed in the main building and the rooms need soundproofing, we heard the next door tv, doors slamming, and dogs barking down the hall. The shower head sprayed outside the tub, sink didn’t drain, and the room smelled musty. Not to mention the bow in the mattress. We will not be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. Summary: What a nice place for a conference. The staff were all wonderful. The food was great.  I especially enjoyed the bar food and ambiance. The view from my balcony was refreshing. Nearby Balboa Island offers a great place for walking and Fashion Island has all the food and shopping you might need.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: The grounds of this hotel are beautiful and the lobby is lovely. I was there for a conference and the rooms were very comfortable. The rooms or at least my room was grimey and the bathroom was pretty gross. The shower head and lever did not work properly so, my husband and I ended up taking high showers with the head on the high pressure setting because it only worked on that setting. The bathtub was clogged and by the second day would not drain at all. There were also stains in the toilet bowl. The bed was ok but I could feel the springs or something lumpy in the middle of the night. The room also smelled like old cigarette smoke. The food was ok, good for hotel food but I would never choose to eat there. The customer service was good but one of the managers was very rude. I

Summary: It's hard to imagine a better setting -- a peaceful lagoon within walking distance, a beautiful harbor a short walk more and a short drive to serveral public beach.  Add to that a big dose of quiet and seclusion and you have a winner.  Older property ... but that's its charm.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: Have stayed at property several times. Waited 3 hrs for my room even though others were able to get in room early - and I have Globalist status. Room AC did not work, making 3 night stay uncomfortable. Hotel needs an update. Will not be returning.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. Summary Heading: Nice Property, but beware of self-parking
Summary: This was overall a great Hyatt property.  The pool and courtyard was very nicely situated and the rooms were also up to standards.  The price of the hotel was good, but I think we booked under a Groupon rate.  The staff was exceptionally cordial and helpful.  My one complaint is the self-park area though.  It was way on the other end of the property.  If you had to go to your car for whatever reason - out for the day, unpack, forget something in your car - you have to walk all the way over there.  I'm not opposed to a walk, but if this were on a rainy day it would be terrible and frustrating.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We do offer golf cart assistance to and from the parking lot, should you need ride to and from your car. Just call the front office and we will be happy to assist. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: This is an amazing hotel. The three pools are lovely, as are the grounds. All staff were super friendly and helpful. My kids loved the free drinks they got during their whole stay. It is walking distance to the beach and shops. We walked to the ferry that takes you over to the peninsula and the kids fun zone. We wished we could have stayed longer.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We absolutely loved this property! Every employee we dealt with brought a warmth and amazing customer service. Our room was immaculate and the resort was beautiful! The location was perfect to take advantage of all that Newport Beach and Balboa Island have to offer. We will 100% be back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Not worth the price and I used points, lol
Summary: I learned that if I ever stay at this property again to make sure I book a second floor.  There was so much noise coming from the room above us.  It was like thee was zero insulation at all.  It sounded like metal hangers banging constantly.  Walking down the hall to our room it had an old smell almost like wet dog.  Not at all what I would expect.  I used the alarm clock device in the room to charge my phone.  That was a mistake it wasn't even working.  I woke up late to a dead phone and only because the maid knocked on the door.  So we started our day to Disneyland late and then only had 45 minutes to get up, shower dressed, packed and out of the room before check out due to it. Also the valet area is very congested.  People would park there and the would be no way to pull out
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. Summary: Excellent property and fantastic location! Elizabeth at check in was very friendly and gave a us lovely upgrade to a pool view room. Beautiful property that would accomadate families or couples quite well. The 3 pools was a surprise and meant it was never to crowded.

Summary: Hotel was over all sub-par to the Hyatt standard.  The room and furniture were dated and dirty and the AC unit was broken and made noises all night.  I sincerely hope Hyatt will invest the necessary capital in order to provide the much needed face-lift the property requires.  Best regards,  Christian Skov

Summary: Don’t count on the restaurant to stay on top of your order.  Be aggressive.  I was not and saw tables being served one after another until I became angry and spoke to the manager.  Our food cane moments later clearly sat under the heating lamps.  But otherwise hotel and staff are great.

Summary Heading: Hyatt Regence Newport Beach - Hidden Gem Resort
Summary: Great location, family style resort with a large pool area. Very helpful staff, nice getaway when you are going to Newport Dunes for one of their evening concerts. Nice bar area and fire pit. Friendly staff. Recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The grounds are amazing. So nice to walk around on paths and enjoy the property. Great lounging areas with outdoor sofas and fire pits. All 3 pools and hot tubs are also great. You get 2 rounds of complimentary golf per day. Pet friendly too - great to walk your dog. Staff very helpful and friendly. Very clean rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This is a true resort with beautifully landscaped acres, pools, spas, games, etc. Rooms are average but nice. Able to walk around the bay. Canoe/kayak/paddleboard rental across the street. Lots of good restaurant options in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: My husband and I came to the Hyatt for a 1night 2 day getaway from the kids! We absolutely loved our stay. We relaxed so wonderfully. We had the breakfast buffet at the hotel and slept the whole time. We did leave for dinner at the SOL Cocina restaurant a few minutes away! It was a beautiful weekend for us 🤗
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The walls are very thin, so you hear everything in the next room.  Parking is very far from the rooms and the buildings didn't have elevators.  Beds are small and sheets are not soft.  So very bad for strollers and people with kids.  If you are single, it would not be a big hassle.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Venue, Clean, & Excellent Customer Service
Summary: I stayed 3 nights and had a great experience.  Clean room, beautiful venue, and customer service exceeded expectations.  The hotel bar/lobby area had a relaxing feel and the ambiance of the outdoor patio was awesome, especially after dark.  The garlic fries at the bar were delicious too!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Great Experience at Newport Beach Hyatt.  Staff were friendly and courteous.  Lobby area inviting and comfortable.  Rooms look like it has be renovated although the tub could be updated as well.  Overall my experience was one that would bring me back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The hotel staff was amazing.  From providing us with a cell phone charging cord to helping us with our luggage.  The food was excellent and enjoyed a few adult beverages at the bar.  A great place to stay for business and family travel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Very nice place for the money.
Summary: Nice rooms, coupla three pools, and a bunch of amenities that I couldn't use during a single night stay.   But folks were really nice that I talked to.  Can't recommend their SHOR seafood grill, it was just meh.
