Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy your experience at SHOR. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay overall and we hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: Beautiful hotel and amazing staff. Will be back again! The pool was beautiful and not crowded. The rooms were clean and the food at the resturaunt was great. After checking in and out of another local hotel to come here we will never go anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Resort fees are an unnecessary add on for business travelers
Summary: A nice property that I have stayed at many times through several owners, but I'm tired of being charged a resort fee when I'm not using the facilities.  That was my last stay at this property.  There are a number of close by alternatives that will meet my needs without the up charges.

This hotel is simply stunning!  The grounds, the food, the pools, the rooms - all are done with the utmost care and attention to detail.  Staff is incredibly friendly and yet professional.  I was here for a business trip, but it would be a great getaway for families or for a romantic time away, too.  The rooms are good sized, all have some sort of view (pool, bay area, golf course, etc.), clean, and well maintained.  I've never seen a bed made so perfectly!  The staff was wonderfully kind, too.  Any need you had, they were on it in with a smile!  The food at the restaurant SHOR is excellent, as well.  All in all, I couldn't ask for a better place to stay.  The location is amazing, too.  You're close to the beach (it's walkable if you're willing!), close to John Wayne airport,
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The worst and will never return...got there and room was not ready and then still late after they promised us a room...claimed they were book solid...front desk girl would not look at me and just stared at her computer screen...sent us to the bar to wait and the food we ordered was raw..sent it back...wine over priced...came back still no room and heard again that they were booked solid...not my problem...finally got to the room and there was no soap or shampoo...came back from the wedding and ordered a salad and asked for red wine vinegar and they brought it smothered in balsamic!  next morning housekeeping knocked on our door early and said we were checking out that day...so late to get us a room and pushed us out the next morning...just terribel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: The suites were filthy! We could see months of dust under the coffee table. No soap, dishwashing detergent, paper towels or sponges in kitchen. We filled dishwasher but it didn’t work. Staff just took dirty dishes away. Mold in air conditioning unit! Hallways smelled of cigarette smoke and pot. Glasses put upside down directly on wood tables in our conference room.  Front desk didn’t respond to our complaints. We have serious health concerns about this Hyatt and won’t return. Do want to give fabulous ratings to the bell staff.

Summary Heading: always like to stay at the Hyatt Newport
Summary: They are a large hotel but spread out so feels friendly and relaxed...and you can self-park which is nice although it is quite a way to the room from the lot.  Having a coffee bar is nice but I do wish it stayed open later than but its nice to have it there.  I enjoy being able to walk on the Back Bay before meetings. The resort fee is a little annoying since, being there for business, I don't really use any "resort" aspects of the hotel.  Good location, friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: I love the staff. They all were friendly and accommodating. Didn't meet one rude person. The facility was clean and there was lot of opportunities to enjoy the varied amenities. Would visit again. Seemed to be an excellent place for a family experience
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The hall carpets need cleaning and vacuuming Pool area need much more attention Rooms need updating  Room 811 needs a new door to wash room Parking attendants are always helpful The resort fee is much too high for value
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I have forwarded your comments to our housekeeping staff to use as a training opportunity.  The resort fee does include a number of amenities including; golf on our golf course, 2 hours of bike rentals per day, bottles of water in the room, as well as our pools and fitness facilities. I apologize if you were not informed of these inclusions.   If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: This is a picture-perfect place. It has lots of history, scenery, and space. If I could I would offer two ratings: 1 for the desk staff and 5 for the food staff. My experience with the reception staff was less than helpful. They seemed distracted and detached. I did not find my experience with them helpful at all. Let me hasten to say that the food services staff could not have been more helpful and friendly. I did enjoy the best hamburger I ever had at their SHORs in house restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We will be sure to share your kudos with our food and beverage teams. While I wish you had a better experience at reception, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver exceptional customer service, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short.  If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Yes, there are much nicer and roomier rooms out there in OC.  If you are the type that doesn't leave the room much, maybe look elsewhere.  If you like to stroll verdant grounds while deciding between swimming, golfing, biking on the nearby path, drinking, exercising, shuttling to Balboa, this is a good option for the price.  I'm a fan.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: Old, stinky hotel with terrible access to rooms!
Summary: This hotel is not wheelchair accessible and self-parking is very far to get to.  My room was at the very back of the hotel and I had to drag my suitcase across rugged sidewalks to get there.  Old stinky room like mildew.  Housekeeping up early banging trashcans for over an hour and talking loud across the courtyard.  Rooms are overpriced yet feels like a roach motel!!  Don't do it!!

The staff was amazing and very pleasant! They greeted us with smiles and congratulated us for our anniversary - with a free drink coupon and an upgraded room! This is our third time and looking forward to more!
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating with us!  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: We stay here all the time for business trips.  Although a nice place, the rooms are stuffy and the air conditioning never seems to work properly.  The food is good.  You can wait a bit longer than normal if they are busy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: For us it was a lovely way of finishing our hectic holiday visiting, Quiet, beautiful landscape, private location of rooms catering for all needs.Very accomodating staff, always available and prompt with service.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary Heading: Beautiful setting, near everything, extremely relaxing.
Summary: This Hyatt (what used to be the Newporter Inn), is beautifully relaxing.  The landscaping is gorgeous, one can hike/bike in the Back Bay, shop at Balboa or Fashion Island, or head to beautiful beaches at Newport Beach and Corona del Mar. Much of this is within walking distance.  I've come here for an annual work meeting, and always add a couple of extra days to relax. It's become a highlight of my year.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: This hotel is in desperate need of an update.  The lighting was very poor.  The outlets were almost inaccessible. The bathroom was old and too small.  I really expect a whole lot more from Hyatt.  I travel a lot, all over the world and this hotel really didn’t meet my expectations for a Hyatt Hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Nice place, not a terribly good value
Summary: This place is very nice and is very comfortable, but if cost benefit means anything there must be places that rate higher.  While the facilities are top notch, you've got to beg for basic toiletries--they aren't stocked in the room.  I was not disappointed with the hotel, just underwhelmed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I am so sorry to hear your amenities were not stocked. I have shared this feedback with our housekeeping managers to share with their team as a training opportunity. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: The room was dark dingy and old.  The food from the restaurant was not good and not cheap.  The Hotel is Very Overpriced.  I would not stay again nor would I recommend it.  I really do not have more to say.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of

Summary: I was attending a conference at this hotel so my husband went with me and we stayed a few extra days.  The site is gorgeous.  Mitchell made certain we had a great room, balcony overlooking the pool and close to the conference to accomodate my injury, extra water and cookies before Geoff took us up.  Geoff made certain we knew our way aroung the amenities and gave us a couple of tips on local restaurants.  All the staff were friendly and our valet parking attendants were excellent, even when they were servicing two weddings.  The meeting space was good and the receptions, breakfasts and lunches catered were really excellent.  Although I travel to Newport Beach each year, we had never stayed here; but we will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We will be sure to share your great comments about Mitchell and Geoff with their managers. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Beautifully maintained landscape. Impressive all around. Clean and comfortable bedrooms. Bathroom was fair though shower was dimly lit. I liked the morning cafe that served Starbucks coffee. The restaurant menu was very good and not over priced with nice-sized portions.  Vegan, vegetarian and gluten-free options. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We will be sure to share your feedback with our team. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The hotel is close to the bay and has very good food, a relaxing atmosphere, and pleasantly comfortable sleeping accommodations. I felt at peace during this trip. The gym is small however had plenty of equipment for everyone.  Employees are also courteous and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I was very impressed by how the staff handled having such a large group.  The food was great and even with such a large number of people we didn't have to wait long to get our plates.  I would recommend them to any size group!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The staff were friendly and helpful.  Rooms were comfortable and the grounds were beautiful.  I would love to return for pleasure instead of business in order to really enjoy all the amenities this location offers.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Valet was dishonest regarding charges. Beware they mislead you on pricing and will not know actual charges until check out. We were tipping $40 each time thinking it was a courtesy as the check in valet suggested
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I have forwarded your comments to our valet manager to follow up with our valet team. Our parking prices are usually disclosed at the time of arrival and I apologize that they were not mentioned to you.  We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: The only up is that the suites are spacious but the downs are: 1- The room had spiders and the reaction in the guest services was very carefree they just asked if I wanted them to get rid of it which I did myself hated the response 2- We asked for a room on a higher floor and they said one would be available the next day but they ignored the request  Didn't like the experience and checked out earlier too
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I have forwarded your comments to our housekeeping managers to ensure this does not happen to a future guest.   We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: When we got into the room it had a fishy smell. The sheets smelled and had black spots on them. My wife and I were very disappointed. We have stayed here a couple of times and usually really enjoy it but unfortunately we had to cut out trip short because of it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I have forwarded your comments to out housekeeping managers to follow up with the housekeeper that cleaned your room.   We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: There is no question that this is the VVS Diamond of hospitality and excellence among gems in the area. My son and I are staying for an extended period and I am breaking my own rule of waiting until we leave to write a review because this Hyatt Regency management, staff, and services are across the board so consistently exceptional that I have no doubt it is authentic and our experience will continue to be outstanding.  Rarely am I compelled to write an outstanding review because service is rarely this exceptional.  Because I write from experience here are just a few examples: the management never fails to say hello and has stopped and asked for my son’s name saying he should know it and apologizing for not knowing and has remembered since then, I have had to extend for work an
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you are enjoying your stay! Jennifer and Brendan are exceptional members of our team and we are very fortunate to have them. We will be sure to share your kind words with them. We hope you enjoy the remainder of your stay and please come back again soon!

Summary: I was in town staying at the hotel for a work conference that was being held there.  My room was quiet and restful for sleeping at night.  The self parking was a bit of a walk from my room but I felt safe walking through the hotel at night.  Great location for shopping at Fashion Island.  Hotel gym included a Pelaton bike which I thought was awesome on their part.  I would definitely stay there again when in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our Pelaton bike and the local area. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: We stayed for only 3 nights.  The hotel lobby is beautiful, the room was clean, the beds and the sheets were amazing.  We will definitely go back again.  The location is unbeatable; we were a short drive from shopping, restaurants, local pharmacy and grocery stores.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Been staying at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach for the past 3 years. Its always a good experience. Its conveniently located within a 5-10 mins. of everything in NPB.  The hotel grounds are nice and situated close to walking paths and the back bay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to our hotel!  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We had a relaxing low stress mini vacation. Good food, great bar w excellent pool & hot tub. Will be going back with my kids & grandchildren. The Hyatt should consider incorporating a spa, for we had to go off presumes for this service.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This was my first visit to this Hyatt. It's a little older, but well kept. Note, if you self-park it is quite a distance to several of the rooms because the complex is spread out. Location-wise, it's in a fantastic area of Newport Beach. The Back Bay is close by, as is the Nature Reserve. There's a small golf course right next to the grounds and it's a lovely tropical setting. Food was excellent. Also, seems like a great place for families.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear that you were able to enjoy a few of our resort amenities, as well as the local area. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: Very frustrating experience when I made the reservation for multiple people in my business. Automated reservation line is aggravating and live staff not accommodating.  Set up in double rooms was not optimal for sharing while getting ready for business meetings.  Food in meeting rooms and service were both very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: The room is very small and outdated. If you have young children, take note it was shower only. It really has a nice, upgraded lobby with a fireplace but the rest of the hotel could use a complete remodel. Also, the hotel is under a flight path for John Wayne Airport. The planes are low and it even shook our room at times.  We stayed during February and a weird cold front came in. The heater wasn't very good and vibrated so loud, we couldn't tell if it was the plane or the heater. However, we called for maintenance and they fixed what as causing the noise.   We stayed for 4 days. Housekeeping did bare minimum even though they were tipped each time before they cleaned. Trash was left in the room if it wasn't placed in the tiny trash cans which were filled. Empty boxes of snacks,

Though the room was pretty standard, we had a nice terrace with a little table and nice view of the lush grounds. The staff was excellent and the service was great. The toilet was oddly loud, such that we avoided flushing it at night, but overall the room was clean an comfortable and we enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.I am so sorry to hear about the noise in your room. I have forwarded your comments to our engineering department so they can take a look at the toilet in the room you were in. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Looks great from the outside but...
Summary: The property and grounds are beautiful, but the rooms could use a makeover.  Antiquated hvac system, cottage cheese ceilings and out dated furniture.  The room we had was on the first floor.  Walls are thin and you can hear people outside.  Our unit had it’s front door out of alignment and a cold breeze came right through the room. Another thing that was never mentioned was that the property is right under the flight path of the airport so be prepared to wake up at 7am on a Saturday! They take pets, but have a hefty $100 price tag for that.  That along with a resort fee of $27 and a self parking fee of $27, plus taxes came out to the price of the room. Definitely not worth the money!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Felt  that the rate was a bit steep which affected my values selection, otherwise quite satisfied.  Wouldn't have minded a larger selection of food choices in the lounge but the quality and taste was excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: Good service and location and the rooms are updated, however the hotel is showing its age and we could smell the humidity in the room. I would recommend the hotel for its location, however for the price next time I would choose another hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: It was loud and noisy. We were beside some sort of boiler room, room 432. The guests upstairs were brutal, both nights. We complained the first night and they removed the “resort fee” but then charged us for parking and deleted all our keys...twice! You can do better than this hotel in and around the Newport Beach area. Hotel is a little dated in parts and could use a refresh. Sorry Hyatt, this hotel sucks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: There's a few parts to this hotel, some better than others. The area of rooms by the pool is dated and noisy. It seems to be a stay for guests prior to taking cruises due to its proximity to SNA Airport.  There's better options nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Loved the golf course and friendly service. The rooms were bit dated, but the layout and location was perfect. We came in for a wedding and were checked into the room seamlessly. The hotel, restaurant staff was friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear you were able to enjoy some of our resort amenities while you were here. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: This hotel has a lovely setting, well laid out, easy to get to amenities. Food was delicious, staff was friendly and helpful, room was clean and very comfortable, had a wonderful time and definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This hotel was as expected of Hyatt. I would have given a better rating if two employees didn't come into my room while we were in there. Very disconcerting to know that any employee (not just cleaning crew) can come into your room any time while you're checked into it. We had to yell "hello!? There are people here!" for them to not come all the way in. Very strange.

This property never disappoints. The staff continues to exceed expectations. We especially love the staff at the bar. Craig, Greg, and Shannon are unbelievable. They always remember us and remember our drinks. We continue to stay here because of the excellent service and experiences that we've had.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear Craig, Greg, and Shannon made your stay exceptional. We will be sure to share your kind words with them and their managers. We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Don’t Stay Here...But If You HAVE To, Be Sure To Pack Your Earplugs
Summary: The nightly room rate ($350/nt) was ridiculously overpriced as was the parking fee & the $27 resort fee. The $27/$36 parking fee is absurd considering there appeared to be ample parking available in the area. The resort fee was worthless mid-winter as the pool slides were turned off & they dont let you know golf is complimentary prior to arrival so...yeah I didn’t use anything, and couldn’t have anyways considering I was there for a training that was being hosted at the hotel.  In regards to room quality, I had one of the worst hotel experiences of my life as my room in the Lido building might as well of not had walls. I could hear EVERYTHING in the other rooms on my floor. I had to download a white noise app to be able to sleep & that barely helped. Every night I was awakened

Summary Heading: Great location beautiful setting lots of opportunities to relax.
Summary: We stayed at the Hyatt for a Conference. the staff was very friendly and the rooms were beautiful. Wonderful location and great facility but plan on eating off site if possible.  The property is immaculate and well kept. Several pools and a fitness room available along with outdoor sitting areas leisure spots and plenty of relaxing nooks. The only issue was the overpriced bar and food offerings. This forces a person on a budget to seek food and beverage elsewhere which is not easy if attending a conference.  The food for the conference was excellent but again very overpriced.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. I have forwarded your comments to our food and beverage team in an effort to improve our services. If your travels bring you back to Newport Beach, we hope to welcome you back to our hotel!

Summary: Fantastic Girls Night to celebrate 2 friends' birthdays! I used my free night award for a standard 2 double bed BUT got upgraded to a suite that had a sofa bed in the living area!  NICE!!!  Service was excellent too!  Wish we had more time to swim and just hang out at the hotel.  I would like to return and explore the area more.  This is much better than the last Hyatt experience!  They usually offer wonderful service!  Thanks Hyatt Newport Beach!
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating with us! We are so glad that we could make your stay exceptional. We hope to see you again for your next celebration!

Summary Heading: We keep coming back to this hotel
Summary: Our daughter lives and works in Newport Beach. We always wanted our independence, so we stay in this nice hotel every time we visit her. We recommend it to anyone who wants to explore Orange County, it’s close to everything, and has the amenities of a resort. The staff , from front desk, to housekeeping and restaurant are all friendly and provide top service.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Positive aspects of hotel (service, location, external appearance) were far outweighed by the poor internal construction. I could clearly hear normal conversations taking place in the hallway and adjoining rooms, as well as any steps taken (and TV noise) in the room above me.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Was in town Thurs night - Saturday night for a business seminar in Irvine. The location of this hotel is great in that it's close to Newport Beach, Balboa Island, and the sprawling Newport Fashion Island shopping center where there are plenty of restaurants.  Since I already had a full itinerary, I didn't make use of the hotel's many amenities, but the room itself was clean, extremely comfortable, and quiet. Exactly what I was hoping for. The staff was friendly and helpful.  The parking situation is a little odd on that the self-park was on the far west side of the property which means a 5 minute or so hike to get to the car. In good weather, no problem. In the rain it would be a pain.  I would stay here again if the occasion arose.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We appreciate your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I was there for a conference, which was nice enough. The restaurant was good as well as the conference food, my biggest complaint was the weather - 45 and rainy! Next time I'll bring the kids as they would enjoy the pools.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your conference and stay with us! We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Staff were very helpful, the room was spotless, and the pools looked amazing (I could not use them to to some freak cold weather that rolled in). Highly recommend to anyone looking to stay in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The layout of this hotel/resort is really well thought out. Meeting rooms are great and it is also a location where you can have an inside/outside venue. Food is also very good here and there are multiple pools and hot tubs. If you wish to see the sun rise the staff will place on the right hand side rooms. Some have patio’s and they all have 2 chairs outside with a little table. There is a volley ball court and a great gym as well. At night the outdoor lights come on and create a wonderful atmosphere. Close to the hotel is fashion island for shopping. Would definitely recommend this hotel and I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your meeting and stay with us! We hope to see you and your group back again very soon.

Summary: Nothing happened bad st my stay but the room was dirty, it’s the little things.  As I said no issues with staff etc.  just the actual room wasn’t clean,  I found numerous hairs both small and long, dust etc.  I expect more from the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I have forwarded your comments to our housekeeping team to use as a training opportunity. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: I recently stayed here to celebrate my mom's birthday. I wanted something special; the property and staff exceeded my (high) expectations. Every person we interacted with gave my mom a warm "happy birthday" greeting (including before I personally informed them of the event; they must have shared the information amongst themselves). We ate at the on-site restaurant; the food was expertly presented and prepared. The room we stayed in was pristine, as were the (plentiful) amenities at the property. Beautiful property, professional and warm staff. I highly recommend the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach if you're looking for a special experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating with us! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This particular Hyatt is really special.  Every single member of the staff genuinely cares that you're having a good time and things are going as expected.  The three pools are great, the firepits around the property are perfect for those chilly CA nights and the food is great.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Hard to give a comprehensive review as we only stayed one night and did not have the opportunity to use any of the facilities.  The front desk was welcoming and helpful, the room very nice and what we saw of the property looked lovely.  The walls seemed a bit thin as I could hear noise from other rooms in the evening and morning but would stay again when we have time to enjoy the amenities. We used points and were please that they covered the resort fees as well as the room but at $27 the self-parking was a bit costly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We sorry to hear that you were not able to use our amenities during your stay. Hopefully you will get another chance to stay a little longer and enjoy all the great amenities we have to offer!

Summary: The rooms could use a little updating. They use full size beds instead of queen size. The bedding is soft, clean and comfortable.  The breakfast was wonderful! The staff is very friendly and helpful! They do not have shuttle service to the airport.  The pool and spa are clean and refreshing. The valet service is on it!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: This hotel was a great place to stay.  The grounds are really pretty and atmosphere is nice.  This is an older hotel but that is what makes it charming.  Rooms are not huge but beds are comfortable and nice overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We were in Newport for our daughter's wedding and did a room block. The sales manager we worked with was excellent and made the booking process seamless. Wonderful customer service by the hotel staff. Very pleased with our selection and wouldn't hesitate to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for hosting your family for this special occasion with us! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you all back again very soon.

Summary: This is an excellent hotel, looks new and is very well kept and serviced.  Not a place for walkers, though, it is by the side of one of those Californian 5 or 6 lanes roads... However, you can walk from there to Balboa Island and the peninsula, it is close enough. No one walks the streets of California, though.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay. We do have some great walking trails behind our hotel that walk along the back bay. Stop by the concierge desk during your next stay for a map of the local trails.  We hope to see you back again very soon.

Summary: If you're looking for a great place to stay in the Newport Beach area, I recommend the Hyatt Regency.  It is not on the beach, but it IS located on the Back Bay and the bay view rooms with a balcony are really lovely.  The Hyatt is in a great central location that is easy to get in and out of and the staff are friendly and helpful.  This is probably the sixth time we've stayed there for a long weekend and it definitely did not disappoint.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here. The grounds are beautiful with 3 pools, hot tubs, nice walking paths a small beach right across the street. Newport Beach and Balboa are close by and there is excellent shopping at the nearby fashion island. The staff goes out of their way to be friendly and helpful. The hotel is older but well kept up and very clean    We would not hesitate to stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The Hyatt Newport beach is easily accessible for a traveler that needs to be centralized around Newport Beach.  The property is aged and could stand to be updated.  This could be a reasonable hotel if it was priced more appropriately.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: Great Location great experience.  This location has a wonderful staff that does the extras to make you feel welcome.  Pride in their work.  The rooms are clean and large.  I recommend the restaurant for any meal.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Not worth the money. Walls too thin. Could hear the man snoring in the next room. Had to climb stairs for luggage too.
Summary: Not worth the money. Walls too thin. Could hear the man snoring in the next room. Had to climb stairs to get to room. Room facing outdoors like a motel. Gym was great though. Room was clean. The bay view was terrible. Couldn’t see anything. All neighbor hotels much better and better priced
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: We stayed here to attend a conference.  Our room was way in the back of the property and it was a walk to the lobby area.  The hotel seemed like it was an older hotel, but it had been updated.  The room seemed clean overall, but one of the curtains had a gross mark on it.  The lobby was welcoming.  There is a little gift shop on site that had cute tee shirts.  There is a shuttle that will take you to nearby Fashion Island.  The property was decorated for Christmas when we were there, which made it feel more home-y.  I understand there is a nature preserve you can walk into that is really nice, but I didn't check it out.  It wasn't overly fancy, but we enjoyed our stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Not a place I will ever stay again.
Summary: We were not informed of charges nor did we receive a bill we could view with actual charges.  After two, and maybe three, phone calls we are still dealing with pending charges, none of which reflect the actual bill.  Only after requesting an invoice, via phone, did I receive one and it was requested they mail an invoice.  I received several emails from them and none of them addressed the actual invoice nor did any address the pending charges which were ridiculous and did not reflect actual charges!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I apologize for your negative experience. Our Front Office Manager left you a voicemail last week to make sure we had your billing matter resolved. Please feel free to call her back or email us at qualitynewpo@hyatt.com to ensure this matter is resolved.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here knowing that Hyatt is the hotel brand we love the most and this hotel didn't disappoint either. The stay was amazing and close to local restaurants that offer great tasting food and help you embrace California life. This hotel was spacious comfortable and had easy access to food options. Hyatt regency was a great stay and whenever we travel back to California we will stay here again.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your wedding and thank you for choosing our hotel to celebrate! We are happy to hear you had a great stay and hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay...older but updated. Staff very helpful, rooms spacious. If one is challenged by balance issues the tubs are quite deep and even though a suction held mat is in place...can be slippery. Restaurant provides decent food, however, very pricey.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: Back for a 3rd visit, and plan another
Summary: This is one of my favorite hotels. The location is so much fun, the running path around the water is perfect for outdoor exercise. The the hotel has a cozy little bar, and lovely private apartments for more elegant stays (these even have a private pool, although January isn't the best time to enjoy this feature).  The rooms are spacious, my most recent room was a balcony room overlooking the pool and it really had an at-home feeling.  The bedding is wonderfully comfortable, I always get a great sleep when I stay here. Can't say enough good things about this property.  But will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Older hotel with great grounds. I great location for summer months will pools and near bay and beaches. We used to find great deals on priceline, but not sure they exist now. Food options were quite good but seemed over prices. Parking fees are high and really not needed except to generate income. Be sure to check out your room before moving in, there could be mold issues.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I apologize for the issues you experienced in your guest room. I will be sure to share that with our housekeeping staff. Should your travels bring you back to Newport Beach, we hope welcome you back to our hotel!

Summary Heading: Great location for Balboa but not for Rose Bowl
Summary: Nice property with wonderful staff.  But not as new and sparkly as other Hyatt Resorts I have used.  Clean and convenient but needs a face lift.  Agent booked us here for Rose Bowl and it is just too far away.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Unfortunately, we are a ways away from Pasadena. Should your travels bring you back to Newport Beach, we hope to welcome you back to our hotel!

Summary Heading: A great hotel offering the perfect package
Summary: We stayed at the hotel for 6 nights in dec/Jan and our stay was brilliant. From previous reviews I assumed the self parking was miles away up a very steep hill. It really isn't, it's just behind the hotel. The staff were lovely and really nice to our two children, they loved the free refills of soft drinks. Although it was December the pools were heated, so swimming is still possible, the main pool is great for children with a nice waterslide. The rooms were big with two doubles and cleaned daily. It is quite close to Balboa island and the hotel runs a shuttle to there regularly. The resort activities are great and would recommend  a bike ride to the nature reserve behind the hotel. The food and drink in the hotel is a bit pricey but that is my only complaint. Otherwise a really
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: The room we stayed in had a very high humidity level. The sheets, towels, etc. were all extremely damp.
Summary: I think with the location of this hotel, and price, it's due for a huge updated renovation. Hyatt hotels have always been my hotel of choice but with the condition of this one, I don't believe I will return.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I have forwarded your comments to our housekeeping and engineering teams to inspect the room you were previously staying in. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Booked late on Hotwire.  Great price, however, after the resort fee of $39 (we had no time to enjoy the resort) and the parking fee, it cost more than average.  I've stayed at this hotel in the past, and its location to the airport and Newport Beach area is ideal.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: HORRIBLE BAR SERVICE FROM RUDE TODD
Summary: I stayed in this Hyatt for night and the bar service was absolutely terrible..I went to bar after I checked in to inquire about mixed drink and met TODDthe bartender he was so so rude and sarcastic with his answers he said we'll what do you want I don't know what kind of answer is that just stupid and UNPROFESSIONAL uneducated in service...I will never go there again TODD represented Hyatt I a horrible way just like a cheap bar very sleazy feeling I got...How sad and pathetic it is He seemed burnt out and so miserable in his position again how sad it is....Then upon check out I talked to one of the employees near front desk expressed my concerns and she said Todd's had many complaints previously from other customers....HOW PATHETIC THIS BARTENDER WAS....
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I have forwarded your comments to Todd's managers to follow up with him. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Great hotel, location and amenities. The hotel lobby was inviting, food was delicious and staff was friendly but they fell short at check-in and check -out. We enjoyed all the amenities from riding bikes to playing shuffleboard. This hotel is very kid friendly, the shuttle service to Balboa and Fashion island made it easy to get around. The reason I’m not giving this resort a 5star was because check-in and checkout was terrible. I requested early check in a few days before arrival and front desk made sure it wouldn’t be a problem.   Unfortunately we didn’t get a room until after 4pm. Also, check out was an issue. We requested to use our points but front desk told us to step aside and call main number and request them to make the change. After 30 minutes on the phone we were able
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: My husband and I love staying at this Hyatt!  They treat us like royalty.  We especially want to give a shout out to Robert in valet.  He always greets us with a warm and genuine welcome.  Can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay. We will be sure to share your kind words with Robert. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Clean room is most important point.  Additionally, the staff was friendly and helpful arriving very late (230AM), and the resort looked beautiful (Large chessboard, pool), but only stayed one night, so didn't use amenities.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again for a longer trip to enjoy our amenities.

Summary: We tacked on three days at the Hyatt Regency at the end of our tour of California. It was everything we needed it to be: great service, clean and modern rooms, central location and super friendly staff. The shuttle bus to the shops and town was great, and gave us the opportunity to get out and about. Lovely swimming pool and jacuzzi also. Each night different activities were provided, including smores and outdoor kids films. I'd definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Exceeded our expectations from valet parking to check in to condition of room.  All we had to do was ask for something and it was done.  Needed to borrow a high chair when 1 year old grandson came to visit during meal time.....10 minutes later we had one delivered to our room!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Staff is great and left feeling rejuvenated
Summary: Overall great experience.  Staff is great and welcoming.  Pool/Jacuzzi was nice to relax in.  In a great location next to the marina and easy access to main roads.  I would recommend staying here to anyone in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Attended and stayed here for a conference. From check in to check out everything was great. They know how to look after their guests. Food was good rooms where very nice and clean. Would of loved to have a swim in one of there pools but time did not allow for it but they did look lovely. Staff where very friendly and helpful.   Location was easy to get to and I was coming from LAX. Hotel has everything on its door step that you need to do and see while in the area.  Great place to stay not just for business.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, as well as your conference. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: Nice hotel, rooms ok restaurant service needs quality improvement, slow and cold food served.Location very good, parking ok, but long way to walk from self parking lot to the lobby /room. Reception / welcome excellent
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I have forwarded your feedback to our food and beverage team to use as a training opportunity. I am glad to hear you enjoyed the rest of your stay and hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary: When you arrive at this hotel it is very beautiful. Quick check in and very friendly. We were put in the Bay building which is a bit farther away than I wanted to be but for self parking was great. You have to take two sets of stair to get down there and my fault completely I took a tumble down the last step not realizing there was one more there. It would have been better had there been an elevator to take us down. The rooms are very spacious but a bit echo-y. The doors to the bathrooms give little privacy as you can kind of hear everything going on in there. The pool area is really nice although it was too cold to use the pool. We did see several little kids there though. This is my second stay at this Hyatt and I liked both times. However I would rather be in the main
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I hope you are OK! We do have an elevator near the self parking lot going to the second floor of our Bay building, but it is often missed. To request the main building, email us directly at qualitynewpo@hyatt.com before your stay and we will block you there.   We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Stayed 4 nights during a business meeting, both at the hotel and offsite.  Staff went above and beyond to make sure our needs for the meeting were met. Would have liked to stay longer to enjoy some of the other aspects this beautiful property.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and meeting with us! We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: 4th time we have used this hotel as our base for business and pleasure in the LA area. Close access to freeways and beach. The areas restaurants are of all kinds. Especially the ones around Fashion Island are worth visiting.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stays and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Rooms are OK, but the hotel is noisy and feels like a motel
Summary: I spent 2 nights there on a business trip.   The room was fine, but the layout of the hotel - several two story buildings surrounding pools -- feels more like a motel.  Room door and window open to an exterior walkway rather than a hall - you must choose between privacy and daylight.  Sounds from the pool and outdoor events carry.  The hotel is under tha landing path for the local airport, and the landings are loud until about 9pm.   Airport shuttles run only on the hour (other hotels in the are run shuttles more frequently) and there is no way to reserve a seat in advance.  Net:  there are lots of better choices in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of

Summary: A pretty hotel/resort.  A comfortable enough location for networking and business related planning.  Opportunity to walk outside from rooms to meeting rooms a nice break in routine.   Shuttle service almost convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your conference with us. We hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary: Lovely hotel with beautiful grounds. Within easy distance from shops, restaurants, beautiful and walking paths.   I arrived very early and they had no issue providing a room to rest. They also honored the request to be connected to my new coworker, there was no issue changing my room to accommodate this request.   Although Hyatt’s are not my usual choose, I have had very pleasant stays are many now and have enjoyed everything about these stays.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel. We are happy to hear you had such a pleasant stay with us. We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: The scenery and overall experience was just beautiful! Felt like I was at a resort in Hawaii! I didn't even have enough time to experience all of the amenities the hotal had to offer, but I plan to go back, it was seriously the nicest hotel i have ever stayed at.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. Hopefully you will get a chance to come back soon to explore the rest of the property and enjoy all of the amenities we have to offer.

Summary: My team and our company as a whole enjoyed the customer service and accomodations.  We are all looking forward to coming back as soon as we can!  Rooms with a view were gorgeous... staff is very warm and inviting!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your holiday event with us and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The hotel is an older property, but well maintained and comfortable.  Service was very attentive, and my wife & I particularly appreciated a very early check-in.  This is a dog friendly hotel, with easy access for animals.         Room rates were reasonable, but alcohol prices at the lobby bar were very high.  There are nicer properties in the area, but I would not hesitate to return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Hidden extra charges for things you don't even use or can't avoid using
Summary: I paid for my room in advance and in full. When I checked out I was suprised to be charged an extra $27 dollars because the hotel was a resort hotel! I didn't even use the facilities! Of course it is a resort hotel, how is it that they charge extra for being what they are? You can't opt out of the "resort" part of the fee so why is it not just part of your room fee? Also, I was charged a further $27dollars or so a day to self park in the hotel parking lot. There is nowhere else nearby to park so you have no choice but to park in the hotel parking lot. Why again, is this not just part of your room fee? These additional fees are incredibly tacky and very disappointing for a hotel of this standard. The reception and management were rigid on the additional fees, despite it being no
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. Our resort fee is listed in at the top portion of our booking screening and includes a number of amenities on property. The resort fee includes; golf on our golf course, 2 hours of bike rentals, bottles of water in the room, volleyball, and shuffle board. I apologize that you were unaware of the amenities included with this fee. When booking through a third party booking site the fees may not be seen as easily, but they are listed on all of our partner sites. If you should decide to stay with us again, we hope you'll get a chance to use a few of our amenities included with the resort fee.

Summary: I will start by saying the staff and service continues to be stellar, particularly Jennifer White the Front Office Manager. This visit however the deteriorating condition of the property was evident and quite disappointing.  It got so uncomfortable that we ended up moving hotels.While staff was accommodating in moving us, a new location just meant different issues.  Specific examples include: smelly hallways and rooms, overall feeling that the room and sheets were not clean, dim lighting, furniture that was very worn, nasty exterior carpeting leading to the self park, the inside of the elevator looked beat up, and the grounds/landscaping needed some major attention.  This was one of our many stays at this resort over the last 5+ years and it just didn't feel the same. It was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I see you have been in contact with Jennifer and she has followed up with you on these issues. I have also forwarded your comments to our housekeeping staff to use as a training opportunity.   We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Staff - They were well trained but also genuine. Everyone I interacted with was kind and friendly. The check-in time was reduced thanks to Karin pulling me aside. I was not a special guest, but she made me feel like one.  Hotel - The pool is very cool and there is a big water slide. There is also a quiet pool for adults. The hotel is not new, but this is good because it makes it a great value for the location. The Gym is very well equipped for a hotel and the location is great for running, beach activities, kayaking, and other fun water sports. There is even a small golf course on the hotel grounds. This is a great location to go to expensive restaurants or fun ones with kiddos.  Value - Totally worth the price. You are not getting a super updated fancy hotel, but you are going
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and  our resort amenities. We will be sure to share your great comments with our team.  We hope to see you back again very soon.

Summary: This hotel has old rooms with no decor, thin rugs and cheap furniture. At check in I was also assigned a room with a Murphy bed, which I did not find out about until I reached my rooms. Hotels should not have Murphy beds, but at a minimum should ask guests at check in if this is okay. Instead I had to call the front desk multiple times before anyone answered and ask to be moved. Beyond this, the minibar was not stocked and the food at the restaurant was mediocre.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I see our front office manager has been in contact with you in regards to your recent stay.  We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Stayed here for 6 nights as part of a California holiday. We chilled out and took the courtesy bus to he local mall which had bars and restaurants which were better value. My son loved the pool with the slide and we enjoyed the fire pits of an evening.   We did end up changing rooms due to the bed configuration not workong for us but the hotel was full so we had to wait 24 hours. Staff on reception were lovely and very accommodating.   Parking was luckily included in the deal we had with BA Holidays otherwise it would have been pricey and the parking lot was a bit a bit of a walk. You could however pull up outside and unpack / pack the car back up. We may have hired a car on-site rather than the airport if we did the trip again only after a long flight and baggage delays.   The
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: A nice peaceful resort among the orange county bustle.
Summary: While I would not have considered the newport beach property to be a family place (I would point to Huntington Beach for that), my son loved the kids pool area, the putting green, and the walks on the property. This hyatt has one of the best gyms of all the properties, even with outdoor spin bikes. It is a great hotel for walking both on and off the property. We did a quick weekend getaway but the local excursions to balboa island and the mall, in addition to the on-property amenities, made for a nice stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: It was a great place to stay, rooms were quite, the property was nice. Drink prices were on the high end 15-17 dollars a drink. And had about 30 dollars in extra charges/tax’s I wasn’t aware of. I would stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We will be sure to share that with our food and beverage team. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: I returned to Hyatt Newport Beach to celebrate July 4th at Newport Dunes this year! I stayed last year at a Villa with our own private pool. It's was fantastic until the city of Newport Beach kicked us out of the pool to check the water. We were furious, but did not have to pay for the room during our stay to compensate us. The manager Mr. Fink apologize and invited us back this summer.  We came back! The girl that checked me in was Sara. She did not even give me any eye contact and was NOT very friendly! Boooo! Maybe she was having a bad day? Who knows. But, I wanted to give a shout out to the valet service department! They hustled moving cars in and out the small entrance.  My son had foot surgery and was in a wheelchair. Those guys would pick us up with wheelchair on the golf
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  I apologize that your initial experience was not very pleasant, but we are happy to hear that Eric was able to turn things around for you. We will be sure to share this with him and the valet team. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: I am not certain if it was just our room or the facility.  We checked in near midnight so it was late after traveling that day.  We stayed on the ground floor looking out at Volleyball nets.  Parking is expensive but staff are friendly and prompt. The bar in the checkin area looked busy and was loud.  In the bathroom the walls were damaged with water.  Some kind of ick was on the floor in the corner so not clean.  Also killed two spiders in the bathroom.  It does not have central air but has an installed air unit.  It is blowing directly on the bed so gets incredibly cold or hot between turning on.  The desk looked like it had been there since the 70’s and the desk chair was all ripped.  The alarm Clock would have fit the very old version of iPods.  It just made the whole stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Do not give your credit card
Summary: the name does look like premium hotel but it is not in point of customer relation. If you have doubt of nay thing during your stay do not satisfy with staff explanation and confirmation. Do not leave the hotel without having solution with your problem

I stayed overnight for a professional meeting. The staff were prompt, very polite and professional, and the accommodations were superb. Room service meal was delivered in about 20 minutes, and soup was hot!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: They did a very good job for the conference.  Bar food is a little pricey ($4.50 for a small tub of yogurt!)  Banquet food was pretty good, lunch supplied by the hotel for 2 days was very good and plentiful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: I cannot wait to check out. This place is HORRENDOUS
Summary: This is our last night here and I cannot wait to check out. The first day we were given a room at one of their building that had a completely wet carpet with a nasty smell this was in their LIDO building. We asked to be moved right away and they they put us in their BALBOA building and this room had a faulty ac unit and a huge HOLE in the ceiling but we still spent two nights there because I wasn’t moving again. We needed up checking out to spend a night in San Diego but then came back to Hyatt for the rest of our trip, two more nights.  I asked to stay in the main building this time so they put us on the second floor of the CATALINA building. This room was a little more updated and had some views. The main issue with all the rooms especially this one is the NOISE. The person
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Very Nice hotel but room noisy
Summary: The hotel is very nice and has a nice bar and outside seeting area. The restaurant is good and offers a nice variety of dishes.The fitness area is pretty good and has enough machines to propose.The rooms in main building are pretty big and comfortable.My room was very noisy. I could hear the TV and conversations of the people above me.Overall stay was nice.

The grounds are beautiful, our room was comfortable and the service was excellent. The staff were friendly and very helpful from the planning process through the conference. You can borrow a bike to ride the Back Bay Trail which is right off the property.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This place is one step above motel 6. Small and smelly room. View of a construction site and room was in the very rear of property with no elevators, not nice for handicapped people. Never stay here again and will tell others to stay clear.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: the hotel is an old building that was recently refurbished, but many issues from the past still on it. A water pipe burst in the middle of the night and I had to be relocated, staff was professional and helpful to solve the issue. But the oldness of the hotel is noticeable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: READ BEFORE BOOKING! FIRST. Advertised rate, is not advertised rate. $189USD a night plus $56 taxes, plus $30.51 Resort fee. Total $275.51USD per night. SECOND. Car parking is over 500m away from accommodation, plus you pay $27 USD a night. Would be cheaper to park your car in town and Uber back and forth. THIRD. If you do book here, make sure you get a second, third level room. Unless you enjoy elephants walking around in the room above you and hallways. FOURTH. Staff walking around outside talking and wheeling trolleys at 6am in the morning. FIFTH. Great location. SIXTH. Told reception about complaints.. response.. "Sorry to hear, thank you for staying. Have a safe flight". That's it?

Very nice stay we were towards the back with a view onto the golf course in the neighbouring property. Staff very helpful and hotel is a very good standard. Look forward to returning some day. Highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great Stay and Super Friendly Staff
Summary: During my 4 day stay the staff was helpful and friendly all around the property. Really enjoyed my stay here and if your visiting Newport i would highly recommend. Only down side is parking whether your doing valet or self parking it'll cost you. Add that to the overall  price of staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The property needs a complete renovation. Feeling like we are staying in a 1980’s property it has cracks in the walls, water marks and old fittings in the bathrooms. The highlight was the bed which was very comfortable. The staff are well trained and trying to make good on an old property.

Summary Heading: Not the Hyatt Regency it used to be
Summary: I last stayed at this hotel about 15 years ago. My family vacationed in Newport Beach yearly and we stayed at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach for 4 years in a row. We absolutely loved the hotel - it was a beautiful, luxurious vacation spot. We even bought the same down comforters for our home because they were so comfortable!  When my husband and I decided to visit Newport Beach last week, I was so excited to share one of my favorite hotels with him. Although it boasts a ton of amenities and the shared spaces have been updated, this hotel is no longer an upscale gem in Newport Beach. I’ve stayed in Hyatt House and Hyatt Place hotels that were nicer than this Hyatt Regency. It seems like Hyatt has not updated this hotel since I stayed here over a decade ago! I travel often for
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Don't loose sight of what truely counts for a compfortable stay
Summary: Lacking the quality I expect from the Hyatt. Bathrooms need an overhaul. All frills but lost sight of fundamental quality of detail in terms of cleanliness. I'm not a germophobe, but I should not feel the need to wear sandals in the shower in fear of getting some bacterial infection. The new cosmetic changes are charming, but true service and relaxation starts when you feel like your at home in a comfortable clean room. Thank you for taking the time to read this review.
