Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Our 25th Wedding Anniversary, surprised Wife with a stay at hotel, and Boney James played a afternoon concert. VIP Service from Reservation Call to Checkout by Brendan, our room overlooked stage, Priceless!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel and for celebrating with us! We will be sure to share your comments with Brendan. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This is a 1960 motel masquerading as a Hyatt!!!!  Beautiful entrance , great reception area and bar.  But then the rooms and pools - a serious makeover is needed, in fact better to rebuild. Bathrooms are dreadful 1960 style, room walls are paper thin , upkeep is poor. I even complained about the housekeeping in the grounds and on the stairs. Does the Housekeeper have glasses I enquired pointing out glass shards.  Staff deserve much better than this as well as Hyatt customers

Summary Heading: Nice property, but thin walls and terrible room service
Summary: The property is nice and the service very professional and friendly, but I was disappointed by two things.  First, the walls of the rooms were really thin and I could hear everything that was said/done in the next room.  They weren't noisy, its just that the walls were so thin, I could her conversations, coughing, etc.  I had one of the worst nights sleep I've had in a hotel in a long, long time.  Second, the room service amounted to a paper bag with food in plastic "to go" containers and a packet with plastic silverware and a napkin.  It wasn't that it was cheap.  It was easily as expensive as any room service I've had in a high end hotel in any city center, but the experience was no where near expectations.  My plans of a nice dining experience on my balcony were not met.

Beautiful Grounds and wonderful staff! I come here regularly and they consistently exceed my expectations. The rooms are nice and comfortable with nice choice of comp toiletries, they have a water dispenser in lobby now, nice addition so you always have plenty of drinking water on your stay. Elegant yet fun atmosphere.

Great hotel for a event.  Staff is amazing and service is amazing! I would highly recommend the hotel for any event.  We have our annual conference there.  We have been there for 5 years and the service continues to get better and better every year!

The hotel is great, has 3 pools so every room is close to one, bikes and a golf course. Overall this pace is great. My only complaint is about the room we were given. Balboa room 714, you can hear every footstep in the hallway above and the bathroom did not have an exhaust fan which made it very wet and hot after showers.   Would def stay there again just hopefully in a different room.

Summary Heading: Another great experience with Hyatt Hotels
Summary: We hosted a company event this past weekend at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach.  The event coordinators were the best and the hotel itself is fun, convenient, friendly and inviting.  The pools are great and there's even a water slide at one of them.  The outdoor firepits are perfect for chilly SoCal nights.  All around a great experience and we will be back next year for sure!!!

The hotel was very clean, but small.  Did not have enough trash cans to suffice.  The housekeeping service was very sweet, but the breakfast was absolutely terrible and way overpriced.  I appreciated having all of the activities available during our stay. I would definitely stay there again.  But I will never order the food there again.

The resort was great exceptional staff Jennifer at the front desk was very helpful. Bob at the valet was great with kind words everyday Mike, Lupe, and Janet from housekeeping were great at maintaining our needs I would strongly recommend to stay at this resort

Really decent hotel. Nice rooms and location.   Parking lets you down though. It’s a hike from the self park to the room. Fortunately parking was included in our BA rate. Otherwise it would have been an expensive add on too.  Very friendly staff however...

Even though I live in OC but the staycation was fabulous. I felt I was at a resort. Great location and the staff was super friendly and always had a genuine smile. Excited to go back for the holidays this year.

Very nice hotel experience for a little getaway within 1.5 hr drive from home.  Hotel has some nice amenities included with golf, biking, and various other activities.  Like the close proximity to Fashion Island, Balboa Island and beaches.  Many good restaurants close by too.  The grounds are beautiful and lots of areas to enjoy some private time.  Would certainly return again.

Review title: super cool and fun but there needs to be privacy for the bathrooms. It gets weird and awkward when you share a room with strangers. So fix the doors and add a lock. That's pretty much it really

This resort was older and that didn't matter a bit as it was clean, beautiful and calming. It had a positive energy and the staff from check-in to housekeeping were sincere and friendly. If you have the chance to stay here then do because you will enjoy it.

One of the BEST experiences. Wonderful Hotel, Beautiful Setting, Awesome Customer Service, Absolutely loved everything about it!Definitely will be back! The local area is beautiful and the shuttle takes you to the perfect places.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are so pleased you enjoyed the property and look forward to having you return.

Summary: This hotel needs major upgrading in rooms as well as common areas. Our outside areas were not properly cleaned. I don't think anyone cared. The hotel doesn't fit such a big brand name Hyatt reputation.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  I am sincerely apologetic that you found the hotel condition unsatisfactory.

Summary: Ideal location to my party venue. Great service, immediate and responsive to customer's needs. Grounds are beautiful oasis. Room was spacious. I was escorted to my room by Host Exec. Very hospitable!!
Manager Response: Thanks Liz!  We are so pleased to hear that you had such a great experience on this very special occasion.

Summary Heading: Great Location in the Newport Beach Area
Summary: I have been a frequent guest of this property for the past 10 years.  With the renovation and upgrade of the hotel now complete, I enjoyed my recent stay.  The quality of the rooms now matches the splendid grounds at this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel is more of the old type of resort, with lots to do other than just have a decent room to stay in. It's a beautiful campus to walk around, with three pools, exercise room, volleyball, shuffleboard, etc. Just a few steps from the back of the property is the Upper Bay nature preserve, for running, walking, or bicycling. I only ate breakfast there, it was delicious, and the staff was very friendly and attentive. Since I sat on the patio, I got to watch a hummingbird feed on a bird-of-paradise flower. There's a free shuttle bus to the airport and a couple of other locations in town. If you want to get some fresh air and exercise while traveling for business, keep kids busy for a weekend, or just relax in the amazing weather, you will get a lot more here than in some
Manager Response: Your comments above really speak to the essence of who we are and the nostalgia that we feel the hotel offers.  Thank you so much for sharing.  We hope that you have the opportunity to return and spend some time with us again.

Summary Heading: Tired property and shouldn’t be called a resort
Summary: The title of my review says it all. Plus their menu prices are outrageous. I travel a lot for my job and can’t believe this property is getting away with these prices. You can’t call this property a resort...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments.  We are sincerely apologetic that we failed to meet your expectations.

Summary Heading: Nice staff and place to stay - horrible food
Summary: The hotel is very pleasant. Beds are comfortable and place is clean. Nice sitting patios connected to our room overlooking the patio. The food is horrible - do not waste your money eating at the restaurants. Overpriced too. Do not trust the vegetarian and vegan indicators as all their vegetarian food is cooked on the grill with the meat making it non vegetarian.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you found the hotel pleasant and comfortable.  We are apologetic that your food and beverage experience was such a disappointment.  We will be sure that the comments are shared with our culinary team.

Summary: We visited this hotel whilst on a road trip around California. We love the OC series and wanted to visit fashion island. We were taken aback by the pool area, quiet of the hotel, beautiful surroundings and impeccable staff. A hotel I will never forget and it's location is somewhere I will always want to return to.  Amazing - thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments.  It is awesome to hear that the hotel and staff made such an impression.  We do hope you will return and spend some more time with us.

Summary: We had a delightful wedding at the Newport Beach Hyatt Regency. I would highly recommend it. The hotel is beautiful, set on lovely grounds facing water. It's up to date ,very comfortable and well staffed. Everyone we dealt with went to extra mile for us. We were especially grateful to Breanna who helped us with the wedding planning and execution. We'd love to come back the next time we're in town.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your recent nuptials!  Thanks for letting Hyatt Regency Newport Beach be a part of your special day.  It is awesome to hear that Brianna was such an asset to you.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Check out the greatest jazz musicians on Friday nights in June until October at the Newport Beach Hyatt Regency! From Brian Culbertson to Chaka Khan, this venue has the best in an intimate setting. The amphitheater is fabulous! Tickets vary in price but worth the price. 2 more shows featuring Sergio Mendez and Boney James! The bar inside hosts live performance after the concert.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear that you enjoy our Concert Series.  This event is a long standing tradition at the hotel and one that we are very proud to continue.  We hope you will be able to attend the last concert for the season.  It is going to be a great show!

Summary: Stayed over for one evening so we can get to the airport in the AM.  Nice setting and grounds, nice suite #730, roomy, comfy, clean great shower pressure!!! Great caring staff that tended to our needs. Nice outdoor patio where we had a cocktail and we then went off to dinner. Well equipped gym where we spent an hour toning up!!! Starbucks takes over the bar area in the AM. We will be back!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to write your review.  We hope your next visit is longer!

Summary: We initially booked this hotel since it was very central to the beaches we wanted to visit. Appearance of the hotel is very nice and check in was very quick.  We had our own car and had to pay for the parking daily which was a bit of a let down - it should be included in the price.  Unfortunately we did not have enough time at the hotel to view the whole premises or make use of all the services as most of our time was spent at the beaches since we had limited time.  However the time at the hotel was so much fun.  The kids loved the pool and all the activities and the outdoor movie night was really such a nice touch.  We were able to order pizza from the restaurant and eat on the loungers while we watched a movie.  The warm water jet pool was great.  Slides and fun for kids a
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We love that your family had the chance to enjoy our Dive In Movie!  We hope during your next visit that you get a chance to explore the whole property and utilize all of our services.

Summary: Everyone i interacted with was very pleasant and made me feel welcome. Very comfortable bed. Vibrant lobby bar with specialty cocktails. Hallway smells really bad and gives away the age of the hotel. Wish they could fix that.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about our staff.  We truly believe they are what makes us a unique and desired location in our area.  Some of our associates have been at the hotel for over 30 years!

Summary: We had been on the road for over two weeks with another six nights to go when we arrived in L.A. Our room was pre paid so check in was quick and easy. Our bags were delivered to a spacious room, well appointed & with plenty of power & USB connections as well as Wi Fi & a balcony view over a fountain & garden lined path leading back to reception. My wife appreciated the bath tub however the bathroom itself was a bit cramped.  If the resort itself is your destination, than you will be well catered for with three seperate pool & spa areas, tennis courts, nine hole golf course & gym. In addition there was the facility to hire, cars, motorbikes & electric pushbikes all on site. The grounds & gardens are well maintained with garden lined paths making for easy access to all areas of
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  The Southern CA traffic definitely makes driving to a number of the destinations your mentioned very cumbersome.  We are certainly sorry that you were not on property to have an opportunity to enjoy the resort.

Summary Heading: Good location clean but lots of planes
Summary: Clean hotel and our room was near the tennis court and fairly quiet.  They did have some weddings and concerts that might have disturbed other quests.  Comfortable bed smaller bathroom and nice balcony with a table and chairs.  No elevator to the second floor.  Our conference room was round and very nice.  It is near the airport and you hear a lot of planes. Good shuttle service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  It sounds like you attended a meeting in our Terrace Ballroom.  We love the uniqueness of that specific meeting space and all of the natural light the room gets.

Summary Heading: Great place for a weekend getaway!
Summary: Very nice hotel, made me feel like I’m on vacation somewhere tropical. Busy place but it was fun seeing all the people around and a beautiful wedding. Kids enjoyed the water slide and pool. It’s a pet friendly hotel. Will bring my little puppy next time.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback and for staying with us!  We are so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time here.  We look forward to meeting your furry family member the next time you return.

Summary Heading: Brian Culbertson weekend at the Hyatt
Summary: We came for the jazz concert and had a very nice time. The room was pretty small over the bungalows and the people next to us and below us were very loud. The valet boys were very nice, check in clerks were very friendly as well. The $12 tiny glass of wine at the concert was crazy over priced. The next morning breakfast which included two eggs over easy, wheat toast and bacon was $18. Absolutely incredibly over priced so we left before ordering. I would think that they would want to have more people enjoy their dining facilities and charge at least $10 less for such a small breakfast than having people go a block up the road to have a meal. Over all, the grounds were very nice, sitting area's very cozy and nice pool area's as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for attending the concert event.  The concert events here are a long tradition for the hotel and something we are very proud to host.  We appreciate the notes regarding your food and beverage experience and will be sure to review with the team.

Summary Heading: Wonderful... not your typical Hyatt though
Summary: We spent the weekend at the Hyatt Newport Beach and it was perfect for our little family.  We checked in the wait wasn’t too bad but it was 3pm and two big wedding groups were checking in at the same time.  We were given a room in The Bay building which is the building surrounding the largest pool- the pool w the water slide, splash pad, putting green, corn hole and ping pong.  Great location for our daughter who is five.  Our room had this cool little alcove with a day bed and trundle and of course a king bed as well.  The bathroom was updated and really big. I grabbed a coffee every morning from the coffee shop in the lobby which was run by some very friendly ladies.  Parking was pretty convenient- didn’t love the fee but I guess it’s normal in SoCal. We did use the little
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  It is wonderful to hear that the room and experience were perfect for you and your family.  We look forward to having you return.

Summary: This is a resort. It is nice, but the food and beverages are dramatically overpriced. I ordered 2 Jameson's (whiskey) with dinner one night and the drinks alone came to $30 - the most I have ever paid. The housekeepers left me water when I left them a $5 tip, but left me no water the one day I left a $2 tip. The hotel hosted a raging party one night when I was trying to work - it was literally right in front of my room and I felt like I was living inside of a stereo speaker. It is a nice looking resort, but for me staying there was kind of frustrating and the management seemed out of touch with their clientele.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment on your experience.  We are sincerely apologetic that the pool event hosted one night of your stay was so disruptive and that bottled water was not placed in your room everyday.  We do appreciate all of the feedback and will use the info moving forward to better service all guest that are on property.

Summary: Staying for the Brian Culbertson concert. I have been to the hotel before for concerts, but never stayed. The rooms smelled of mold, it was very musty. The building we stayed in had no elevator, thank God they put us on the first floor. The towels are very thin, no Central air. The staff was very friendly I must say. Corporate needs to stop being cheap and update this hotel from the 70s. Come for the concerts, but don't stay over night!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment on your experience.  The Summer Concert Series is a long standing tradition of the hotel and something we are very proud to host.  I am certainly sorry that the stay was such a disappointment.  We sincerely appreciate the feedback.

Summary: I had a wonderful experience this past summer at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. I was meeting my best college friend for the weekend and this was the perfect place to stay. The location was amazing and we really enjoyed how easily accessible it was to places including Balboa Peninsula and Huntington Beach. The employees were so genuinely kind and helpful. Such a beautiful property with a wonderful golf course. I highly recommend it to everyone who is considering staying there.
Manager Response: Thanks for your sharing the feedback about your experience!  We hope you have the opportunity to visit again soon.

Summary: Stayed for wedding. Booked Hyatt expecting level of upscale amenities typical of the chain. Lovely grounds but while room was nicely sized the furnishings and decor was very basic and not quite up to Hyatt standards. Not bad but not quite worth the price. Parking could have been included for the cost.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We do appreciate the insight provided.

Summary: I went for business, but I paid $255 out of my own money to go one day early. I have to say, I was so disappointed. All of the doors are on the exterior. There’s at least a two-inch gap underneath the door which fronts to the outside. I caught a lizard in my room one morning, and I saw countless critters outside. I know you can’t control the outdoors, but I’d think they’d at least be on top of keeping it clean. For four out of the five nights I was there, the same room service trash sat just outside of my door (it wasn’t mine). I know it was the the same trash because it never moved or changed.   Trash was scattered three of the five nights I stayed there. It was explained that they had raccoons. Okay? You know this? CLEAN IT UP.   My room faced the Oasis pool, which wasn’t the

We were disappointed with the Hyatt Regency in Newport Beach as we expected the same at the Hyatt Regency in Huntington Beach.  The hotel is in need of renovation and the pool area needed maintenance to fix broken paving around the pool.   The pool and jacuzzi in particular did not appear to be particularly clean with a fair bit of mould and general disrepair.    Our room smelled very strongly of damp although the balcony over looking the garden was good to have.  In all fairness to the hotel we didn't raise this with them as we were only there 3 nights and spent very little time at the hotel.   With some investment this could be a really good hotel.

Fantastic and beautiful grounds, staff were great and food was really good, especially the "meat lovers flat bread".  Have stayed there approximately 6 times and will continue to stay there. Have stayed in other hotels in other locations but none as good as this Hyatt. The Friday night concert was great, we sat on our balcony and watched and listened.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your experience.  It is great to know that you are a repeat guest and that you are a fan of our Concert Series.  We have 3 more shows left this year and certainly hope you have the opportunity to return for one of them!

Summary: Not terrible, but needs some renovation. Employees were pretty good with a few lame exceptions. Food was pretty bad. Overall disappointing experience and I really wanted to like this place. We wouldn’t come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We are certainly sorry that we failed to meet your expectations.

Summary Heading: Not what you expect from Hyatt Regency
Summary: Very surprised this property is in the HR class. It is obviously older, very dated looking. The layout is rambling, and the section for my room, 'Bay' was on the far side of the property, accessed by walking down stairs and all around the main pool. It looked like a motel. Room was stale smelling. Mattress lumpy, uncomfortable. Window out to walkway and view from their of parking lot. WiFi was free and worked OK in most places. Food was pricey - it is Newport Beach. The lounge and restaurant were packed with local people coming for a jazz concert on the lawn. This precluded guests from getting good service. One drink per hour, basically. I do not recommend this hotel and will not stay here again.

When our family first arrived, the area of the property and 2 rooms that we were given seemed a little bit "tired and worn". but everything was kept extremely clean and as time went on (one part of family stayed 2 nights, and one part stayed 3) we all liked it more and more because ALL the staff that we came into contact with was SO nice and friendly and this property was very efficiently run.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments regarding our staff.  We have some amazing and well tenured associates at the hotel.  They truly create a one of a kind experience.  We look forward to having you stay with us in the future.

Summary: I was playing a tennis tournament at the site.  The staff was very helpful  the facilities were first rate, extremely clean and everything was very convenient. Excellent pool, jacuzzi and workout room. Quick breakfast available at the bar very convenient.

The guest rooms had a moldy smell and felt very stuffy although the beds were very comfy .The family pool smelled like sewage and was infested with mosquitoes that wouldn’t let us relax . The kids slide was uneven and hurt my kids back . On the positive side customer service was great and staff made us feel welcome .

Summary Heading: Kid magnet not a restful stay for an adult
Summary: So I spent some time at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach, CA  It lists itself as a four star hotel - really it should be a 3 Star, it is old. While the housekeeping staff is really nice and friendly- the service leaves things to be desired - like fresh toiletries ( if not every day, how about ever other day) but a week without refresh on toiletries is a bit long.   I found candy wrappers next to my bed from the guests before me.   The lighting in the room and bath leave me wanting. The shower area is basically not lighted very well - dark.   A guest left a box of beer bottles outside his room and one would assume it would be picked up. I saw it for a couple days and when I left - they were still there.  This hotel is a kid magnet, could be the giant water slide at the main pool.

Summary Heading: N Cal Visit S. Cal Amazing Stay
Summary: The hotel is set on a huge parcel - open to eye, and very user friendlyOld school general layout where the land was to be the future - with no reason to stack up twenty stories plusYou got love this place - our goals involve Family - Business - Friends, Couples etc.The staff are Top ShelfThe food and drink is @ restaurant Cadillac - And the Pool - with the huge slide - Kids said is off the hook - This kid that is!The people are amazingThe property is in NewportEnough SaidJim

Summary Heading: Definitely not my new home away from home
Summary: I was here due to unfortunate circumstances - my house was rendered uninhabitable due to a slab leak.  I do not think that the staff took the time to empathize with this situation.  Instead it was like living in a fishbowl.   While most of the staff is friendly, I couldn’t help but feel that some of them were just fake.  Further the quality of the guests is questionable.  There are some great people who stay there, and then you have your in your face trashy busy bodies.   I don’t love dealing with people so it was a lot to handle. I think I’m just way to east coast for west coast drama

Summary Heading: Beware of Bate & Switch when Booking This Property
Summary: Sadly, we were greatly disappointed this Labor Day weekend at the Hyatt Newporter.  We booked four rooms for four nights over the Labor Day weekend back in February 2018 using the hyatt.com site.  We made a special request to have all four rooms on the third floor of the Catalina Building.  The Check-in process took approximately 40 minutes as they had put our rooms down on the 1st floor.  The check-in clerk was very defensive telling me I booked the room rate for first floor rooms.  There is no indication anywhere on the Hyatt.com site that gives a price by floor.This property is a campus style property with multiple two and three story buildings.  Some rooms face the golf course, some face the pool, same face the bay, some face the other building and some face the parking lot.
Manager Response: I am sincerely sorry that your experience was not as it has been in years past and that your check in took an extended period of time.  Our campus style layout and four different buildings offer a multitude of different options in regards to locations and views as you have noted above.  Currently we offer a variety of different room types including standard, balcony, pool and bay views in addition to our suites and villas.  If ever there is a very specific request we are more than happy to assist with making sure your reservation is booked to meet your location and view requests.  Our in house reservations manager as well as any of the members of our front office team are very well versed in this area and available 24 hours a day.

Summary: We arrived at 1.30 am after a cancelled and then delayed flight. The reception staff helped us to our room and made us feel very welcome. We had a balcony room overlooking the golf course which was quiet and peaceful. The kids enjoyed the swimming pools. Great location. My Husband was able to paddle board every day - just a short walk to the water where he SUP'd around the local mansions!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Location is great, near Fashion Island and beaches.  Hotel staff and exterior is nice however the interior rooms (Bay bldg) were very outdated. Ac, windows, shutters, weird bathroom layout, made the room feel like a motel. The main pool also had a motel feel. Considering that it’s in Newport Beach, was expecting it to be nicer especially for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, but could be better.
Summary: Admittedly expected a little more from the Hyatt brand with this hotel. The location is good and the main reception / bar / pool areas are nice. The rooms are basic and the hotel does feel very much like a ‘motel style’. We had some issues with our stay but they were dealt with appropriately by the hotel management.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: Booked the 2 nights. Check-in was fast, and efficient. The room is spacious, but a bit dated...The hotel looks like an upscale motel. It is very cenvenient if you want to stay for a couple of days and if you have a car. The parking is just $27 per day and there are plenty of spaces. Have not tried the pools, but they look decent. Probably the best choice in the area for below $300/night
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Resort for four nights. There was a wide variety of activities for kids. There are three different pools throughout the hotel. One has a water slide and tends to be more kid friendly. The other two pools were quieter. All had hot tub areas but I felt the temperature was too hoot and did not use. Just off the lobby was a nice outside area for sitting at night just off the bar. There was a nice fire pit set up there. There were many other fire pits located throughout the hotel area. Rooms were very clean and nice and quite. We found the staff to be super friendly and accommodating. There was food available but we did not utilize this. We were very happy with our stay at the hotel/resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We had four nights here at the end of our holiday and the hotel is actually very nice, clean, with attentive staff and a great pool. The bar and food is expensive for what it is but its a small gripe. The pool is really nice and the spoolside service was really nice to have.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: I would recommend this to anyone that is looking to host a conference in Southern California. The service and food was great. I loved my room and heard nothing but good things from other colleagues as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We are happy to hear your enjoyed your conference and we hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: BAD BIT: So it would have been a 5 star review however, on our arrival the lady on reception got everything wrong.She asked us to pay $1000 as a holding deposit incase of any damages made throughout our stay and told us we hadn’t paid enough to our travel operator.Both wrong.This to us was unacceptable, as nowhere on their webpage does it explain that you will be charge $1000 straight away for any damages.$270 for resort fee yes but, $1000 for damages NO.! Anyway we got that sorted by paying the resort fee in cash $305.09 in full thats with tax.  GOOD BIT:  Hotel was lovley, all the staff were welcoming and polite.Special mention to David on reception & Nicholas on pool slide.  Set in beautiful gardens overlooking Newport Dunes.3 pools, all with a hot tub and the main pool has a

Great conference destination away from the chaos of regular life. Food was great, staff were great, free, hourly shuttle to John Wayne Airport. Quick Lyft ride to evening destinations in the area. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your conference getaway and hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary Heading: Nice Hyatt property, close to Balboa Island and Fashion Island
Summary: Nice Hyatt property, not luxurious but well located in Newport Beach. Spacious grounds and comfortable rooms. The pool areas are nice, the adult pool better if not traveling with kids. Overll, a good option for the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: Wonderful Stay.  The grounds are well kept and beautiful. Staff is fantastic. Great place for kids and families.  Balboa island is a nice walk away.   As a globalist was upgraded to a suite which gave us more than enough room. Only negative is that we could here running and thumping from the room above. We will definitely be back.  Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We appreciate your loyalty! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and apologize for the noise. We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: I stayed at the Hyatt Regency with my wife and two children for four nights during our recent California road trip holiday.  It was the best four nights of the two weeks we were in the USA.  The hotel was comfortable, had great amenities, friendly helpful staff and a good atmosphere. The kids loved the pool.  The hotel was convenient for Disney (less than 30 mins) but near to the lovely coastal town of Newport Beach.  Balboa Island and the nearby beaches are beautiful.  Thanks Hyatt!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We just came back from a few days at the Hyatt during our week vacation in California. It was a great pick for us.  We found it to be clean, quiet and to have many options for pool time. we stayed over a weekend.  It was a short walk to Balboa Island.  This resort was located so close to food stores, shopping, beach and relaxation.Our room was clean and right next to the pool.  this made is so easy to go from the pool to our room.  we really enjoyed our stay.  we would come back again. It was busy since they had a Peter Cetera concert their our second night there.  It's close to Balboa Island and peninsula.  We did need to drive to the beach on the peninsula but it's a short drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Good location but rooms nothing to write home about, old and small. Some of our family paid for view rooms when reserved and did not get them.  The hotel did refund the extra charge but no attempt to move them was made.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: I liked my room as it was well serviced clean and comfortable, the only thing that was a bother was the smoke detector going off due to failing batteries on my last morning, and the previous night when I tried to have a quite relaxing dip in the hot tub and pool, I encountered two racoons that made me quite nervous and another guest had to warn me about one behind me, eventually I ran back to my room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. Due to our close proximity to the back bay, occasionally raccoons will come on property. We are currently working on a solution to limit the encounters with our guests. I apologize for the inconvenience. Should your travels bring you back to Newport Beach, we hope to welcome you back again.

Summary Heading: If you don’t mind no sleep
Summary: Beautiful hotel, but they don’t tell you it’s on a flight path and the the first flight is 7am. This makes a lovely wake up call unless the cleaning staff are cleaning on a ride on at 6:40am outside your room!Good for early birds!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Great resort hotel with good facilities and friendly staff
Summary: Great location with amazing beaches.  Comfortable rooms although the beds were a little soft.  Decent pools and a free (for one round) nine hole golf course which was fun.  We didn't have time to use the free bikes or play tennis, etc.  They have a Starbucks on site which is great for a, relatively, cheap breakfast.  Everyone was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Had a quick trip and stayed here for one weekday evening recently. Decent location but not ideal to walk to anywhere. There is a shuttle that runs on a schedule to the mall and airport.  Would be a good family hotel based on the 3 pools and extracurricular activities (golf, tennis, shuffle board, lawn chess, etc).  This is a large property and overall I think this is an average Hyatt Regency based on where it’s located.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: Stayed at this property for 2 nights for a work function.  Upon check in, the location was perfectly located in the heart of newport beach, friendly staff and a good swimming for kids.  Once entered the hotel on my way towards my room, it really reminded me of a high end motel with higher end clientele.  Give it a 2 star truly based on the location, place needs remodeling big time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Should your travels bring you back to Newport Beach we hope to welcome you back to our hotel.

Summary: Had a bad experience, room smelled had bugs and noise level was loud. Could hear every flush shower and door in the entire area. Unit smelled so bad we had to leave the first day as soon as we checked it. Food was over priced and staff actually lied to us about eating locations around resort when asked.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I have sent you a private message so we can get more information about your recent stay. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Felt like a motel in a poor disguise
Summary: This is a four star hotel? Service and quality was on par with a motel type establishment. The whole experience was frustrating from start to finish. Our room was downgraded last minute when we tried to check in because another customer decided to "extend their stay?" after we paid top dollar for a reservation and had our hearts set on the bay view room. They said they would call once downgraded room was ready and after several hours, they didn't. Once we got to the room things were in disrepair. Front Door would not close and I had to wait nearly 40 minutes for someone to come fix it after calling front desk twice, bathroom door would not close due to being warped, there were bugs in the room (2 moths and a spider). Noisy, paper thin walls, creaky old rooms with popcorn
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Hard to Believe this is a Hyatt !!! Absolutely Awful !!!
Summary: Hyatt is normally my brand of choice when I have to stay at a hotel chain. Unfortunately this particular Hyatt is absolutely bottom of the barrel. Our room was a dated, shabby, dump that seemed more like a lousy motel than a Hyatt Regency !!  Small old bathrooms, stained carpet, furniture from 1987, tacky IKEA type motivational prints on the walls, worn sheets on the beds (no duvet), a loud rattling ancient air conditioning unit and paper thin walls. We could hear the entire conversation of the people in the next room when they were speaking normally. Everything about this hotel is awful and screams dated and antiquated !   Upon check out I asked the snotty front desk attendent when the last time the hotel was renovated. She told me “every 2 years something is done, and 2 years
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt and for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve.  I apologize that your experience was so negative. I also apologize that the information you were given about the renovation was incorrect. All of our guest rooms were renovated at the same time. I would like to get more information from you about the room you stayed in and the host that checked you out. I will send you private message to get more details about your stay.  We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: awful experience- false advertising on website and brochure
Summary: Worst hyatt stay ever. Dated rooms, cracked ceilings, poor housekeeping, old worn out pool. dirty refrigerator that would not cool past 50degrees. Staff did not care not offer help. Called manger over to see state of room and she offered no concessions for the poor quality and sloppy housekeeping service.
Manager Response: Good afternoon Rachel,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I see our Housekeeping Manager has reached out to you in regards to your experience at our hotel. I hope he was able to resolve this matter for you. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Room was in the corner and they put their defect beds right next to the room as if they have no storage. The AC was poor. The pool filled with chlorine. A motel but charged like a resort. I will not recommend this for anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: I stay at this hotel several times a year, and have for over 20 years. The staff is exceptional and makes my visits feel like I’m surrounded by friends. The location is PERFECT. A short walk to Balboa Island and near so many fun things to do.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel and your loyalty! We hope to see you back again very soon!

Summary Heading: Normal place, as many other brands
Summary: Nothing espectacular, in fact, we received a much better experience on second brands hotels. Cleaning...hair on the shower, pillows all different, dirty dishes on the aisle for several days, music loud since 8am
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Beautiful grounds with somewhat worn and dated rooms.
Summary: The hotel is located in a beautiful setting with very well manicured grounds / landscaping, but our room (especially the bathroom) was quite dated and in badly in need of updating. The freezer in refrigerator appeared to have not been defrosted in months. I have no complaints about the service or any of the staff as they were cordial and prompt.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Your concerns have been forwarded to our housekeeping team to check the refrigerator in your guest room. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon.

Summary: My AC did not work the first night 8/2/18 I spoke with front desk staff on the morning of 8/3. They told me that if a door or window was open, the AC turns off. I explained that no door or window was open. They made some adjustments (I was not physically there). It worked then went off again the night of 8/3. 8/4, I called. I explained that my AC was set to 64 but the room temperature was 80 degrees (at 6 am) I was told again that if a door was open, the AC turns off. I explained that this was not applicable. I was told that it also turns off in the absence of activity so my sleeping may have turned it off. I thanked the person and hung up.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and your loyalty to Hyatt. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: We stayed for a week and booked two connecting rooms for our family. We were on the first floor in the main bldg and a nice terrace leading out to grassy area and the pavilion for concerts which we heard on aFriday night.  Very courteous staff, and the gym was nice.  As noted elsewhere, it’s a little run down and the property reminds me of a motor lodge back in their hey day, albeit a nice one.  Convenient to Balboa Island, Newport area and Irvine.    Housekeeping was great the whole time and polite.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary Heading: Awesome Stay over the 4th of July
Summary: This review comes a month late but was certainly deserving. My friends and I have been staying here for the week of the 4th for the past 5-8 years. The location is amazing, close to all sorts of beaches, shopping and restaurants (though I do recommend having a car). The rooms are nice and there is a ton of fun activities to keep all ages stimulated. We swam in their many pools, played golf, used the neighboring tennis club (daily) and used their workout room. They also have bikes to rent and go all over - really a good offering of amenities to make a trip of any duration enjoyable.   I would like to call special attention to the barista ladies; Alejandra and Adriana, who took care of us every morning. They were extremely hospitable, nice, hard working and remember us every year.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We will be sure to share this with Alejandra and Adriana's managers. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I wish I could write a better review for this Hotel because I am positive that this property did have it's day and I've stayed there so many times, prior to renovations, etc.   At the end of the day, its a great average property but it's not really up to what I would, in any case, consider the "Hyatt Regency" standards if you're going by that reputation. Check it out well prior to booking.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and your loyalty to Hyatt. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: OK hotel, let down by check-in/out staff and poor attention to cleaning around the pool
Summary: Room not ready at 4pm check-in. Had to keep check myself, no knowledge of local attractions, given a scripted piece of paper, when asked questions staff said Google it! Checkout never asked how was stay?
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: If you're going to Balboa Island or the beach, great location. We even drove to Universal Studios on a Monday morning from here, took 1.5 hours there (6am), and 1 hour on the way back (10pm). The pool without the slide was nice, great temp and it's salt water so it's soft on your skin. Smore's was a nice treat!  The golf course needs some work.  Fun time riding bikes.  Shopping and food galore surrounding the area.  Overall a good family experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: As far as hotels go this one needs some work. Got an ADA room that smelled awful, stain on the couch, fridge rattling (they replaced it) and just not what I’d expect from a HYATT let alone a HYATT Regency. Tried to move but Mia couldn’t seem to be able to find a room that was any better.  Nor could she explain the options very well. Offered an upgrade but it had a view of parking lot! And said they are sold out every night.   Then at dinner we ordered drinks and meals and asked for bread and were informed it is $4.00. Really! $27 self parking and we are just about to scream.   Too bad. Great central location but we’d be hard pressed to come back. It’s going to be a long couple of days ... at least it is work and not vaca.

This is our 5th time staying at this Hyatt and we always have a good time. We stay here overnight when we go see Pageant of the Masters during the summer. It is conveniently 10 minutes away from Laguna Beach, so it works out perfectly.   My kids love the pool. And the staff is very accommodating.    Down the street, we always eat at True Food Restaurant everytime we're down here. We also visit Crystal Cove Beach and eat at the restaurant over there as part of our family tradition.   Overall, we have such a great experience and pleasant memories when we stay here at the Newport Hyatt.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: had a great stay very clean good food and great drinks close to the beach, great place to stay for vacation, great place for kids nice pool with a kids water slide and a golf course, staff  was very nice and help ful
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I've attended the Summer Series at the Hyatt-Newporter, in Newport Beach, California, since 1996. This past weekend, we celebrated my husband's and youngest daughter's birthdays, in conjunction with the Vincent Ingala concert.  It was a great time; the weather was beautiful...the concert was all that I expected, and more, and my family really enjoyed their time at the property.   I look forward to my next stay, and the Hyatt-Newporter really is
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon for another show!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 8 nights, it is a lovely hotel, location is excellent and staff were all very nice. The room was very clean and pleasant and had everything we needed. My only criticism is we had breakfast included in our room charge, I checked this twice on our first morning and was told it was included, when we got our bill they tried to charge us for breakfast, it was quickly removed without any fuss, but I just feel that the staff on reception should have noticed this so that we would not have to bring it to their attention. It just makes you feel that they were hoping we didn’t notice. I’m sure that’s not the case but maybe better checks should be put into place. Other than that I would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I have sent you a private message to get more information about your recent stay. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: Very good stay at an excellent location
Summary: This hotel was a great venue for both business and leisure purpose. It was very well set up, rooms very clean and excellent support with special requests. The catering is great too especially breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Mediocre Room for a high price.
Summary: The rooms were ok and the view consisted of the used towel bin and some random junk left behind the hotel.  The resort seemed nice but the room was definitely lacking considering the price. I highly recommend you verify which room you get prior to showing up.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. To request a specific room location please email qualitynewpo@hyatt.com. Should your travels bring you back to Newport Beach, we hope to welcome you back to our hotel!

Summary: I have not encountered a worse place than this when it comes to hidden fees. I was told that parking was included in the resort fees but when I had checked out, they tried to charge me an additional fee for self parking. That does not make sense for me to have to pay for parking if I had to do it myself. Yes, there was valet, but I bet that there would have been a fee for that too. They should include these fees when they set the price online. I will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I apologize that you were misinformed about our fees. When booking the reservation our resort fee and parking prices are listed in the details portion of the reservation confirmation. I apologize for the miscommunication. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: We travelled up and down the west coast from Sonoma to Newport Beach so we had some direct comparisons. After a phenomenally expensive two nights in Santa Barbara ($1000) we arrived at Newport Beach feeling a little jaded. Driving in we were happy to see it just like the photos online, and very happy with the check in. Our room was lovely, quiet and easy to get to. It’s a very spacious property and well serviced with friendly staff. The bed was very comfy, recently renovated with a great, neat bathroom and good amenities. Yes the self park is a 5 min walk but nothing too arduous at all and you can always drop your guest at the top if they can’t walk. The self park fee is $27 and the valet park is $36. Not sure why we got charged both on the first day, which I though was a little
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and we were able to turn your vacation around. Should your travels bring you back to Newport Beach, we hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This property is old and dated. It’s more like an old motel. Certainly Not 4 Star. The worst Hyatt I’ve ever stayed at. I will no longer trust the Hyatt brand really. The website photos are completely deceiving. The carpets in the corridors are dirty and old, the bathrooms are from previous decades, the rooms are totally disappointing. (Stay away particularly from the Lido building) ‘Hyatt’ you’ve lost a loyal customer in me with this terrible property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and your loyalty to Hyatt. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Make sure you take advantage of all the fun that the resort offers.  I don't think it is promoted as well as it could be.  Complementary 9 hole golf and bike check out-- not well promoted and great fun for ages 5-65.   The pool area is great fun with the slide.  I thought the drinks at the pool were overpriced-- that was disappointing.  The coffee bar was fantastic and a decent value.  Overall... it is a resort and you should be pleased with the offerings. IF you don't have kiddos... then request a room away from the pool.  The pool opens at 7am and those kids are having fun at that time.... YOU will be awake early and wanting to join them OR scream at them.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! This is great feedback. We will definitely share it with our team so we can point out the great inclusions of our resort fee. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Resort - room not so clean.
Summary: The landscaping is beautiful, manicured to perfection!  The master gardeners deserve a raise!    Maybe just maybe when checking in, and the request is four keys, a note can be added, stating ‘4’, so the housekeepers know 4 sets of towels! Ok, first request, understandable, 2nd request, 2nd day, please pay attention, 3rd request, 3rd day- come on!! 4th request, 4th day- terribly annoying and someone really should pay attention!  Now the air vent - it is DISGUSTING! Just because the beds are made and hopefully sheets are clean doesn’t mean the room has been ‘cleaned’.   I would have mentioned this to the management  while we were there but I’m not convinced it would have been cleaned thoroughly and without careful attention to cleaning the bed and surrounding area.   Please vacuum
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. We would like to get a little more information from you so we can identify our areas of opportunity. If you could please message us the name on your reservation or room number so we can follow up with our team, it would be greatly appreciated.  If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: When I heard where we were staying it was so exciting, but so disappointed on the comfort of the bed. Hard as a rock. I’ve had better days in Ayers hotels . By the time we headed out of there my back was hurting so bad, I’m sure to go back to therapy for how stiff my back was. I couldn’t sleep the first night and by the second day I was so tired from not sleeping from the first.  My poor husband woke up early because his back and hips hurled so much. We did ask to have us moved but no rooms to change to. They said they were booked. Never again. Won’t be going back..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Great location but lack all the things that the Huntington Beach property offers.  My family has stayed at over 40 Hyatt properties and I would would recommend that property.  As a second this is a serviceable place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: Great clean hotel with friendly staff!
Summary: We enjoyed our recent stay at this hotel.  My husband and I came for business (for me) and vacation (for him) and we were both very pleased with the proximity to recreation and dining spots.  We would love to visit again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: As the conference chair I can’t say enough about the hospitality of the hotel entire staff!  From the time I checked in until the time I checked out I felt that they truly cared.  Great hotel and location!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The hotel was nice but the patio lounge food was expensive and not  good at all. The fire wall / pit were beautiful ambience for relaxing outside. We self parked and checked out of the hotel on the TV in our room and it instructed us to leave the keys in our room yet when we tried to get out of the self parking lot for the last time we needed our key. Very frustrating.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I have shared your comments with our food and beverage team to discuss when planning our new menu. We hope to welcome you back for a better experience!

Summary: Food was good, servers were painfully slow. Water was shut off for 4 hours without warning and no apology.  Golf course is really for kids or people who don’t play a lot. Views were not great. There is a harbor, but boat storage in front of it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Every year the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach host a Smooth Jazz Festival. This year was not a disappointment. The lineup was amazing and the weather was superb. We ate great food and listened to some amazing jazz musicians. We laughed so hard I almost pee’d on myself. I would suggest to those who have never been to at least participate one time you’ll be hooked. Life is short take it by the horns and ride.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: A betrayal of the Hyatt brand.
Summary: Stunned by this disgusting property. It’s nothing like experiences at others. From now on I’ll question whether or not I have faith in staying at any Hyatt with which I’m unfamiliar. Remove the name from the marquee.

Summary: A group of family and friends met for a yearly birthday celebration. We were able to all get rooms in the same area and the hotel staff were very accommodating.  The hotel staff were very friendly and we really enjoyed our stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating with us and the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This old Hyatt property is not really a resort, nor does it treat clients like resort visitors.  Rooms are aged... parking and resort fees are excessive.  If you are a Globalist (top level) of Hyatt, don't expect any preferencial treatment that you would be accustomed to at any other property.  The breakfast is nice and what one should expect at any Hyatt property.  Recommend considering the Marriott or Pelican nearby as a good option.

Summary: Had a great stay at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach.  Hotel had a good location, was convenient for both Newport Beach fun and nearby work.  Food at Shor and at the bar was great. Service was attentive and we really enjoyed the hotel pools.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Location and amenities were wonderful, within walking distance to Balboa Island. However the room was average with more of a motel feel located next to the water slide. Also the food was expensive as well as the resort fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: Tired and in need of professional care and repair
Summary: This hotel is in desperate need of updating and renovation.  Dirty deck areas with seagull and gum droppings everywhere,  needs a deep pressure, wash.  Exterior doors and windows are in need of paint.  Entry doors near pool area did not have thresholds allowing air, dirt and possible bugs entry.

Summary: We love this hotel.  Close to everything in Newport/Laguna area.  The staff are great and the property is wonderful.  Three pools--even one with water play and a slide for this kids.  Highly recommend it for a little vaca or a long stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I was a single person traveling for business. I was given a room in the family section. Way to noisy for me I could not go into the pool till after 7pm because kids were throwing balls, doing cannonballs running, ect. and I wasn't up to that. crying baby in the room next to me morning and evening. I wouldn't stay there again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We apologize for you were placed near the kids pool. If you would like to email us your name we can update your profile to keep you in a room away from the children's pool. You can email your request to qualitynewpo@hyatt.com.  We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary Heading: The best for a quick weekend getaway
Summary: The hotel grounds are magnificent and include a 9 hole golf course and tennis courts. There are 3 beautiful pools. The hotel is low rise with rooms spread in separate buildings around the resort. Hotel services could not have been better. We received such attention that it felt like family treating us. My wife is mobility impaired and a golf cart was always available to assist her as needed. The bellman service was wonderful in that regard. The pools are very nice and food and beverage services were available at the pools. Breakfast at the restaurant was wonderful. Food was abundant and the server's attention could not be beat. We can't wait for the opportunity for a return visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We stayed in a standard king and paid what we'd usually expect a good quality stay for. It was quite disappointing. The room looked like it had been thrown together with an enormous tv balanced on a cabinet at an angle that you couldn't see it from the bed. The sheets had a rip and stain on them which wasn't very pleasant. There's no mini fridge as promised on the website.   Otherwise, great location and nice staff. The resort is nicely set up. Just a shame about the quality of the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve.
