If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: 20 rooms were reserved for my nieces wedding and it was fantastic to continually run into family and friends at 3 different pools are the many different sitting areas to relax.Totally recommend this hotel for events.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Home power outage led to Oasis in Newport Beach
Summary: We had a power outage that led us to this property which was not only available but gave us an outstanding room.  Staff was inviting and kind and listened to our needs.  Kids were treated as human beings and room was clean had rock solid AC and super comfy beds.  The free coffee and ice cold mini fridge really made a difference.  Fast Valet and delicious restaurant.  Coming back for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: What a gem! We live nearby so we didn't need the accommodations but we were here for a kids' weekend with my daughter's friends. The architecture initially looks dated (60's?) but it has been recently been renovated inside and out, and the result is an "all inclusive resort" feeling.  Very welcoming, light, open, breezy, and beachy. We hung out at the kids' pool which has a water slide, but there are 2 other adult pools.  It would be fun to return for a couples weekend, hang out, and eat at the Seafood Grill.  The staff was very efficient & friendly.  The drinks are pricey (but good), I spent 70 bucks poolside for the two of us.  Parking was easy--but expensive, almost 30 bucks a day--but it has a huge parking lot.  Tourists from all over stay here and it's nice to know that
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Stuff are great. Room seems little old. Perfect location. Close to Fashion Island. Easy to get to all nearest places. Also they have a shuttle to Balboa Island. Definitely can recommend to stay here!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: Great property in a great location, but the Management and Staff are what makes this property a must visit!  We visited over a busy weekend, but never felt that the staff or facilities were overwhelmed at all.  We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Came here to escape the heat. Having been to many Hyatt properties, this one was on par with Hyatt standards. The grounds were well landscaped with many California native plants. Despite a large number of people going in and out of the hotel during the busy summer season, every staff was attentive and eager to help. Since our room was not ready they gave us access to the pool to hang out. Shannon the pool cocktail server in the Serenity pool was extremely nice and offered friendly service despite how busy the pool was. There was an extraordinarily number of people at the pool due to someone getting married and they had everyone just show up and hang out. She handled it well and was still smiling.  Overall, even just a short stay we felt relaxed at their pool and walked around
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Service was great, food was even better.  Will defantly go back to stay.  Hotel staff was very accomodating, hotel was clean and quite, even being a holiday.  Great location,close to all and easy to get in and out.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Hotel is clean and conveniently located to area beaches. Staff excel in hospitality. Room was clean. Walls are thin, beds are comfortable. Overall a pleasant experience. Bikes are available on the property to rent, cookies provided in the afternoon. Pool and hot tub were clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear you were able to enjoy some of our resort amenities. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: So let me first start by saying the grounds of this resort are beautiful. The location is pretty good. Not as close to some of the activities as we would like but that is okay.  Check in process was fast and the person at the desk was knowledgeable, helpful and courteous.  The fitness center was a breath of fresh air compared to other hotels of equal value. There were plenty of treadmills, weights and more. That’s where it all stops. I’m pretty disappointed in our stay to be honest. There are many places we could have chose to stay but we decided to give Hyatt a try since it has a good reputation and the pool here has a water slide for the kids. The rooms are smallish. The bathroom was very tiny and for a family of 4 just not enough space. Every day was a mission to get enough
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I have sent you a private message to get more information about your recent stay. I am so sorry to hear about your negative experience and would like to get more information so we can better our service. Any additional information is greatly appreciated.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary Heading: Beware of fees!!! Lots of them!
Summary: I booked a room for my husband and I on Priceline. I knew there would be a resort fee of at least $30 but had no idea the hotel also charges a $27 self park or a $36 valet fee! What! We were given no list on what the resort fee covers or entails. The valet spoke to us like he could no $&!?'s and that we could self park because it was late and he didn't want to park our car. On top of that shocker... we got stuck in a back corner in a tiny room. On the way to our room a raccoon followed us and started to come at us as we were standing at our door to go in! The grounds of the hotel are nice, the room is clean, but a $120 a night deal turned into $180! Not impressed at all! I do realize that this room usually books for $180 or higher, that which I would never pay! Probably won't be
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you could provide us with the name on the reservations or the name of the valet that spoke to you that way, we would like to follow up with him. That is unacceptable and we would like to take corrective action. Any additional information is greatly appreciated.  Warmest regards,  Ashley R

Summary: the hotel had a very good location and had a nice golf course that I liked. however, the rooms had very thin walls and I could hear whatever was happening next door. also, the food served at the gift shop was overprices
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: I stayed at this Hotel for just one night and loved it. It has so many activities for families. Golf etc. The rooms are clean and the location puts you close to just about all the beaches. I did not use the shuttle because did not have time but the shuttle to balboa is a great idea
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Great choice for those who want more of a resort feel than a regular hotel. The room was quite comfortable, although typical of many hotel rooms. A manager stopped by right after we arrived in the room so he could double check a vent cover or something mechanical that had been noted about the room. It wasn’t a bother to us. He was extremely professional and even fetched us some free water bottles for the inconvenience. The landscaping is nice. Lots of palm trees and other tropical plants give it a nice resort feel. Breakfast is always great in the restaurant as well as the grab-and-go selections from the coffee shop. Convenient location to everything in Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Sorry for any inconvenience. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: Overall this was a nice stay. The staff was very welcoming and professional. The slide and pool was perfect for our kids. Only drawback was the room was a bit dated, small and their was outside noise at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: Awsome location staff fantastic sent my daughter bday desserts even the day after talked to staff they seemed very excited and always very kind and nice. Would definetly come back. The room was great but a little small but defenetly worth due to location and pools plus slide.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel and thank you for celebrating with us! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This hotel was my favourite one of the trip. It was beautiful. The grounds were immaculate. The rooms were large, clean and comfortable. The pools and gyms were nice. They offered golf, tennis and bikes. Room service was very good.   Can’t say enough about this place. I can’t wait to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: be careful staying at one of the villas; upstairs room is cramped, inappropriate furniture and the TV is positioned on side of the room not allowing comfortable viewing from the bed. Bed was comfortable but room lacked overall quality stay standards.

Summary: We only had a weekend to enjoy our stay and were sorry when we had to leave.  This beautiful resort is our most favorite of the hotels we have stayed at in Newport Beach.  We will definitely stay there again.  The staff was courteous and if you need anything special Chloe the Concierge will do a wonderful job with whatever you need.  It was a magical weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We will be sure to share your wonderful comments with Chloe. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I stayed here for about a week. The area is beautiful and there are many things to do inside the hotel while you're staying, but my experience was really really really awful. Here are things that I wish I knew before reserving a room here:  Noisy: I don't even know where to start with this one! I was staying in a room that was facing the swimming pool. During the day, I wasn't able to have a quite moment at all as I could here all the noise from the shared pool area, and during the night, i could here almost everything that people were doing in their rooms next to mine and also on top of my room. This problem could have been easily avoided if they had used some good insulation.  Bad Restaurant: To start, I should say that the restaurant has a fixed menu for everyday with limited

Summary Heading: Nice place, though pricey for the generic rooms
Summary: Expensive hotel in a very expensive area, but the room we had was very generic. For the cost, I expected newer and nicer. Also, our room was quite far from the main pool and the lobby, so it was kind of inconvenient. We appreciated the warm pools and all the games onsite. The shuttles to local shopping and the airport is a big plus.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for families
Summary: I like that there were life size games all over the property, 3 pools, and the children's pool has a slide andand its a big pool, also a splash pad, games, and poolside service for food and adult beverages. Very nice employees. Fun time!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This is my second visit to this beautiful resort .  Before arriving I received an email saying for $60 I could have early checkin and late checkout so I agreed.  Upon arriving at the hotel at 1pm I was greeted by a very abrupt receptionist who informed me that’s a generic email and you don’t get an early check in (too bad they charged my credit card which they did refund ) finally at 4pm I got my room. Everything else was great except house keeping either they didn’t come I kept ringing to have my room cleaned at 4pm or they would come in for 5 mins throw the sheets around and give me clean towels . Bar was my favourite the waitress was so lovely that I ate there highly . Having said all this I would still go back as overall it’s a great hotel  pool area is beautiful with lovely

Summary Heading: Great for a holiday weekend getway
Summary: We live about 45 min away in OC. Stayed here with 2 other families for Memorial Day weekend. Kids loved the slide and the pool. Food was great! I kept getting the same burger over and over it was so good! Our room was right near the pool which was so nice with the kids. Fridge in the room for continental breakfast for the kids. Nice grounds with oversized chess and shuffle board. Kids activities by the pool each day. Will be back again for sure!

This place was overpriced considering that JFK stayed here and he was assassinated in 1963.  There is also a parking fee of close to $25 and a resort fee of $30 plus.  I'm sorry it just felt like a rip off.  Was like a Holiday Inn, should be priced like a Holiday Inn.

Summary Heading: Beautiful property - just don't stay in the Lido building

Summary Heading: A fun place with awesome amenities for the price
Summary: Our family loves its yearly trips to this hotel. We love there is a shuttle that can take you places . The pool is fun and relaxing as well. At night they put games out for the kids and it’s just a nice family oriented place . Oh... the bikes were awesome because there is a beautiful trail located behind the hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Still Great After All These Years
Summary: Since my last review of Hyatt Regency Newport Beach in 2013, I have stayed there four more times and each time the staff there has been as wonderful as the last.  For our road trips, my son and I make this hotel our base because it’s always so nice to come “home” to.   During our stay last month, on the first day of my and my son’s vacation, I dislocated my hip just after checking in.  The staff got me up off the pavement and into a wheelchair, called the paramedics and stayed with me the entire time.  One staff member, in particular (I’m sorry I don’t have her name), was very caring and compassionate, bringing me water and seeing if there was anything else I needed while waiting for the paramedics.  They were also very accommodating when my son and I took ill, allowing for a
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! That is unfortunate that you and your son fell ill. We are happy to hear Kristine took such great care of you. We will be sure to share your comments with her. We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I stayed here for three nights while attending a conference in February.  The physical facility is a bit old but well-maintained.  The employees were all friendly and very helpful.  Pluses: Nice pool areas Within walking distance of Balboa Island and its great shops Excellent shuttle service to nearby mall and Balboa Island Fantastic trail to run along right next to the hotel, through the wildlife area Bikes and golf course on-site  Cons: Noisy.  You can hear a lot through the walls of the hotel Value is OK, but this place seems just a bit overpriced for an older property  I'd stay here again, everything was pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I was impressed by the mini fridge, spacious room with a couch and also outside chair and table. Loads of cupboard space also made me very happy. The bed and pillows were not great but big and comfortable enough. I thought the towels could be softer and bigger but again, that could be a personal preference. Good service on checking in and out.
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I stayed here with friends for the Surf City Half. The location was a few miles further down the road, but that made the experience nice because it wasn’t hella crowded. The parking is kind of inconvenient for the rooms on the other side of the property where we were, but the room was nice and the property is very pretty. We really enjoyed the pool area as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Hotel has a nice look and feel as you walk up. Room was horrible and felt like I was at a Howard Johnson. Do not stay in any of 600 series...rooms windows open to hallway...no privacy. Checkin and bartenders were great. Standard buffet.

Summary: Another great concert production by the Hyatt. We will be back next year! I look forward to working with Shelley again. working with her makes me know that everything will be fine upon my arrival and during my stay. NO WORRIES!

Summary Heading: Rooms look like Ramada at Newport Beach Rental
Summary: There for Jazz Festival ..Rooms inside main hotel bldg updated but super small.  Rooms in areas surrounding venue similar to a Ramada Inn if that great but the $500/night price super  inflated.  The Commode water cycled constantly.

Summary: Been coming to the Hyatt for over 10 years. Staff is always friendly and of there is a problem, they handle it immediately.  Staff from housekeeping to Bartenders are professional. Rooms are very clean and there are many rooms with views. Rates are fare, shopping and beach are close.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Hyatt Regency Newport Beach Jazz Festival Weekend
Summary: My wife and I along with another couple decided we would attend the Neport Beach Jazz Festival and stay on the grounds for the full experience. Well the accomodations were great and the experience was truly memorable.

Summary: Great venue for the Jazz Festival! Well organized and the line-up was fantastic, I would definitely come back for another weekend of Jazz. The music and the entertainment were great. Not too far from my home

Summary: We stayed here for the Newport Beach Jazz Festival - although there were some communication break downs between the hotel and the Concert vendors, the Hotel staff was great and very accommodating. We enjoyed our stay and loved our upgraded room and the view.

As always the Hyatt Newport Beach is The place to stay. The service is top notch, the staff treats you as if you’re family. Everyone speaks & greets you from the manager to the maintenance workers. That’s how great they are, I’ve been staying at the Hyatt for over 20 yrs and it’s the best.

Summary: Stayed at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach while attending the annual Cigar & Spirits event at the hotel.   The hotel put me in the Balboa Building. Which is a 3 minute walk from the main building. The room was clean and quite spacious. Received a king bed with balcony. Surprised to notice there was a little sitting area with a couch and an ottoman. The couch doubles as a sofa bed. Bathroom is also a good decent size. Room has a little mini bar area with coffee, tea and a mini-fridge. If you want a quiet place to stay, ask for a room away from the pool. Even number rooms in the Balboa Building are the best.   Free Wireless interest throughout the hotel. They do have 2 desktop computers in the main lobby area for guest use. There is a smoking area to the right of the main lobby.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you back again next year for the Cigar and Spirits Event!

Summary: The staff as this property is very friendly and professional.  They go out of their way to help you, and answer any question you may have.  I wasn't sure where the ice machine was, and a staff member, just didn't tell me, she actually walked with me to the machine.  Everyone greets you when you walk by them.  5-star staff. Hotel is located near a lot of restaurants and freeway.  There are great restaurants within five minutes (driving).  Besides the hotel restaurant, not many restaurants too close (by walking).   Rooms are clean and housekeeping does a good job.   Self-parking is downhill from the hotel rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed our staff and your stay. We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Property is well situated near many attraction the area has to offer.  The grounds are well maintained for the most part and is scenic. That's where the pros end.  Staff were okay for the most part. Check in staff seemed nice enough. I was given two beds instead of a king size bed like I reserved. Was told they didn't have anymore. Fine, I can live with that. Parking was a pain. The driveway into self parking can be somewhat dangerous as the only driveway to the parking lot doubles as a rental car and motorcycle parking as well as service vehicles and delivery trucks parking. This made for an interesting and daring blind turn into a downhill sharp right turn into the parking lot. This is unacceptable and downright dangerous. You can't see the oncoming traffic until you make your

Summary: We were given a superior room in the centre of the complex, located immediately above the facilities 24hr Fitness Center and open air lounge. The room was further enhanced by being directly located below the flight path for John Wayne Airport. The surrounding concrete pathways allowed further amplification of trolley movements and delivery vans. A wet towel across wardrobe shelves remove the dirt from the partially serviced room.....the towel later donated to Reception. But a great location with lovely gardens. Not a cheap place considering the tired bedrooms.  All in all the hotel flatters to deceive. Not recommended.

Summary: The staff is really great and they sincerely try to accommodate your requests.  The guest rooms can use a little facelift, but overall its a solid hotel.  Also, the breakfast burrito and salsa is top notch!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: One can tell that probably 30 years ago this place was THE place for a family vacation.  Big, motel style rooms, a pool, tennis courts, golf course.  But that heyday has come and gone.  Everything feels tired.  The rooms are musty and the beds are kind of crummy.  Just feels really run down.   Also, the place is a bit of a maze.  Self park is down at the bottom of a hill.  So if you plan to self park - be prepared to hoist your luggage up a number of stairs.

This is a great property. The staff are all first rate. The rooms are clean and comfortable. We stayed in the back of the the property. there are buildings that look more like old motels then Hyatt spaces but that is only the exterior. The rooms are clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Hyatt Regency Newport Beach Wedding Weekend
Summary: Family and friends attended my son's wedding. I live in the OC and many guests flew in from oput of town. The staff, and total facility were outstanding. Obviously the area is equally as outstanding and its the perfect reason why I live in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and for hosting your family at our hotel. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: Underwhelming Customer Service + $30 a day for parking?
Summary: I have no complaints about the hotel itself, it was lovely and the rooms were spacious and clean. The customer service and parking left quite a bit to be desired.   We arrived around 4pm on Friday with a car full of luggage. We were told we only had 5 minutes to park, check in and unload at reception. The wait to check in took longer than 5 minutes itself but was a fast process when we got to the counter. No exceptional greeting or welcome, the girl simply checked me in and sent me on my way, maybe said 5 words to me. It was very transactional.  We then asked the valet guy if we would be able to borrow a trolley as we had a ton of luggage. We were told only if we were to park valet - which is ludicrous. We also weren't told where the ramps were so we wandered around the lobby
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Excellent location for business or pleasure!
Summary: The rooms were clean and easily accessible. The staff was friendly and courteous whether they were at the front desk or on the property providing services. I could hear voices and other guests moving around but it wasn't too disruptive to my stay. The beds were really comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This hotel lies at the end of the airport runway. Flights depart promptly at 6:30am and take off literally every minute. So loud; don't expect to get any sleep here if you're looking for a relaxing vacation. On top of that the bed is freaking hard. The springs they use in the mattress is quite hard and theres no pillow top cover, so I didn't get any good sleep.   The hotel itself is quite old. The rooms have a musty smell to them and the layout of the complex is weird. There's no direct way from the parking lot to any of the rooms. Also, depending on which building you're own, the room setup is also slightly different. While this hotel is a mile from the beach, I wouldn't recommend purely because the sleeping is so difficult. Staff is nice. I'm so glad to be home though.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights for a conference. The rooms are outdated but clean and large. The food was awful, but then again maybe only when served to 200 conference attendees. As the basket in the restaurant on the last day was pretty good. Try to figure out how to please larger crowds. Location distance from the beach is convenient and free bikes and free golf made it more bearable.

I stayed here recently for a conference. There are some definitely pros and cons to the property. The front desk and shuttle staff are very friendly and helpful. My room was in the main building and was up to date and comfortable.  My only real complaint is the food. Ugh. Not good at all. We had food through the conference, it was all pretty tasteless. Breakfast was the worst...even the bacon was not good. The Shor salad at the restaurant was pretty good, although it took FOREVER. Then lunch at the cafe/bar in the lobby was mediocre at best...and again, SUPER slow service.  The location is ok. There is a nice running train along the back bay just steps from the property. The shuttle is also really convenient to take you over to Fashion Island or Balboa Island and the shuttle
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. While I wish you had a better experience in our restaurant it is feedback like this that helps us improve. I didn't have time to use any amenities and they still charged me the resort fee.  I got 50% off but still was charged 50%.

Summary Heading: Hands Down Best Place to Stay

Staff is welcoming and will cater to your needs. Try breakfast at Shor! Amazing!

I plan to book all my future stays in your area at the Hyatt Newport Beach. Thank you for a good experience on all levels.

I made reservations for my room a while a go and about 2 weeks prior to the date I added another room to my reservation to be adjoining double beds.  Upon check in the rooms were not adjoining,  The staff was trying to accommodate me as I requested an upgrade and the upgrade was facing a wall with a king bed.  My original reservation was a double bed.  The valet was requested my keys upon check in and I asked if there's somewhere I can put the car and check in and leave.  I told him that I was not going to leave my keys.  He said I can pull it fwd.  In addition, the next day your staff assisted in moving my room so that they can accommodate my other room to be adjoining.  We then got moved
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While we wish you had a better experience it is feedback like this that helps us improve. Summary Heading: Enjoyed my quick stay at the Hyatt
Summary: Beautiful property in Newport Beach.  Free shuttle to/from airport and shopping areas. Enjoyed all comfortable sittings areas inside and outside.  There is also a walking/running path outside, along with onsite golf and tennis.  The kids will love the pools, and there is also a big chess outside chess board and shuffleboard, etc.  I will definitely return.

Summary: We went for a family trip to California, we booked from Friday -Tuesday at this hotel, they have  shuttle from the airport, George was the driver very nice and helpful giving us tips about the area, at the check in Constance  was excellent,  cordial, nice and  made our at this place enjoyable. Hotel has 3 pools, golf course, shuttle to  fashion island also to a place very closed to balboa island. If you want to go to the ferry  in order to see the sea lions, or wheals take a lift or Uber for 9 bucks, Recommendation get a room  with a balcony, our room was  on  the first floor  near to the chest  game. This hotel has Hertz rental car ( Monday-Friday), if you rent the car over there you may be able to get free  parking. I strongly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay. We will be sure to share your comments with George, Constance, and their managers. We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great room - but hard to get to
Summary: The room was great, and the hotel facilities were great - when you could get to them.  We opted to self park, which we discovered was impossible to get to our room with the stroller - there was zero access without stairs unless we wanted to hike up a steep hill.  We even followed all of the handicap ramp signs - it went in circles - no access to the lobby or where the building with our room was.  I asked someone at the front about getting to our room from self parking and I was told "If I didn't like my options, I should have valet parked."  Upon checkout, I was told that I could have asked for a ride on a golf cart - an option that was not mentioned at any other time, nor would it have accommodated the stroller/car seat.  At the very least there should be a sign saying that

The salad was not properly dressed.I ordered Mexican eggs for breakfast as I didn’t want the buffet. Took forever to get them and they were not cooked as requested. Summary: the hotel was very clean and had everything we needed, even warm-water pools.  it was a bit "far" away from the center but as we had a car it was no issue, also caps were there so there is absolutely no problem. The man at the front desk was unable to change my name on my reservation as I was listed with my husband's last name and not my current legal maiden name. He was also unable to add my Hyatt number to the reservation.  The air conditioning was also awful.  It kept beeping randomly throughout the day (even when doors remained closed) and took a very long time (over one full day) to adequately cool the room.  Overall a terrible experience for a high price tag.  I will not be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, while we wish you had a better experience it is feedback like this that helps us improve. Unfortunately, due to the high amount of fraud we must use the information provided on the reservation. If it does not match the identification given at the time of check in we are unable to make changes to the reservation for security purposes. When possible, any adjustments should be made prior to arrival to avoid any complications at check in.   We apologize for the noise in the room, I will forward your comments to our engineering department to take a look at the AC in the room you were in. We appreciate you letting us know.  If you give us another chance we will be happy to welcome you back.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: I found the hotel in need of a renovation.  It’s a bit too rough around the edges and shabby.  You can hear through the walls that are paper thin. And the food is simply awful- go out for meals!  Staff is nice and outdoor bar is quaint.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Great location with tons of family amenities
Summary: The hotel is a bit dated, however what the overall place lacks in newness it offers a ton of family amenities: outdoor fire pit, bikes to rent, shuffle board, chess, horseshoe toss. Plus they have 3 separate pools: adult, family and serenity. Also their onsite restaurant has solid dinner choices on their menu so you don’t have to travel far. Or you can take shuttle bus that goes to fashion island or other key places.    Tip: rent the bikes in the morning and ride down the street to take the ferry over to Balboa island for the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear you were able to enjoy our resort amenities, as well as offer tips for future guests. We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: Very nice property, great staff, grounds are immaculate, super nice fitness area .  Really enjoyed the relaxed atmosphere .  I prefer to stay at Hyatt properties for this reason.   Pools are very nice good indoor and outdoor seating.  Good Job
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear you were able to enjoy our resort amenities. We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: Our company had our yearly partner convention and the Hyatt staff went beyond their capabilities to provide excellent, fast and seamless support every time we needed it. The hotel was very clean and looked impeccable at all times. They provide healthy food that's also tasty and their amenities are all high quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your annual conference with us. We hope to welcome you back again very soon.  Warmest regards,  Ashley R.

Summary Heading: Restful and just what the doctor ordered
Summary: My son and I recently stayed at your hotel at Newport Beach. We had a very restful holiday and came away with a very positive experience of the hotel and staff. A special word of praise to Chloe Kerr, Concierge, who was a wealth of knowledge and consistently steered us in the right direction. Likewise, our servers in the restaurant, Matt and Rob, were brilliant. We were treated with the utmost courtesy and entertained at the same time. I will be recommending the hotel to others and am looking forward to returning some day soon. In short, well done.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel. We are happy to hear Chloe, Matt, and Rob provided such excellent service. We will be sure to share your comments with them and their managers. Should your travels bring you back to Newport Beach, we hope to welcome you back again.

Summary: I’m a frequent traveler and have seen it all relative to hotel standards.  This one is at the top of my list.   If your looking for very friendly service...this is the place.  If your looking for large and clean rooms...this is the place.  Shuttle service to and from SNA airport also to Fashion Island which is very close and has great local restaurants and ritzy shopping.  Restaurant recommendation for Sushi lovers...Roku which is in the heart of fashion island.  Go for the jalapeño tuna roll...yowza!!!   Hotel bike rental...no fee...good bikes too for a nice spin around the bay which is just out the back gate of the resort...beautiful view with wonderful wildlife.   Nine hole par three on site also.  It’s fun and laid back. Don’t expect to much except a good time. $3 club fee
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear you had the opportunity to fully experience our hotel and the local area. We hope to welcome you back again very soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary Heading: Great stay, friendly service!  Worn property.
Summary: Quick weekend away with my family - we were looking for something with large pool(s) and we found it!  The grounds and public spaces of this hotel are top notch.  The rooms are a little more worn, but serviceable.  We found the staff to be friendly and helpful.  Great stay, would return!  The hotel charges a $25/night resort fee that is both non-negotiable and non-refundable.  The charge to park is $27/night, so be sure to add **$52** per night to your room rate to find the actual cost of staying in the hotel.  Four star stay!  (I charge a one-star per night non-negotiable non-refundable fee to write a review.  This fee covers the power consumed by my computer, the internet connection, and the time spent writing the review.  This was a four star stay in every way!  Unfortunately
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.We are glad you enjoyed a couple of amenities included with our resort fee. Hopefully next time you will get a chance to play golf on our golf course or use our bike rentals that are also included with the resort fee. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Yes it is in Newport, but NO view  Lobby and terrace is spectacular with a nice bar and great service There is a nice walk from the lobby to your room You can understand that the propoerty was converted to a Hyatt  ......(and Regency!!) It does not have the Hyatt standards you are used to if you know the brand. The Shor restaurant in the lobby area is very nice, with a tasty breakfast and nice menu for dinner.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing your thoughts and taking the time to help improve our hotel. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: 1980 Called And Wants Their Hotel Back
Summary: My family and I are binge watching the old TV show “Who’s The Boss” and Tony’s a better housekeeper than the staff at this hotel. The decor of Tony and Angela’s house looks similar to this hotel. I feel like the only thing missing here is a Sizzler in the lobby for the restaurant. Thankfully, there is popcorn in our room... oh! Wait it’s just popcorn ceilings. The not next to the air conditioning says “there is a slight delay when turning it on” Ten minutes later it still didn’t work and the front desk sent someone with a nifty remote control unit to get our air working. Still waiting for it to start working. This location is so awesome in Orange County and this property is on 65 acres it’s said that they have done nothing to update it. It says something when the Best Western
Manager Response: Good afternoon,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Though I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that helps us improve. I see you have been in contact with our front office manager and she has awarded the points you used at our hotel back to you. She will follow up with you directly in regards to your experience.  Kindly,  Ashley R.

Summary Heading: Great improvements at the golf course
Summary: It is nice to see that a property actually listens to guest feed back; we notice great improvements at the little golf course with new T- off mats, new markers, ball washers, cups and pin/flags. The putting green was well maintained and the whole course is in good shape. As usual, our arrival was perfect and the room (280) great.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel and for noticing our improvements. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice place but layout is confusing
Summary: Bit dated but well maintained property. Food was inconsistent, excellent at times and disappointing at others. Facilities seemed well done but very confusing getting around at first.  Service staff friendly at all times. Would recommend if you wanted to be in this beautiful but busy area near LA.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We apologize for the inconsistencies you experienced during your stay. I have sent your comments to our food and beverage department to review with their team. We recently updated our signage and are currently working on more improvements. We appreciate your feedback and will use it to better our service.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Good location, close to Balboa island
Summary: Stayed here on work and the place is OK, rooms getting a little tired but close to Balboa island ferry, UC Irvine, beaches etc. They had a Packard car show in the lower parking lot while we were there. Nice distraction. Food and drink prices a bit much for what you get at the hotel but Fashion island is a short walk or shuttle ride away.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the car show. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: Be Sure To Review your Invoice at check out
Summary: Stayed 3 nights at Hyatt Newport Beach.  Local resident.  My home was having extensive work and I needed a hotel room.  Was quoted a lower charge for room for third night (Sat.) but was not given the rate.  Problem with the invoice at check out.  I was charged to my room for 3 restaurant charges even though I paid with credit card at the restaurant at the time of service.  Charges were described as "room service."   Fortunately,  I had my credit card receipts and the front desk took off the charges.  Otherwise, I would have been charged for 3 meals that were already paid for.  My advice to Hyatt Newport Beach guests, be sure to check your invoice at check out.  P.S. The food is not that good.
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Though I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that helps us improve. I have sent you a private message to gather more information so we can take corrective action. We look forward to your response.  Sincerely, Ashley R.

Summary: I came with my sister to celebrate my  birthday. I have been to several Hyatt's over the recent past and have enjoyed them. However this Hotel was disappointing for what I paid. Our room was very small. There was not enough towels, especially wash cloths. There were NO blankets even though it was February. There were NO robes, either. The clock did not work. We ordered room service for breakfast and it was too expensive for what we received. Too many extra fees. Bellmen were very helpful and kind.
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that helps us improve. I see you have been in contact with our Front Office manager and she will follow up with you directly for further information.   Thank you again for your time and we hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: The grounds and courtyards are very nice. The food was also very good during our stay. The rooms are in desperate need of a deep cleaning and full renovation (not just a refresh). This property appears to be older and the rooms are motel quality with a little "lipstick on a pig". Very dusty hvac equipment that hadn't been cleaned in a long time, drafty door that didn't seal, peeling ceiling paint, burned out light fixtures, and more. Additionally room thermostat is located right below HVAC unit so room would not stay a consistent temperature as soon as unit started it blew on the thermostat and shut itself down quickly.   I'm suspicious of the positive reviews.  Most are from people who only made 1 or 2 previous reviews on TA. Review fraud?
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Though I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that helps us improve. We take matter like this very serious and would like to get more information about your recent stay. I have sent you a private message to gather more information so we can take corrective action. We look forward to your response.  Sincerely,  Ashley R.

Summary Heading: Not what expected for Hyatt regency
Summary: We stayed in this hotel for 6 nights. I have experienced other Hyatt regency hotels in other places but this one in newport beach was not satisfactory at all. The receptions were awful. Not all of them but I can say 90% of them. They behaved in a very rude manner. We had free wifi and free breakfast for two but they did not even tell us were to eat it. I asked them twice for this issue and find the place. They do not explain at all. It was really confusing.  For the breakfast, they have breakfast buffet for the weekends which was good I believe. But for the week days, the breakfast were terrible. Burritos, french toasts, pancakes, omelettes, ..... I got them all but, all of them were terrible. The staff could not speak english. I had troubles understanding them. The hotels
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short.  We will be following up with the agent that checked you in to ensure this does not happen again. We will also be following up with our housekeeping department to ensure we are placing the correct number of items in our guest rooms. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and we will use it as an opportunity to better our service.  Sincerely, Ashley R.

Summary: I had heard about this hotel for years. It’s my first time I’ve stayed. Beautiful property and very friendly staff. Great location, close to John Wayne airport. I wish I had more time to explore the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I don't know where you would go to make a call. Not the lobby or the library or outside; loud music everywhere. the lay-out of the reception area makes it inevitable,  the bar is right there and a bar without music would be a morgue. The restaurant named Shor touts local products for "vibrant" dishes.  The chopped-up fried calamari was okay, better-looking than tasting, definitely not vibrant.  The same for the black mussels. Too much decoration that does not add to vibrancy, just added confusion. Lukewarm french fries were later replaced by a hot dish, courtesy of the British waiter.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: We recently held a business meeting here and were well pleased with the location, Hotel features, rooms and dining options. The hotel is within easy walking distance of the Marina and walking trails will take you to Balboa island and eventually the beach if you’re up for it. You can also rent bikes. The resort features clusters of accommodation each surrounding its own pool area. I saw at least two and I think there are three.   The resort also has golf, a big Chess board on the lawn and shuffleboard. The grounds are beautiful and well maintained. My room was very comfortable with a nice patio overlooking the golf course and harbor. Dining options include the lively bar area and SHOR restaurant. Good but not great cuisine.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary Heading: Lots to do at this hotel
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a weekend in January.  I was very happy with all of the activities they had at the resort.  We played, shuffleboard, golf, horseshoes, giant chess and swam in the pool/hottub.  Luckily the greens fees were included in our resort fee because it's a little overpriced for what you're getting but we had a great time playing it and it got our golf fix without having to travel to a course and spend hours out there.  I would definitely stay at this resort again if I travel back to this area again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and and all of our resort amenities. We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Overall this hotel is excellent!  Great for a business traveler and a great value with a superior location. Restaurant and bar were great , but there is plenty of access to food around the hotel as w ell as easy access to the airport and freeways. I would highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Spent 8 days here.  Wonderful vacation. Had a small hiccup with housejeeping the second day. Mike Phan immediately rectified it and everything was great after that. Will be returning regularly to visit family and will stay at this location again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear Mike was able to assist you and rectify the situation. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Original room a cave.  A second room ok but people above noisy from 2 to 5 in the morning.  People st front desk very nice.  Food at bar ok. Local beer terrific.  Grounds are nice.  Pools looked like fun.   The day was cold.
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  We are sorry to hear about your negative experience with noisy neighbors. We happy to hear you enjoyed the grounds and local beers. We hope your next stay will be much better.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary Heading: Long walks amongst the palm trees
Summary: This was a really nice hotel several years ago.  Now it is a nice hotel in need of a renovation.  The rooms are standard Hyatt Regency (i.e., very nice).  I had a nice view of the golf course (really) in the Lido building.  FYI - This building is approximately 1,200 feet from the ball room and restaurant.  If you aren't used to walking at least a mile a day, this might be too much for you.  The staff were all excellent and a free shuttle from the airport is hard to beat.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: Best Newport Beach has to offer!!
Summary: I love this place from it's eclectic grounds which include an executive golf course and 3 pools to name a few. It's not just a BOX and an elevator ride to your room but a a place to explore and enjoy. The staff is amazing and makes you really feel at home.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The grounds are stunning and there's quite a lot to see just roaming around. The service is 5 star from the front desk to the restaurants. Someone was always available & willing to help. The rooms were comfortable with great views. We got a beautiful sunrise each morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I stayed in the hotel for two nights for a GFOA training session. I stayed on the second floor and the bedroom size was large. Room was quiet and the temperature in the room was pleasant. Valet was quick and the lounge was accommodating. Looking forward to my next stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Was at this hotel for a conference which was held on site. The room I was initially given was very nice but had no bath so I asked to move and that was no issue with a new room key available within minutes. The location was great and just a few minutes cab ride to the beach or to the mall. I had breakfast in the restaraunt each morning, did not have an evening meal as such but did have a buffet every lunch time which was specific to the conference and also an evening get together which had wonderful food. The food for lunch was great, salads and meats, all sorts but not too much and all fresh. Check out was simple, room cleaned every day. Basically a great location and good facilities.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your conference and stay. We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The lady at the front disk was very rude ... she was sick (has flue ) she kept sneezing and sniffing .. she touched our cards with her hands Very dark room ... the bathroom smill very bad ... swimming bool seats is not clean at all

We arrived at about 8:45 in the evening on a Monday. The gentlemen that came out to my car was rude and when I asked where self parking was he just pointed and said it is behind the hotel. The self park is $27 a day, crazy expensive. Resort fee is another $25 a day. Parking is very far from the check in lobby and hard to find. The signage is very poor.  My co-workers were assigned rooms in the main building and said they were motel quality at best. I was assigned a double bed room by the pool which is a pretty good hike from the main lobby and bar area.. All corridors are outside as this part of the property was built in the 1960's. The room was clean and the restroom/shower was okay. Ice machine was quite a walk. The grounds are nice and the meeting spaces are plentiful and

Terrific staff, rooms and amenities. I recommend it highly. Food really good. Nice selection of outdoor swimming pools and a small golf course make it fun. Nice walking grounds and relaxing balconies.  Great views and close to Orange County airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed our amenities and your stay. We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay at Hyatt Regency
Summary: I have ben staying regularly at this property for 30 years and I have never been disappointed.  Renovations throughout the years have kept it in top quality.  I especially enjoy the extensive grounds and fire pits at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I like this hotel, especially if you can get a good rate. Pros: close to bay and beaches, nicely maintained grounds, friendly staff. Cons: Noisy due to being directly under flight path of nearby airport, room was not as clean and comfortable as it should have been.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: I stayed here last week, and the rooms are motel style with the doors outside, making it even louder.  Our room had popcorn ceilings, and shutter type “doors” into the bathroom so there was zero privacy.  The worst part was how insanely loud the AC/heater unit was, it literally sounded like a plane was landing every time it went on. Worst night of sleep I’ve ever had at a hotel. They also charged $28 for self parking, it’s ridiculous and I would never return here.

- Dirty, smelly, noisy rooms - Dirty hot tubs and pools - Had food poisoning from the restaurant - Dirty towels - Miscellaneous credit card charges I would never stay in this hotel ever again. The front desk staff tried to educate me on food poisoning even though I am a dietitian. The whole thing was embarrassing and uncomfortable. This was my first and last stay at a Hyatt,

We stayed here a few times and love the location.  I like the hotel has a shuttle from John Wayne airport but I think, they don't run as often as it used to. The shuttle will drop you off at Fashion Island or Balboa or you can walk to Balboa. We always enjoy cocktails in the lobby bar. Always a nice stay
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: Hotel was very nice, had a little issue with our room when we arrived but were taken very good care of from start to finish. The hotel is right down from Balboa island which is a great place in itself and close to all the fantastic beaches.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel. we are happy to hear our staff was able to get everything situated for you. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regards,  Ashley R.

Summary: This was a great location to celebrate our friends daughters marriage on the Wild Goose. We were also able to attend the Rose Bowl and bring home a huge win for the Ga Bulldogs!!!  The Hyatt Hotel is in a convenient location and we would definitely stay there again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regrds, Ashley R.

Summary: Check in was at 4 pm.  We didn't get into our room until after 5 pm, but it took getting a manager involved so we could get a room we had reservations for.  It was New Year's Eve and they apparently had given late check outs that day even though they were booked to capacity on New Year's Eve.  The hotel bar is basically an area just off the lobby.  Not a "real" bar type atmosphere.  Hotel is fairly old.  Bathroom had no counter space.  It was marginal at best.

Convenient location near Fashion Island and a short drive to the beach.  Lovely park like setting with casually elegant vibe.  Outstanding value, family friendly, lovely.  The family wants to return again next year!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: We live locally, and visit the Hyatt Newport as our "Stay-cation" go to property.  The Management staff is excellent and very attentive.  The staff in the restaurant and public areas all have great attitudes and are quick to offer help.  They even printed a name badge for my 5 year old, who can't wait to start his first job there "as soon as he turns 16".  Highly Recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We look forward to welcoming back you and your family soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: We visit the Newport Beach Hyatt year after year.  We love the beautiful grounds, the bike rides on Back Bay, the back gate right into the Bay Bay Area, the pools, the friendly staff, and the convenience.  Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear you were able to enjoy our resort amenities. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: This hotel is amazing.  From friendly and helpful staff, to beautiful grounds, and all the amenities they offer! This hotel is like a resort for families.  The rooms are a good size, there are 3 pools, and one with a water slide and spray area.  There are life size games (Connect 4, checkers/chess, and more!) They offer free bike rental, free beach chair & umbrella to take to the beach, golf course, and so much more. Doggies are welcome too! It's just beautiful, peaceful and relaxing here! We didn't want to leave -- and we stayed for 7 days!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear you were able to enjoy our resort amenities. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: We had to change our anniversary get away night last minute and settled for this hotel near to our home.  The main detriment is the motel-like feel of the guest buildings, pools and rooms.  The view, grounds and service were good.  Just okay hotel if you have a special get away.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about our hotel. Please let us know if you come back to celebrate again so we can enhance your stay. Our customer service email is qualitynewpo@hyatt.com.  Thank you, Ashley R.

Summary Heading: Hyatt  36 Year Veteran Experiences  Fiasco at Hyatt  Regency Newport Beach
Summary: After a very stressful drive from San Diego to the property I was looking forward to an early check-in ( not property's 4:oo pm).I was questioned by my early check-in request which I did not appreciate and immediately insisted on management intervention. The front office responded positively but when the bellboy and I reached the room and tried to gain access this was when "I hit the roof" my assigned room was already occupied.The bellboy apologized returned to the front desk while I waited and waited. Eventually i was informed they were working on getting me a room on the third floor(highest level) with king bed in the main building. During my wait approximately 45-60 minutes, a guest relations officer did extend the services of the lobby bar with food. This is a 55 year old

This was our second stay at the Hyatt. We'll be back again. The staff are friendly and professional, the room was clean and comfortable, and the grounds are spectacular. We have family in Newport Beach and find that the location is quite convenient. We would recommend this hotel to friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary Heading: Great family-oriented, pet friendly resort with tons of amenities
Summary: Always a great experience Great service and amenities  Clean and comfortable rooms and a great outdoor patio/bar with a fire pit Dog-friendly and caters to the whole family  Large property with a lot to do-whether you like concerts, golf, swimming, playing ping pong or shuffleboard, or enjoying a relaxing evening with a glass of wine
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear you enjoyed all of our resort amenities. We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: Best hotel experience. Great location in Excellent location in Newport Beach. Friendliest and most professional staff. Rode bikes, played shuffle board, enjoyed good food and relaxed. Home away from home.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: From check in problems to maintenance issues and rude untrained bartenders.   Think somewhere else.   We we not the only ones to have issues of all types. Front desk staff has limited options to help, bell staff great
Manager Response: Good afternoon Chris,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. While we wish you had a better experience it is feedback like this that helps us improve. We would like to get more information about the dates of your stay so we can address the appropriate associates and better our service. If you could please email me at qualitynewpo@hyatt.com it would be great appreciated.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary Heading: Best kept secret in Newport Beach
Summary: This is our "Go to" hotel for Southern California.  It took us a couple years and lots of trips to find it, but now we prefer this property over all the other choices in Orange County.  We enjoy the location and the tranquility of the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: Service and accommodations are wonderful.  Employees are so nice, the food is great and the location is perfect.  We visit 2-3 times per year.  Lots of things to do on the property and we will be back very soon!
Manager Response: Good Morning -   I wanted to thank you for your great review and kind words about the staff, food, and location. We are so happy to hear about your great experience while staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to the property. Happy New Year!

Summary Heading: Hyatt Regency has lost its luster.
Summary: The magic of the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach, CA is gone.  No longer the class hotel it used to be.  Allowing guest with barking dogs is not a good idea.  "Special" rate of $135 became over $200 with parking, resort fee, and endless local and state taxes.
Manager Response: Good Morning Dean -   Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us feedback. I wanted to personally apologize for the noise issues that you incurred during your stay with us. We are a dog friendly hotel and it is very unfortunate that one of our furry friends caused a disturbance during your stay. We really do try very hard to accommodate all of our guests and pets to our best ability and I sincerely apologize that you had to deal with this noise from the neighboring room. We hope that you will give us another try sometime in the future.  Have a great New Years!

Summary: Hyatt is our preferred hotel but did not get the quality hyatt that I am used. Hotel needs some remodeling with the paper thin walls and could be better. Danny the bartender is the best.  Shuttle service is fair but saves you on driving.
Manager Response: Good Morning Bridget -   Thank you so much for sharing your positive experience with Danny. We will certainly share the feedback with him! I do want to apologize for the issues that occurred while staying with us. I am very happy to say that we are currently re-insulating all of our guest rooms to provide a more tranquil environment within the room. We hope to complete this major project very soon. We do hope that you will come stay with us another time and again I thank you so much for your feedback.

Summary: Hyatt Newport Beach is a great destination. Even though it is not right on the beach or next to the mall, it is very close. Many activities and shopping are nearby. Very close to the freeway and airport.

I spent two nights here on business. The grounds are attractive and the bed was comfortable enough, but the property felt dated. My ground-level room was a fair hike from the front desk and had an uninspiring view of the gold course. Sometimes pedestrians walked by and I could hear them. One night the people in the room next to me had a dog that barked nonstop when they weren't there. The food at the restaurant was tasty but overpriced, and although the place was nearly empty, the service was slow.  All of this would have made for a slightly disappointing but not horrible experience. The real problem, however, was with billing. Arrangements had been made to charge my room to an account, which I confirmed upon check-in. Yet my personal card was charged. I contacted the hotel to

I have never experienced such friendly and accommodating staff at a hotel.  They far exceeded any expectations.  The hotel is beautiful and decorated for the holidays. The location is perfect.  It is near Balboa Island, Fashion Island and great restaurants.

The Hyatt Regency Newport Beach welcomed us with open arms when we evacuated from a wildfire and smoke in Santa Barbara. Staff was amazing in helping us get settled with our pets, and we found our room to be comfortable and relaxing in spite of our stress. Thanks to the staff and to Hyatt for making our stay as easy as it could be. Evacuated or not, this is a great place to stay!

Summary Heading: The Newporter has not lost its charm....
Summary: This low density, sprawling resort hearkens to Newport's storied past, and with it complimentary bikes, executive golf course and numerous pools it is one of the few hotels I have recently stayed at that the Resort Fee is actually worth it.   The Staff is also incredibly courteous, and very nice to children.  Our children loved ranging from pool to pool (and through the hotel with their own personal robes), and their only complaint was the water slide didn't open until 10:00  AM.   The adults only suggestion would be arranging a shuttle to be available for the Newport Boat Parade, to prospectively shuttle guests to entrance of Balboa Island.  Considering the chaos that surrounds this event, its is almost impossible to get an Uber or Cab for a reasonable price, and its just a
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and our resort amenities. We do have a shuttle that goes to Balboa Island, however during the boat parade our shuttle is unable to get to the Island due to traffic. We appreciate your suggestion and will keep it in mind for next year. Thank you for your time and we hope to welcome you back again soon.  Wamrest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: Good value for the money - and location was great, walk to Balboa Island and Fashion Island.  Beds very comfortable, walls a little thin though.  We could hear our neighbors.  Pool side rooms are great and tranquil.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: This hotel seems like a collection of many annexes brought together under one Hyatt.  I stayed in the Lido building, which was a bit of a hike from the lobby and parking area.  Would not recommend this area of the hotel.  There are exterior corridors where you can hear everyone clumping around with their luggage.  Also got to hear the guy coughing in the adjacent room - and it sounded like he was right next to me.  On the plus side, the rooms are clean with comfortable bedding.  And the location is great for Newport Beach.  It's a short walk/drive to Fashion Island or down to Balboa Island.
Manager Response: Good afternoon Rob,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I apologize for the noise you experienced during your stay. If you have a preference of building, please email directly prior to arrival and we will pre-block you to your desired building. You can email us directly at qualitynewpo@hyatt.com.   Thank you for your time and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: The hotel is in a good location and offers convenient shuttles to and from the airport, Fashion Island, and Balboa Island. The staff were very courteous. The hotel is clean and has been updated. The common areas were comfortable as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Stayed there this past weekend for a work stay. Put in the incorrect room, asked why and the receptionist was so rude about it. Lied about the reason amen blamed it on my company and told me thay my companies coordinator was the person who chose who got what rooms with how many beds and bed sizes. It was very obvious it was just because I was the youngest and easily manipulated. My coordinator called them and called them out and then they had to switch our room. The lady was very upset and was highly rude about it all.
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I apologize that your experience was a negative one. I see our Front Office Manager has been in contact with you in regards to your stay. We take matters like this very seriously and are taking corrective action to ensure this does not happen in the future. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: It is RARE that I 5 star recommend a location.  I had a short business trip and was given the option of this property or two nearby Marriott hotels.  I am so glad I chose the Hyatt Regency Newport.   Arriving at the airport, the shuttle was absolutely on time. Checking in was fast and friendly.  It's a beautiful, clean, well  maintained property.  My room, which wasn't a suite, was spacious and more than comfortable.  I spoke with co-workers who were at the Marriott locations, which were nice, but not as much as the Hyatt apparently. My balcony and relaxing environment were just great.  The bed, was comfortable, real comfortable.  I don't always find that to be the case.  I dined at the bar, which serves from a menu. Bartender Todd, was fantastic with conversation and
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay! We will be sure to share this with Todd and his managers. We hope to welcome you back again very soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary Heading: Great stay at an exceptional hotel
Summary: Loved everything about this hotel from the grounds to the food to the staff.  Was treated like the only person staying there from check in to check out.  Great experience.  Highly recommended.  Also a great workout facility
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: Beat up hotel not up to Hyatt standards. Dingy, unpleasant room, chipped paint, stained sinks and scuffed furniture, old carpeting.  Plaster peeling even behind reception desk.  Nice staff, and clean, however.   Would be lovely but needs complete renovation.

Please see my initial comments, stay was okay, rooms need to be updated and cleaner. Smells like cigarettes. Walls are too thin, not enough privacy can hear the people next door. Girl at check in working evening December 2nd was not friendly, very rude.
Manager Response: Dear Alicia,  Thank you for taking the time to help improve our service. We strive to provide exceptional service and it is apparent that we fell short. Our front office manager left you a voicemail last week as we would like to get more information from you about your recent experience. Thanks for being open and honest about your experience so we can learn from it. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: Great Hotel and Great Service, we love the location and grounds, there is a lot to do at the hotel and near by, it's perfect. We think it's our best kept secret-close to beach and fashion island. Lovely landscaping🌴
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Old property, trying to get updated
Summary: This is a sprawling property with a good location. Very nice restaurant on premises. Several pools, one with a mini water slide. Cafe open for light breakfast. Very friendly staff. However, there are a few issues. Paper thin walls do not all ow you to sleep.  Make sure to wash your glasses, ours were consistently smeared and dirty. Bathtub/shower grout covered in pink mold. The resort has very loud music blaring throughout. They allow smokers right outside the lobby, and keep the lobby doors open. The lobby stinks of cigarettes. We were here because it was free.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I have forwarded your comments to our housekeeping manager to follow up with his team. We would like to get some additional information from you in regards to your stay so we can narrow down your room location. If you could please private message me the name on your reservation or room number that would be greatly appreciated.   I look forward to hearing from you soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: For a 100 room occupied weding, and over 250 guests, the experience at the property was overall very nice. I'd visit the property again when traveling in the area. Really easy access to the bridge into balboaisland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you and all of your guests enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: excellent location minutes away from the Fashion Island mall.  Very clean.  Newly remodeled room at the Balboa building was fabulous.  Loved breakfast at the restaurant (had mixed eggs with avocado/potatos/etc.  New chef is fabulous.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Do not book here. Here’s the bad news. The photos and description of this “golf resort” are wildly misleading. What you’ll see in the pictures are modern, elegant, new looking, updated rooms. What you actually get are dowdy, outdated furnishings and rooms that haven’t experienced a designer’s expertise for YEARS. And don’t think I was in the one outlier room. No, no. I changed rooms three different times. The first right when I checked in. The second because it was a double and not the King I had reserved. The third to be on the ground floor. Each was exactly like the last. Some even had those wall unit AC units. The art was drab. The carpet is old. Everything really needs to be thrown out. For what you get, you are grossly overcharged. At best, this is barely a three star
Manager Response: Dear Jewell,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve.
