I have sent you an email to your personal email address to discuss your experience in further detail. I hope to hear back from you soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary Heading: A Resort hotel that actually feels like a resort
Summary: What a great place to stay.  A lot of activities at the hotel that keep you away from your room.  The kids love the chess set and shuffle board and I like the gym.  Hyatt is a great hotel to get away from it all.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: Our stay of one week was planned as a combined shopping and visiting vacation based in this location being directly across the street from Fashion Island. It is also relatively close to other attractions with easy access to freeways. The rooms were adequate but not elaborate. We only used the restaurant for breakfast which is included in our room rate and provided a good start for each days activity. Food quality was adequate and the buffet was well supplied. Service was great and all the servers were very attentive and took an interest in our group. The only negative was that we didn’t have room to get together as a group of six just to talk and visit. The extra charges were excessive for daily parking and destination fees that covered services normally covered by hotels in
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay. If you are looking rooms close together please contact us directly at qualitynewpo@hyatt.com and we can pre-block you in rooms close to each other. We can also give recommendations for large groups.   Thank you again for your time and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: Family enjoyed pools. Water slide is fun and other two pools were clean. Kids dinner food could be improved in quality. The parking fee is a bit high; we almost reconsidered staying at Hotel due to this charge.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the waterslide. I will share your feedback with our culinary team as we change the menu seasonally.   Thank you again for your time and we hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel with my young son and another family member due to a business meeting on the property followed by vacation. The airport, mall, and island shuttle was prompt and the drivers very courteous and safe. In room dining was not the best, but the food at Shor was very good. We wished the dinner hours were a bit earlier as we were running on eastern time. All of the staff coo'd at my kiddo and were friendly and speedy in meeting our needs. Great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time share your feedback. We are happy to hear you were able to enjoy our hotel for both business and leisure. I apologize that you did not have the best experience in our restaurant. I will forward your concerns to our restaurant manager as a means to improve on service and quality. Thank you again for your time and we hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: My family and I stayed at the Hyatt for one night and were thankful our stay wasn't any longer. There is something dingy and uninviting about this hotel. The majority of the staff were just doing there job - not exceptionally friendly, enthusiastic or helpful. The rooms, (we had to switch from one to another) were both very noisy. The bathrooms could have been cleaner.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.  Sincerely, Ashley R.

Summary: much to our surprise we were treated to a bottle of bubbling champagne and choc dipped strawberries .everyone went out of their way to make our the best.the resturaunt was extremely fabulous also.the only drawback is the27.00 a day to park.
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary! Thank you for celebrating with us! Hopefully we will get a chance to celebrate with you again.  Warmesty regards,  Ashley R.

Summary Heading: THe Hyatt Newport Beach Friendly and curtious
Summary: I travel for business 60% of the time for that past +30 years.  This hotel has been the friendliest and most curtious staff I have experienced.  No matter who was around when I needed something, they knew where to direct me or would take me where I needed to go.  The rooms were clean and well appointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to welcome you back again very soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: Room is large with the most comfortable bedding. Pool is large and busy which I enjoy. Plenty of sporting amenities including tennis and table tennis. restaurant and parking ($25/night) is overpriced especially because there is no nearby public/street parking. Note that you have to drive to the beach..the property is not on the edge of water as it may seem.

Quick trip to the water and great restaurants, nice grounds, a decent hotel restaurant though service was not great, nice staff throughout the hotel, but pack your earbuds.  My room was very noisey with heater so sleep was a little tough.

the people are awesomely friendly and professional. However the room i stayed at in Newport beach was old and dated. The carpets at least need to be upgraded in the 'vintage' units if they want to maintain loyalty.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. It is feedback like this that helps us improve. We are happy to hear our staff made your stay exceptional.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: I'm a Hyatt dedicated client! I love the brand and it's usually because of the staff. This was exactly the case here. The staff, from the valet when you arrive to the valet when you leave, and everyone in between, was awesome. Acknowledging you, saying hi, need anything?  The resort sits on a beautiful property near the harbor with wonderful landscaping. One complaint, the rooms need updating. Popcorn ceilings? A wall mounted air conditioner? I expected something more from the room. It's a gorgeous property, stay for that and the kindness of the staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear our staff made your stay awesome. We hope to welcome you back again very soon!  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: We had the best sleep EVER! We needed a place to stay for my daughter's regatta. Admittedly we can be rather picky when it comes to hotels. We had a lovely experience at the hotel. The staff were so considerate- they let us check in at 7:30am when they saw us with all of her gear. They chose a quiet room for us and we slept better than at home. We would definitely go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Warmest regards,  Ashley R.

Summary Heading: Expensive For A Loud Guest Experience
Summary: Hotel does a poor job managing noise during late night hours and containing out of control groups that party too hard. For a quiet resort one would expense more management involvement on maintaining a quiet relaxing environment that doesn't effect guests who stay there whom are not part of a large group. This experience has been consistent over the past 5 stays at this property so it is not an isolated incident.

Stayed in Newport Beach for a wedding. Had no real expectations for the hotel and boy were we surprised.  Grounds of the hotel were lovely, 2 pools, hot tub, shuffle board and giant chess. The bar and restaurant were great, Juan our waiter was very attentive and when we were undecided about what to order for breakfast, do we order the chilaquiles? he was kind enough to bring us an order free of charge to try - wow amazing service!  Hotel offers free 9 hole golf and 2 hour bike rental to residents as well. Very well run hotel - you could tell as the staff were friendly and it just had a great vibe about it. Will definitely come back and experience the hotel again when we don't have to rush off to a wedding.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel. We are happy to hear you were able to enjoy our hotel's resort amenities. We will be sure to pass you compliments to Juan and his managers.   Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: Hyatt Regency Newport Beach is always a joy--quiet, spotless, comfortable, beautiful setting, and great facilities. Check in and check out were effortless. Public spaces are varied and comfortable for informal gatherings.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel. We hope to welcome you back again very soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: For those who want to stay close to the coast and be only a 30 minute drive from Disneyland, I highly recommend the Hyatt Regency at Newport Beach. The hotel grounds are beautiful and well-kept, the pools are nice and the fitness centre was a welcomed treat.
Manager Response: Dear Tyler,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel. We hope to welcome you back again very soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: We were upgraded to a pool villa,and it was amazing.The patio was bigger than my back yard.It has a cute par 3 golf course,free bikes and a great gym.The bar has a great menu,and some perfect local drinks.I would go to watch a game there,very comfy.
Manager Response: Dear Kerry,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel. We are happy to hear you had a chance to enjoy our resort amenities as well as your villa upgrade. We hope to welcome you back again very soon.  Warmest regards,  Ashley R

Summary: The beds and bedding were excellent! the airplanes taking off were very disturbing when I was sleeping. Also loud music blaring in morning.  louver door to bathroom a big problem. No privacy. and light from bathroom at night was disturbing to husband that was sleeping ,due to the open louver bathroom door.

We very much enjoyed our stay. Staff were extremely courteous, amenities were great, the hotel grounds and pool were very nice, and location in Newport was top notch. Room was clean, quiet, and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to welcome you back again very soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: From the convenient shuttle (to and from the airport and a mall with many restaurants) to the friendly staff to the helpful concierge to the accommodating wait staff to the clean room, this was an excellent place to stay.  It is conveniently located relative to the airport, Balboa Island and Peninsula and the nearby mall.  The layout is easy for a large meeting.
Manager Response: Dear Allison,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regards,  Ashley R.

Summary: We had the opportunity to stay at this hotel while attending a multi-day conference.  The staff was attentive and efficient, although the wait staff in the restaurant could have been much better.  The accommodations were comfortable, clean, and nicely appointed.  We did experience a perfumy odor in our room, probably from the cleaning crew protocol, that we were able to air out by opening the sliding glass door for some time before bedtime.  The amenities were great, and the location, near Fashion Island and Balboa Island, with a complimentary hotel shuttle available into the evening was ideal.  There were some great restaurants in the vicinity. We would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Matthew,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear that you were overall satisfied with your experience at our hotel. I apologize that the restaurant service did not meet your expectations. I have forwarded your concerns to our food and beverage managers to discuss with their teams, in order to better our service.   Thank you again for your time and we hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: We recently had two nights at this resort.  I could not speak highly enough of the front office staff, they were attentive, helpful and so friendly.  The resort has a very relaxed feel and has three pools what are all very well set out. The grounds are gorgeous, the rooms are very clean and comfortable.  The only thing is the self-parking can be a long walk from some of the rooms.  The bar was great and served Starbucks coffee in the mornings. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear our front office staff took great care of you. Hopefully we will get a chance to welcome you back again very soon.  Warmest regards,  Ashley R.

Summary: I had a one night stay with my two year old daughter.  The staff was excellent in every aspect.  Valet, check in, breakfast at the restaurant were all outstanding.  They really went beyond my expectations. This was my second time at the hotel.  It was a brief overnight stay but I really enjoyed every part about it.  I wish we could have taken advantage of the amenities, but we didn't have time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We hope to welcome you and your daughter back very soon!  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: Pleasant quiet room as requested with pretty view of grounds. Food at Shor's was above average although Salmon eggs Benedict was served cold initially. Shuttle pickup for Fashion Island was too late for evening pickup so had to order a Uber to get back to the hotel. Desk clerk at check-in and waiter at breakfast were very helpful and eager to please.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your recent stay. I apologize that your food was cold. I have forwarded your comments to our restaurant to follow up with the kitchen staff. I hope the remainder of your stay was pleasant and you will be back to stay with us again soon.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary Heading: Recent four night stay for business trip
Summary: I have to rate this as barely four stars...  Service was great, excellent front desk service, great housekeeping, very good valets.  The "main" dining room was pretty bad in my experience- that included one lunch and one breakfast.  Both were mediocre.  I found the lobby bar/breakfast/quick lunch counter had good food for breakfast.  Burger was not great for lunch.  Service was excellent however.  The property is interesting...  For the most part it's the location you are renting.  The facilities- not so much.  The rooms look like an upscale Motel 6.  Strange spaces, weird bathrooms.  I will give credit to the property owner- they tried their best to improve the property- but this is NOT on par with other Hyatt properties AT ALL.  The pool areas are quite nice, and if you are
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. It is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I have forwarded your comments to our chefs to discuss with their team. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.  Sincerely, Ashley R

Summary Heading: Great Location. Great Food. Great Property
Summary: Visited the Hyatt Regency in Newport Beach for a 5 day conference this October.  Of the 7 years I have been going to our conferences, this was by far the best facility yet. The rooms are starting to show their age a little but overall the property was excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your conference and hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Very well maintained hotel certainly worth staying. Close to everything. Rooms are updated and every well maintained everyday. You have access to golf course and bay. Pleasant and calm. I will stay there again for next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Well managed great staff beautiful property
Summary: Fantastic stay the entire week.  Chris at the front desk was amazing, he really understands above and beyond guest service - he was “in training” yet he’s a true pro.  I can’t wait to go back to this fantastic property, it’s landscape/pools/recreation options are exceptional and the entire staff truly gets it!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear Chris provided you with above and beyond service! We will be sure to share your kind words with him and his managers. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Hotel has pretty grounds.  We were able to bring our dogs, which is why we selected this hotel.  Although its nice not having cars on the property, it's a really long trek to the parking lot, especially with 2 dogs (1 with 3 legs), and all of their baggage. Room wasn't in the best condition, 3 things were broken, but bed was comfortable and overall it was a good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. I apologize the there were broken items in your room. I have forwarded your comments to our engineering staff to ensure that everything has been fixed in your previous room. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: We only spent 1 night at this hotel so I feel like we only scratched the surface.  There is A LOT going on here.  There were lots of kids on the weekend and dogs! I can see where families loves this hotel because there is so much to do.  There are 3 pools, one of which has a water slide and other water play features for kids as well as music - the other 2 pools are quieter.  There is also shuffleboard, a giant chess set, golf, and fitness rooms.  These are just a few of the many amenities this hotel has.  It was my birthday so they sent a piece of cake to our room AND gave us a very late check out which was extremely generous.  2 water bottles are also provided per room.  There is a great exercise trail behind the hotel that runs flat along a nature preserve.  Walking, running,

The hotel is older and it shows.  The overall condition of the bathroom was poor.  The walls needed a good cleaning as did the tub.  It smelled of mildew.   Most of the employees were friendly but didn’t go above or beyond.  At checkout, didn’t even ask how my stay was, which I thought was odd because I almost always get asked that upon checkout.  Strange.!One employee working at the gift shop was extremely rude to my toddler.  She screamed at him after he accidentally broke an item which we paid for naturally.  Overall a horrible experience.  Would not recommend.  Glad we used Hyatt points and didn’t pay for the stay.

This property is a gem in southern California.  I love to return here every year for our meetings and even stay an extra night to enjoy the quiet comfort.  Being so close to Fashion Island and Balboa Island is also a great plus.  The staff are not only professional and efficient but so friendly and welcoming.  I feel like I'm visiting a friend, not at a hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary: Everything about the hotel was excellent. The ambiance, staff, checkin, the rooms, the drink at the bar were all excellent. Only downside is the $27 for overnight parking, really? Otherwise, great meeting/staying place for the weekend close to all the local spots
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary: Loved every minute at thus hotel so much to do from adult to kids pool with slide, the bay and mall right close by. Great staff very helpful and sweet. Good drinks and food by the pool excellent room service
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary: Food was great in the restaurant. Buffet style food was not very good and the room we stayed in was poorly remodeled. Rather pieced together. Customer service though was hands down the best. The view and pools were great as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback! I apologize that the buffet did not meet your expectations. Your comments have been addressed with our culinary team and we will use them to improve. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary: Your staff knows hospitality and went the extra mile to make me feel welcomed. They were always smiling. In particular, the valet, banquet and front desk staff were so helpful and kind to me. They were all happy to be there and all of them were very accommodating
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary Heading: Slice of heaven in Newport Beach
Summary: The staff was so accommodating and so kind, large rooms, great value. I would love to come back and stay again.We had a fundraiser in the area and reserved a block of rooms. The grounds are so beautiful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary: We had a great time in our comfortable little room that were steps away from the pool. We booked the hotel not knowing what to expect and not familiar with the area. This hotel is great if you have a car (which we did). We explored nearby beaches and restaurants. The kids enjoyed the pool and slide. We enjoyed the fact that we could lounge comfortably poolside to watch the kids play. There were lots of chairs and umbrellas available so we didn't feel like we had to fight for space or prime seats. We had a very relaxing time overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I stopped into Newport before driving to Long Island... This Hotel was beautiful and all staff went out of their way to assist... It was also in a lovely area of marinas... I will return for another stay when in the area!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel while I was in town for business and was pleasantly surprised. I've grown accustomed to staff not really caring about you, your stay and definitely not about your day. Very impersonal. This location on the other hand was completely different. Everyone was so welcome, always asking how I was doing, how my day was going, and if there was anything they could do to make it better. It was a breath of fresh air, coming from someone who travels multiple times a month. I very much appreciated how nice everyone was.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We love your Hotel but were sadly embarrassed this time around as the room we expected with pool view was one next to parking lot. Wedding party was noisy and several hung out directly by our patio. I had a dear friend that I showed classy elegance for 11 days with no issues and wanted to relive our precious dog Rescue meetup memories as we had a great visit several times before. This time was a bummer. For $300+ one would expect better quality and view that was promised.   The grounds are lovely and SHOR is a great place to eat and have after hours drinks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. Please reach out to us directly at qualitynewpo@hyatt.com so we can ensure you are blocked correctly in your preferred location for your next stay.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary Heading: Be wary of what they offer, even if you pay more for a balcony/view room
Summary: Upon checking in they gave us a room that was far less superior than what we paid for.  When we went back to guest services they said even though the room was reserved there is no guarantee.  We asked to speak to a manager who finally offered to move us the next day and we said that was unacceptable.  They found us a room which did have a balcony, view, and king bed but smelled like smoke.

This hotel is in a nice location with very pretty grounds.  However, the rooms are old and the walls are thin.  We heard the people in the room next door to us checking in at 2am.  We also heard anyone walking in the hallway.  The hotel is pet friendly with a good restaurant.  We felt that it was over priced for what you got compared with other hotels in the area.

Summary Heading: Grounds and location give it an extra star
Summary: The rooms here could use an update.  The rooms around the pool (Bay rooms) look like a 70's apartment from the outside.  They are clean and the bedding is nice in the room though.  The carpet and general feel of the room was very dated.  The pool area is nice with a slide and some games for the kids/families.  You can walk out the back gate and get on the Back Bay path for a nice run/bike.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope you enjoyed your stay and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The location and grounds exceeded expectations as well the customer service. The room however was booked with Bay views but the view was unable to be seen over the overgrown bushes. The room was dated with carpet coming up at the seam.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While we wish you had a better experience it is feedback like this that helps us improve. I see you have been in contact with our housekeeping manager in regards to your stay. To follow up, our landscapers have trimmed the bushes outside of your room and I apologize that it had not been taken care of before your arrival. If you give us another chance we would be pleased to welcome you back again.  Warmest regards, Ashley R.

Summary: The place was awesome. A lot more beautiful than in the pictures. Perfect for kids. Three pools and free 9 holes golfing. Highly recommended. Close to shopping and great restaurants. Service was friendly and quick and all staff friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: My recent staff at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach
Summary: I recently stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach to celebrate my birthday, and I had a wonderful time. The facility was nice and clean, and the staff was extremely polite. I also attended the concert, which was fantastic. I would recommend this hotel for all to attend.
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating your birthday with us! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Nice facility. Staff friendly. Hotel charges are crazy. Nickel & dimed for everything. DO NOT ORDER ROOM SERVICE!! Charges added are astronomical. A $27 resort fee is accessed. Additional $27 a day parking fee ($36 if valet used)

This hotel is heaven on earth. The staff is awesome. I could live there for the rest of my life. It’s such a perfect place to relax and have a wonderful vacation. I can’t say enough about this hotel. Everything is absolutely perfect in every way.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Location is good and close to Balboa Island and Fashion Island.  Hotel grounds are nice with lots of trees and grass, but exterior of hotel is dated.  Room mini split AC system has musty smell when turned on.  We turned it off since it was not hot, but it would make the room smell if we had to turn it on.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. It is feedback like this that helps up improve. One of our Front Office Managers will be reaching out to your shortly to get more information about your stay so we can fix the AC in that room.   Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Spent 1 night here to attend a Hyatt Regency Newport Beach Jazz Series concert.  Stayed in the Lido bldg, king balcony room overlooking a small part of the golf course.  The room was fine, bed and pillows comfortable enough and equipped with a small refrigerator.  The bathroom counter space is very limited, hardly enough space for small toiletries although there is a shelf below.  The iron was terrible, barely heated up and didn't glide over clothing at all.  Forgot to mention this at checkout.  Nice outside bar area of the lobby, friendly service, good small bites but a little overpriced.  Hotel charges $27 per night for self parking and $36 for valet on top of the $27 per night resort fee.  Concert venue area was nice, outdoors, good view from all seats and not too big.  Don't

The Hyatt Regency in Newport Beach is an excellent place to stay and a very good value. Rooms are great. Exceptional staff who really care about you and your needs. We look forward to staying again. 5 star rating.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Great location, great staff, great property.  We love Orange County and we love this property. While it is an older Hyatt property, it very well maintained and kept current.  There is an open concept bar that is very, very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Staff members Kerri and Chris were the best !!!  They both go above and beyond to make you feel welcome at the resort.   Room and pool area the best.  The entire staff were an A+.  A definite return if I travel back to the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We will forward your compliments to Kerri and Chris. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice kid friendly place to stay
Summary: Both my room and the hotel were in very good condition. They even had a swimming pool and water slide for the kids. Fitness room was well equipped and open 24/7. The restaurant had good food and the staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Valuables stolen from our valeted car!
Summary: We had a nice stay at this hotel, but had a terrible experience with their valet service.  You have the option of self park $27 or valet $36- we valeted.  When we got our vehicle back, multiple things had been stolen from our center console and the rest of the contents were tossed on the seat!  The valet staff didn't seem at all surprised (or apologetic) and had us fill out a form.  Their insurance has now denied our claim because they apparently have a sign posted?  Either the valet staff were stupid enough to steal from their customers, or they left our car unlocked for anyone to rifle through it.   The hotel was nice but not worth the several hundred dollars' worth of items we've lost, not to mention having to worry about these people having our personal information from our

We stay there this summer and the room service improved dramatically. A lot better. All people continue being kindly  and very cheerful. A very good hotel in a very nice place. The restaurant is very good. The self parking still is expensive..But the place itself worth a visit.

Hotel in a great position for visiting Newport Beach. The Grounds are very well kept as are the Pools. The Food we had at breakfast was a very high standard. The only negative about this Hotel is that the Rooms are in need of refurbishing.

Summary Heading: Hyatt Regency Resort and Spa Newport Beach
Summary: Beautiful complex with many activities, wonderful Shor restaurant, 3 swimming pools,lush landscapes along walkways around resort, all wonderful amenities, staff was very attentive and helpful and went out of their way
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Great location, close to the beach, Fashion Island and Balboa Island. The hotel is quiet and peaceful.  The jacuzzi and pool were well maintained. If you are coming to Orange County, this is a great place to stay.  There are many restaurants nearby and the free shuttle to the airport, Fashion Island and Balboa Island will save you money on taxi's and allow you to see some of the local sites.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: We stayed at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach to attend a high school reunion. The staff, from the door, to the desk, to housekeeping, to the restaurant were outstanding. Our room was always clean. The only downside was a noisy neighbor and poor internet connection. The hotel, however, has everything you could want.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your high school reunion with us and hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary: Room was not adequate for a handicapped person.  If you needed to be in a wheel chair to move around the room was too small. Bathroom linens were awful.....I would have used them to clean up a spill. Bathroom counter to small for two people to use and place toiletries. Bed squeaks! Locks on patio door very good felt comfortable leaving slider door open. Shor dining room - serving "trays" AWFUL..looked like you cooked cookies and never  cleaned the tray and then added a piece of paper bag to cover the burnt marks.  I was told that it was the chefs "choice"  and as I told the manager I serve my cats food in a china bowl and on a nice tray.  Need to make better choices for serving pieces. Comp water was nice so you could make coffee without a charge to use the water.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I apologize that are accommodations did not meet your expectation. I see you have already been in contact with our food and beverage manager in regards to your dining experience. Should your travels bring you back to our hotel please reach out to us directly at qualitynewpo@hyatt.com and we will ensure you are satisfied your accomodations.

Summary: We attended our 55th high school class reunion here.  The staff went out of the way to welcome us and make sure our stay was enjoyable.  The rooms were excellent and the food, while somewhat expensive, was very good.  ADA compliant accessibility in some areas of the hotel is lacking.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your high school reunion with us and hope to welcome you back again very soon.

Summary Heading: Resort Hotel  with lot of facilities
Summary: Great Hotel! with tonnes of facilities like a big pool , hot tub, slides to name a few. The hotel charges additional 30 USD as resort fee after booking and another 27-30 USD for car parking, so just add another 60 USD to your budget /night if you wanna stay here. The bar is open till midnight and they have great outdoor seating as well. The Hotel is very close to newport beach and fashion island.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The Guest Room was very nice.  The bed was comfortable.  The TV came on quickly.  There was a refrigerator.  However, the lighting in the entire room, including the Bathroom was very low.  There was only one small light in the ceiling of the bathroom, not allowing any light by which to put on make-up.  The mirror in the open room did not have any better lighting.

Very relaxing resort. Although we were not able to enjoy all amenities because of a food chain retreat with 300 + guest, we managed very well and enjoyed the weekend. The room we had was spacious, very clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Despite saying 3yrs ago we wouldnt be returning here we decided to visit again, this time with our grown up family. As we have stayed here before we knew to avoid the Bay Building, and so requested a different block on our reservation details.We then tried to email the hotel a couple of days in advance to confirm this, but its impossible to find a direct email address for them. Tried facebooking but they only check messages weekdays during business hours and as we left a message friday night they didnt get back to us until after we had checked in on the monday! Anyway on arrival sure enough they had allocated us rooms in Bay. After much discussion we were 'upgraded' to a room in Catalina that we had to pay extra for, and our son & his fiancee a room in Lido for the same original
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, I apologize for all the issues you encountered during your stay. I see you have been in contact with our front office manager in regards to your stay. For any future stay requests please email qualitynewpo@hyatt.com, that email is checked regularly.   We hope to welcome you back again.

Summary: There are Better hotels to stay in near by. Rooms arent great, needs updating or at least cleaning properly. Parking can be a nightmare on days where the hotel are running there events. Certainly a ripp off @$27 a night

Went for high school reunion.  Grossly overpriced, food was horrible, spiders in bathroom sink, towels belong in a CHEAP motel,   I wouldn't stay here again if you paid me.  Wife and I are staying at a Hyatt Centric hotel in San Francisco and it's outstanding, what we expected of  a Hyatt hotel.

Summary Heading: Back Bay beauty with home town comfort
Summary: My wife and I use to live in Newport Beach, and we often drive up from San Diego for visits with friends and family.  we enjoy our own space so we stayed at the Hyatt, instead of imposing on others.  the grounds were well maintained and picturesque.  The staff was friendly and no request was an imposition, the room was clean and the view from our balcony was superb.  The room rates were reasonable considering it was in the heart of Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our property! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: The Hyatt Regency Newport Beach is in a beautiful setting. Disappointing to see that the Hyatt has not begun a renovation on this old hotel. The rooms are outdated and the hotel overall needs a face lift.

Summary Heading: Wedding Festivities and Great Hotel Too
Summary: I want to return some day. Had a wonderful 3 day stay. Can't say enough about how special this hotel is. Great staff-friendly, smiling, felt really "at home". Wonderful activities offered on site. Very clean hotel, comfortable room, terrific bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our property! We are happy to hear we were able to make you feel "at home". We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Warm & Friendly Staff, made us feel very welcome , we had a wonderful experience all round, special thanks to Helena and her team. (Newport beach) i will definitely recommend it & will visit again next year
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay! We will pass along your kind words to Helena and her team. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel-been coming for years.  Beautiful property and extremely friendly staff.  Many great amenities.
Summary: I love the property, and ties, bar, restaurants and location.  The rooms are updated and clean.  My only complaint would be with an older hotel and poor insulation it can be very tough if you have an inconsiderate guest staying above you. In 14 years, I've only had this one bad experience with the noise though and was offered an opportunity to change rooms to an upper level.  The staff always bend over backwards to make their guests' stay comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our property! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Stayed here for one night and it was nice. The beds were comfortable and the room was clean. Treated very well by the staff. I made use of the airport shuttle on the way back and appreciated this service, not sure it is worth the 30$ resort fee. I really think they need to revisit this charge, I don't get were its coming from.  I did walk down to Balboa Park. There are sidewalks, but it's not something I would say is a good thing to do, especially if you have children. I didn't have my toothbrush and toothpaste and someone ran both those things up to my room, without a fee and in about 5 minutes. I really appreciated this.(obviously :-) ) I gave the hotel a 4 star, but it really is more a 3-3.5 star hotel. I just didn't feel like downgrading them all the way with a 3. Just not
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Our resort fee does include the following: o Golf at Back Bay Golf Course   (There is a fee for clubs and balls) o Shuttle Service- John Wayne Airport/Fashion Island/Balboa Island o Premium Internet included (up to 6 devices) o 2 bottled waters in room o Bike rental for two(2 hour max) o iPad mini for use in lobby only (2 hour max) o Fitness Center o Assorted board games, shuffleboard, oversized chess board. o Beach Valet (2 chairs and 1 umbrella) o Local and 800 calls o Kids Cups (distributed at the Front Desk) o Business Center Computers  We certainly want you to feel safe when you stay with us, when you return please email us at qualitynewpo@hyatt.com and we can pre-block you to a building with an interior door.  Thank you again for sharing your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: I LOVE Palm trees!  This hotel is in the Guiness Book of World Records for having the most variety of Palm trees throughout its property!  36 Varieties to be exact!  So needless to say, the landscaping, the variety, the colors of the Flora and Fauna of this property is just breathtaking!  The location of this property is also ideal!  It's within a very short distance of Fashion Island with a huge variety of shopping stores and Balboa Island where you can eat, shop, walk and enjoy the view of the marina.  Okay, so let's talk about the hotel itself.  This hotel has beautiful lobbies, as well as beautiful common areas inside and outside!  The rooms are comfortable and kept very clean.  The service we received from the front desk representatives, the valet people, and the concierge

Summary Heading: Very Noise stay for a resort
Summary: Between the thin walls, noise AC unit, and the planes overhead everything was pretty. They also didnt say anything about a $27 resort fee. Kind of joke if you ask me. At least the staff was friendly and helpful.

I am glad you asked.  We came to this facility for a conference.  We arrived at 12:45 and had to wait until 4:00 to check in.   The first room they put us in was in the Lido area, I do not remember what room #.  The bed comforter had black streaks on it and the sheets looked wrinkled.  We wondered if the room had been serviced so asked for another room.  They moved us to room 456.  By this time we were very tired from flying all day.  This room had 2 double beds.  There was pain and plaster peeling from the wall next to the shower - EWWW  They had the nerve to charge us $179 a night for this room.  We stayed 2 nights for the conference and then an extra night before flying out.  The 2 beds did not have a bedspread or a comforter.  They had a top sheet, a blanket, and then
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I am so sorry to hear about your negative experience. That is definitely unacceptable and we would like to get more information from you to fix the issues you encountered during your stay. If you could please private message me or call the hotel directly at 949-729-1234 that would be greatly appreciated.

Summary: Great location, front desk staff was friendly, efficient and was great. Our room was large,clean and comfortable,and we loved sitting on the balcony watching the guests play giant chess. This is a beautiful resort.In the morning, we decided to have our breakfast in the restaurant. We both had the buffet which was $26.The hostess was short tempered when we asked if we could sit inside because it was too hot outside. She said I don 't know if it's available WE counted 10 empty tables, she pointed to a table in the corner and disappeared. Our waitress was grumpy.We decided on the buffet so we could serve ourselves. This buffet was just fair,and fruit flies all over the fruit. We mentioned this to our waitress,and she said, that's good protein!! We left the hotel for all other meals.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I apologize for your negative experience in our restaurant. I have forwarded your comments to our food and beverage manger to follow up with their employees. We are happy to hear you enjoyed all other aspects of your stay and hope to welcome oyu back again soon!

Summary: Great service, Great location and Great stays...  I have stayed here many times and each time I love driving up and knowing I'm going to have a great experience.  The summer concerts, the great pools, the staff and the Surfer Girl Cocktail are well worth the visit!~
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We went for a anniversary and block a bunch of rooms for our family and fiends.  The Hyatt gave us a suite so we could entertain and everything went off without a hitch.  We arrived with boxes of flowers, snacks, liquor etc . . bellman took two or three trips to get it all to our room with a great attitude
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your aniversay woth us and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Bathtub was described as a spa-like experience but it was smaller than my bathtub at home and not very impressive. Lights were very hard to find which made it worse. Check-in was really hard to hear because of a concert and then we didn't get the free cookie.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. Our front office manager will be reaching out to you directly to get more information about your recent stay.  Thank you, Ashley R.

Summary: The hotel is a little older and hasn't been updated.   Rooms are large , clean, and comfortable with older rugs and furniture.   Large planes pass frequently, so the noise might bother some people.  We really appreciated the wonderful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights. I really can't fault the hotel. The rooms are lovely, clean, & well appointed. Communal areas are also great. Absolutely loved sitting around the firewall to enjoy a relaxing drink at night! The hotel is a 60 minute drive from LAX, is well situated for exploring the OC, LA, and the surrounding area. Newport Beach is beautiful & it is a walkable distance to the town centre, however, it is uphill back so might be difficult for less able people. Fashion island, with its shops & restaurants,  is a few minutes car drive, still within walking distance.  My only complaint is that we didn't stay here for long enough! Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Front desk staffs are inefficient and slow.  Room service food was not delicious.  Rooms are clean and when requesting for things staffs are nice.  The pool was nice and big.  Location is not that great coz you can hear planes flying all the time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: The Hyatt at Newport Beach is not only convenient to beaches, shopping and restaurants its a great value for the overall experience. Nice dining options and great outdoor seating areas for casual conversations or relaxing. Also like the multiple pool options especially if you're looking for an "adult only" experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon

Summary: I work nearby but live in Los Angeles. To avoid the 4 hours on the road every day, I'll occasionally stay at this hotel. The property is located near Fashion Island, as well Balboa Island and Newport Beach. If you're able to drive, there are quite a few dining options. The hotel itself is decent. The decor is a bit outdated. The property is decently large, so the rooms are spread out. I usually request the Balboa section, which is close to the lobby and relatively updated.   The property is a good place for families, as there is at least one pool. There is a giant chessboard, as well as a large shuffleboard playing area.   The restaurant specializes in seafood, but can be hit or miss.  The staff is generally quite friendly. If you're lucky enough to get Ben at the front desk,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We will pass along your comments to Ben and his managers. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: 50 of us stayed here for a wedding. The Hotel Bar help were amazing! Pool area was great for the kids. Restaurant food was good as well. They seem very busy but get to you with whatever your needs maybe on a timely basis.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: My room was not satisfactorily cleaned (toilet used by previous guest and not flushed), it was old and the capper is the $27 resort fee you get hit with on checking in. Pass. There are better places to stay in beautiful Newport Beach for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: I was not really impressed with the hotel.  The condition of the hotel room was just average and the bathroom shower did not drain while we showered. I expected a little more for the price.  There are so many other hotels in better condition for the same price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. If you can please the contact the hotel directly we would like to get a little more information about your room so we can ensure the issues you encounteder have been fixed. Please call the manager on duty directly at 949-729-1234.  Thank you, Ashley R.

Summary Heading: This place is far from a resort.
Summary: First,Valet was great! He informed us on the 36$ fee per day and we agreed. Upon check in, we were told we were "upgraded" to a room. The room we got was nothing close to upgraded it was a regular room that had an old smell. We got to our room, we ordered room service, and they charged us 3$ deliver fee? What is this delivery for? We ordered in house. This is not uberEats! Why is there a delivery fee when its in the complex. It is not like we were given the option to pick up. The next day we had a wedding. My husband was directed into a shuttle for the wrong wedding. He told the front desk the name of bride and groom and they directed him into a shuttle. The wedding we were there for did not even have a shuttle. This made my husband late to the wedding. The worse part of this

Celebrated my 8 yr. old daughter's b'day.  Took her, my wife and 9 yr. old son.  The kids loved it.  My wife and I liked the decor in public areas.  Once you get to the inner parts of the resort, where the rooms are at, it looked like an older apartment complex.  The guy who checked us in said he would send a happy bday cake to our room, it never came.  I'm glad I didn't tell my daughter.  All in all, we would stay again for the kids.  Plus, it's at a good location.

If you have younger children, the Bay rooms around the large pool is the place to stay!  Otherwise stay in one of the other serene and lovely rooms. The grounds are beautiful, service is very good, choice of pools, including one with a black line for laps. Workout room has good equipment and is cleaned daily.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary Heading: Relaxing time at Hyatt Regency in Newport Beach
Summary: Second time in this Resort for soccer tournament in Irvine, we choose this location as nicer and closer to the ocean. We enjoyed last year and so this year the quiet and cozy atmosphere and the friendly and caring staff, the special food both at breakfast and dinner
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: We found a disconnect between the name Hyatt Regency and this property.  We felt like Hyatt bought it and put their name on it. They do have an excellent location  The sign outside is very nice and then we arrived and wasn't thrilled.  They have a very nice staff
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: it could be better if was not so pricey for the quality you get. it should not get more then 3 stars for a review. the price for the food and parking and other fees extremely high. and you have no other options but pay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Poor Room AC and Noisy Property
Summary: Room AC was too small for the size of the room and the out door heat. My room reached 98 degrees at Midnight and made it uncomfortable to sleep. Was assigned a room by the pool which was very noisy. Property is in the airport flight path so that adds a whole new element of noise not to mention jet fuel reside all over my parked car the next day when I went to check out. Other than that, we had a great time at the Gino concert.

Summary Heading: Not the best it could be
Summary: My room was dirty, there were black hairs on the sink and in the shower (obviously house cleanings dirty rag) My sink was clogged and I stood in water while taking a shower. They said it was fixed after my complaining but it only lasted one day.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We have informed our housekeeping of your experience and we will use this as an opportunity to retrain our staff. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Great place close to nice restaurants, friendly staff, easy access Comfortable rooms They gave you a useful tips about balboa island We have a such nice walk into the garden of the hotel  Nice lobby for have a nice drink
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Great venue for a wedding and relaxing for the weekend. Would recommend this hotel for a special event or just a weekend getaway.  Restaurant and bar were great too!  Happy to have spent the weekend here :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We were there four days and our room never serviced.  I asked the front desk one day to make sure it got done and still didn't get serviced.  Resort fee ridiculous as nothing special except two bottles of water.  When we arrived room was hot and took a full day to cool off.  Beers/drinks were expensive at the bar and it shut down before midnight.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. I apologize that no one had mentioned the other items included with our resort fee such as golf on our golf course and bike rentals. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: I had a wonderful stay here. Staff was pleasant and courteous (Brian was really helpful). On property food was delicious. Attended a concert series event that was fantastic. Location was convenient to shopping mall, beach and highway. Cant wait to return for another visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and will pass on your feedback to Brian's managers. We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Pros : nice customer service, pools, nice looking hotel Cons: uncomfortable bed, maids did not change sheets just flipped them over, poor expensive food and drinks, hair in our food, expensive self parking,

Summary Heading: Stunning setting, friendly service, delightful "play areas" for adults and kids
Summary: Our room was in the Lido, which has modest exterior architecture compared to other buildings, but the room was clean, modern and lovely. The view across the resort's bougainvilleas and palms of the north harbor was gorgeous. With a full day to hang out before an evening wedding, we had 3 pools to choose among, shaded shuffleboard court, life-size chess board, complimentary bikes. NB is having a heat wave, but in the shade of the mature, healthy landscaping and the vine-trellised arbors, you don't feel it at this oasis. Many families with children here. Large, boisterous groups in restaurant and lounge on Saturday--but you can give them wide berth and find seclusion and luxury without sacrificing view or service. Great staff, all ages, all friendly, hard-working.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Landscaping is very nice and pool is good.  Rooms are old and tired. Staff was very nice... its a good corporate nights stay.  Room service was horrible,missing items and no choices.  Great location and nice to lay out and soak up some sun.  I was in a villa and the walls were paper thin!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary Heading: Excellent quality hotel in a first class location
Summary: This is an excellent hotel with lush gardens and three separate pool locations. The rooms are airy and very comfortable, the beds are particularly nice and large with excellent air conditioning and latest large screen TV's
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We booked this hotel for a long weekend while we got married in Newport Beach. It was close to everything and staff was very friendly and accommodating. Floors are definitely not sound proof. Every morning and night there were kids running around and jumping above us, that's my only complaint. We got a room with a balcony and Brian McKnight happened to be performing at the hotel that night right outside our room so that was really cool.

Just spent a few nights at the Hyatt Newport Beach & was impressed with the hotel. Read a few varied reports on TA but was not disappointed. Waited a couple of hours for our room to be ready when we arrived but no big deal as we had a late lunch. Our room was a bay view & thought it was good quality. It was clean with a modern bathroom & nice balcony views. The pools were also very clean with towels available & a decent hot tub. We didn't eat dinner but the breakfast/coffee bar was great & we had lunch at the pool a couple of times...a little pricey for food & alcohol but you expect that in up market hotels. We enjoyed our stay & found all the staff helpful. Really impressed with the hotel grounds & general cleanliness of the hotel. Would stay there again.  Two negatives, no
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback and great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We stayed overnight for a family staycation. We have two children, 10 and 6, and there were plenty of things to keep them busy with the pool water slide, ping pong, and games. It is very close to the harbor where we rented a duffy boat for a couple hours in the evening. It was a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Valet Parking attendants and process need help
Summary: Valet parking is confusing at the hotel. They seem understaffed, valet attendants rude. We waited several minutes before anyone would acknowledge us. When i asked is this where i park, one attendant in particular was condescending, rude and completely unhelpful. He was stressed because it was a busy day but thats not my problem. Its a real problem when your children (age 5 and 8) ask mommy why is he so mean, what did we do?  The checkin in process at the front desk though was good.

Summary Heading: If location is the only thing you are looking for.
Summary: Check in was great, the desk clerk was very nice and helpful as was the concierge that we talked to after we checked in about shuttles and beach umbrella use. There were no upgrades available.   Upon first impression, the room were were given was fine, we were however very unimpressed for the price.   We had just moved from a week at the Hyatt Regency Orange County where we stayed in a spectacular suite for about half the price.   The shower in our room was almost impossible to turn on.  Luckily I had a butter knife in my possession as we needed it to change the water from the tub to the shower.  It had to be pried up.   I thought all the signs about being quiet were somewhat strange and we were surprised to be kicked out of the fire pit area by the pool at 10pm sharp that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. Again we apologize for your negative experience and hope you give us a chance to improve.

Summary: We had to spend a night in Newport because of attending a wedding nearby. There was no way to secure early check-in until early the same day. The young woman was soooo annoyed with me for calling to ask if we could have a room in which to dress before leaving @ 4:15 for this wedding. Guess I interrupted her "job"!  As my husband was showering, the shower head fell off nearly hitting his foot! Sunday morning...6:42 a.m...noisy guests (adults & children) were running by our room either heading to the pool or who knows what...Someone should be monitoring common areas that early in the morning...Could never recommend this property & was really surprised & disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Family friendly resort without the "attitude."  Bonus jazz concert on Friday nights during the summer.  Attentive staff, surprisingly good dining experiences and room to lounge/hang out is sun or shade.  Grounds are well-kept with shuffle board , giant chess, volleyball & golf. Motorcycle rentals available.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed all of our resort amenities. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: If you want to be close to the beaches near Corona Del Mar, San Clemente, Del Mar, etc., and Fashion Island, PCH, etc. this is the place to stay.  Pets are allowed too!  The main pool has a slide and the Bay Back is walking distance for biking, running and walking!  Only downside are the parking & resort fees.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: I had the extreme pleasure of being assisted by Kevin; one of the hotel's amazing, professional staff, who, kindly and without making me feel like I was a 'bother', re-located me to a much quieter room the second night of my stay, due to the unruly noise of a family in the room next to my previous one.  The three children were running up and down the walkway in front of the rooms, screaming and laughing until after 10:30 pm., the previous night, and I had a very early start the next morning, and the three mornings following.  Kevin personally brought me the key card to my new room and offered to help me with my luggage.  But, let me say, both rooms were wonderfully clean and comfortable, and the beauty and extravagance of the Hotel grounds, gave me a feeling of importance.  This
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear Kevin was able to make your stay pleasant. We will be sure to share your comments with him. We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: We recently had 4 days here for our board meeting. We booked to conference room and all the exec team stayed onsite. Check in was crazy we lined up for way too long and rooms where not available for some of us until 4pm. The staff were friendly and helpful but I would say this would be a good hotel for a family vacation not so good for business travel. There were many families and lots of kids all having fun. The hotel is well located to access all the major malls and attractions and UBER was generally onsite within 5 minutes.

Summary Heading: I don't get all the negative reviews
Summary: Currently staying at the hotel, it's a lovely resort hotel. 3 pools, 9 hole golf, great location, really nice hotel and great value. Rooms are spacious and modern. Newport Beach is a stunning town. We are enjoying it!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: Very clean rooms, Great location great food/ The management staff at Hyatt Newport is second to none. Helena the Manager is a highly trained professional that treats all the guests with the up most respect. I love the Hyatt experience at Hyatt Newport Beach California

Terrible experience.  Called front desk 3 times during stay and was only answered once - otherwise voice mail.  Overal front desk staff was not very gracious - not what I am used to as a highest tier loyalist.  Left card with breakfast order outside my door and it was never picked up - they delivered quickly and waived fee but would have preferred timely delivery.  Condition of hotel is poor - clearly not upgraded in decades - room mirror was falling apart.

Summary Heading: Great resorts for the whole family
Summary: We had a great time  So many things to do at the resorts and near by Wonderful staff. So accommodating  Check in was real easy. We got an early check in and  a room update.  The free shuttle to Blaboa island and the fashion square is a plus Will definitely go back ...
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Wow this place is a major disappointment.   Isn't Newport beach one of the wealthiest places in the U.S.?  Why would anyone stay here?  Run down and depressing rooms, hallways and common areas, a third rate restaurant and lounge area and man, what is that smell in the room? It's like a mix of bleach and mold.   This property could be a jewel if Hyatt exhibited a little creativity and vision.  Isn't Newport beach one of the wealthiest places in the U.S.? Instead, they seem content to wallow in sub-mediocrity on this one. Blah!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Booked two double rooms for July 2017 (three months in advance) Via booking.com. Upon arrival after a 15 hours of non stop flight and exhausted kids, we discovered that only single bed rooms were reserved . The front office stated that there was nothing the hotel can do to correct their fault and try accommodate us with our kids. I had to go & search nearby hotels in the middle of the night with sleepy & hungry kids . Luckily, The New Port Marriott was friendly enough to respond to our short notice booking and secure for us the needed rooms. That was really an Awful experience.  This will be my last booking with a Hyatt regency hotel , and also my last Booking via Booking.com who even refused to post my review !!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: Treat yourself to this great property !  9 holes of golf are included, which we missed out on as we didn't expect that !   Thank you Hyatt !!   Very near any BackBay festivals, Fashion Island, Corona del Mar, and Newport Beach - travel from 'far' or 'stay-cation'
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We had a harbour cruise to go on at Newport on a Friday evening so we decided to get a hotel room and arrive around 1pm to avoid the dreaded LA traffic.. So we got there at 1.45pm yeah room was ready so we put our bags away then went down for lunch...We were told that we had to eat at the bar because lobby/cafe resturant was closing in 10 min at 2pm. Ok went to the bar that had a limited menu... Only one bar tender!!! Must I go on...left the Bar at 3.20. I think the management should rethink this.. Oh there was 20 of us in the bar area trying to get a drink and food..;lol  Hey once we got the dishes they were really good...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I apologize for your long wait in the bar area. I hope the remainder of your stay was much better. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: Pro: My kids has fun at the water slide. Lots of towels at the pool. Kids get a purple cup with unlimited refill with milk and juice Fire Pitavaiable for making s'mores.  Con: $27 for self parking. Bathroom run down at the Lido Building
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!

Summary: We stayed one night and really enjoyed ourselves. Ben at the front desk was very helpful coordinating a slightly early check-in which we really appreciated. He is an asset to this property and should be commended for making our stay special.  ROOM: 2nd floor in Lido building. Excellent view of golf course and bay. The room was a connecting room which may have added to the noise of our neighbors that night. If sensitive to noise maybe ask for a non connecting room. As others have mentioned it is a hike to self parking, but it is what it is  PROPERTY: We spent our time in Lido pool as it is least crowded pool. Perfect temp water. Very comfortable lounges. We also played the little golf course. Greens are awful but we still had fun. Longest hole is 100 yards so just bring a
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Our 18 month old got his feet dirty just by walking around in the room! The worst thing about this hotel is the very long walk from the rooms to the self parking area. And with a stroller it was a circuitous route 3/4 of the way around a pool and then behind a building before climbing a steep hill. The $27 per day for self-parking is a joke and the $27 per day "resort fee" is also a ripoff. There is nothing resort like about this place. Don't even try to use the luggage carts without the aid of a bellman - we were told that due to liability issues we weren't allowed to use it. (We've stayed in dozens of hotels and have never heard of such a policy before.) Finally, we weren't able to checkout using the TV - something wrong with the technology. Consider staying somewhere else if

Visited this wonderful hotel in May 2017 for the annual cigar and Spirits Show!! First class service and a beautiful area to visit. Close to John Wayne Airport and great restaurants and shopping galore! A must is the shopping area called Fashion Island with outdoor shopping and food for even the most skeptical!! Golf and beach nearby to make your stay even that more enjoyable!! Also visit the restaurant Thirty three Waterfront to enjoy great food and a fine Cigar overlooking the marina!! Great hotel, great service and great location!!😎

Great customer service.  Close to beaches and Balboa island.  Our boys ages 7 and 4 LOVED the onsite water slide and pools.  Rooms were clean and resort offered many activities. Dinning was also good.  The overhead airplanes can be noisy at times, but do not deter from a great experience.  We will be back!

Summary Heading: Room is outdated and staff wasn't helpful
Summary: For the price these rooms were so outdated.  Nasty wallpaper in the bathrooms, mold around tub, paint chipping off, water damage on ceilings.  We booked for two nights and we ended up having to leave a day early due to a medical emergency back home and the hotel would not refund ANY of the $335 we paid for a room that we didn't even stay in.  We left at 5pm and they wouldn't give us even a small portion of our money back.  They must not have children or families because the treatment was horrible and inconsiderate.

Nice location to have a quick get away for the weekend near the beach. Shopping is near by, along with nice places to have dinner. Beautiful bike riding trail near by at no additional cost to guests. Pool area is fun for kids.

Summary Heading: Worst Hotel Experience Ever - A total disappointment
Summary: Our family stayed at this overpriced, inefficient hotel this past month. Be careful with your credit and debit cards. Not only will they demand a $75.00 per night security deposit, money which they kept for a week in my case, but they put AUTHORIZATION HOLDS on your card. In addition to $225.00 security deposit, they took $204.50 and $122.96 out of my checking account for AUTHORIZATION HOLD. Why? It couldn't be explained. I had a zero balance when I checked out.
