Manager Response: It’s great to hear that our staff impressed you with their great customer service. I'm also happy to hear you were able to take advantage of our complimentary shuttle that is now included in our resort fee! We hope to see you again!

Summary: My group received excellent service at this hotel.  They were the host hotel for a small corporate VIP event I had during the middle of the week.  Great service and great food as well.  It was busy for a weekday, yet they stayed on top of all my needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great response. We are happy to hear you had a great meeting while on property!

Summary: Our son was married in Newport Harbor in June 2014.  The grounds are impeccable, the room was wonderful.  Our son and new daughter-in-law only wished they could have stayed longer than one night - but, they were off to Hawaii for their honeymoon. The concierge sent up truffles and champagne for the newlyweds.   I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a romantic getaway.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience at our hotel for your son’s wedding! I'm happy to hear that our concierge was about to make the newlywed couples night even more memorable.

Summary Heading: A real gem in crowded California
Summary: Had to go for a business meeting and what a pleasant surprise.  Spread out over a large acreage this older hotel has a relaxed feel, like it's in a different world.  The multiple buildings are only a couple stories tall so its more "cabana" like then a major hotel.  The grounds are well maintained, the rooms have been upgraded and have all the nice modern touches (the automatic night lights in the bed tables neat!) and the eating areas have good food and good service.  Walking distance  to Balboa Island with more shops and food.  Nature trails, bike rentals, you name it, what a place to unwind.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful response on Trip Advisor. It sounds like you were able to experience the great amenities that our hotel has to offer. We are built on 26 acres which is very uncommon for hotels in this area. We hope to see you very soon!

Summary: This was our 5th year at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach for jazz. It was the best so far.They were more organized and everyone was so friendly and helpful - from desk staff to security for the event.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about our Jazz Festival. It’s great to hear we were more organized this year than in previous years. We hope to see you for your 6th Jazz Festival next year!

Summary: We stayed for 8 days, bed and breakfast, travelling from the UK. All the staff were friendly and extremely helpful - really very good indeed.  There is a main building which houses the reception, restaurant, bar and some rooms, but most are in separate building blocks. We stayed near the pool, which kept our daughter happy! It's all really clean and tidy although a little tired in places if I'm being picky.  It's a 20 minute walk down to Bilboa island, 20 minutes drive to Laguna Beach. San Diego took 90 minutes but we may not have picked the best route. Parking was $22 per day, I guess valet parking is more.  We enjoyed our stay - the breakfast menu is also really good!
Manager Response: Thank you for your response on Trip Advisor. It’s great to hear that you enjoyed the bed and breakfast package. That package is a great deal if you are planning to eat on property. We hope to see you again when you are traveling to Newport Beach!

Summary: We just returned from a 3 day stay for their jazz festival. We have traveled a great deal over the years and have never had better customer service!! From the minute we arrived to the minute we left the staff (front desk, valet, housekeeping, etc.) were amazingly friendly and accommodating. And the number of staff made all the services especially easy to access.  There were some issues with the room but the staff went out of their way to get them quickly resolved. The hotel is old but has been renovated and the grounds are lovely. The festival itself was wonderful...well organized, good security, and a very pleasant atmosphere.  We liked the location that is an easy walk to Balboa Island. We ate at Wilma's Patio on the island 2 mornings and really enjoyed the food and service.
Manager Response: It’s great to hear that you had a nice time at our annual Jazz Festival. I hope you are able to join us for one of our Friday night Jazz concerts this summer!

Summary Heading: Nice resort, but little bit expensive
Summary: I was on a busniess trip. Car is necessary to go to the beach, althoug there are good swimming pools. Very big resort. I would say with hundred of rooms!!. I was in March and it was fully booked. The only negative thing is the price, though the value for money is fair. If your budget is high, this is a good choice. If you are looking for a enconomic lodge, this is not the one.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great response on trip advisor. We are happy you were able to enjoy our pools and resort. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed her for five nights for wedding & leisure.. Our room was on pool side .. Nice view..staff as friendly .. Service was also good ...in five days we feel like home ..location is so good we go for morning walk on back bay everyday .. Wedding also nicely organised..We enjoyed a lot ...
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on Trip Advisor. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, just add $40 for parking and resort fee
Summary: We had a nice weekend at this hotel, the kids loved the pool and I could easily jog from the hotel to Balboa Island. The rooms are small but clean and comfortable. They charge $22 for parking!!!! and $19 resort fee!!! (the hotel is nice but by no means a "resort", there is no private beach/ spa ect.) and for that reason we will not come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on Trip Advisor. We have put the resort fee in place to make our resort more cost effective and include items such as internet, bottled water, bike rentals, and more. I hope you were able to take advantage of some of the fun activities and amenities we offer with the fee.

Summary: We booked one night before surprising family that we were in town. The hotel has been updated, redecorated since I was last here; it looks nice. The property is pretty and the staff were friendly. The rate, however, is somewhat misleading (as others have mentioned). We paid as much for everything else (resort fee, parking, drinks, breakfast) as we did for the rate itself, so not quite the value we had hoped it would be since we weren't there quite 20 hours.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response on Trip Advisor. If you book directly through our website we often offer packages that such as bed and breakfast which will include 2 breakfasts or even a parking package. These rates tend to be more cost effective when utilizing these amenities in the hotel. Thank you so much for your feedback. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed for one night while driving down the coast.  The lobby and welcoming areas are very nice and the service was very good.  Our rooms were at the back of the resort, next to the fitness areas that was under construction, in what we referred to as the Expedia rooms.  Spoke to a few others and found that they too had booked with Expedia and were in the same area.  The room was clean and had all the necessarily amenities but was not what you would expect from a Hyatt.  The bathroom's sink area was too small to hold any of our toiletries.  The grounds were nice and the hotel is close to Balboa Island which was great.  We also enjoyed a few drinks at the bar area.  Seemed to be a younger crowd there on the Saturday night and the area still showed remnants of the drink fest the
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your experience at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. I'm sorry to hear that we were unable to exceed your expectations during your last stay. I recommend reaching out to the hotel directly before you check in if you have a building request. We strive to make every guest as comfortable as possible. Our fitness center is now done and there is no more construction at the hotel. We hope to see you again in the future so we can make sure you have a better experience!

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel Great staff wonderful manager
Summary: We stayed here last August,and whilst we had a problem with our room that very terminal and was beyond the control of the management. The general manager Mr Cuperschmitt moved heaven and earth to mitigate the problem . We had a great upgrade to Hyatt in Huntingdon Beach which was also very pleasant. 10 days later we returned after touring az and NV in an camper van and the service was excellent.   The measure of a great hotel is not how it reacts when things go well it is how they handle matters under adversity.   Mr Cuperschmitt was beyond helpful. when we checked into the Andaz in Amsterdam  he even called forward and we got the Royal treatment there too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful response. It’s great to hear that someone from our team was able to go above and beyond to make sure you had a great experience even at another Hyatt hotel. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: Nice pool with fun waterslide for the kids. Room and service were good but lacking polish for a 5 star rating. Would definitely return though.  Asked for an upgraded room with balcony and found this to be more comfortable than the poolside rooms with no balcony for fresh air.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed some fun in the sun at our kids pool! We are hope to see you again very soon!

Summary Heading: A glimpse of water in the California sun
Summary: I found the Hyatt a good place to get a little California fix on a fleeting business trip.  When I got up to my room, there was a hummingbird buzzing the flowering trees and I could see sailboat masts and a strip of water.  The room was comfortable and clean; bathroom and toiletries good; my only gripe was that the minuscule creamer packet for the in-room coffee led me to use three "Arabica Mix Condiment Packs" (their label).   Swimming before breakfast the next day I had a lovely pool (one of three) to myself.  I appreciated the lobby layout switched completely from bar at night (with tasty bar food that substituted well for a heavy dinner) to coffee bar with a limited breakfast menu in the morning.  I had left my laptop at home, and appreciated using one of the lobby
Manager Response: It’s great to hear you were able to utilize so many aspects of our property including our pools, lobby lounge, and coffee bar in the morning. We will work a substitution for a different creamer in the guestrooms. Thank you very much for that feedback. I hope on your next stay you are able to take advantage our complimentary airport shuttle to John Wayne Airport.

Summary: I've stayed here before a few years ago and would not have gone back if they hadn't remodeled.  My expectations were pretty high since it was recently done and by the caliber of their new hotels the Andaz.  I returned to find that the lobby and bar have a fresh new high end look, very nice.  The rooms and common areas are pretty much the same though.  They did a half way remodel, only changing paint, carpet, drapes, and new bathroom fixtures.  The furniture is mostly the same run down ones that were there years ago.  Our dresser draws wouldn't stay shut, the bed squeaked, no high def tv, white walls with the same pictures from before reno that don't match current decor, curtains that only open from one side, and I could go on.  The $19 resort fee makes you think you are at a
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you responding on trip advisor. Our goal is to meet all guest’s expectations when staying with us at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. I want to apologize that we failed to meet some of yours. We are defiantly different from our Andaz Brand. Every Hyatt brand (Hyatt Regency, Park Hyatt, Andaz, Hyatt Home, Hyatt Place) all target a specific market. Andaz is a boutique style hotel that offers a completely different experience then any other. I completely understand why you enjoy that brand. I hope you were able to utilize all our resort activities we offer on property. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the area and visiting Corona Del Mar. Please feel free to call us if you need anything at all.

Summary: We had to pay a resort fee of $35 for Internet and a bunch of stuff that we didn't use on top of that we had to call to the several times to get towels. Walls thin, good was very over priced and service was terrible in the food area.
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear we didn’t meet all your expectations for your stay. Our resort fee is $19 and it includes Internet for up to 6 devices, bottled water, bike rentals, green fees on our golf course, beach valet kits, shuttle rides to the airport, Fashion Island and Balboa Island, local and 800 calls, kids cup for beverages in all our outlets, access to our newly renovated StayFit gym, mini I pad rentals and computer work stations with free printing. If you have any questions about charges, please feel free to contact our front office to take a look at your folio to make sure everything looks correct.

Summary: The quality of the hotel, the location and the service were all excellent. I was slightly worried having read earlier reviews, but these people really need to get a life and stop spening their time looking for things to complain about. Special note should be made of Felix in the resturant at breakfast. He always made us all welcome and after three days already knew what our drinks order would be, Angel was also great with the family.  The receptionists could never do enough for you. As it was my son's birthday while we were out there he wanted to go to a water park. But as these soft Californians dont thinks 70/80 Deg is warm enough they were all closed. Anyway the receiptionest suggest we go go-karting, and he phoned and booked for us. Also there was a card, cookies and a drink
Manager Response: It’s wonderful to hear that our front desk agent was able to make your son’s birthday memorable. Thank you for taking the time to write a response on trip advisor highlighting your wonderful stay. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: The location is a very short distance to Balboa Island and to Balboa beach .The room was good size and had a good view . We ate out back in the morning got our breakfast at the Starbucks we were taking pictures and then left we were checked out and drove about five miles then I saw I didn't have my good camera. We went back I looked out back the G.M. was there he called room service to check the room and the front desk which is where someone handed it in.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great response on trip advisor. We are so happy to hear that your camera was recovered safely. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Overall I had a good experience at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. For the most part everything was up to par.  I was very impressed that they had chosen to drain and turn off their fountain in view of the severe draught CA is having. Until, we were checking out and a guest was drying off his truck with a pool towel at the entrance to the lobby.  I realized why as I returned to my car to find it soaking wet from the sprinklers for their landscaping.  I'm not talking a bit of water but more like a huge rainstorm came over the parking lot.  As we are currently battling several fires in SD County I feel it is completely irresponsible of the Hyatt to allow their irrigation system to waste such a vast amount of water.
Manager Response: Thank you for your concern for the California drought. Our hotel is dedicated to conserving water on property. We have reduced our landscaping water use. We have also educated our staff on water conservation measures throughout the hotel. I am very sorry to hear the sprinklers got your car very wet. I will have our team look into the sprinklers and make sure they are working correctly and being scheduled at the right time.

Summary Heading: Not that impressive for a Hyatt resort
Summary: I was here for two nights to attend a conference being held at this hotel.    The airport shuttle and John Wayne runs every hour.  So if you just barely miss it, as I did (on a record hot day), you get to wait for 50 minutes for it to return.  Check in was smooth and quick...no problems noted.  When I entered my room (pictures attached), I was at first extremely impressed.  It was HUGE!  And it was decently decorated.  I believe it was room 201.    The photos speak pretty much for themselves.  This was a very large room and the furnishings and paint, etc were all fresh and up to date.  I thought I was in for a great stay.  Then the troubles started.  It started when I noticed the older wall-mounted air conditioning unit...the kind you tend to see at two and three star hotels.

Summary Heading: Nice Resort - Very Noise -Bring Ear Plugs
Summary: The resort was very nice. It was as I expected. But the room I had on the first floor was very noisy. I had difficulty sleeping at night. I actually liked the first floor but wish they could control the noise.  The services that I received were excellent, but they charge for everything and it was pricey.  The location was convenient to Huntington Beach where I attended a wedding. There is nearby shops too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great response! I'm sorry to hear about the noise you experienced on the first floor. I will make sure our security team works on managing noise better. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Paying resort fees for a hotel stay...
Summary: After the Hyatt Irvine changed to Hotel Irvine, started to stay at the Hyatt Newport.  Overall great location and facility with excellence service.  They are going through a renovation/update and look forward to seeing the expanded exercise facility.   Be warn - resort fees and parking fees drives up the cost quick. And this Hyatt may call itself a resort, but it is not. This is the main reason for three star.
Manager Response: It’s great to hear that you always experience great service at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. Our new fitness center looks beautiful and will be open May 23 to all of our hotel guests. We hope you area able to enjoy our new work-out facility on your next trip. I apologize that our property doesn’t meet your criteria for a resort. We do offer the following amenities that are all included in the resort fee: Complimentary Wi-Fi in all guestrooms for up to 6 devices, 2 bottles of water per day, green fees included, access to the Stay Fit gym, complimentary bike rentals, computer stations in lobby with free printing, Beach valet kit rentals, Complimentary shuttle to Fashion Island, Balboa Island, and the Airport, Local and 800 calls in guestroom, Kids cup for beverages in our outlets, shuffle board, table tennis, and oversize chess games. We also offer three great pools and a fun water slide great for children.

Summary: I attended a conference at the hotel in May.  Thank you Ziana for coming to the rescue! My check in was delayed on a record high temperature day in Newport Beach.  You came along with a friendly smile and word to the somewhat overwhelmed front desk. The hotel is clean and recently renovated in soft , muted beach tones. The staff were friendly and accommodating. The restaurant Shor serves a lovely breakfast, great coffee too.  The hotel shuttle is a welcome amenity. I would have appreciated better directions from the front desk staff in using the hotel shuttle.  When I called the hotel's front desk to ask where to pick up the shuttle at Balboa Island, I was told it was "just before the bridge"...which corner? When calling from the airport...it picks up "outside baggage
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on Trip Advisor. It’s great to hear you were able to enjoy our property and SHOR restaurant. I will make sure our front office does a better job with explaining the drop off and pick up areas for our hotel shuttle. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: My family stayed at this hotel which was near the starting line of a marathon my son was running.  They offered a free shuttle for runners to the start line, which was a helpful perk.  The hotel also offers free shuttles down the road to a spot across from Balboa Island, and the large shopping mall across the road.  The room was nice with two double beds.  We had to request a microwave and coffee maker as they weren't in the room when we arrived.  The bathroom had louvered doors, which doesn't provide the privacy most people prefer, but other than that, the room met our needs.  The lobby area includes a Starbucks breakfast area in the morning, and a bar setup the rest of the day, with snacks available for purchase.  Off from that area, there's a library/tv room with coffee table
Manager Response: It’s great to hear that you were able to take advantage of our free shuttle for the Marathon runners. We hope you are able to come visit us again in the near future.

Summary: The property was beautiful, very clean.  The only thing I did not like is that the self parking is across the bridge. I normally don't use or trust valet. However, Chad the valet was awsom. The concierge was very nice but, did not inform us of the shuttle service into downtown so we walked, but was able to catch the shuttle back.  The restaurant is brand new, the menu is very small for lunch.  I would recommend dining there for dinner you have more options.  The room was large and had a partial view of the ocean I really enjoyed my stay.

I was at a conference at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach in February 2014, and it was a delightful experience. The hotel is spread out over a large area that is beautifully landscaped. I stayed in one of the buildings that had a view of the marina from my balcony. I specifically asked for a quiet room since I'm a light sleeper, and one of the farther buildings was quiet and perfect for me. There are various swimming pools for different buildings, and I was impressed to see that each was equipped with a chair lift for disabled people--something I had never seen before. To get to my room every day I walked past a large outdoor chessboard and a lovely fountain--treats for the eyes every day. The staff was very helpful, and parking was only $10 a day, much cheaper than most other CA
Manager Response: It’s great to hear that you were able to relax outside and enjoy Newport Beach's great weather! We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here on business and it was gorgeous getaway.  Staff was excellent and very accommodating.  Rooms were impeccable and nicely furnished.  The bathroom was spacious and well lit - hard to find in a hotel.  Lots of green space and places to relax outdoors.  It was easy to find a quite place and just read without being disturbed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response on Trip Advisor. It’s great to hear that you had a nice stay while on business. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The location is great and the layout of the rooms provide a view amentity to almost every wing.  The lobby and many of the rooms have been renovated.  I hope that the exterior and hardscape are next. Staff was very friendly.  Would have been helpful to have right side of valet lane open so alleviate congestion.  Restaurant food and presentation were excellent.  I would, and probably will, come back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great Trip Advisor review! I agree the Lido Building Bay Views offer the most amazing view of the Bay and the golf course! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here with a group of 4 on a business trip due to the fact that we stayed at different Hyatts around the US where we received great service and friendly staff (we also stayed in Hyatt Long beach) where the experience was 10 times better. I dont even know how the resoprt looked like prior to the refurbishment as it needed an upgrade. First let me elaborate on my awful experience despite the ravings of almost all reviewers. 1-To begin with when we checked in at 3:20pm we were told we had to wait until 4pm for a room to be ready, so I asked the agent (Bridget) if she could get us other rooms as we are all exhausted being up since 6am , to which she rudely replied that we need to wait and there's nothing she can do and then she just walked away to chat with her colleague, I
Manager Response: Thank you for your response on Trip Advisor. I am so sorry to hear that you had a poor experience at our property. I'm very sorry that you didn’t receive the most professional service from our staff. Providing every guest with great service is what we work for each and every day. I am very sorry we failed to do so on your stay. I completely understand your frustrations with the breakfast and Wi-Fi being charged when you were told it would be complimentary. Please call the front desk and ask to speak to a front office manager or myself so we may address this situation. If there is anything you need, please reach out to me directly do I may better assist you.

Summary Heading: Bogie and Bacall would have loved it
Summary: Humphrey Bogart sailed his beloved yacht Santana from the Newport Harbour Yacht club - nearby in Balboa and almost visible across the bay from the balcony of a third floor room.  This is a great hotel/resort for a business meeting or a break and at very affordable prices.  The staff go out of their way to be helpful and pleasant and to make sure that a stay is as enjoyable as can be.  We stayed two nights in a double queen room on the third floor with a balcony.  The room was welcoming on arrival and well serviced during the stay.  Bogie would have appreciated the efficiency of the bar staff, their abilities to mix cocktails or their advice on whiskies and bourbons. Bacall would have enjoyed the company well attired and sassy business women and well dressed young men there for
Manager Response: Thank you for your great response. I'm happy to hear your enjoyed the resort and the guestroom. I agree that our Bay View rooms offer an amazing view and peace and quiet. We look forward to your next arrival.

Summary: I stayed at the Hyatt for a meeting.  The location is pretty good and staff was great.  Ate here several time and the catering was consistently excellent.  There were several little things that didn't I didn't expect from a Hyatt Regency.  The room wasn't cleaned well (m&ms and some change under the desk) and the ironing board cover was so wrinkled that it was essentially useless for straightening clothes.  The worst part was the noise level.  Noise from the courtyard and the other rooms was quite objectionable.  My #1 need from a hotel is to be able to sleep on my schedule (early to bed, early to rise) and I wasn't able to do that.  They're in the middle of some remodeling,  Maybe it will be nicer when they're done.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response on Trip Advisor. I'm sorry to hear that we didn’t fully meet your expectations. I will speak to my housekeeping team so we may use this as a coaching tool. We are currently remolding our Stay Fit Fitness Center. This will be finished in a couple weeks. I'm very sorry you were inconvenienced by any noise. Please feel free to reach out to me or any other front office manager upon your next stay.

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at this wonderful resort for 5 nights while attending a conference.  The staff was just wonderful, there with whatever anyone needed.  I heard other attendees say, they are there with what we need, before we even know we need it!  the rooms were lovely, and well appointed.  There were multiple swimming pools, one specifically for family use so if you wanted quiet time by the pool, you could enjoy it.  There is lots of space to relax both indoors and out,  the grounds were just beautiful and the whole property very well kept.  can't say enough good about the place and my stay!!
Manager Response: Thank you for responding about us on Trip Advisor! I'm so glad to hear that you had a great experience. We offer 3 pools that are completely different. We hope there is something that each guest will enjoy. Thank you for choosing Hyatt Regency Newport Beach! We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Loved our stay in Southern California, far preferable to the madness of LA. Spacious resort with nicely landscaped grounds, three good pools, lots of activities, excellent, friendly staff. 15 minute walk to he lovely balboa Island and was about a 45 minute drive down from LAX. Highly recommended for family holiday in his area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great response! We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us! I'm happy you were able to enjoy all the amenities we offer on property. We hope to see you on your next vacation!

Summary: Six night stay for work/vacation. The staff from the front door, front desk, restaurants, and housekeeping are extremely friendly and helpful. Rooms are clean, modern, and fresh. Beds are very comfortable and linens are very nice. Even the pillows are comfortable. Restaurants on site have a nice variety to choose from although a little pricey however this is California. Coffee provided in the room was actually pleasant unlike the Starbucks that most resorts provide.  Iron, ironing board, refrigerator, safe, hairdryer and coffee maker were provided for use in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response on Trip Advisor. It’s great to hear you had a nice time with us on your vacation/work trip! We have recently just changed our menu in the lobby lounge and SHOR. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Stayed here for a week attending a work conference. Great atmosphere. Lovely grounds and pool.  Shuttle to and from John Wayne airport...free. Nice  bar and restaurant area. Great meeting facilities for the conference. Close to Huntington Beach as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great response on Trip Advisor! I'm happy to hear that you had a great time at your conference with us!

Summary: We stayed for 7 nights and had a wonderful stay. Staff were great and we really felt welcomed. The hotel has been renovated so rooms and public places were nice and modern. It has access to back bay which meant lots of morning runs in the sunshine. We'd stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great feedback! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I stayed here for business and felt as though I was on a mini vacation. The grounds are beautiful and the room was lovely, as it overlooked the pool. The staff was notvthe friendliest I've encountered but they weren't rude either. This would be a great family spot in the summer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great feedback! I'm sorry to hear that you didn’t experience the best service possible from our staff. I will make sure our guest service teams reads your feedback so we may use this as a coaching tool for the future. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: My wife and I stayed here 20yrs ago and it was stated that it had undergone considerable upgrading. The grounds are lovely well kept but was slightly disappointed in rooms whilst plenty big enough were nothing you couldnt find in a cheaper hotel chain. We were in room 266 nice and quiet with balcony albeit having two large conifer trees right outside which blocked the light and any sun were you to get any and couldnt really see any upgrade from the last time we stayed. Bathroom had been given a slight upgrade new basin but quite small. The lobby area very comfortable with chairs and tables. Lobby used for breakfast area in the mornings and a bar area in the evenings which was a very good idea. We ate breakfast in the Shor restaurant very good ,reasonable, staff were very
Manager Response: Thank you for your great response on Trip Advisor! I'm sorry you were disappointed with parking and Internet fees. Parking is ran through a 3d party company. They stay competitively priced with all other hotels in the area. We no longer have an Internet fee. We now offer the resort fee that includes many different things to make our resort more cost effective for families that are staying with us. The resort fee includes high speed internet for 6 devices, complimentary items such as bike rentals, bottled water, local and 800 calls, green fees at our golf course, beach kits, kids re-usable cups etc. We also offer a shuttle that runs every 2 hours to fashion island and balboa island for our guests who don’t have a car or who simply would rather use the shuttle.   Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Stayed here for two nights yesterday and the day before. All in all it was a pretty nice hotel, good food, nice pools, but the walls are so ridiculously thin. I was on the second floor in room 206 and i could literally hear the couple next to me going at one another all night long... it sounded like they were having a great time but i got no sleep all night thanks to the paper thin walls. i saw the couple on saturday morning and the girl was freaking hot so i can't say i would blame the guy for not being able to contain himself all night but i can blame the walls. there was far too much fun going on in the next room for me to get even an ounce of sleep...

I have used Trip Advisor many times and decided I need to start contributing. When I travel to Cali I always stay at the Hyatt Newport Beach close to Huntington beach without the riff raff. Mall is within bloocks as is the harbor. Great golfing and an overall safe feel. Granted I think the parking is over priced but you know your vehicle will be safe.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We look forward to you staying with us again!

Summary: Stayed here for one night last week with my husband and 8 year old.  I was expecting more of this property based on the reviews.  It was an ok property but it didn't meet my expectations based on other Hyatt Regencies that I have stayed at.  This is an old property, rooms with low ceilings, toilet literally next to shower, so much so you can't open the sliding shower door on that side, room was on the very small side.  For one night it was ok, but I had hoped to extend our stay.  We decided to move on.  It is centrally located, near fashion island mall, and a short drive to the beach and balboa, but we had lots of air traffic noise first thing in the morning.  Also, when the valet brought our car the next morning it had a wine cork under the wiper blades that we most certainly
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your response. I'm very sorry to hear that you do not intend to visit our Hotel again. We are a historical property originally built in the 60's. Our structure still maintains the authentic character of the decade. Every building on property offers a different experience to our guests. We truly appreciate your feedback.

Summary Heading: Great staff and a beautiful setting
Summary: I stayed at the Hyatt as part of a conference. I have high expectations when I stay at a Hyatt property and, by and large, this one did not disappoint. The staff that greeted me was very friendly and professional. They even had fresh cookies available when I checked in.  It is true what some of the other reviews say: the various buildings that make up the resort sprawl over a sizeable area. However, from this Northerner's experience, having to walk a little extra among the palm trees and sunshine of Southern California is not such a drawback. If you have limited mobility, though, I can see why it would be an issue.  I found the room clean and comfortable. One of the areas near my room was under renovation, but I had no problems with noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback! I'm happy you were able to enjoy the beauty of our resort! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The location is great and the pool area is nice but the rooms need work.  The mattress was the worst mattress I have ever slept on in a hotel.  Our toilet had problems off and on and the bath room was tiny.  Our shower also filled up with water and we had to get that fixed!  I agree is is an upscale motel instead of a nice hotel.  It was disappointing to us.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon,  I am very sorry you had a poor experience with our guestroom. I'm sorry you had an uncomfortable bed and experienced problems with bathroom as well. I hope you were able to notify a manager while you were on property so they could provide you with options to move rooms or send someone to replace your bed. Your direct feedback allows us the opportunity to make improvements to our Hotel. Please feel free to contact a hotel manager is you need anything at all.  Sincerely, Hyatt Regency Newport Beach Management Team

Summary: So, I stayed at the Hyatt and I was blown away with how beautiful the grounds were plus, loving golf, it was nice that my room was right on the course! I checked in (I believe his name was Jonathan) and he was super friendly and helpful :) My room was quite a walk, i didn't realize how BIG the property was but, the was only 5 mins to my room. The landscape is very pretty and it felt very tropical with all the palm trees and music! My room was very clean, and the bed was wonderful. My only complaint is that the walls are too thin. Around 5 am I was woken up to other persons alarm in other rooms :/ Overall, nice staff, beautiful grounds, nice beds and awesome water pressure in the shower! I would stay here again :)
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your great feedback. Our property is very large and built on 26 acres. I want to apologize that you experienced noise in your guestroom. We are currently working on improving the tranquilly in all guestrooms. Thank you again for your response!

Summary: The Hyatt has great location with close proximity to the Orange County airport ss well as island town of Balboa island. Good golf course with fun activities for children. The rooms in Catalina facing golf course are desirable. Prompt service with typical Hyatt touch.

Summary Heading: Not As Good As I Expected
Summary: My husband and I went to a conference that was held here.  It was very expensive, even though we had the discounted rate for the conference.  The bay view rooms were not available for the conference rate, so the lady I talked to suggested that I booked a pool view room.  The pool view room is more expensive than the garden view room, but I thought it would be nice to sit out in the balcony look out to the pool, especially since the lady said that we would not hear the noise from the pool.  We were given a first floor room in the back by the pool.  The King-bed room was actually pretty nice; however, the patio was right against the fence that was around the pool with bushes over the other side.  There was no view at all and it felt like we were sitting in a cage.  The worst thing

Stayed here for 5 nights. Average rating.   Pro's:  -Newport Beach is nice area -Food was good quality -9 hole pitch and putt was great  Cons:  -Hotel is right under the flight path and can be noisy.  - Comments on small beds from other reviewers is correct.

The entrance to the hotel, the service and the lobby area are all good but once I got to my room - 188 - it felt more like an upscale motel. There was  a pervasive smell of damp in the room as well. It was comfortable enough but more of a holiday hotel than business.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. I'm sorry you didn’t enjoy the Lido building. We have 4 buildings on property. All of the buildings offer a different experience for our guests. I would recommend you to request to stay in the Catalina or Balboa building next time since they offer entrances that are inside. Lido is great for people who want to be near the quiet pool and want to look over the golf course. We hope to see you again!

Summary: I spent a couple days and one night in Newport Beach at the end of a week's vacation in Southern CA. I chose the Hyatt Regency because it was conveniently located to everything I wanted to see and do, and was wowed by this resort. The room decor was lovely, modern yet had an air of the beach about it. I had a delicious frittata for breakfast in my room and later sat out by one of the pools. The entire property is beautiful -- grounds are well kept, the lobby and sitting areas very comfortable for conversation.  Two computers were available to print boarding passes.  Everyone provided impeccable service. I wish I could have stayed longer, and will definitely stay here again the next time I'm in Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great feedback! I'm happy you were able to enjoy your time at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach! We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We booked our room for an aniversary getaway.  We called in advance to make sure a large bed would be available.   We were informed that only doubles would be available since they had overbooked by as many as 50 rooms for large beds.  When we arrived in our room the musty stench of old was overwhelming, but worse was the comically small size of the beds.   There was no way to fit more than one body in a bed, so we spent our anniversary in seperate beds.    Such a disapointment.   The front desk said that they would comp breakfast for us and try to find a larger bed,,,, they did not.
Manager Response: Good Morning Ron,  I would first like to thank you for your feedback about our property. We find this the most important tool in improving guests satisfaction at our hotel. I am very sorry you did not receive a king size bed for your anniversary getaway. I completely understand your frustrations. I have shared your trip advisor review with our front office staff so we may all use this as a coaching tool for the future. We hope you to see you again at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach.  Sincerely, Hyatt Regency Newport Beach

Summary Heading: Spread out buildings - Overall expected more from a Hyatt
Summary: Was there for a family reunion of three days.   The buildings are quite spread out so ask for main building if you can't walk distances.    Made good arrangements for meals for our 30+ family members from all over the US and international.    Manager Morgan was helpful in helping me arrange a small party after most family had left.   A problem when we arrived that should not have happened.     Rooms are not ready until 4PM so our bags were taken for storage - when returned, the bags were wet although stored inside - must have been a leak (had rained earlier in the day).   They took one bag and ironed the wet clothes, I used the hair dryer to dry my damp clothes.    No clothes dryer on premises.   Food better than fair but not exceptional for the prices we paid.   Pretty grounds,

Likes - Great resort property - tennis, nine hole golf, ready access to a fantastic running and biking trail near the harbor. Comfortable, inviting bar and lounge - inside and out. Food is good - but likely will not generate a buzz of conversation. One upside surprise was the steak & egg breakfast. Staff is friendly and willing to help! Distinct feel of "Classic Newport" to go along with a legacy John Wayne hangout. Dislikes -  ok - nice property - great Staff - but in my book - even with group rates - expectations come with base room charges at this level. The parking charge is not a friendly add on with these base prices - I fortunately have no problem walking up the hill from parking but many might have an issue with that ( BTW - Valet is $34.00 per day - even the "well

Was just at this hotel for two days. Both evenings I was promised a wake up call with a backup call after 10 minutes. Didn't get a backup call either day. My business associate had NO hot water in his room. Breakfast was adequate but very expensive! There's also a resort fee...Great if you're hanging out at the resort, but I didn't use any amenities and had to pay $40 for the stay. My bed was lumpy, with indents on the sides from previous guests. Sure glad that I only had to pay for breakfast and the resort fee. Will tell my business partners to book me somewhere else next time.

Scheduled to stay the night before an event held at the property. Arrived late at night tired with a group of colleagues from Europe.  Myself and a colleague were shocked to get to our rooms and find no beds and only fold out love seat sofas as our "beds" . These were not the good fold out beds. They were the thin , full of springs and wires ones.  My colleagues room was freezing to boot . The front desk told her they could send a space heater. The hotel was full they had no other room for us and little sympathy but a good deal of rude attitude, which isn't what you need at 11:30 at night nor when you are holding three events the next day and booking a block of rooms. They offered to comp the rooms and breakfast but we wanted real beds and real sleep. They called the nearby

The hotel has nice rooms that are spread out across the lush grounds that include multiple swimming pools.  I think there is also a golf course and tennis.  All the hotel workers are very friendly.  Also a restaurant and pleasant bar off of the lobby.  On site parking is a must and it will cost you.  Ask about it before you book.  The shuttle bus to Fashion Island and Balboa Island ran about a half hour late, which is somewhat annoying.  I recommend having your own car.  Nonetheless, the pleasant grounds and good rooms and amenities make this a nice place to stay in my book.

Hyatt is where my loyalties are and this hotel is one of the reasons why. Good location. Quiet, less expensive, option to park rather than forced to have vallet. The pools are clean and quiet. The cleaning staff are kind and respectful and trustworthy.

I stayed in this hotel for couple of days. The hotel facility is good but I was amazedto find that all is extra to the price: Breakfast, internet and car parking (22$ per night).  Tip: I switched rooms to standard bed size and reduced the parking from 22$ per night to just 10$ per night. If you use the self parking (instead of Valet parking) ask for rooms close to parking lot.

Summary Heading: Well I thought I already wrote a review but here it goies again.
Summary: Went down here for a wedding in late January and stayed on a Saturday and Sunday night.  The check in was OK and they didn't have any King rooms  so we got a double in the 2 story bldg. facing the pool but our room was on the other side.  The room was also at the end of the corridor right next to the exit.  I was OK with the room.  Decent size and it was nice.  The resort consists of some pools, shuffleboard, a big chess board and I don't know what else.   They also have bikes you can take out.  So we had some major partiers on our floor but it died down enough for me to go to sleep around Midnight.   The next morning I was awakened by planes flying overhead I guess headed to Long Beach.  I am guessing this was around 8:00AM or so.  Pretty loud.  Loud enough I would not stay

Summary Heading: Great location and staff, not so great restaurant
Summary: First trip to Newport Beach with my wife who ran the Huntington Beach Marathon.  We found the staff to be very accommodating to our needs and professional.  Special thanks to Colin at the Front Desk for his help and Service Manger Flynn.  The room was comfortable and the grounds were very well kept. My only wish would be for a cafe in this hotel.  There was only the dining room and the lounge for food and service and if you did not want a large meal there was no place to go,
Manager Response: Good Afternoon,  Thank you for your response on Trip Advisor! I am so happy you experienced great service from Collin and Flynn! We appreciate your feedback for another area to dine at. The lobby lounge offers great options for small bites such as hummus, wraps, and sandwiches. In the summer we also offer dining near our pool with great options for people who are looking for a light lunch. We hope to see you soon!  Sincerely, Hyatt Regency Newport Beach

Summary: Strange place, without a doubt incredible location and pools rigut outside your door which is superb, very clean property, nice open lobby area & bar. Loved the jacuzzi 1 of the best I have been in, very nice pool with a slide for the kids. The room I was in was gorgeous and quite big although a bit difficult getting in and out the shower. Downfalls, very pricey, breakfast $23? and the rooms don't have any privacy with the windows, many a time I saw paserbys peering into my room. Well the big question? Thumbs up or down from the Truth? It's a Thumbs Up and hopefully 1 day I will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. I am so happy you had a great time with us at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. I'm sorry you found breakfast expensive. We do offer a full menu instead of the buffet that is a less expensive. Our coffee bar in the lobby lounge also offers freshly made breakfast sandwiches, bagels and pastries that are great alternative to a full breakfast. We hope to see you soon!  Sincerely, Hyatt Regency Newport Beach

Summary: Very nice property w excellent service. The property makes great use of its public space w a Starbucks that converts to a bar in the afternoon and evening. Strangely, however, many of the guest rooms are poorly laid out. There is little privacy and you have to keep your window shades closed all the time. The result is staying in a dark room in gorgeous Newport Beach. It was a real downer. If you go, ask, or better yet, tip your way into a nicer room.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Alan,  Thank you very much for your feedback on Trip Advisor. It’s great to hear that you experienced excellent service at our hotel. I want to apologize that you didn’t enjoy your guestroom. Our hotel is very historical and every building offers something different then the next. A lot of families love being near the kid pool in the Bay Building because it provides easy access to the pool and parking lot. If you are looking for privacy and a quiet stay, I highly recommend requesting the Balboa building or the Lido Building facing the golf course. These rooms have great balcony’s that overlook green hills. I completely understand your frustrations. Please reach out to the hotel before your next stay so we may better assist you in blocking you in an area that would suit you best. We hope to see you soon!  Sincerely, Hyatt Regency Newport Beach

Summary: We stayed at the Hyatt Regency in January 2014 for my husbands 74th Birthday.   Little did we know that families were staying at the hotel for the Rose Bowl as Newport Beach was the host city.  We requested a Pool View but they were all taken & they upgraded us to a Bay View room.  The first evening we ate at the Hotel Restaurant and to our surprise the food was superior & priced just right.  The second evening we decided to venture out to a Restaurant & at the end of the evening we were sorry we didn't eat at the hotel restaurant.  Our room had a view of the 9th hole golf course & a view of the fireworks the first evening.  The staff was very knowledgable & friendly & we will definitely stay at the hotel again at a future date.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon,  Thank you so much for your feedback.We are so thrilled you were able to have such a great experiance for your husbands birthday! We hope to see you again soon!  Best, Hyatt Regency Newport Beach Staff

Summary Heading: Was there for 5 nights and loved it
Summary: Just there for business meeting and found this to be a great property.  Beautiful in every way.  Beautiful rooms, many with balconies with great views of bay.  Staff was outstanding, including those who help with the meetings.  They helped our group throughout the stay.  Plenty of places to walk around the ground, nice exercise room, and at least 4 pools.  You can easily walk to Fashion Island or Balboa Island, but there is a regular shuttle to both places if you like.  Also, shuttle to and from the airport each hour. The only warning I would have is that it is a resort setting, so rooms are spread out across a few acres.  It can be a way from the self parking lot (22/day by the way) to your room and steps will be involved.  Beautiful place for a stay, but be prepared to walk
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great review! We hope to see you soon at Hyatt Regency Newport Beach!

Summary: We were here for a conference and found the Hyatt Regency a great space for the event. The meeting space was well laid out and it was nice to have lunch and refreshments on the terrace. The food served by the hotel was very tasty and had several healthy options. The sleeping rooms were very clean and nicely decorated.  It rained during out stay (bad for us, good for CA!) so we were not able to enjoy too many of the outdoor activities. They have several pools and you can rent bikes. It would be nice for families. The one downside is you are kind of stuck on the property and we didn't have a car. There is a shuttle that goes to Balboa Island and Fashion Island every two hours; both places have a lot of dining options.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. I am happy to hear that your conference was a sucess and you enjoyed your time here. Hopefully you will have a chance to come back and enjoy some of the amenities you were not able to enjoy due to the weather. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: I travel a lot and this is one of my favorite locations  This hotel always had that 1950's cool low rise feel now it has the interior update to boot! Large property you can run or walk to balboa island near fashion island and there many restaurants close to crystal cove and Laguna and I nice drive north to Huntington Beach .
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach, it is always great to hear from our guests that we have achieved such a prestigious standing to become one of their favorite locations. We are very proud of our history and appreciate hearing that you also enjoyed the classic atmosphere our location offers. Having originally been built in the 50’s we have always tried to accentuate our history while still maintaining an exceptional level of service. It is a pleasure to have you as a guest and we look forward to your return. Thank you – Scott H

Summary: Have stayed at this Hyatt several times. Love this hotel and the restaurant/bar. Go there for the tortilla soup-authentic. We were there on 2/1/14, and Bridgett waited on us. Awesome service-sweet girl. The only issue we had is we spent $220 on food and beverage and the manager charged us $6 for parking. Thought it was ricdiculous, since we spent so much--this is the reason for the 3 star
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a kind review from your recent trip to our restaurant Shor American Seafood Grill. I am truly sorry for the confusion with the parking situation, I can certainly understand how this can leave you with a bitter feeling even after a beautiful meal. We do normally charge for parking, but it seems this was not communicated to you prior. I hope I can resolve the issue for your and keep you coming back. Thank you - Scott H

Summary Heading: It's had a great makeover, rooms great and brilliant blue
Summary: Had a bit of a nightmare checking in, the hotel was rammed ( Wed night so probably a business conference ) yet the desk clerk as as helpful as he could be , couldn't get us rooms in the main hotel as we usually are , so eventually we got rooms a couple of mins walk away in one of the satellite buildings . It was fine, the room was great , looked recently refurbed, and overall you can't fault this place ..it's got a little better every year for the past 15 years we've stayed here ..and you can't say that for any hotels ..usually they are pretty  good or pretty average & then go backwards ..this place certainly bucks the trend ,, new outdoor area with glass screened outdoor fires and plenty of seating ..no good for us in Jan but I bet it's great in Summer ... Nice clean bedroom,
Manager Response: Hi Tony, Thank you for choosing to stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach over the past 15 years. We are truly greateful to have a guest such as yourself return to our property for so many years. I am sorry to hear that there was a bit of confusion with your check-in. However it does sound like things were able to turn for the better after your check-in. I hope we can continue to provide you with a level of service that will have you returning for the next 15 years. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: Everything here is first class.  Have been here for 4 days on business, and I have been very pleased with their room service, their restaurant, their front desk service and their personal nature.  While really professional, their staff (even maintenance all over the grounds) speak and make you feel welcome.  And the grounds around the hotel are very, very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the absolutely wonderful words, I will be sure to pass this down to all the hotel staff. We are pleased to have you as a guest and hope that we can be your hotel of choice when in the area. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: The food was very overpriced and of limited quantity and quality. On the other hand, when we went on an excursion onto the island, we got a very nice meal, at reasonable cost. The rooms were nice enough, but not quite what I expected in a Hyatt Regency. The in-house restaurant charges over $15 for THREE shrimp. I am from the gulf coast - and $15 at home would get you as many shrimp as you could eat there.
Manager Response: First off, I would like to thank you for choosing the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. We appreciate your feedback and are always looking for ways to improve our property for our guests. I am sorry to hear that our restaurant was not what you were looking for at the time. However, the great thing about Newport Beach is that there is an abundance of restaurants with all types of food and ambiance. We have a great concierge that can always recommend a restaurant in the area to satisfy almost any type of craving you have. Hopefully you will come back and stay with us again if you are ever in the area. Thank you – Scott H

Summary: Regular travelers should be aware that this is not a typical Hyatt.  Rooms clustered around a pool looking like a motel, but heavily upgraded.  Comfortable room, but odd to be in a Hyatt and have a room that opens up directly to the outside.  Felt like the place was nice, but not "high end." Pool was a bit basic.  Lobby was very nice and comfortable.  Good location.  Just definitely different from other Hyatts. Ate in the seafood restaurant and found it good, although the lunch menu was pretty limited.  I have to note that the Mercedes airport shuttle bus was pretty first class. I wish Hyatt would have thicker bedding.  You feel like you're sleeping with nothing but a sheet on you.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. We understand you have many options to choose from and definitely appreciate your business. At the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach we certainly agree we are not the typical Hotel, we want to differentiate ourselves from the conventional big box hotel and hopefully provide our guests with a memorable stay. It was great to hear that you did enjoy some of the various, amenities that we have to offer, hopefully you can return and experience the other areas of the hotel. The golf course and water slide are a particular big hit in the summertime, or even a peaceful walk along Back Bay. If you are ever back in Newport Beach I hope that you come back and stay with us again. Thank you – Scott H

Summary Heading: Looks very differently from the pictures on the website
Summary: Newport Hyatt was somewhat disappointing for us. The hotel’s look in the reality is very far from the pictures on their website. The pictures are very misleading. This hotel has only 2 floors, so there is not much of a view. Room is pretty basic, not as beautiful as shown on the pictures, but remodeled. The bayview is very relative; it’s more of the road and passing cars view, and then something like lagoon very far away. Also only executive suites are in the main building on the first floor. If you are in a bayview room, you will have to walk about 5 min. from the lobby, and this part looks more like motel, old and outdated.  There are 3 pools. The main pool next to the slide was not heated at all, even though most of the families and kids hung out there because of slide and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback as this always gives us an opportunity to improve on aspects of the hotel that our guests feel the need for improvement. It is very unfortunate that you were not completely satisfied with your stay however I can assure you we have a high standard and ultimately did not achieve that standard. Also, our main building has 3 floors and the suites are located throughout the hotel on various floors. Many guests enjoy the bay view rooms and request them on return visits; however I understand that this is a personal preference. We do not heat the main pool as it is the largest pool and the other 2 pools are heated. We try to offer a variety of options for our guests to suit as many people as possible. I am also sorry that your breakfast was not up to standard either and I can understand how this can affect the rest of your day. Regarding the parking and resort fee prices, I assure you that our prices are competitive to our local neighboring properties. The resort fee gives you access to our fitness center, golf course, bike rentals, Wi-Fi and business center as well as compliment bottled water in the room. Hopefully you will give us another chance, as I am sure your next stay would be above and beyond this last one. Thank you – Scott H

Summary Heading: Great location but service isn't always as good
Summary: We stayed here a couple of weeks before Christmas 2013 in order to enjoy shopping at Fashion Island.  The location is very good . . . close to the mall . . . and within walking distance (for the energetic!) to Balboa Island.  The Shore Grill restaurant is terrific particularly for breakfast and the restaurant staff is superb.  The front desk staff, however, isn't always as helpful as we would like . . . you get the feeling that any complaint or issues comes under the "not my job" category. The rooms have all been refurbished but some can be quite noisy. . . shower and toilet noises from adjacent rooms.  But if you can get a Bed & Breakfast rate, this is hard to beat in terms of value.  And if you haven't already been warned, remember the parking is inconveniently located at the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. I am sorry to hear that our front desk staff was not up to the high standard as the rest of the team you encountered during your stay. We hope to see you back again, as I am certain you will experience a high level of customer service from all of our staff. Thank you - Scott H

Summary Heading: Be careful of the undisclosure charges
Summary: When we checked in, the hotel staff gave us a map to parking lot w/o telling the parking fee. As we checked out, they said there was no balance due. Couple days after, the charge of $22 appeared on my credit card as a parking fee, I called for ? then they said valet parking is $45/night & self parking is $22. When we checked out, as I was waiting for my husband went get our car, I  asked for a cup of coffee but the receptionist said because the price we booked through Hotwire, no breakfast included. We paid almost $100/night, what is the cost of a cup of coffee???
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. I am sorry to hear about the parking issue during your stay. I can assure you that the parking rates are listed on both the Hotwire site as well as our website and signage on property. This should have also been brought up during your check-in by our staff, however if it was not this is a rare occurrence as our staff is trained to tell guests about all amenities on site. We do offer complimentary coffee in all of our guest rooms for you to enjoy, as well as our on-site coffee shop for specialty coffee and a variety of breakfast food. Again, we appreciate the feedback and will make sure this is communicated to our staff to prevent this in the future. I hope you will come back and visit us again as I am sure you will enjoy your stay. Thank you - Scott H

Summary Heading: Convenient and classy spot in Newport Beach
Summary: Really enjoyed staying at the Hyatt Newport Beach in summer 2013. Very nice and clean poolside rooms, a fairly short drive down to the beachfront. There is a good restaurant on the premises and excellent pool service. Would definitely recommend if staying in Newport.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave such kind words regarding your past stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. It is always great to hear that our guests are enjoying thier stay and we hope that you will come back the next time you are in Newport Beach so we can exceed your expectations. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: Although the grounds are beautiful and the service is great the rooms were below average.  In addition I felt that the price was excessive for the property.  Another issue I had was being charged $22 a day for self parking....and the ten minute walk from the parking lot.  I DEFINATELY will not be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. We are glad to hear your kind words regarding the beuatiful grounds and the level of our service you experienced. Unfortunately we were not able to met your expectations with our rooms and parking situation. To accomodate all our guests we offer several different options for parking. If you do not want to walk up from the parking lot, you can always valet your car, or you can request a golf cart escort. At the Hyatt we always strive to make each and every guests stay an enjoyable one. I hope that if you are ever in the area you will give us another shot as I am sure we can exceed expectations. Thank you - Scott H

Summary Heading: Don't believe the naysayers. Great property!
Summary: We checked in on New Year's Eve for a four night stay for the Rose Bowl Game.  Go Green!  We found the room to be updated, pools easily accessible, and the staff warm and welcoming.  We only experienced one issue, which was the pool running out of towels close to closing time at 10 pm.  Then again, if that's the biggest issue, we're doing well.  Front desk staff, valets and room service were all wonderful.  The valets even squeegeed off the back window of our car in the morning to remove the dew.  Room service was delivered on time and with warm food.  The location of the property is excellent, only five minutes from John Wayne Airport and around the corner from Balboa Island.  Price wise, we found a great rate on Hotels.com which Hyatt not only matched by lowered by another
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a very nice review from your recent stay. Customer Service is a top priority for our property and it is great to see that you were able to experience that during your stay. I hope you have a wonderful New Year and please come back and visit us again in 2014. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: This was a nice surprise. Doesn't look like much from the outside but our room was updated clean and comfortable. Great location close to all and a fraction of the price of anything comparable. We would stay here again with family.
Manager Response: Thank you for the very nice word, we are so happy to hear that you had a great stay here in Newport Beach. We look forward to having you back and I hope that we can make your next stay even more enjoyable. If there is anything we can do to improve your stay, please do not hesitate to let us know and we will do our best to exceed your expectations. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: When addressing several issues with the booking upon check in I found their front desk personal rude and lacking the ability to see the value of bringing business solutions with a hospitable and gracious attitude.  This is very different then many of the 4 star hotels we deal with.  We were disappointed with the negotiating and rigid manner of serving their customers.  The renovation of the hotel was recently done.  However, the floors were not vacuumed well and the bathroom was cleanliness was not up to par.  Disappointing for this Hyatt.  Hope they do a bit more training of both their front desk personnel with hospitable and an ability to quickly solve customers with grace and housekeeping with cleaning.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to rate and leave a response from your recent stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. It is so very disappointing to hear that there was a problem with customer service as this is one of our strong points that makes us stand above other locations. I can certainly ensure you that this is not normal for our property and we will make the necessary adjustment to make sure all our guest receive first class service. As with the customer service we are normally above par with our room cleanliness. I would ask that you please give us another opportunity to show you that your stay was not how we normally operate. I am sure that your next visit will be the complete opposite and you will see that we have a great staff that is focused on making every guest happy during their stay. Thank you -- Scott

Summary: My husband and I stay here when we need a gateway from the kids, Always clean and staff is helpful. Only downfall is room service can be a little slow but once receiving the food the wait almost seems worth it! Will Return!

This hotel is really nice. I usually stay here for business when I'm in SoCal. It's got a great location close to PCH and Fashion Island Mall. And, close to Irvine for the business... Since the renovation it's much nicer and more modern.  I just stayed there a couple of weeks back and there was an issue with my check in. The long and short of it was that my room wasn't ready when I got there. They told me it wouldn't be long and they would call me when it was ready. It ended up they didn't call me and I didn't get checked in until five hours later. Anyway, they upgraded me to a villa room and that's the reason I decided to do the review. The villa was amazing with fireplace and it's own private pool. It was December but I still did the obligatory midnight swim in the nice heated

The hotel is set on a nice property in Newport Beach, CA. The staff were all very friendly and the room was spacious and comfortable. I would be happy to stay there again on my next trip to Newport Beach.

The hotel says they had a $15MM? rennovation in last year.  I'm not seeing it, and widely disappointed.  This is average, and not a Hyatt it's category by any stretch.  This might be an ok reception/party hotel with their grounds, I'll give them that.  However, as a business traveler, I'm lacking the help, quiet, business environment.  The rooms are very noisy as I sit in the main buidling 3rd floor, touted as a "great room and quiet" by front desk.  I'm hearing every door close as people come and go here at 9:30-10pm mid week evening.  The room has new carpet and bedding, but nothing special in shower/bath.  Old hair dryers amazingly.  Valet is quite expensive and self parking is about 1/2 mile away in the dark, walking back up a big hill....Exercise room is nothing "Hyatt
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay. I am very sorry to hear that you did not get the quiet room that you were looking for as the 3rd floor is normally very quiet and tranquil. Certainly I can understand your frustration in not having a quiet enviroment to complete your work, however this was most likely a rare occurance. Finally I can assure you that our renovation has been a great success, and may only be difficult to compare if not having seen the previous product. Hopefully you will have the chance to stay with us again in the future and I am sure you will see the difference. Thank you - Scott

Summary Heading: A bit of a letdown for me, but it's an OK place to stay
Summary: Overall I have to say that I was disappointed with this hotel after expecting much nicer accommodations for a Hyatt located in a place like Newport Beach.  By no means was the experience bad or the amenities, service and cleanliness an issue, it just ending up being adequate when I had expected exceptional.  Perhaps this is indicative of what is happening to four star rated hotels as they all seem to just be rather basic nowadays.  The hotel is very large and located on a main road right near the Fashion Island shopping center.  It’s not really that great for walking places unless you have to, and in that case be careful as you will have to cross very busy multi-lane roads such as the PCH.  There are no rooms that will have any wonderful views but the grounds, golf course, and
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave such a thourough review of your recent stay. Jazz weekends are some of the busiest times for our property, although it depends on what time you come in. I am sorry we were not able to exceed your expectations but I am happy to here there was no real issues during your stay. We have some amazing amenities here on property that may help your experience during your next visit. A bike ride down back bay during sunset or sunrise is truly a beautiful experience. You may also want to jump on our complimentary shuttle to Balboa Island and check out some amazing food and entertainment. We have plenty of ideas and attractions in the area that can make anyones day turn amazing. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: Everything was great...I stayed in Hyatt hotel for two days and I hade great experience...I felt very welcome start from front desk...I had  quick lunch in the restaurant ,the staff was very helpful and very friendly...for sure I will be back...

Our family stayed out in Newport Beach for 7 days.  We loved the hotel grounds, and thought of the location as absolutely perfect (close to Fashion Island Mall, Balboa Island & ferry, Pacific Coast Highway, the 405, and of course proximity to Huntington Beach...and Long Beach).  The room we had was first floor, and our patio was right next to life size human chess game and shuffle board which our kids loved.  The couldn't allow a rollaway in our two-bed room, so we just used an air mattress for one of the kids at night.  The room was plenty big (110 I think).  Staff was pretty cool, but the back of the hotel with the fire at night, pool and beach view is awesome.  I think parking price is pretty crazy, but hey, if you have just one or two bad things then the 100 exceptional

Summary Heading: Still one of my top hotels
Summary: I stayed here two years ago.  Still an excellent property overall.  You can no longer park overnight on back bay road so you are stuck paying the 22 dollar a night self pay parking.  But that is typical in big cities and California.  This hotel has such a nice atmosphere.  Three swimming pools.  Gym is a bit undersized for the town and clientele.  Lobby and outdoors areas are exceptional.  Something about the property makes you relax.  I love the views over the back bay.

Very nice hotel with great view of the bay from the balcony (if in a bay view room, of course).  Had to only give it four stars, however, because the walls are almost paper thin.  The staff, from the front desk, to the greeters, to the restaurant wait staff, couldn't have been nicer, more helpful or professional.  They really treat you like family here.  While I never met any of the housekeeping staff, the room was always cleaned to perfection.  The bed was quite comfortable with plush linens and pillows.  There are no elevators, being only 2 floors in my building, but the staff carry your bags up the stairs for you and, when it came time to check out, they were at my room within a few minutes of my call to the front desk to carry my bags out.  I would definitely stay here

Summary Heading: Private drive beautiful grounds and great service
Summary: First stay at Hyatt Newport and will not be our last.  Affordably priced resort atmosphere, convenient to highway or the beach.  Bungalow styled layout. Three pools and activities  good layout for conferences. The hotel entrance is understated the rooms were updated and most have balconies to enjoy a view of the palm trees  one o the pools or even the golf course.  Play a game of chess with oversized chess pieces in the front courtyard or find a relaxing lounge chair by the pool to relax and enjoy the serene surroundings.  Restaurant has a overall good menu would have liked a juice bar at breakfast.  And a buffer. The eggs Benadict is to die for.  Front bar features Starbucks coffee all day for coffee lovers who need their fix in the morning.    A definite repeat visit in store

Summary Heading: Not up to Hyatt Regency standards
Summary: Most Hyatt Regencies are a step above the run-of-the-mill Hyatt properties.  The Hyatt Regency Newport Beach falls far short. While the public areas are generally well kept, and somewhat above average, the rooms are very disappointing. and below even Holiday Inn standards. With so many other choices in Newport Beach, you could (and would) do far better elsewhere.

I was here for business.  Great location but the parking is far away from the rooms.  I wasn't happy about the charge of $22.00 for self parking and $36.00 for valet.  This should be included since the parking is inconvenient, 10 minute walk to most rooms.  I'd stay here for a good value if I was on vacation and didn't have a car.  I'm not sure I'll stay again on a business trip.  The breakfast was excellent and the room I stayed in was just refreshed.

My wife and two of our children stayed here for a little celebration for our 8-year-old. It was what he wanted for his birthday: A night in a hotel!  This place is really a great place for family with little ones. They have several pools to choose from, and the main pool has a water park for the kids, a slide for the kids and a putting green for the kids. It really allowed us to be able to just do our thing and let the kids be kids.   The staff is pretty awesome there as well. We lost our sweaters somewhere there and the VIP Manager reached out to me, to see if she could help locate them. She sent me the phone number and email of the main housekeeper and they really did their best at finding the sweaters.   Really great stuff! Well done Hyatt!

This hotel has an excellent location on the Bay. It has a very relaxed atmosphere. I was here for business and it was an ideal location for business. But, you should add some additional time for check/out, etc. The rooms were very nice and spacious. The staff and their service was excellent. I look forward to a return visit.
