To do anything else, you will need to drive or take a cab. Nice pools...great way to do business in Irvine but stay in a place with a resort-like feel!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review from your stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. We are so please to hear that you had a wonderful stay. We look forward to you coming back. Thank you

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, a bit out of the way from eating and nightlife
Summary: It was a bit confusing arriving, as we weren't too sure whether to drive up, check-in and self-park, or valet, or self-park, then check-in. Regardless, we turned left, self-parked in a large open lot behind security boom gates, then were offered a lift up to reception in a golf cart. From memory, it was $20 overnight for self-parking.  We checked in and were advised where our room was. No one offered to assit with our luggage, which is strange. Even though I don't normally take advantage of it, it was strange not to have it offered, considering how far away it actually was to our room. We were advised it was down two flights of stairs, but it ended up being down 4 sets of stairs (with large bags). We also had to squeeze our way through the bar with our bags to get to the first
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. Please always feel free to drive up to the front of the hotel and check-in, you can always find out where your room is and then decide where you would like to park. I am sorry bell service was not offered to you upon your check-in, as this is something that is normally offered. It sounds like you were able to enjoy the bar, and had time to enjoy some of the wonderful local restaurants. Again, I apologize there was difficulty departing the parking lot. I hope that you will come back and we can have the chance to improve from your last stay. Thank you Scott H.

Summary: We stayed at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach for the first time, and it certainly exceeded our expectations!  The hotel is well maintained and recently upgraded.  The Hyatt Regency experience begins with the friendly valets to the professional registration personnel to the friendly, efficient bellman!  The Lobby Bar and SHOR Restaurant offer wonderful food and drink with firendly, professional staff!   The hotel is affordable for Newport Beach, and the Hyatt's hotel rivals many of the high-end resort hotels in the area! We will return again soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a wondeful review from your recent stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. It is great to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations and we truly look forward to you coming back. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: We attended a four night group event at the Hyatt and the reservation process was a nightmare. Spent close to 3 hours on the phone / email over multiple weeks before I finally got the group rate.  So my expectations were low.  We were part of a large group checking in on the first day, and while there was clearly a higher that normal volume of check-ins, the process was smooth and organized.  Rooms were ready on time.  We initially were given a room in the bay building, which while nicely remodeled but essentially a very high end motel room with no outside space.  The staff readily moved us to another room that had a secluded balcony and partial view of the bay, which was perfect.  Fridge in the room is handy.  The breakfasts were worth every penny of the price.  Skip the buffet
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a response from your recent stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. We love to see that our guests had a great time at the hotel and were able to enjoy some of the many amenities that we offer. It is very unfortunate that the reservation process was difficult and I can see how that can put a damper on things before you even arrive. However it is great to hear that things really turned around upon your arrival and you were able to really enjoy your stay. We really hope that you will come back soon. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: This property has recently been renovated. The room renovations were outstanding. Convenient desk plugs and new plumbing. New lobby format introduced last year has much better flow. Front desk staff has excellent customer service.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such kind words regarding your most recent stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. We are so happy that you were able to enjoy one of our newly renovated rooms and found that it was much more convenient. Customer service is something we are always working on, and we really want to be know for our exceptional level of service. We look forward to you coming back and staying with us again this summer. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: WE got a great deal through Priceline.  Based on earlier reviews we requested a room in a wing that had been recently refurbished.  The room was quite nice.  A very good value for what we paid..  We did pay for the valet parking ($9 more than self parking), because the self parking lot is a long walk up hill.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. We are happy to let you know that the hotel has been completely renovated. All rooms have been renovated as well as the pools and other areas of the hotel. As everything is now completed we would hope that you will be able to come back and take full advantage of all the amenities that we have to offer. From golf to our new waterslide, we feel we have alot more to offer and we invite you back to come enjoy everything for youself. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: Stayed here for almost a week for a wedding and wasn't very impressed by the remodel.   We had blocked out about 15 rooms and despite this being done months in advance somehow families were still not put together, it was chaotic and check in and a headache just to get people keys!  Valet isn't very organized and self parking is a hike plus no clear directions to the lobby since there was STILL construction going on middle of May. The hotel is very spread out with multiple buildings and pool. We were in the Lido section...had mix of standard rooms and whatever upgrade from there part way through the week. Very underwhelmed by both. New decor is nice but it still looked like a motel from the outside and layout of the room and bathroom kept with that feeling. Pool wasn't anything

Summary Heading: Nicely remodeled, lobby is very inviting and multifunctional - bar at night, breakfast in am.
Summary: Nicely remodeled, good for business travel. Big hotel with a small hotel feel. Nice patio area with relaxing seating options. Was there for work but wished I had some time to relax and enjoy the amenities more!
Manager Response: Hello Kelly, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent time at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. We hope you were able to relax and enjoy the newly renovated property and we hope that you will be back soon to really enjoy everything that we have to offer. Thank you - Scott H

Summary Heading: You too can have it all, sun, fun, music, good food, and the beach; at the Newport Beach Summer Jazz Series...
Summary: The Hyatt spent $15 Million in renovations and it shows!!! This was not just putting lip stick on a pig but a full make over, a face lift!!! I couldn't do it justice my describing the upgrades to you...I encourage you to visit their website!! The grounds are awesome, a new restaurant, the pool area has been revamped, a new VIP lounge area, the rooms and interiors fully redone!!  Service, stellar, when and where have you ever written an email to the General Manager and you get a response within an hour; no where!!! Jonathan Butler was the opening act.  It was awesome a small quaint atmosphere...very up close and personable.  There is a new restaurant, Sho it's nice and the food is good!!! The Staff is great!!! Thumbs Up, all the way around!!!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to read all the kind words that you had to say about the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. We have really worked hard on the renovation in the hopes our guests will have the kind of enjoyable stay that you have writen about. Our goal is provide a level of customer service above and beyond anything you have previously recieved as we want our service to be on par with the beautiful renovation.   The Jazz Festival is one of the best times to be here in Newport Beach and hope that you will come back next year and be part of the good times again. Thank you - Scott H

Summary Heading: I liked it so much I booked it twice.
Summary: I was here for business for one night and I enjoyed it so much I booked a return there a month later. Pools are great, service is wonderful, and The Shor restaurant is fantastic. As a vegetarian, I found plenty of wonderful things to eat and if you are a gold Hyatt member, there may be a free dessert coupon for you at the front when you check in. Also they have complimentary drinks behind the front desk--definitely try those out. Mine was guava and was perfect after a long flight.  Also through the back gates is a nature preserve that stretches on for miles, as well as Newport Dunes. Both are perfect adventures as well as fresh sea air and I heard the cafe at Newport Dunes by the nature preserve is great. Get in a standup paddle rental from the little hut behind the cafe.  $3.49
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave such a wonderful review from your recent stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. It sounds like you were able to find many of the gems near the hotel such as the beautiful Back Bay and Newport Dunes. Perhaps on your next visit you will want to take our complimentary shuttle to Balboa Island for a fun afternoon out in the sun.  It was also great to hear that you were able to find so many vegetarian options at the Shor American Seafood Grill. Our chefs work hard putting together a menu that will hopefully have options for all types of dietary needs. They are also very considerate of the environment, ensuring that we use only local, sustainable products from our produce down to the fish that we serve.  Hopefully you will have to chance to come back and stay with us again. We are starting our Summer Concert Series on 6/21/13, which runs all through summer and is a great way to spend a warm summer evening in Newport Beach. Thank you – Scott H

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights over Memorial Day weekend.  We were in town with a lot of family and friends for a wedding that took place at another venue.  We had problems with this hotel from the beginning when we discovered that our rooms were far from the parking/lobby areas and up a flight of stairs with no elevator.  Since we had two guests who use canes and have difficulty with walking and stairs, this was really a problem.  The only other problem with the room, which was generally very nice and overlooked the water, was that the cleaning crew would congregate outside nearby at 6AM in the morning and make a lot of noise.  We also had problem with the parking lot, where the gates never seemed to be functioning right and we had to build in extra time to get out of the lot each
Manager Response: It was great reading the review you wrote from your recent stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know how everything went over your 5 day stay, as we will use this information to improve our service. I completely understand your frustration in having to walk a distance to your room and then up stairs knowing there were people with you who had difficulty with the stairs and the distance. As we have 4 separate buildings, depending on which building your room is located you may have a bit of a longer walk. Please always inform our staff upon check-in of any disabilities your party has, so that we can try our best to get you a room that will accommodate everyone. Memorial weekend is a very busy time but I know that our staff will always try their best to ensure you are comfortable with you room. Our housekeeping managers have been informed of the noise complaint from that area, and I can assure you this is not a normal occurrence, however it will be addressed with the staff to ensure it does not come up again.  We do offer complimentary internet in our lobby 24-7. You can take advantage of this while enjoying your morning coffee or having a cocktail in the evening. We also have a business center located in the lobby for guests without a computer to gain access to the internet or print out a boarding pass. As for parking we offer a variety of options for our guests. There are complimentary shuttles that go to and from John Wayne Airport, as well as Fashion Island and Balboa Island. We also have a car rental service onsite as well as comparable valet and self-parking rates. We hope that you will have a chance to come back and hopefully we can show you that we listen to our guests by exceeding your expectations on your next stay. Thank you – Scott H

Summary Heading: Beatiful property, great breakfast, warm pools
Summary: We stayed a long weekend in late May when it was still a little cool out but they keep the pool water temp about 80!  We stayed in the Lido section, which was farthest away from the lobby and the only pool without a bar....otherwise, the room and bed were great.  The only meals we ate on side were breakfast and it was great....try the chicken sausage!  We rented bikes one morning for $9 and rode down to the water.....great idea if you have some free time.  Water is also within walking distance.
Manager Response: Hello Lori, it was really great reading your wonderful comments regarding your stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. It sounds like you had a great idea in taking the bikes down to the beach, I would also recomend a ride around Back Bay. The bay is home to plenty of wildlife, and some of the birds can only be found in this specific area. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed breakfast in our new restaurant SHOR American Seafood Grill. If you are able to visit us again I would highly reccomend having dinner at SHOR. The restaurant proudly offers food options that are good for the guest, good for the community and good for the planet and food from natural, local and sustainable sources. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: We stayed here over Memorial Day weekend for a reunion.  The grounds were very nice and the renovations they made were great.  My largest complaint is with our room.  We had a double room with a nice view of the bay.  Only a few rooms have a view of the bay which is nice but since they are the only rooms on the road they are somewhat noisy.  The beds in the room are SO small.  My husband and I barely both fit into the same bed.  My largest complaint is with the bathroom doors...sounds silly but it was such an annoying part of our stay.  The new doors they put on the bathroom are more like shutters so every time you go in the bathroom, close the "doors" and turn on the lights it is basically like turning on the lights in the whole room.  This is an issue for us because I tend to
Manager Response: Hi Jordan, thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach. We are glad to hear your positive feed back, but are really sorry to hear that you had some issues with the newly renovated room. We take all of our guests feedback very serious and will look into the issue to see if there is a way we can alleviate it so no future guests has the same problem. Please come back and visit us the next time you stay in Orange County, we look forward to exceeding your expectation. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: We got to experience the Hyatt Newporter for the first time during a little stay-cation and loved it! We're always working opposite hours so its hard to get a weekend away but this was the perfect solution. We actually felt like we were on vacation somewhere tropical!  The hotel was just completing renovations so the larger pool wasn't open, but the pool that our room overlooked was just fine, plus it offered complimentary bed-type loungers.  Our room was very comfortable and newly renovated. The beds were nice and linens were crisp and soft. The bathroom even had great products in it too and there were robes and a safe in the closet. The only thing the room was missing were hooks to hang your used towels.   Even though its in our own backyard, we would gladly enjoy another
Manager Response: It is so wonderful to hear that you had such a perfect Stay-cation! We are happy to know that you were able to experience our upgraded pool and rooms. Since you are so close by we really hope that you will be able to come back soon and possibly enjoy a Friday night during our Summer Concert Series which is starting 6/21/13. Or you can just come in for another quick escape, and enjoy our golf course on a beautiful summer afternoon, and then go for a bike ride around back bay while watching the sunset. Either way we look forward to having you come back. Thank you - Scott H

Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach over Memorial Day Weekend!  We had originally "applied" for an upgrade to a suite for an extra fee (so the kids could sleep in a separate room).  Upon arriving, we were told that we got the suite, however when we arrived at the room, the suite was really just an extra board room, with a conference table (meaning the kids would still be in our room).  We called and told them our situation and we're hoping to move to a different suite, but expecting to move back to a regular room.  To our surprise, they upgraded us to another suite with our OWN private pool (not huge, but private - probably 10x16 feet).  The room was great as well, with full kitchenette, living room (pullout sofa for kids) and private bedroom.    The
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you taking the time to write such delighful words about the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach, and most of all we are thrilled to hear that your stay was so enjoyable. We look forward to you and your family joining us again in the future. Thank you - Scott H
